words.mnemonic_zh: ab（离去）+ don（给予），把东西留下离去即放弃
words.example_en: He decided to abandon his old car and buy a new one.
words.example_zh: 他决定放弃他的旧车，买一辆新的。
words.en_def: To give up or leave permanently.

sentences.en: They had to abandon the sinking ship.
sentences.zh: 他们不得不放弃正在下沉的船。

sentences.en: He abandoned his family.
sentences.zh: 他抛弃了他的家人。

words.mnemonic_zh: ab（偏离）+ norm（规则）+ al，偏离规则就是不正常的
words.example_en: The abnormal weather made people feel uncomfortable.
words.example_zh: 异常的天气让人们感觉不舒服。
words.en_def: A person or object that is not normal.

words.cn_def: 在（船、飞机、公共汽车等）上
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“阿伯登”，想象阿伯登上了车
words.example_en: The passengers are already aboard the plane.
words.example_zh: 乘客们已经登上飞机了。
words.en_def: On board; into or within a ship or boat; hence, into or within a railway car.

sentences.en: We all climbed aboard.
sentences.zh: 我们都爬上了船。

sentences.en: To sling a saddle aboard.
sentences.zh: 将马鞍吊在船上。

sentences.en: He doubled with two men aboard, scoring them both.
sentences.zh: 他在两名球员的情况下包夹，两人都得分。

words.root_cn: 可能源于拉丁语词根，有“生长”反义相关含义
words.mnemonic_zh: ab（去除）+ olish，把东西去除就是废除
words.example_en: They planned to abolish the old regulations.
words.example_zh: 他们计划废除旧的规定。
words.morph_note: 词根来源较复杂，此为简化拆解
words.en_def: To end a law, system, institution, custom or practice.

sentences.en: Slavery was abolished in the nineteenth century.
sentences.zh: 奴隶制于十九世纪被废除。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: ab（偏离）+ ort（生长）+ ion，胎儿偏离正常生长即流产
words.example_zh: In some countries, abortion is a controversial issue.
words.example_en: 在一些国家，堕胎是一个有争议的问题。
words.en_def: The expulsion from the womb of a foetus or embryo before it is fully developed, with loss of the foetus; either naturally as a spontaneous abortion (now usually called a miscarriage), or deliberately as an induced abortion.

words.mnemonic_zh: ab（离去）+ sence（存在）+ e，人离去了就是缺席
words.example_en: His absence made the meeting less lively.
words.example_zh: 他的缺席让会议没那么活跃了。
words.en_def: A state of being away or withdrawn from a place or from companionship; the period of being away.

sentences.en: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
sentences.zh: 缺席使心变得更亲近。

sentences.en: He had an absence of enthusiasm.
sentences.zh: 他缺乏热情。

sentences.en: absence of mind
sentences.zh: 心不在焉

words.mnemonic_zh: ab（离去）+ sent（存在），人不在就是缺席的
words.example_en: Many students were absent from school today.
words.example_zh: 今天很多学生没上学。
words.en_def: (with definite article) Something absent, especially absent people collectively; those who were or are not there.

sentences.en: The part was rudimental or absent.
sentences.zh: 该部分是简陋的或不存在的。

sentences.en: Absent taxes modern governments cannot function.
sentences.zh: 没有税收，现代政府就无法运作。

sentences.en: Most of the men are retired, jobless, or have otherwise temporarily absented themselves from the workplace.
sentences.zh: 大多数男性已经退休、失业，或者暂时离开工作场所。

words.mnemonic_zh: ab（完全）+ solut（解开）+ ely，完全解开就是绝对地
words.example_en: He is absolutely right in this matter.
words.example_zh: 在这件事上他绝对是对的。
words.en_def: In an absolute or unconditional manner; utterly, positively, wholly.

sentences.en:
Do you want a free cookie with that coffee?
Absolutely!
sentences.zh:
您想要免费的饼干和咖啡吗？ 
绝对地！

words.mnemonic_zh: ab（加强）+ sorb（吸），加强吸的动作即吸收
words.example_en: Plants can absorb carbon dioxide and release oxygen.
words.example_zh: 植物能吸收二氧化碳并释放氧气。
words.en_def: To include so that it no longer has separate existence; to overwhelm; to cause to disappear as if by swallowing up; to incorporate; to assimilate; to take in and use up.

sentences.en: Heat, light, and electricity are absorbed in the substances into which they pass.
sentences.zh: 热、光和电被它们所进入的物质吸收。

words.mnemonic_zh: ab（偏离）+ surd（不合理），偏离合理就是荒谬的
words.example_en: His absurd idea was rejected by everyone.
words.example_zh: 他荒谬的想法被大家拒绝了。
words.en_def: An absurdity.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态或性质
words.mnemonic_zh: “ab-”表过度，“und”像水流动，水多就是充裕啦
words.example_en: The region has an abundance of natural resources waiting to be exploited.
words.example_zh: 该地区有丰富的自然资源有待开发。
words.en_def: A large quantity; many.

words.mnemonic_zh: “ab-”表示错，错误使用就是滥用
words.example_en: He was found guilty of abuse of power in his position.
words.example_zh: 他被判定犯有滥用职权罪。
words.en_def: Improper treatment or usage; application to a wrong or bad purpose; an unjust, corrupt or wrongful practice or custom.

sentences.en: All abuse, whether physical, verbal, psychological or sexual, is bad.
sentences.zh: 所有的虐待，无论是身体上的、言语上的、心理上的还是性上的，都是不好的。

sentences.en: He abused his authority.
sentences.zh: 他滥用职权。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“阿克大蜜”，院士都是大能人
words.example_en: The academy offers a variety of courses for students.
words.example_zh: 该学院为学生提供各种课程。
words.en_def: (usually capitalized) The garden where Plato taught.

sentences.en: the military academy at West Point; a riding academy; the Academy of Music.; a music academy; a language academy
sentences.zh: 西点军校； 马术学院； 音乐学院。 音乐学院； 语言学院

words.mnemonic_zh: “ac-”加强，提升“速度”就是加速
words.example_en: The government plans to accelerate economic development.
words.example_zh: 政府计划加快经济发展。
words.en_def: To cause to move faster; to quicken the motion of; to add to the speed of.

sentences.en: to accelerate the growth of a plant, the increase of wealth, etc.
sentences.zh: 加速植物的生长、财富的增加等。

sentences.en: to accelerate our departure
sentences.zh: 加速我们的出发

words.mnemonic_zh: “accept”接受，加上“able”就是能被接受的
words.example_en: This solution seems to be an acceptable compromise.
words.example_zh: 这个解决方案似乎是一个可以接受的折中办法。
words.en_def: Worthy, decent, sure of being accepted or received with at least moderate pleasure

sentences.en: We need to find an acceptable present for Jeff.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为杰夫找到一件可以接受的礼物。

sentences.en: The designs were acceptable, but they were nothing special either.
sentences.zh: 这些设计是可以接受的，但也没什么特别的。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态或行为
words.mnemonic_zh: “accept”接受，加“ance”表状态，即接受状态
words.example_en: The proposal gained wide acceptance among the committee members.
words.example_zh: 该提案在委员会成员中得到了广泛认可。
words.en_def: The act of accepting; a receiving of something offered, with acquiescence, approbation, or satisfaction; especially, favourable reception; approval.

sentences.en: the acceptance of a gift, office, doctrine, etc.
sentences.zh: 接受礼物、职位、教义等

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表被动或完成
words.mnemonic_zh: “accept”接受，加“ed”就是已被接受的
words.example_en: The accepted theory has been challenged by new evidence.
words.example_zh: 这个公认的理论受到了新证据的挑战。
words.en_def: To receive, especially with a consent, with favour, or with approval.

sentences.en: The Boy Scouts were going to accept him as a member.
sentences.zh: 童子军将接受他为会员。

sentences.en: I accept the notion that Christ lived.
sentences.zh: 我接受基督活着的观念。

sentences.en: I accept your proposal, amendment, or excuse.
sentences.zh: 我接受你的建议、修正或借口。

words.mnemonic_zh: “access”能进入，加“ible”就是可进入的
words.example_en: The building is easily accessible by public transportation.
words.example_zh: 乘坐公共交通工具很容易到达这座建筑。
words.en_def: Easy of access or approach.

sentences.en: an accessible town or mountain
sentences.zh: 交通便利的城镇或山区

sentences.en: accessible public transport
sentences.zh: 无障碍公共交通

words.suffix_cn: 名词或形容词后缀，表相关事物或性质
words.mnemonic_zh: “access”附属的东西，加“ory”就是配件
words.example_en: She bought some fashionable accessories to match her dress.
words.example_zh: 她买了一些时尚的配饰来搭配她的连衣裙。
words.en_def: Having a secondary, supplementary or subordinate function by accompanying as a subordinate; aiding in a secondary way; being additional; being connected as an incident or subordinate to a principal; contributing or being contributory. Said of people and things, and, when of people, usually in a bad sense

sentences.en: She was accessory to the riot.
sentences.zh: 她是骚乱的同谋。

sentences.en: the accessories of a mobile phone
sentences.zh: 手机配件

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表被动或完成
words.mnemonic_zh: “ac-”加强，“claim”呼喊，加强呼喊赞扬就是备受赞扬
words.example_en: The acclaimed artist held a successful exhibition last month.
words.example_zh: 这位备受赞誉的艺术家上个月举办了一场成功的展览。
words.en_def: To shout; to call out.

sentences.en: a highly-acclaimed novel
sentences.zh: 一本广受好评的小说

sentences.en: Many critically acclaimed novels are not commercially successful.
sentences.zh: 许多广受好评的小说在商业上并不成功。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一再（ac）努力就能完成（complish）事情
words.example_en: He managed to accomplish the difficult task on time.
words.example_zh: 他设法按时完成了这项艰巨的任务。
words.en_def: To finish successfully.

sentences.en: to accomplish a design, an object, a promise
sentences.zh: 完成一个设计、一个目标、一个承诺

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 完成（accomplish）之事就是成就（-ment）
words.example_en: Her greatest accomplishment was winning the Nobel Prize.
words.example_zh: 她最大的成就是获得了诺贝尔奖。
words.en_def: The act of accomplishing; completion; fulfilment.

sentences.en: the accomplishment of an enterprise, of a prophecy, etc
sentences.zh: 一项事业、一个预言等的实现

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、性质
words.mnemonic_zh: 内心（cord）一致（ac-加强）的状态（-ance）
words.example_en: We should act in accordance with the rules.
words.example_zh: 我们应该按照规则行事。
words.en_def: Agreement; harmony; conformity; compliance.

words.mnemonic_zh: 与情况一致（ac-cord）地去做（-ing）就是相应地（-ly）
words.example_en: The weather changed; accordingly, we postponed the picnic.
words.example_zh: 天气变了，因此我们推迟了野餐。
words.en_def: (manner) Agreeably; correspondingly; suitably

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 一再（ac）要计算（count）清楚的性质（-ability）就是责任
words.example_en: The company emphasizes employee accountability.
words.example_zh: 公司强调员工的责任感。
words.en_def: The state of being accountable; liability to be called on to render an account; accountableness; responsible for; answerable for.

words.mnemonic_zh: 能（-able）一再（ac）被计算（count）的就是有责任的
words.example_en: Managers should be accountable for their decisions.
words.example_zh: 管理者应该对自己的决策负责。
words.en_def: Obliged, when called upon, to answer (for one’s deeds); answerable.

sentences.en: Every man is accountable to God for his conduct.
sentences.zh: 每个人都要为自己的行为向上帝负责。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一再（ac）堆积（cumul）起来（-ate）就是积累
words.example_en: He has accumulated a lot of wealth over the years.
words.example_zh: 这些年来他积累了大量财富。
words.en_def: To heap up in a mass; to pile up; to collect or bring together (either literally or figuratively)

sentences.en: He wishes to accumulate a sum of money.
sentences.zh: 他希望积累一笔钱。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 积累（accumulate）的行为或结果（-ation）
words.example_en: The accumulation of dust made the room dirty.
words.example_zh: 灰尘的堆积使房间变脏了。
words.en_def: The act of amassing or gathering, as into a pile.

sentences.en: an accumulation of earth, of sand, of evils, of wealth, or of honors
sentences.zh: 土、沙、邪恶、财富或荣誉的积累

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 一再（ac）指责（cus）的行为（-ation）
words.example_en: The accusation against him was baseless.
words.example_zh: 对他的指控是毫无根据的。
words.en_def: The act of accusing.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词/动词过去式后缀
words.mnemonic_zh: 被一再（ac）指责（cus）的（-ed）就是被告
words.example_en: The accused maintained his innocence.
words.example_zh: 被告坚称自己无罪。
words.en_def: To find fault with, blame, censure

sentences.en: For the U.S. President to be impeached, he must be accused of a high crime or misdemeanor.
sentences.zh: 美国总统要被弹劾，他必须被指控犯有重罪或轻罪。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“唉，涩的”，酸的东西口感常是涩的。
words.example_en: Lemons contain a lot of acid which gives them a sour taste.
words.example_zh: 柠檬含有大量的酸，这使它们有酸味。
words.en_def: A sour substance.

sentences.en: acid fruits or liquors
sentences.zh: 酸性水果或酒

words.mnemonic_zh: 一再（ac-）表示知晓（knowledge），即承认。
words.example_en: He finally acknowledged his mistake after a long - time reflection.
words.example_zh: 经过长时间的反思，他最终承认了自己的错误。
words.en_def: To admit the knowledge of; to recognize as a fact or truth; to declare one's belief in

sentences.en: to acknowledge the being of a god
sentences.zh: 承认神的存在

sentences.en: to acknowledge a favor
sentences.zh: 表示谢意

sentences.en: This is to acknowledge your kind invitation to participate in the upcoming debate.
sentences.zh: 谨此感谢您参加即将举行的辩论的盛情邀请。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、性质
words.mnemonic_zh: 不断（ac-）了解（quaint），就有了相识（-ance）。
words.example_en: She has a wide circle of acquaintances in the business world.
words.example_zh: 她在商界有广泛的人脉。
words.en_def: A state of being acquainted with a person; originally indicating friendship, intimacy, but now suggesting a slight knowledge less deep than that of friendship; acquaintanceship.

sentences.en: I know of the man; but have no acquaintance with him.
sentences.zh: 我认识这个人； 但与他并不相识。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 一再（ac-）寻求（quisit）的结果（-ion）就是获得。
words.example_en: The company's recent acquisition will expand its market share.
words.example_zh: 公司最近的收购将扩大其市场份额。
words.en_def: The act or process of acquiring.

sentences.en: The acquisition of sports equipment can be fun in itself.
sentences.zh: 购买运动器材本身就很有趣。

sentences.en: That graphite tennis racquet is quite an acquisition.
sentences.zh: 那把石墨网球拍是一笔不小的收购。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“哎，可儿”，想象小孩对土地面积的好奇。
words.example_en: The farm covers an area of about 50 acres.
words.example_zh: 这个农场占地约 50 英亩。
words.en_def: An English unit of land area (symbol: a. or ac.) originally denoting a day's plowing for a yoke of oxen, now standardized as 4,840 square yards or 4,046.86 square meters.

sentences.en: I like my new house - there’s acres of space!
sentences.zh: 我喜欢我的新房子——有几英亩的空间！

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程
words.mnemonic_zh: 活跃（activ）起来的过程（-ation）就是激活。
words.example_en: The activation of the new system requires a special code.
words.example_zh: 新系统的激活需要一个特殊的代码。
words.en_def: Making active and effective; bringing into a state of activity.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 行动（act）起来的，就是活跃的（-ive）。
words.example_en: He is an active participant in various social activities.
words.example_zh: 他是各种社会活动的积极参与者。
words.en_def: A person or thing that is acting or capable of acting.

sentences.en: certain active principles
sentences.zh: 某些积极的原则

sentences.en: an active child or animal
sentences.zh: 活跃的儿童或动物

sentences.en: active hostilities
sentences.zh: 积极的敌对行动

words.mnemonic_zh: 活跃（activ）的人（-ist）就是活动家。
words.example_en: The environmental activist is trying to protect the forest.
words.example_zh: 这位环保活动家正在努力保护森林。
words.en_def: One who is politically active in the role of a citizen; especially, one who campaigns for change.

words.mnemonic_zh: 像尖（acu）东西一样的，有敏锐之意。
words.example_en: The doctor diagnosed him with acute appendicitis.
words.example_zh: 医生诊断他患有急性阑尾炎。
words.en_def: A person who has the acute form of a disorder, such as schizophrenia.

sentences.en: The word ‘cafe’ often has an acute over the ‘e’.
sentences.zh: “cafe”这个词通常在“e”上方带有尖音符。

sentences.en: He acutes his rising inflection too much.
sentences.zh: 他的上升语调过于尖锐。

sentences.en: It was an acute event.
sentences.zh: 这是一次严重的事件。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 适应（adapt）的结果（-ation）就是适应状态或改编产物。
words.example_en: The adaptation of the novel into a movie was a great success.
words.example_zh: 这部小说改编成电影非常成功。
words.en_def: The process of adapting something or becoming adapted to a situation; adjustment, modification.

words.mnemonic_zh: 一直说要，容易上瘾
words.example_en: Video games can be highly addictive for some people.
words.example_zh: 电子游戏对有些人来说极易上瘾。
words.en_def: A drug that causes an addiction.

sentences.en: These are addictive drugs.
sentences.zh: 这些都是令人上瘾的药物。

sentences.en: Have you seen that new TV show? It's so addictive.
sentences.zh: 你看过那个新电视节目吗？ 太让人上瘾了。

sentences.en: He has an addictive personality.
sentences.zh: 他有一种令人上瘾的个性。

words.mnemonic_zh: 朝着众人整理话语来演说
words.example_en: The president will address the nation tonight.
words.example_zh: 总统今晚将向全国发表演说。
words.en_def: Direction.

sentences.en: He addressed some portions of his remarks to his supporters, some to his opponents.
sentences.zh: 他的言论有些是针对他的支持者的，有些是针对他的反对者的。

sentences.en: He addressed a letter.
sentences.zh: 他写了一封信。

sentences.en: The ship was addressed to a merchant in Baltimore.
sentences.zh: 这艘船的收件人是巴尔的摩的一位商人。

words.mnemonic_zh: 紧紧黏附，坚持不放弃
words.example_en: You should adhere to the rules of the game.
words.example_zh: 你应该遵守游戏规则。
words.en_def: To stick fast or cleave, as a glutinous substance does; to become joined or united.

sentences.en: wax adhered to his finger
sentences.zh: 蜡粘在他的手指上

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，具有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 躺在一起，相邻着
words.example_en: Our house is adjacent to a beautiful park.
words.example_zh: 我们家房子毗邻一个美丽的公园。
words.en_def: Something that lies next to something else, especially the side of a right triangle that is neither the hypotenuse nor the opposite.

sentences.en: Because the conference room is filled, we will have our meeting in the adjacent room.
sentences.zh: 由于会议室已满，我们将在隔壁房间开会。

sentences.en: The picture is on the adjacent page.
sentences.zh: 图片位于相邻页上。

sentences.en: A notice was sent to the house adjacent the school.
sentences.zh: 通知已发送至学校附近的房屋。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 不断让事情变恰当，就是调整
words.example_en: Some adjustment to the plan is necessary.
words.example_zh: 对计划做些调整是必要的。
words.en_def: The action of adjusting something

sentences.en: The credit card company made an adjustment to my account to waive the late fee.
sentences.zh: 信用卡公司对我的账户进行了调整，免除了滞纳金。

sentences.en: When Jim graduated, he found adjustment to the working world difficult.
sentences.zh: 吉姆毕业后，他发现适应工作世界很困难。

words.mnemonic_zh: 不断加强服务管理的职责
words.example_en: The new manager will administer the company well.
words.example_zh: 新经理会把公司管理好的。
words.en_def: To cause to ingest (a drug), either by openly offering or through deceit.

sentences.en: We administered the medicine to our dog by mixing it in his food.
sentences.zh: 我们通过将药物混合在狗的食物中来给他服用。

sentences.en: administering to the sick
sentences.zh: 给病人服用

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 加强管理的行为和部门
words.example_en: The school administration is responsible for campus safety.
words.example_zh: 学校行政管理部门负责校园安全。
words.en_def: The act of administering; government of public affairs; the service rendered, or duties assumed, in conducting affairs; the conducting of any office or employment; direction.

sentences.en: Successive US administrations have had similar Middle East policies.
sentences.zh: 历届美国政府都有类似的中东政策。

sentences.en: oral administration of insulin
sentences.zh: 口服胰岛素

sentences.en: The company went into voluntary administration last week.
sentences.zh: 该公司上周进入自愿托管。

words.mnemonic_zh: 有加强服务管理性质的
words.example_en: Administrative work requires great patience.
words.example_zh: 行政工作需要极大的耐心。
words.en_def: Of or relating to administering or administration.

words.mnemonic_zh: 负责加强管理的人
words.example_en: The administrator made some important decisions.
words.example_zh: 这位管理者做出了一些重要决定。
words.en_def: One who administers affairs; one who directs, manages, executes, or dispenses, whether in civil, judicial, political, or ecclesiastical affairs; a manager

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 加强放行就是准许进入
words.example_en: His admission to the club made him very happy.
words.example_zh: 他被俱乐部接纳让他非常开心。
words.en_def: The act or practice of admitting.

sentences.en: I request admission for two adults
sentences.zh: 我请求两名成人入场

sentences.en: There is no way he has seen that show, the admission is more than he makes in a week.
sentences.zh: 他不可能看过那个节目，入场费比他一周赚的钱还要多。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“阿福特”，可记成阿福在特的后面，即之后
words.example_en: He went to the park after finishing his homework.
words.example_zh: 他做完作业后去了公园。
words.en_def: Later; second (of two); next, following, subsequent

sentences.en: The after gun is abaft the forward gun.
sentences.zh: 后炮位于前炮后方。

sentences.en: I left the room, and the dog bounded after.
sentences.zh: 我离开了房间，狗跟着跳了起来。

sentences.en: The Cold War began shortly after the Second World War.
sentences.zh: 第二次世界大战后不久，冷战就开始了。

words.mnemonic_zh: after（之后）+ math（看作麻烦），之后的麻烦就是后果
words.example_en: The city is still recovering from the aftermath of the earthquake.
words.example_zh: 这座城市仍在从地震的后果中恢复。
words.en_def: A second mowing; the grass which grows after the first crop of hay in the same season.

sentences.en: In contrast to most projections of the aftermath of nuclear war, in this there is no rioting or looting.
sentences.zh: 与大多数对核战争后果的预测相反，这里没有骚乱或抢劫。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、机构
words.mnemonic_zh: ag（行动）+ ency，行动的地方就是代理机构
words.example_en: She found a job through a recruitment agency.
words.example_zh: 她通过一家招聘机构找到了一份工作。
words.en_def: The capacity, condition, or state of acting or of exerting power.

sentences.en: individual agency
sentences.zh: 个体代理机构

sentences.en: authority of agency
sentences.zh: 代理权

sentences.en: Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry
sentences.zh: 有毒物质和疾病登记局

words.mnemonic_zh: ag（行动）+ enda，要行动的事项就是议程
words.example_en: The first item on the agenda is the budget discussion.
words.example_zh: 议程上的第一项是预算讨论。
words.en_def: A temporally organized plan for matters to be attended to.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: ag（加强）+ gress（行走）+ ion，强行往前走就是侵略
words.example_en: The country's aggression led to a serious international conflict.
words.example_zh: 该国的侵略行为导致了一场严重的国际冲突。
words.en_def: The act of initiating hostilities or invasion.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: ag（加强）+ gress（行走）+ ive，强行向前走的就是有侵略性的
words.example_en: He has an aggressive personality and always wants to win.
words.example_zh: 他有很强的进取心，总是想赢。
words.en_def: Characterized by aggression; unjustly attacking; prone to behave in a way that involves attacking or arguing.

sentences.en: an aggressive policy, war, person, nation
sentences.zh: 侵略性政策、战争、个人、国家

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“饿鬼”，饿鬼同意给吃的就不闹了
words.example_en: They agree to meet at the coffee shop tomorrow.
words.example_zh: 他们同意明天在咖啡店见面。
words.en_def: To harmonize in opinion, statement, or action; to be in unison or concord; to be or become united or consistent; to concur.

sentences.en: all parties agree in the expediency of the law.
sentences.zh: 各方均在法律允许的范围内达成一致。

sentences.en: to agree to an offer, or to opinion.
sentences.zh: 同意某项提议或意见。

sentences.en: the picture does not agree with the original; the two scales agree exactly.
sentences.zh: 图片与原图不符； 两个量表完全一致。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关的
words.mnemonic_zh: agri（农业）+ cult（耕种）+ ural，与农业耕种有关的
words.example_en: This region has a strong agricultural tradition.
words.example_zh: 这个地区有浓厚的农业传统。
words.en_def: A product or commodity from agriculture.

sentences.en: An agricultural tool
sentences.zh: 一种农业工具

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“诶的”，诶，是给你的援助
words.example_en: The government provided financial aid to the poor families.
words.example_zh: 政府向贫困家庭提供了经济援助。
words.en_def: Help; assistance; succor, relief.

sentences.en: He came to my aid when I was foundering.
sentences.zh: 当我陷入困境时，他来帮助我。

sentences.en: Slimming aids include dietary supplements and appetite suppressants.
sentences.zh: 减肥辅助剂包括膳食补充剂和食欲抑制剂。

sentences.en: The incompetent general's brilliant aid often made priceless suggestions.
sentences.zh: 无能将军的出色援助常常提出无价的建议。

words.mnemonic_zh: 和 aid（援助）形似，助手就是给予援助的人
words.example_en: The president's aide accompanied him to the meeting.
words.example_zh: 总统的助手陪同他参加了会议。
words.en_def: An assistant.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“我拉母”，拉着母亲是因有警报
words.example_en: The fire alarm went off suddenly in the building.
words.example_zh: 大楼里的火警警报突然响了起来。
words.en_def: A summons to arms, as on the approach of an enemy.

sentences.en: The clock radio is a friendlier version of the cold alarm by the bedside.
sentences.zh: 时钟收音机是床边冷闹钟的更友好版本。

sentences.en: You should set the alarm on your watch to go off at seven o'clock.
sentences.zh: 你应该将手表上的闹钟设置为七点钟响。

words.cn_def: 令人惊恐的；使人担忧的
words.mnemonic_zh: alarm加ing，警报让人担忧
words.example_en: The alarming increase in pollution needs urgent attention.
words.example_zh: 污染的惊人增长需要紧急关注。
words.en_def: To call to arms for defense

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音联想“偶被踢”，虽被踢但还坚持
words.example_en: He agreed to help, albeit reluctantly.
words.example_zh: 他同意帮忙，尽管很不情愿。
words.en_def: Although, despite (it) being.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“饿了他”，饿了会警觉找吃的
words.example_en: Drivers should stay alert on the icy roads.
words.example_zh: 司机在结冰的道路上应保持警觉。
words.en_def: An alarm.

sentences.en: an airborne alert; ground alert
sentences.zh: 空中警报； 地面警报

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“爱怜”，对外星人好奇又爱怜
words.example_en: Many movies are about aliens visiting the Earth.
words.example_zh: 很多电影都是关于外星人访问地球的。
words.en_def: Any life form of extraterrestrial or extradimensional origin.

sentences.en: alien subjects, enemies, property, or shores
sentences.zh: 外来主体、敌人、财产或海岸

sentences.en: principles alien to our religion
sentences.zh: 与我们的宗教不同的原则

words.mnemonic_zh: a（使）+ lign（线），使成一线
words.example_en: Please align the pictures on the wall neatly.
words.example_zh: 请把墙上的画整齐地对齐。
words.en_def: To form a line; to fall into line.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: align加ment，对齐的状态
words.example_en: The alignment of the wheels needs to be checked regularly.
words.example_zh: 车轮的对齐情况需要定期检查。
words.en_def: An arrangement of items in a line.

words.mnemonic_zh: a（处于）+ like（像），处于相像状态
words.example_en: The twins look alike and are often mistaken for each other.
words.example_zh: 这对双胞胎长得很像，经常被认错。
words.en_def: Having resemblance or similitude; similar; without difference.

sentences.en: The twins were alike.
sentences.zh: 双胞胎很相似。

sentences.en: We are all alike concerned in religion.
sentences.zh: 我们都同样关心宗教。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: allege加ation，宣称的结果是指控
words.example_en: The allegation against the politician caused a stir.
words.example_zh: 对这位政治家的指控引起了轰动。
words.en_def: An assertion, especially an accusation, not necessarily based on facts.

sentences.en: She put forth several allegations regarding her partner in hopes of discrediting his actions.
sentences.zh: 她对她的伴侣提出了几项指控，希望抹黑他的行为。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“我来指”，来指控宣称
words.example_en: He alleged that he was innocent in the court.
words.example_zh: 他在法庭上宣称自己是无辜的。
words.en_def: To state under oath, to plead.

sentences.en: The agency alleged my credit history had problems.
sentences.zh: 该机构声称我的信用记录有问题。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表被动或完成
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家都在说的，就是所谓的
words.example_en: The alleged criminal was arrested last night by the police.
words.example_zh: 那名所谓的罪犯昨晚被警方逮捕了。
words.en_def: To state under oath, to plead.

sentences.en: The agency alleged my credit history had problems.
sentences.zh: 该机构声称我的信用记录有问题。

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词后缀 -ed 加 -ly 构成
words.mnemonic_zh: 据说就是大家都在说的情况
words.example_en: The suspect allegedly stole a large amount of money from the bank.
words.example_zh: 据称，嫌疑人从银行偷走了一大笔钱。
words.en_def: According to someone's allegation.

sentences.en: The suspect was allegedly involved in the robbery, but his alibi placed him in another state at the time.
sentences.zh: 嫌疑人据称参与了这起抢劫案，但他的不在场证明使他当时处于另一个州。

sentences.en: The game is allegedly exciting.
sentences.zh: 据说这场比赛很精彩。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态或行为
words.mnemonic_zh: 绑在一起，形成联盟
words.example_en: The two countries formed an alliance to fight against the common enemy.
words.example_zh: 两国结成联盟，共同对抗共同的敌人。
words.en_def: The state of being allied.

sentences.en: matrimonial alliances; an alliance between church and state, or between two countries
sentences.zh: 婚姻联盟； 教会与国家或两国之间的联盟

words.mnemonic_zh: 把东西放到合适的地方，即分配
words.example_en: The government decided to allocate more funds to education.
words.example_zh: 政府决定为教育拨出更多资金。
words.en_def: To set aside for a purpose.

sentences.en: The bulk of K–12 education funds are allocated to school districts that in turn pay for the cost of operating schools.
sentences.zh: K-12 教育资金的大部分分配给学区，学区又支付学校的运营成本。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 分配行为的结果就是配给
words.example_en: The allocation of resources should be based on fairness.
words.example_zh: 资源分配应该基于公平原则。
words.en_def: The process or procedure for allocating things, especially money or other resources.

sentences.en: The allocation of new permits is on a first-come, first-served basis.
sentences.zh: 新许可证的分配遵循先到先得的原则。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“额，喽”，像同意时发出的声音
words.example_en: Parents should allow children to make their own decisions.
words.example_zh: 父母应该允许孩子自己做决定。
words.en_def: To grant, give, admit, accord, afford, or yield; to let one have.

sentences.en: to allow a servant his liberty;  to allow a free passage;  to allow one day for rest
sentences.zh: 给予仆人自由； 允许自由通行； 留出一天休息时间

sentences.en: to allow a right;  to allow a claim;  to allow the truth of a proposition
sentences.zh: 允许一项权利； 允许索赔； 允许命题的真实性

sentences.en: To allow a sum for leakage.
sentences.zh: 允许泄漏的金额。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 被允许得到的钱，就是津贴
words.example_en: She gets a monthly allowance from her parents.
words.example_zh: 她每月从父母那里得到一笔津贴。
words.en_def: Permission; granting, conceding, or admitting

sentences.en: her meagre allowance of food or drink
sentences.zh: 她微薄的食物或饮料

sentences.en: to make allowance for his naivety
sentences.zh: 体谅他的天真

sentences.en: Tare and tret are examples of allowance.
sentences.zh: 去皮和去重是余量的例子。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“爱理”，爱搭理的就是盟友
words.example_en: The country has many allies in the international community.
words.example_zh: 这个国家在国际社会有很多盟友。
words.en_def: A person, group, or state (etc) which is associated with another for a common cause; one united to another by treaty or common purpose; a confederate.

sentences.en: the two countries were allies in WWI
sentences.zh: 两国在第一次世界大战中是盟友

sentences.en: Gruiformes — cranes and allies
sentences.zh: 鹤形目 — 鹤和盟友

sentences.en: The parking lot to my friend's apartment building is in the alley.
sentences.zh: 我朋友公寓楼的停车场在巷子里。

words.mnemonic_zh: 沿着边，就在旁边
words.example_en: The ship docked alongside the quay.
words.example_zh: 船停靠在码头边。
words.en_def: Along the side; by the side; side by side with.

sentences.en: Ahoy! Bring your boat alongside mine.
sentences.zh: 哎哟！ 把你的船带到我的旁边。

sentences.en: The nurse worked alongside the doctor.
sentences.zh: 护士与医生一起工作。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 改变的行为或结果就是变更
words.example_en: The alteration of the plan caused some confusion.
words.example_zh: 计划的变更引起了一些混乱。
words.en_def: The act of altering or making different.

words.mnemonic_zh: altern（交替）+ ate，交替着做就是轮流
words.example_en: They alternate in taking care of the children on weekends.
words.example_zh: 他们在周末轮流照顾孩子。
words.en_def: That which alternates with something else; vicissitude.

sentences.en: The flood and ebb tides alternate with each other.
sentences.zh: 涨潮和落潮交替出现。

sentences.en: The land alternates between rocky hills and sandy plains.
sentences.zh: 这片土地在岩石山丘和沙质平原之间交替。

sentences.en: alternate picking is a guitar playing technique
sentences.zh: 交替拨弦是一种吉他演奏技术

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音类似“铝镁你唔”，联想和铝有关
words.example_en: Aluminium is widely used in the aerospace industry.
words.example_zh: 铝在航空航天工业中被广泛使用。
words.en_def: A light, silvery metal extracted from bauxite, and a chemical element (symbol Al) with an atomic number of 13.

words.mnemonic_zh: amat（爱）+ eur（人），因为爱而参与的人是业余爱好者
words.example_en: Many amateur photographers participate in the competition.
words.example_zh: 许多业余摄影师参加了这次比赛。
words.en_def: A lover of something.

sentences.en: The contest is only open to amateurs.
sentences.zh: 该比赛仅对业余爱好者开放。

sentences.en: The entire thing was built by some amateurs with screwdrivers and plywood.
sentences.zh: 整个东西是由一些业余爱好者用螺丝刀和胶合板建造的。

sentences.en: amateur sports
sentences.zh: 业余运动

words.mnemonic_zh: ambass（使命）+ ador（人），带着使命的人是大使
words.example_en: The ambassador is responsible for promoting bilateral relations.
words.example_zh: 大使负责促进双边关系。
words.en_def: A minister of the highest rank sent to a foreign court to represent there his sovereign or country. (Sometimes called ambassador-in-residence)

sentences.en: As front hall porter, you are an ambassador for the hotel.
sentences.zh: 作为前厅行李员，您是酒店的大使。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“俺 mend（修补）”，就是修改
words.example_en: They decided to amend the contract according to the new situation.
words.example_zh: 他们决定根据新情况修改合同。
words.en_def: (usually in the plural) An act of righting a wrong; compensation.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: amend（修改）+ ment（结果），修改的结果是修正案
words.example_en: The amendment to the law was passed by the parliament.
words.example_zh: 这项法律修正案被议会通过了。
words.en_def: An alteration or change for the better; correction of a fault or of faults; reformation of life by quitting vices.

sentences.en: The First Amendment guarantees freedom of religion, speech, press, assembly, and petition.
sentences.zh: 第一修正案保障宗教、言论、新闻、集会和请愿自由。

sentences.en: a soil amendment
sentences.zh: 土壤改良剂

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“俺迷的”，在一堆东西中迷失，就是在……之中
words.example_en: He found his book amid a pile of papers.
words.example_zh: 他在一堆文件中找到了他的书。
words.en_def: In the middle of; in the center of; surrounded by.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音联想“俺mong（懵）”，在一群人里懵了，即在……之中
words.example_en: The house stands among the trees.
words.example_zh: 那座房子位于树林之中。
words.en_def: Denotes a mingling or intermixing with distinct or separable objects. (See Usage Note at amidst.)

sentences.en: How can you speak with authority about their customs when you have never lived among them?
sentences.zh: 如果你从未在他们中间生活过，你怎么能有权威地谈论他们的习俗呢？

sentences.en: He is among the few who completely understand the subject.
sentences.zh: 他是少数完全理解这个主题的人之一。

sentences.en: Lactose intolerance is common among people of Asian heritage.
sentences.zh: 乳糖不耐症在亚洲血统的人群中很常见。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“俺剖了”，把东西剖了很多，就是充足丰富
words.example_en: There is ample evidence to prove his innocence.
words.example_zh: 有充足的证据证明他的清白。
words.en_def: Large; great in size, extent, capacity, or bulk; for example spacious, roomy or widely extended.

sentences.en: an ample house
sentences.zh: 宽敞的房子

sentences.en: ample material
sentences.zh: 充足的材料

sentences.en: an ample story
sentences.zh: 一个丰富的故事

words.mnemonic_zh: ana（类似）+ log（推理）+ y，按类似情况推理就是类比
words.example_en: We can draw an analogy between the human heart and a pump.
words.example_zh: 我们可以把人的心脏和水泵作类比。
words.en_def: A relationship of resemblance or equivalence between two situations, people, or objects, especially when used as a basis for explanation or extrapolation.

words.mnemonic_zh: ana（再）+ lyt（解开）+ ical → 再解开分析
words.example_en: The scientist used analytical methods to solve the complex problem.
words.example_zh: 这位科学家用分析方法解决了这个复杂的问题。
words.en_def: Of or pertaining to analysis; resolving into elements or constituent parts

sentences.en: an analytical experiment
sentences.zh: 分析实验

sentences.en: an analytical mind
sentences.zh: 分析头脑

words.cn_def: 锚；给人安全感的物（或人）
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“安可”，锚能让船安稳
words.example_en: The ship dropped its anchor in the calm bay.
words.example_zh: 船在平静的海湾下锚了。
words.en_def: A tool used to moor a vessel to the bottom of a sea or river to resist movement.

sentences.en: Our ship (or the captain) anchored in the stream.
sentences.zh: 我们的船（或船长）停泊在溪流中。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“安琪儿”，可爱天使形象
words.example_en: She is like an angel who always helps others.
words.example_zh: 她就像一个总是帮助别人的天使。
words.en_def: An incorporeal and sometimes divine messenger from a deity, or other divine entity, often depicted in art as a youthful winged figure in flowing robes.

sentences.en: Thanks for making me breakfast in bed, you little angel.
sentences.zh: 谢谢你在床上为我准备早餐，你这个小天使。

sentences.en: Climb to angels sixty. (“ascend to 60,000 feet”)
sentences.zh: 爬到天使六十。 （“上升到 60,000 英尺”）

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“安勾”，角像勾的形状
words.example_en: You need to change the angle to see the whole picture.
words.example_zh: 你需要改变角度才能看到全貌。
words.en_def: A figure formed by two rays which start from a common point (a plane angle) or by three planes that intersect (a solid angle).

sentences.en: the angle between lines A and B
sentences.zh: 线 A 和 B 之间的角度

sentences.en: The angle between lines A and B is π/4 radians, or 45 degrees.
sentences.zh: 线 A 和 B 之间的角度为 π/4 弧度，即 45 度。

sentences.en: an angle of a building
sentences.zh: 建筑物的一个角度

words.mnemonic_zh: annoy（使烦恼）+ ance（状态）→ 烦恼状态
words.example_en: His constant noise caused great annoyance to the neighbors.
words.example_zh: 他不停的吵闹声让邻居们非常恼怒。
words.en_def: That which annoys.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: an（无）+ onym（名字）+ ous → 没有名字的
words.example_en: The anonymous letter revealed some important information.
words.example_zh: 那封匿名信透露了一些重要信息。
words.en_def: Lacking a name; not named, for example an animal not assigned to any species.

sentences.en: an anonymous pamphlet
sentences.zh: 匿名小册子

sentences.en: No customer personal data will be retained unless it is rendered anonymous.
sentences.zh: 除非匿名，否则不会保留任何客户个人数据。

sentences.en: an anonymous office block in a soulless industrial estate
sentences.zh: 毫无灵魂的工业区中的一栋匿名办公楼

words.mnemonic_zh: anti（先）+ cip（拿）+ ate → 先拿到预期
words.example_en: They anticipate a significant increase in sales this year.
words.example_zh: 他们预计今年的销售额会大幅增长。
words.en_def: To act before (someone), especially to prevent an action.

sentences.en: The advocate plans to anticipate a part of her argument.
sentences.zh: 辩护人计划预测她的论点的一部分。

sentences.en: Please anticipate a journey of an hour from your house to the airport
sentences.zh: 请预计从您家到机场的车程为一小时

sentences.en: Little Johnny started to anticipate the arrival of Santa Claus a week before Christmas.
sentences.zh: 圣诞节前一周，小约翰尼开始期待圣诞老人的到来。

words.mnemonic_zh: any（任何）+ how（方式）→ 不管用什么方式
words.example_en: Anyhow, we must finish this task today.
words.example_zh: 无论如何，我们今天必须完成这项任务。
words.en_def: (manner) In any way or manner whatever.

sentences.en: Anyhow, he is dead now.
sentences.zh: 无论如何，他现在已经死了。

words.cn_def: 令人震惊的；骇人听闻的
words.mnemonic_zh: ap（加强）+ pall（害怕）+ ing → 非常令人害怕的
words.example_en: The appalling accident scene left everyone in shock.
words.example_zh: 那可怕的事故现场让每个人都震惊不已。
words.en_def: To fill with horror; to dismay.

sentences.en: The evidence put forth at the court appalled most of the jury.
sentences.zh: 法庭上提出的证据令大多数陪审团感到震惊。

sentences.en: That was an appalling waste of money.
sentences.zh: 这是一种令人震惊的金钱浪费。

words.mnemonic_zh: ap（加强）+ par（准备）+ atus（工具）→ 精心准备的工具
words.example_en: The laboratory is equipped with advanced apparatus.
words.example_zh: 实验室配备了先进的设备。
words.en_def: The entirety of means whereby a specific production is made existent or task accomplished.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 一再出现就变明显了
words.example_en: The apparent change in his attitude surprised everyone.
words.example_zh: 他态度上明显的变化让所有人都很惊讶。
words.en_def: Capable of being seen, or easily seen; open to view; visible to the eye, eyely; within sight or view.

words.mnemonic_zh: 一再催促，引起呼吁和吸引
words.example_en: The new policy appeals to the majority of the citizens.
words.example_zh: 新政策对大多数市民有吸引力。
words.en_def: An application for the removal of a cause or suit from an inferior to a superior judge or court for re-examination or review.

sentences.en: He made an appeal for volunteers to help at the festival.
sentences.zh: 他呼吁志愿者为节日提供帮助。

sentences.en: I appeal to all of you to help the orphans.
sentences.zh: 我呼吁大家帮助孤儿。

sentences.en: That idea appeals to me.
sentences.zh: 这个想法很吸引我。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有某种性质
words.mnemonic_zh: appeal加ing，更有吸引力
words.example_en: The idea of a vacation in Hawaii is really appealing.
words.example_zh: 去夏威夷度假的想法真的很有吸引力。
words.en_def: To call upon another to decide a question controverted, to corroborate a statement, to vindicate one's rights, etc.

sentences.en: I appeal to all of you to help the orphans.
sentences.zh: 我呼吁大家帮助孤儿。

sentences.en: That idea appeals to me.
sentences.zh: 这个想法很吸引我。

words.mnemonic_zh: 不断追求食物，就有了食欲
words.example_en: Exercise can stimulate your appetite.
words.example_zh: 运动能刺激你的食欲。
words.en_def: Desire to eat food or consume drink.

sentences.en: appetite for reading
sentences.zh: 读书的欲望

words.mnemonic_zh: 一再鼓掌表示称赞
words.example_en: The audience began to applaud as the performance ended.
words.example_zh: 表演结束时，观众开始鼓掌。
words.en_def: Applause; applauding.

sentences.en: After the performance, the audience applauded for five minutes.
sentences.zh: 演出结束后，观众报以长达五分钟的掌声。

sentences.en: Although we don't like your methods, we applaud your motives.
sentences.zh: 虽然我们不喜欢你的方法，但我们赞赏你的动机。

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调鼓掌，就是喝彩声
words.example_en: The speaker received thunderous applause after his speech.
words.example_zh: 演讲者演讲结束后赢得了雷鸣般的掌声。
words.en_def: The act of applauding; approbation and praise publicly expressed by the clapping of hands, stamping or tapping of the feet, acclamation, huzzas, or other means; marked commendation.

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调能应用的东西，就是器具
words.example_en: Modern kitchens are equipped with various appliances.
words.example_zh: 现代厨房配备了各种器具。
words.en_def: An implement, an instrument or apparatus designed (or at least used) as a means to a specific end (often specified), especially:

words.mnemonic_zh: 能强调应用的，就是适用的
words.example_en: This rule is applicable to all students.
words.example_zh: 这条规则适用于所有学生。
words.en_def: Suitable for application, relevant

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调去使用，可用于申请或应用
words.example_en: You should apply this theory to practice.
words.example_zh: 你应该把这个理论应用到实践中。
words.en_def: To lay or place; to put (one thing to another)

sentences.en: to apply cream to a rash
sentences.zh: 将霜涂在皮疹上

sentences.en: to apply funds to the repayment of a debt
sentences.zh: 将资金用于偿还债务

sentences.en: We need to apply the skills we've learned to solve this problem
sentences.zh: 我们需要应用我们学到的技能来解决这个问题

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调指出人选，就是任命
words.example_en: The company decided to appoint a new manager.
words.example_zh: 公司决定任命一位新经理。
words.en_def: To set, fix or determine (a time or place for something such as a meeting, or the meeting itself) by authority or agreement.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 一再重视价值，就是欣赏和感激
words.example_en: His appreciation for art is evident in his large collection.
words.example_zh: 从他大量的藏品中可以明显看出他对艺术的欣赏。
words.en_def: A fair valuation or estimate of merit, worth, weight, etc.; recognition of excellence.

sentences.en: We give to you this trophy as a token of our appreciation of all your years of service.
sentences.zh: 我们向您颁发这个奖杯，以表达我们对您多年来的服务的感谢。

sentences.en: an appreciation of colors
sentences.zh: 对色彩的鉴赏

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示相关的
words.mnemonic_zh: 随意做决定，很武断
words.example_en: The teacher made an arbitrary decision about the project.
words.example_zh: 老师对这个项目做了一个随意的决定。
words.en_def: Anything arbitrary, such as an arithmetical value or a fee.

sentences.en: Benjamin Franklin's designation of "positive" and "negative" to different charges was arbitrary.
sentences.zh: 本杰明·富兰克林对不同指控的“正面”和“负面”指定是任意的。

sentences.en: The equation is true for an arbitrary value of x.
sentences.zh: 该方程对于任意 x 值都成立。

words.mnemonic_zh: 研究古代学问的人，即考古学家
words.example_en: The archaeologist discovered an ancient tomb in the valley.
words.example_zh: 考古学家在山谷里发现了一座古墓。
words.en_def: Someone who studies or practises archaeology.

words.mnemonic_zh: 关于古代的研究学问，就是考古学
words.example_en: Archaeology helps us understand the history of human civilization.
words.example_zh: 考古学帮助我们了解人类文明的历史。
words.en_def: The study of the past by excavation and analysis of its material remains:

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关的
words.mnemonic_zh: 和建筑师相关的，就是建筑方面的
words.example_en: The city is famous for its architectural wonders.
words.example_zh: 这座城市以其建筑奇观而闻名。
words.en_def: Pertaining to architecture.

words.mnemonic_zh: 存放重要文件的地方，就是档案馆
words.example_en: The historian searched the archive for old documents.
words.example_zh: 历史学家在档案馆里查找旧文件。
words.en_def: A place for storing earlier, and often historical, material. An archive usually contains documents (letters, records, newspapers, etc.) or other types of media kept for historical interest.

sentences.en: His archive of Old High German texts is the most extensive in Britain.
sentences.zh: 他的古高地德语文本档案是英国最广泛的。

sentences.en: soil archive; peat archive
sentences.zh: 土壤档案； 泥炭档案馆

sentences.en: I was planning on archiving the documents from 2001.
sentences.zh: 我本来打算把2001年的文件存档。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“啊，热呐”，竞技场很热闹
words.example_en: The athletes entered the arena to thunderous applause.
words.example_zh: 运动员们在雷鸣般的掌声中进入了竞技场。
words.en_def: An enclosed area, often outdoor, for the presentation of sporting events (sports arena) or other spectacular events; earthen area, often oval, specifically for rodeos (North America) or circular area for bullfights (especially Hispanic America).

sentences.en: A large crowd filled the seats of the arena.
sentences.zh: 竞技场的座位上挤满了一大群人。

sentences.en: The arena is grey with white beams.
sentences.zh: 竞技场是灰色的，有白色的横梁。

sentences.en: The gladiators entered the arena.
sentences.zh: 角斗士们进入了竞技场。

words.mnemonic_zh: 能争论得出结果地，即可论证地
words.example_en: Arguably, this is the best solution to the problem.
words.example_zh: 按理说，这是解决这个问题的最佳方案。
words.en_def: As can be supported or proven by sound logical deduction, evidence, and precedent.

words.mnemonic_zh: 加强升起的感觉，就是出现、产生
words.example_en: Problems may arise when you least expect them.
words.example_zh: 问题可能在你最意想不到的时候出现。
words.en_def: To come up from a lower to a higher position.

sentences.en: to arise from a kneeling posture
sentences.zh: 从跪姿起身

sentences.en: He arose early in the morning.
sentences.zh: 他一大早就起床了。

sentences.en: A cloud arose and covered the sun.
sentences.zh: 一朵云升起，遮住了太阳。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“俺姆”，俺的手臂
words.example_en: She put her arm around her friend's shoulder.
words.example_zh: 她用手臂搂住了朋友的肩膀。
words.en_def: The portion of the upper human appendage, from the shoulder to the wrist and sometimes including the hand.

sentences.en: She stood with her right arm extended and her palm forward to indicate “Stop!”
sentences.zh: 她站着，伸出右臂，手掌向前，示意“停！”

sentences.en: The arm and forearm are parts of the upper limb in the human body.
sentences.zh: 手臂和前臂是人体上肢的一部分。

sentences.en: the arms of an octopus
sentences.zh: 章鱼的手臂

words.mnemonic_zh: a（一个）+ rray（可以想成排列），一个排列起来的系列
words.example_en: There is an array of books on the shelf waiting to be read.
words.example_zh: 书架上有大量的书等着被阅读。
words.en_def: Clothing and ornamentation.

sentences.en: drawn up in battle array
sentences.zh: 列阵

sentences.en: We offer a dazzling array of choices.
sentences.zh: 我们提供一系列令人眼花缭乱的选择。

sentences.en: He was arrayed in his finest robes and jewels.
sentences.zh: 他穿着最好的长袍，戴着珠宝。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: ar（加强）+ riv（到达）+ al（名词后缀），强调到达的状态
words.example_en: The arrival of the new season brings new hopes to farmers.
words.example_zh: 新季节的到来给农民带来了新的希望。
words.en_def: The act of arriving or something that has arrived.

sentences.en: The early arrival of the bride created a stir.
sentences.zh: 新娘的提前到来引起了轰动。

sentences.en: The arrival of the railway made the local tourist industry viable.
sentences.zh: 铁路的到来使当地的旅游业有了活力。

sentences.en: There has been a significant growth in illegal arrivals.
sentences.zh: 非法入境者数量显着增加。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“阿特”，联想艺术有独特特质
words.example_en: The city is famous for its rich art collection.
words.example_zh: 这座城市以其丰富的艺术藏品而闻名。
words.en_def: The conscious production or arrangement of sounds, colours, forms, movements, or other elements in a manner that affects the senses and emotions, usually specifically the production of the beautiful in a graphic or plastic medium.

sentences.en: There is a debate as to whether graffiti is art or vandalism.
sentences.zh: 关于涂鸦到底是艺术还是破坏行为存在争议。

sentences.en: She's mastered the art of programming.
sentences.zh: 她掌握了编程艺术。

sentences.en: He's at university to study art.
sentences.zh: 他在大学学习艺术。

words.suffix_cn: 动词或形容词后缀，表使……；有……性质
words.mnemonic_zh: ar（加强）+ ticul（连接）+ ate，加强连接表达的能力
words.example_zh: 他很难清晰地表达自己的想法。
words.example_en: He finds it difficult to articulate his thoughts clearly.
words.en_def: An animal of the subkingdom Articulata.

sentences.en: She’s a bright, articulate young woman.
sentences.zh: 她是一位聪明、善于表达的年轻女性。

sentences.en: The robot arm was articulate in two directions.
sentences.zh: 机器人手臂在两个方向上都是铰接的。

sentences.en: an articulate period in history
sentences.zh: 历史上的一个清晰的时期

words.mnemonic_zh: art（艺术）加 s 表复数，多种艺术即文科等
words.example_en: Many students choose to study the arts at university.
words.example_zh: 许多学生选择在大学学习文科。
words.en_def: The conscious production or arrangement of sounds, colours, forms, movements, or other elements in a manner that affects the senses and emotions, usually specifically the production of the beautiful in a graphic or plastic medium.

sentences.en: There is a debate as to whether graffiti is art or vandalism.
sentences.zh: 关于涂鸦到底是艺术还是破坏行为存在争议。

sentences.en: She's mastered the art of programming.
sentences.zh: 她掌握了编程艺术。

sentences.en: He's at university to study art.
sentences.zh: 他在大学学习艺术。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“啊，烧完剩下的”，就是灰
words.example_en: After the fire, only a pile of ash was left.
words.example_zh: 火灾过后，只剩下一堆灰烬。
words.en_def: The solid remains of a fire.

sentences.en: Ash from a fireplace can restore minerals to your garden's soil.
sentences.zh: 壁炉中的灰烬可以恢复花园土壤中的矿物质。

sentences.en: The urn containing his ashes was eventually removed to a closet.
sentences.zh: 装有他骨灰的瓮最终被移到壁橱里。

sentences.en: The ash trees are dying off due to emerald ash borer.
sentences.zh: 白蜡树因白蜡虫而枯死。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: as（加强）+ spir（渴望）+ ation（名词后缀），强烈的渴望即抱负
words.example_en: His aspiration is to become a world - class scientist.
words.example_zh: 他的抱负是成为一名世界级的科学家。
words.en_def: The act of aspiring or ardently desiring; an ardent wish or desire, chiefly after what is elevated or spiritual (with common adjunct adpositions being to and of).

sentences.en: Morgan has an aspiration of winning the game.
sentences.zh: 摩根渴望赢得这场比赛。

words.mnemonic_zh: as（加强）+ spir（渴望），加强渴望的感觉
words.example_en: She aspires to achieve great success in her career.
words.example_zh: 她渴望在事业上取得巨大成功。
words.en_def: To have a strong desire or ambition to achieve something.

sentences.en: He aspires to become a successful doctor.
sentences.zh: 他渴望成为一名成功的医生。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: as（加强）+ assassin（刺客）+ ation，加强刺客的行为即暗杀
words.example_en: The assassination of the leader shocked the whole nation.
words.example_zh: 领导人遇刺震惊了全国。
words.en_def: The murder of a person, especially for political reasons or for personal gain.

sentences.en: The assassination of the king occurred at night.
sentences.zh: 国王的刺杀事件发生在夜间。

words.mnemonic_zh: as（加强）+ sault（冲击），加强冲击就是攻击
words.example_en: The police arrested the suspect for the assault on the old man.
words.example_zh: 警方因嫌疑人袭击老人而将其逮捕。
words.en_def: A violent onset or attack with physical means, for example blows, weapons, etc.

sentences.en: to make assault upon a man, a house, or a town
sentences.zh: 攻击一个人、一座房屋或一座城镇

sentences.en: to make an assault on the prerogatives of a prince, or on the constitution of a government
sentences.zh: 攻击王子的特权或政府的宪法

sentences.en: Loud music assaulted our ears as we entered the building.
sentences.zh: 当我们进入大楼时，吵闹的音乐冲击着我们的耳朵。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一再地凑到相同地方就聚集起来了
words.example_en: People often assemble in the square to celebrate festivals.
words.example_zh: 人们常常聚集在广场上庆祝节日。
words.en_def: To put together.

sentences.en: He assembled the model ship.
sentences.zh: 他组装了模型船。

sentences.en: The parents assembled in the school hall.
sentences.zh: 家长们聚集在学校礼堂。

words.mnemonic_zh: 聚集的行为就是集会
words.example_en: The school holds an assembly every Monday morning.
words.example_zh: 学校每周一上午举行集会。
words.en_def: A set of pieces that work together in unison as a mechanism or device.

sentences.en: In order to change the bearing, you must first remove the gearbox assembly.
sentences.zh: 为了更换轴承，必须首先拆下变速箱总成。

sentences.en: assembly line
sentences.zh: 流水线

sentences.en: freedom of assembly
sentences.zh: 集会自由

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调把观点‘插入’话语中，即断言
words.example_en: He always asserts his opinions without evidence.
words.example_zh: 他总是毫无根据地宣称自己的观点。
words.en_def: An assertion; a section of source code which tests whether an expected condition is true.

sentences.en: He would often assert that there was life on other planets.
sentences.zh: 他经常断言其他行星上有生命。

sentences.en: Salman Rushdie has asserted his right to be identified as the author of this work.
sentences.zh: 萨尔曼·拉什迪 (Salman Rushdie) 主张他有权被认定为该作品的作者。

sentences.en: to assert our rights and liberties
sentences.zh: 维护我们的权利和自由

words.mnemonic_zh: 断言这个行为的结果就是主张
words.example_en: His assertion about the problem is quite convincing.
words.example_zh: 他对这个问题的断言很有说服力。
words.en_def: The act of asserting; positive declaration or averment.

sentences.en: You're a man of strong assertions!
sentences.zh: 你是一个有强烈主张的人！

sentences.en: That's just a bare assertion.
sentences.zh: 这只是一个赤裸裸的断言。

sentences.en: the assertion of one's rights or prerogatives
sentences.zh: 主张自己的权利或特权

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似‘爱舍它’，好资产谁舍得放弃
words.example_en: Good health is his greatest asset in life.
words.example_zh: 健康的身体是他人生中最大的财富。
words.en_def: Something or someone of any value; any portion of one's property or effects so considered.

sentences.en: These shares are a valuable asset.
sentences.zh: 这些股票是宝贵的资产。

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调做标记来分配任务
words.example_en: The teacher will assign different tasks to students.
words.example_zh: 老师会给学生分配不同的任务。
words.en_def: An assignee.

sentences.en: to assign a day for trial
sentences.zh: 指定一天进行试用

sentences.en: to assign counsel for a prisoner
sentences.zh: 为囚犯指派律师

sentences.en: We assign 100 to x.
sentences.zh: 我们将 100 分配给 x。

words.mnemonic_zh: 分配任务这个行为的结果就是作业
words.example_en: The students are busy with their assignments.
words.example_zh: 学生们正忙着做作业。
words.en_def: The act of assigning; the allocation of a job or a set of tasks.

sentences.en: This flow chart represents the assignment of tasks in our committee.
sentences.zh: 该流程图代表了我们委员会的任务分配。

sentences.en: We should not condone the assignment of asylum seekers to that of people smugglers.
sentences.zh: 我们不应纵容将寻求庇护者分配给人口走私犯。

sentences.en: The assignment the department gave him proved to be quite challenging.
sentences.zh: 事实证明，部门给他的任务非常具有挑战性。

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调进入社交圈和人交往、关联
words.example_en: People often associate summer with hot weather.
words.example_zh: 人们常常把夏天和炎热的天气联系起来。
words.en_def: A person united with another or others in an act, enterprise, or business; a partner.

sentences.en: She associates with her coworkers on weekends.
sentences.zh: 她周末与同事交往。

sentences.en: He associated his name with many environmental causes.
sentences.zh: 他将自己的名字与许多环境事业联系在一起。

sentences.en: particles of gold associated with other substances
sentences.zh: 与其他物质结合的金颗粒

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调拿过来的想法，即假设
words.example_en: Your assumption about the situation may be wrong.
words.example_zh: 你对形势的假设可能是错误的。
words.en_def: The act of assuming, or taking to or upon oneself; the act of taking up or adopting.

sentences.en: His assumption of secretarial duties was timely.
sentences.zh: 他担任秘书职务是及时的。

sentences.en: Their assumption of his guilt disqualified them from jury duty.
sentences.zh: 他们承认他有罪，因此失去了担任陪审员的资格。

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调处于确定的状态，就是保证
words.example_en: He gave her his assurance that he would be on time.
words.example_zh: 他向她保证会准时到。
words.en_def: The act of assuring; a declaration tending to inspire full confidence; that which is designed to give confidence.

sentences.en: his assurance is intolerable
sentences.zh: 他的保证令人难以忍受

words.mnemonic_zh: 一再确定，让人放心
words.example_en: The doctor assured the patient that the operation would be successful.
words.example_zh: 医生向病人保证手术会成功。
words.en_def: To make sure and secure.

sentences.en: He assured of his commitment to her happiness.
sentences.zh: 他向她保证他会致力于让她幸福。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“爱死了门”，躲进庇护所就安心
words.example_en: The refugees sought asylum in a neighboring country.
words.example_zh: 难民们在邻国寻求庇护。
words.en_def: A place of safety.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: atro（残忍）加后缀成暴行
words.example_en: The world was shocked by the atrocities committed during the war.
words.example_zh: 战争期间的暴行震惊了世界。
words.en_def: An extremely cruel act; a horrid act of injustice.

sentences.en: The regime is guilty of mass atrocities including forced displacement and the use of chemical weapons.
sentences.zh: 该政权犯有大规模暴行，包括强迫流离失所和使用化学武器。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“阿塔克”，攻击很猛
words.example_en: The enemy launched an attack on the city at night.
words.example_zh: 敌人在夜间对城市发动了攻击。
words.en_def: An attempt to cause damage, injury to, or death of opponent or enemy.

sentences.en: They claimed the censorship of the article was an attack on free speech.
sentences.zh: 他们声称对该文章的审查是对言论自由的攻击。

sentences.en: The army timed their attack to coincide with the local celebrations.
sentences.zh: 军队的进攻时间与当地的庆祝活动一致。

sentences.en: Having washed the plates from dinner, I made an attack on the laundry.
sentences.zh: 洗完晚餐的盘子后，我开始攻击要洗的衣服。

words.mnemonic_zh: 不断拿住目标，最终获得
words.example_en: He worked hard to attain his goal of becoming a doctor.
words.example_zh: 他努力工作以实现成为医生的目标。
words.en_def: To gain (an object or desired result).

sentences.en: To attain such a high level of proficiency requires hours of practice each day.
sentences.zh: 要达到如此高的熟练程度，需要每天数小时的练习。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、行为
words.mnemonic_zh: 趋向到场，就是出席
words.example_en: The attendance at the meeting was very high this time.
words.example_zh: 这次会议的出席率非常高。
words.en_def: The state of attending; presence or waiting upon.

sentences.en: Attendance at the meeting is required.
sentences.zh: 必须出席会议。

sentences.en: The class sat down so that the teacher could take attendance.
sentences.zh: 全班坐下，以便老师点名。

sentences.en: John's attendance for the conventions was not good.
sentences.zh: 约翰参加大会的情况并不好。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“我托你”，律师帮办事
words.example_en: The attorney presented strong evidence in court.
words.example_zh: 律师在法庭上出示了有力的证据。
words.en_def: A lawyer; one who advises or represents others in legal matters as a profession.

words.mnemonic_zh: 加强给予，归因于某物
words.example_en: People often attribute his success to his hard work.
words.example_zh: 人们常把他的成功归因于他的努力工作。
words.en_def: A characteristic or quality of a thing.

sentences.en: His finest attribute is his kindness.
sentences.zh: 他最好的品质就是他的善良。

sentences.en: In the clause "My jacket is more expensive than yours", "My" is the attribute of "jacket".
sentences.zh: 在“我的夹克比你的贵”子句中，“我的”是“夹克”的属性。

sentences.en: A file with the read-only attribute set cannot be overwritten.
sentences.zh: 设置为只读属性的文件无法被覆盖。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“熬神”，拍卖让人揪心
words.example_en: The rare painting will be sold at auction next month.
words.example_zh: 那幅稀有的画作将于下月拍卖。
words.en_def: A public event where goods or property are sold to the highest bidder.

words.mnemonic_zh: 听查账目就是审计
words.example_en: The company hired an expert to audit its financial records.
words.example_zh: 公司聘请了一位专家来审计其财务记录。
words.en_def: A judicial examination.

sentences.en: National Assembly audit
sentences.zh: 国会审计

sentences.en: to audit the accounts of a treasure, or of parties who have a suit depending in court
sentences.zh: 审计宝藏的账目，或在法庭上提起诉讼的当事人的账目

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: aud（听）+ition，听一听，去试镜
words.example_en: She passed the audition and got the role in the play.
words.example_zh: 她通过了试镜，获得了剧中的角色。
words.en_def: A performance, by an aspiring performer, to demonstrate suitability or talent.

sentences.en: I've been to five auditions this week.
sentences.zh: 这周我参加了五次试镜。

sentences.en: His audition was poor.
sentences.zh: 他的试镜很差。

sentences.en: We auditioned several actors for the part.
sentences.zh: 我们为这个角色试镜了几位演员。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: authent（可信）+ic，具有可信性质的
words.example_en: This is an authentic antique vase from the Ming Dynasty.
words.example_zh: 这是一个来自明朝的真正古董花瓶。
words.en_def: Of the same origin as claimed; genuine.

sentences.en: The experts confirmed it was an authentic signature.
sentences.zh: 专家确认这是真实的签名。

sentences.en: The report was completely authentic.
sentences.zh: 该报告完全真实。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: author（权威）+ity，权威的性质即权力
words.example_en: The police have the authority to arrest criminals.
words.example_zh: 警察有权逮捕罪犯。
words.en_def: The power to enforce rules or give orders.

sentences.en: I have the authority to penalise the staff in my department, but not the authority to sack them.
sentences.zh: 我有权处罚我部门的员工，但无权解雇他们。

sentences.en: the world's foremost authority on orangutans
sentences.zh: 世界上最重要的猩猩权威

words.mnemonic_zh: author（权威）+ize，使有权威去批准
words.example_en: The manager authorized the purchase of new equipment.
words.example_zh: 经理批准了购买新设备的申请。
words.en_def: To grant (someone) the permission or power necessary to do (something).

sentences.en: The General Assembly authorized the Council to take up the matter.
sentences.zh: 大会授权理事会处理此事。

sentences.en: The judge authorized the wiretapping.
sentences.zh: 法官授权窃听。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“凹透”，汽车外形凹透
words.example_en: He drives an auto to work every day.
words.example_zh: 他每天开车去上班。
words.en_def: An automobile.

sentences.en: My brother is an auto mechanic.
sentences.zh: 我的兄弟是一名汽车修理工。

sentences.en: Put it on auto.
sentences.zh: 把它放在汽车上。

sentences.en: A body coloured centre pillar signalled the arrival of an electronic four-speed auto, slight suspension revisions and minor trim changes.
sentences.zh: 与车身同色的中柱标志着电子四速汽车的到来，悬架略有修改，装饰也有细微变化。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: auto（自我）+nom（治理）+y，自我治理即自治
words.example_en: This region has a high degree of autonomy.
words.example_zh: 这个地区有高度的自治权。
words.en_def: Self-government; freedom to act or function independently.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: avail（有用）+ability，有用的性质即可用性
words.example_en: The availability of fresh water is a big concern in this area.
words.example_zh: 这个地区淡水的可得性是一个大问题。
words.en_def: The quality of being available.

sentences.en: What is your availability this week?
sentences.zh: 这周你有空吗？

sentences.en: We have several availabilities.
sentences.zh: 我们有多种可用情况。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“爱吻路”，大街上浪漫
words.example_en: There are many shops along this avenue.
words.example_zh: 这条大街两旁有很多商店。
words.en_def: A broad street, especially one bordered by trees.

sentences.en: There are several avenues by which we can approach this problem.
sentences.zh: 我们可以通过多种途径来解决这个问题。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“爱我这”，大家水平差不多
words.example_en: The average temperature here in summer is 25 degrees Celsius.
words.example_zh: 这里夏天的平均气温是25摄氏度。
words.en_def: The arithmetic mean.

sentences.en: The average of 10, 20 and 24 is (10 + 20 + 24)/3 = 18.
batting average
sentences.zh: 击球率

sentences.en: If you average 10, 20 and 24, you get 18.
sentences.zh: 如果您平均 10、20 和 24，您将得到 18。

words.mnemonic_zh: a（加强）+wait（等待），加强等待即期待
words.example_en: The result of the exam awaits us.
words.example_zh: 考试结果在等着我们。
words.en_def: A waiting for; ambush.

sentences.en: I await your reply to my letter.
sentences.zh: 我等待你对我的信的答复。

sentences.en: Glorious rewards await the good in heaven; eternal suffering awaits mortal sinners in hell.
sentences.zh: 天上的善人将有光荣的奖赏； 永恒的痛苦在地狱中等待着凡人的罪人。

words.mnemonic_zh: a 使 ware 知道的状态，就是意识
words.example_en: The campaign aims to raise awareness about environmental protection.
words.example_zh: 这场运动旨在提高人们对环境保护的意识。
words.en_def: The state or level of consciousness where sense data can be confirmed by an observer.

sentences.en: I gradually passed from sleep to full awareness.
sentences.zh: 我逐渐从睡眠状态进入完全清醒状态。

sentences.en: The awareness of one type of idea naturally fosters an awareness of another idea
sentences.zh: 对一种想法的认识自然会促进对另一种想法的认识

words.mnemonic_zh: a 向 way 路的方向离开
words.example_en: He walked away without saying a word.
words.example_zh: 他一句话也没说就走开了。
words.en_def: To depart; to go to another place.

sentences.en: At 9 o'clock sharp he awayed to bed.
sentences.zh: 九点整，他上床睡觉了。

sentences.en: The master is away from home.
sentences.zh: 主人不在家。

sentences.en: He's miles away by now.
sentences.zh: 他现在已经远在千里之外了。

words.mnemonic_zh: back 后面 drop 垂下的东西，像背景幕布
words.example_en: The mountains form a beautiful backdrop for the village.
words.example_zh: 群山为村庄构成了美丽的背景。
words.en_def: A decorated cloth hung at the back of a stage.

sentences.en: Against a backdrop of falling interest rates, the new savings account is looking less appealing.
sentences.zh: 在利率下降的背景下，新储蓄账户的吸引力似乎减弱。

sentences.en: a brilliant sunset backdropping the famous skyline
sentences.zh: 绚丽的日落映衬着著名的天际线

words.mnemonic_zh: back 支持加上 ing 表行为，就是支持行为
words.example_en: The project needs more financial backing to succeed.
words.example_zh: 这个项目需要更多的资金支持才能成功。
words.en_def: To go in the reverse direction.

sentences.en: the train backed into the station;  the horse refuses to back
sentences.zh: 火车倒车进站； 马拒绝后退

sentences.en: I back you all the way;  which horse are you backing in this race?
sentences.zh: 我一路支持你； 这场比赛你支持哪匹马？

sentences.en: The mugger backed her into a corner and demanded her wallet.
sentences.zh: 劫匪把她逼到角落里，并索要她的钱包。

words.mnemonic_zh: back 后面 up 上来的东西，就是备用的
words.example_en: We should always have a backup plan in case of emergencies.
words.example_zh: 我们应该总是有一个备用计划以防紧急情况。
words.en_def: A reserve or substitute.

sentences.en: If the goalkeeper is injured, we have a backup.
sentences.zh: 如果守门员受伤了，我们还有替补。

sentences.en: After the power failure, we had to restore the database from backup.
sentences.zh: 断电后，我们必须从备份中恢复数据库。

sentences.en: The accident caused a mile-long backup on the highway.
sentences.zh: 事故造成高速公路上一英里长的倒车。

words.mnemonic_zh: bacter 细菌加上 ia 表复数
words.example_en: Some bacteria can cause serious diseases.
words.example_zh: 有些细菌会引发严重的疾病。
words.en_def: A type, species, or strain of bacterium.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“败的”，就是坏的
words.example_en: He had a bad experience at the party last night.
words.example_zh: 他昨晚在聚会上有一段糟糕的经历。
words.en_def: Error, mistake.

sentences.en: Abducting children is bad for mothers.
sentences.zh: 拐卖孩子对母亲来说是不好的。

sentences.en: Do you think it is a bad idea to confront him directly?
sentences.zh: 你认为直接面对他是个坏主意吗？

sentences.en: It is bad manners to talk with your mouth full.
sentences.zh: 满嘴说话是不礼貌的行为。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“背哦”，保释人要背责任
words.example_en: His family managed to bail him out of jail.
words.example_zh: 他的家人设法把他保释出了监狱。
words.en_def: Security, usually a sum of money, exchanged for the release of an arrested person as a guarantee of that person's appearance for trial.

sentences.en: to bail cloth to a tailor to be made into a garment; to bail goods to a carrier
sentences.zh: 将布交给裁缝制作成衣服； 将货物保释给承运人

sentences.en: to bail water out of a boat
sentences.zh: 把水从船上捞出来

sentences.en: to bail a boat
sentences.zh: 救船

words.mnemonic_zh: ball 球像选票，-ot 表相关事物
words.example_en: They will hold a ballot to decide the issue.
words.example_zh: 他们将举行投票来决定这个问题。
words.en_def: Originally, a small ball placed in a container to cast a vote; now, by extension, a piece of paper or card used for this purpose, or some other means used to signify a vote.

sentences.en: to ballot for a candidate
sentences.zh: 为候选人投票

words.mnemonic_zh: bank 银行 rupt 破裂，就是破产
words.example_en: The company went bankrupt due to poor management.
words.example_zh: 这家公司因管理不善而破产了。
words.en_def: One who becomes unable to pay his or her debts; an insolvent person.

sentences.en: a bankrupt merchant
sentences.zh: 破产商人

sentences.en: a morally bankrupt politician
sentences.zh: 道德败坏的政客

words.mnemonic_zh: “banner”音似“伴呢”，旗帜常伴活动。
words.example_en: The protesters carried banners demanding social justice.
words.example_zh: 抗议者们举着要求社会公正的横幅。
words.en_def: A flag or standard used by a military commander, monarch or nation.

sentences.en: The mayor hung a banner across Main Street to commemorate the town's 100th anniversary.
sentences.zh: 市长在大街上悬挂了一条横幅，以纪念该镇成立 100 周年。

sentences.en: They usually make their case under the banner of environmentalism.
sentences.zh: 他们通常打着环保主义的旗号来表达自己的观点。

words.mnemonic_zh: “bare”音似“掰儿”，把东西掰掉就光秃了。
words.example_en: The trees were left bare after the storm.
words.example_zh: 暴风雨过后，树木变得光秃秃的。
words.en_def: (‘the bare’) The surface, the (bare) skin.

sentences.en: a bare majority
sentences.zh: 微弱多数

sentences.en: I do wonder why keeping my little breasts bare can be lewd even as none tells my brother anything for being bare-chested.
sentences.zh: 我确实想知道为什么让我的小乳房裸露会被视为猥亵，尽管没有人告诉我哥哥任何关于裸露胸部的事情。

sentences.en: The cupboard was bare.
sentences.zh: 橱柜里空空如也。

words.mnemonic_zh: “barrel”音似“掰肉”，想象用桶来装肉。
words.example_en: They stored oil in large barrels.
words.example_zh: 他们把油储存在大桶里。
words.en_def: A round vessel or cask, of greater length than breadth, and bulging in the middle, made of staves bound with hoops, and having flat ends or heads. Sometimes applied to a similar cylindrical container made of metal, usually called a drum.

sentences.en: a cracker barrel
sentences.zh: 一个饼干桶

sentences.en: the barrel of a windlass;  the barrel of a watch, within which the spring is coiled.
sentences.zh: 卷扬机的筒； 手表的发条盒，发条盘绕在其中。

sentences.en: Throw it into the trash barrel.
sentences.zh: 将其扔进垃圾桶。

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，表方式，意为‘基本地’
words.mnemonic_zh: 由“basic”加后缀变副词，表基本情况。
words.example_en: Basically, this plan requires more time and effort.
words.example_zh: 基本上，这个计划需要更多的时间和精力。
words.en_def: In a fundamental, essential or basic manner

sentences.en: They've added some fancy features, but it's basically still a car.
sentences.zh: 他们添加了一些奇特的功能，但它基本上仍然是一辆汽车。

sentences.en: I shouldn't have done it, basically.
sentences.zh: 基本上我不应该这样做。

words.mnemonic_zh: “basis”音似“杯舍思”，思考杯子的基础用途。
words.example_en: We should make decisions on the basis of facts.
words.example_zh: 我们应该根据事实做决定。
words.en_def: A physical base or foundation.

sentences.en: Cars must be checked on a yearly basis.
sentences.zh: 汽车必须每年检查一次。

sentences.en: The collection of all possible unions of basis elements of a basis is said to be the topology generated by that basis.
sentences.zh: 基础的基础元素的所有可能并集的集合被称为由该基础生成的拓扑。

words.mnemonic_zh: “bass”音似“爸嘶”，爸爸嘶吼出低音。
words.example_en: The song features a strong bass line.
words.example_zh: 这首歌有很强的低音旋律。
words.en_def: A low spectrum of sound tones.

sentences.en: Peter adjusted the equalizer on his audio equipment to emphasize the bass.
sentences.zh: 彼得调整了音频设备上的均衡器以强调低音。

sentences.en: The conductor preferred to situate the bass in the middle rear, rather than to one side of the orchestra.
sentences.zh: 指挥更喜欢将低音部放置在中后部，而不是管弦乐队的一侧。

sentences.en: Halfway through middle school, Edgar morphed from a soprano to a bass, much to the amazement and amusement of his fellow choristers.
sentences.zh: 中学过半时，埃德加从女高音变成了男低音，这让其他唱诗班成员感到惊讶和有趣。

words.mnemonic_zh: “bat”音似“爸特”，爸爸特别像拿球棒的人，也像蝙蝠一样神秘。
words.example_en: A bat flew out of the cave at night.
words.example_zh: 一只蝙蝠在夜晚飞出了洞穴。
words.en_def: Any of the flying mammals of the order Chiroptera, usually small and nocturnal, insectivorous or frugivorous.

sentences.en: You've been in for ages. Can I have a bat now?
sentences.zh: 你已经进来很多年了。 我现在可以拥有一只蝙蝠吗？

sentences.en: He batted the ball away with a satisfying thwack.
sentences.zh: 他满意地一击，把球击走了。

sentences.en: The cat batted at the toy.
sentences.zh: 那只猫猛击玩具。

words.mnemonic_zh: “battle”（战斗）加上“field”（场地）就是战场。
words.example_en: Many soldiers lost their lives on the battlefield.
words.example_zh: 许多士兵在战场上失去了生命。
words.en_def: The area where a land battle is or was fought, which is not necessarily a field.

sentences.en: 1886 The night of the 16th of May found McPherson's command bivouacked from two to six miles west of the battlefield, along the line of the road to Vicksburg — Ulysses S. Grant, Personal memoirs of U.S. Grant, Chapter 35.
sentences.zh: 1886 年 5 月 16 日晚上，麦克弗森的指挥部在距战场以西 2 到 6 英里的地方扎营，沿着通往维克斯堡的公路——尤利西斯·S·格兰特，美国格兰特的个人回忆录，第 35 章。

words.mnemonic_zh: “bay”音似“背”，海湾像大地的后背环抱海水。
words.example_en: The yacht sailed into the bay.
words.example_zh: 游艇驶入了海湾。
words.en_def: A berry.

sentences.en: to bay the bear
sentences.zh: 驱赶熊

words.mnemonic_zh: “beak”音似“比嗑”，用鸟喙比着嗑东西。
words.example_en: The bird used its beak to pick up the worm.
words.example_zh: 鸟儿用它的喙叼起了虫子。
words.en_def: Anatomical uses.

words.mnemonic_zh: “比姆”，想象比姆扛着大横梁。
words.example_en: The old house has thick wooden beams supporting the roof.
words.example_zh: 老房子有粗木梁支撑着屋顶。
words.en_def: Any large piece of timber or iron long in proportion to its thickness, and prepared for use.

sentences.en: This ship has more beam than that one.
sentences.zh: 这艘船的横梁比那艘多。

sentences.en: a beam of energy
sentences.zh: 一束能量

sentences.en: a beam of hope, or of comfort
sentences.zh: 一束希望或安慰

words.mnemonic_zh: “背儿”，背着负担，即忍受、承担。
words.example_en: He can't bear the pressure of the high - intensity work.
words.example_zh: 他无法忍受高强度工作带来的压力。
words.en_def: A large omnivorous mammal, related to the dog and raccoon, having shaggy hair, a very small tail, and flat feet; a member of family Ursidae.

sentences.en: That window can be a bear to open.
sentences.zh: 那扇窗户可能很难打开。

sentences.en: to bear a railroad stock
sentences.zh: 持有铁路股票

sentences.en: The great bear market starting in 1929 scared a whole generation of investors.
sentences.zh: 1929年开始的大熊市吓坏了整整一代投资者。

words.mnemonic_zh: 对比“best”，坏到极致像野兽。
words.example_en: The beast in the cage roared angrily at the visitors.
words.example_zh: 笼子里的野兽愤怒地向游客咆哮。
words.en_def: Any animal other than a human; usually only applied to land vertebrates, especially large or dangerous four-footed ones.

sentences.en: That is a beast of a stadium.
sentences.zh: 那是体育场的野兽。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“比特”，像打败对手得比特币。
words.example_en: Our team managed to beat the defending champions this time.
words.example_zh: 我们队这次设法打败了卫冕冠军。
words.en_def: A stroke; a blow.

sentences.en: a beat of the heart; the beat of the pulse
sentences.zh: 心跳； 脉搏的跳动

sentences.en: the beat of him
sentences.zh: 他的节拍

sentences.en: a dead beat
sentences.zh: 死气沉沉

words.prefix_cn: 表示加强或周围的状态
words.mnemonic_zh: be- 加强，half 部分，为一部分人代表利益。
words.example_en: On behalf of the whole class, I'd like to thank the teacher.
words.example_zh: 我谨代表全班感谢老师。

words.prefix_cn: 表示加强或周围的状态
words.mnemonic_zh: be- 加强 hind 后面，更强调在后面。
words.example_en: The cat is hiding behind the big tree.
words.example_zh: 猫正躲在大树后面。
words.en_def: The rear, back-end

sentences.en: to look behind
sentences.zh: 向后看

sentences.en: I'm two weeks behind in my schedule.
sentences.zh: 我的日程比计划晚了两周。

sentences.en: My watch is four minutes behind.
sentences.zh: 我的表慢了四分钟。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示被动或完成
words.mnemonic_zh: be- 使，love 爱，被爱就是心爱的。
words.example_en: The beloved actress received many flowers from her fans.
words.example_zh: 这位深受爱戴的女演员收到了粉丝们许多鲜花。
words.en_def: To please.

words.mnemonic_zh: “奔驰”，想象奔驰在公园看到长椅。
words.example_en: An old man is sitting on the bench, enjoying the sunshine.
words.example_zh: 一位老人正坐在长椅上享受阳光。
words.en_def: A long seat with or without a back, found for example in parks and schools.

sentences.en: They sat on a park bench and tossed bread crumbs to the ducks and pigeons.
sentences.zh: 他们坐在公园的长椅上，向鸭子和鸽子扔面包屑。

sentences.en: They are awaiting a decision on the motion from the bench.
sentences.zh: 他们正在等待法官席对动议做出决定。

sentences.en: She sat on the bench for 30 years before she retired.
sentences.zh: 退休前，她在替补席上坐了30年。

words.mnemonic_zh: 长椅上做标记，作为行动的基准。
words.example_en: This company's production efficiency sets a new benchmark in the industry.
words.example_zh: 这家公司的生产效率为行业树立了新的标杆。
words.en_def: A standard by which something is evaluated or measured.

words.prefix_cn: 表示加强或周围的状态
words.mnemonic_zh: be- 加强 neath 下面，强调在正下方。
words.example_en: The treasure is buried beneath the old oak tree.
words.example_zh: 宝藏被埋在那棵老橡树底下。
words.en_def: Below or underneath.

words.mnemonic_zh: 做善事的受益人
words.example_en: The beneficiary will receive the insurance money after the accident.
words.example_zh: 事故发生后，受益人将获得保险金。
words.en_def: One who benefits or receives an advantage.

sentences.en: You are the lucky beneficiary of this special offer.
sentences.zh: 您是此特别优惠的幸运受益者。

sentences.en: If any beneficiary does not survive the Settlor for a period of 30 days then the Trustee shall distribute that beneficiary’s share to the surviving beneficiaries by right of representation.
sentences.zh: 如果任何受益人在委托人去世 30 天后，受托人应通过代表权将该受益人的份额分配给尚存的受益人。

sentences.en: beneficiary gifts
sentences.zh: 受益人的礼物

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“拜它”，赌一把求好运
words.example_en: He decided to bet on the horse with the highest odds.
words.example_zh: 他决定押注赔率最高的那匹马。
words.en_def: A wager, an agreement between two parties that a stake (usually money) will be paid by the loser to the winner (the winner being the one who correctly forecast the outcome of an event).

sentences.en: Dylan owes Fletcher $30 from an unsuccessful bet.
sentences.zh: 迪伦因一次不成功的赌注而欠弗莱彻 30 美元。

sentences.en: It’s a safe bet that it will rain tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 可以肯定的是，明天会下雨。

sentences.en:
Fancy going for a drink after work?
You bet I do!
sentences.zh:
想下班后去喝一杯吗？ 
你打赌我会的！

words.root_cn: 词根 tra 的变体，表跨越
words.mnemonic_zh: 使跨越底线，即背叛
words.example_en: She felt deeply betrayed when her friend lied to her.
words.example_zh: 当朋友对她撒谎时，她感到被深深背叛了。
words.en_def: To deliver into the hands of an enemy by treachery or fraud, in violation of trust; to give up treacherously or faithlessly.

sentences.en: an officer betrayed the city
sentences.zh: 一名军官背叛了这座城市

sentences.en: My eyes have been betraying me since I turned sixty.
sentences.zh: 自从我六十岁起，我的眼睛就出卖了我。

sentences.en: Though he had lived in England for many years, a faint accent betrayed his Swedish origin.
sentences.zh: 尽管他在英国生活了很多年，但淡淡的口音暴露了他的瑞典血统。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“比听”，两人之间要比着听
words.example_en: There is a small river between the two villages.
words.example_zh: 两个村庄之间有一条小河。
words.en_def: A kind of needle, shorter than a sharp, with a small rounded eye, used for making fine stitches on heavy fabrics.

sentences.en: I want to buy one that costs somewhere between forty and fifty dollars.
sentences.zh: 我想买一个价格在四十到五十美元之间的东西。

sentences.en: conversation between friends
sentences.zh: 朋友之间的对话

sentences.en: Between you and me, I think the boss is crazy.  Let's keep this between ourselves.
sentences.zh: 就你我而言，我认为老板疯了。 让我们把这件事保密吧。

words.mnemonic_zh: 使自己警惕起来
words.example_en: Beware of the slippery floor after cleaning.
words.example_zh: 清洁后，当心地板滑。
words.en_def: (defective) To use caution, pay attention to (used both with and without of).

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“比养的”，比养的范围还远，即之外
words.example_en: The beauty of the view is beyond description.
words.example_zh: 这景色之美无法用言语形容。
words.en_def: The unknown.

sentences.en: 2017 July 13, Joseph Gamp "Marvel release stirring new set images of Black Panther and we are BEYOND excited" Metro (UK)
sentences.zh: 2017 年 7 月 13 日，约瑟夫·甘普“漫威发布了激动人心的黑豹新片场图片，我们非常兴奋” Metro（英国）

sentences.en: She had no reason for the conviction beyond the very inadequate one that she had seen him around London.
sentences.zh: 除了她在伦敦见过他之外，她没有任何理由相信他。

sentences.en: No swimming beyond this point.
sentences.zh: 超过此点后不得游泳。

words.mnemonic_zh: 有偏见的状态
words.example_en: The reporter's article was clearly biased towards one side.
words.example_zh: 记者的文章明显偏向一方。
words.en_def: To place bias upon; to influence.

sentences.en: Our prejudices bias our views.
sentences.zh: 我们的偏见会影响我们的观点。

sentences.en: The newspaper gave a biased account of the incident.
sentences.zh: 该报对这一事件的报道存在偏见。

sentences.en: The table had a biased edge.
sentences.zh: 桌子有一个倾斜的边缘。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“必的”，投标必拿下
words.example_en: The company decided to bid for the construction project.
words.example_zh: 公司决定投标这个建设项目。
words.en_def: To issue a command; to tell.

sentences.en: He bade me come in.
sentences.zh: 他请我进来。

sentences.en: She was bidden to the wedding.
sentences.zh: 她被邀请参加婚礼。

sentences.en: Have you ever bid in an auction?
sentences.zh: 您参加过拍卖吗？

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“比个”，比个大的
words.example_zh: 他住在一个大房子里。
words.example_en: He lives in a big house.
words.en_def: Someone or something that is large in stature

sentences.en: Elephants are big animals, and they eat a lot.
sentences.zh: 大象是大型动物，它们吃的东西很多。

sentences.en: Big Tech
sentences.zh: 大型科技公司

sentences.en: That style is very big right now in Europe, especially among teenagers.
sentences.zh: 这种风格现在在欧洲非常盛行，尤其是在青少年中。

words.cn_def: 双语的；会说两种语言的
words.mnemonic_zh: 两种语言的
words.example_en: The bilingual education program helps students learn two languages.
words.example_zh: 双语教育项目帮助学生学习两种语言。
words.en_def: A person who is able to use two languages.

sentences.en: a bilingual dictionary
sentences.zh: 双语词典

sentences.en: bilingual education
sentences.zh: 双语教育
