words.mnemonic_zh: 音似‘蹦的’，像在蹦跳，有跳跃之意
words.example_en: The dog can bound over the small fence easily.
words.example_zh: 这只狗能轻松地跳过小栅栏。
words.en_def: To tie; to confine by any ligature.

sentences.en: Just to make the cheese more binding
sentences.zh: 只是为了让奶酪更有粘合力

sentences.en: I wish I knew why the sewing machine binds up after I use it for a while.
sentences.zh: 我希望我知道为什么缝纫机在使用一段时间后会粘住。

sentences.en: These are the ties that bind.
sentences.zh: 这些是具有约束力的纽带。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示场所、事物
words.mnemonic_zh: bound（边界）加 -ary 成边界的事物
words.example_en: They set up a new boundary between the two countries.
words.example_zh: 他们在两国之间设立了新的边界。
words.en_def: The dividing line or location between two areas.

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似‘抱’，鞠躬时像抱着身体
words.example_en: The actor bowed to the audience after the play.
words.example_zh: 演出结束后，演员向观众鞠躬。
words.en_def: A weapon made of a curved piece of wood or other flexible material whose ends are connected by a string, used for shooting arrows.

sentences.en: The musician bowed his violin expertly.
sentences.zh: 音乐家熟练地拉着小提琴。

sentences.en: The shelf bowed under the weight of the books.
sentences.zh: 书架在书的重量下弯曲了。

sentences.en: Cronenberg’s "Cosmopolis" bows in Cannes this week.
sentences.zh: 柯南伯格的《大都会》本周在戛纳亮相。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似‘不瑞克它’，括号一般不用弄坏它
words.example_en: Please put the important words in brackets.
words.example_zh: 请把重要的单词放在括号里。
words.en_def: A fixture attached to a wall to hold up a shelf.

sentences.en: tax bracket, age bracket
sentences.zh: 税级、年龄级

sentences.en: I tried to hit the bullseye by first bracketing it with two shots and then splitting the difference with my third, but I missed.
sentences.zh: 我试图通过先用两次包围曝光然后用第三次平分差值来击中靶心，但我错过了。

sentences.en: Because the didn't have enough young boys for two full teams, they bracketed the seven-year olds with the eight-year olds.
sentences.zh: 因为没有足够的男孩来组成两支完整的队伍，所以他们将七岁的孩子和八岁的孩子放在一起。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似‘不润’，大脑缺水就不灵光
words.example_en: The human brain is a very complex organ.
words.example_zh: 人脑是一个非常复杂的器官。
words.en_def: The control center of the central nervous system of an animal located in the skull which is responsible for perception, cognition, attention, memory, emotion, and action.

sentences.en: She was a total brain.
sentences.zh: 她是个十足的大脑。

sentences.en: She has a lot of brains.
sentences.zh: 她有很多脑子。

sentences.en: The computer's brain is capable of millions of calculations a second.
sentences.zh: 计算机的大脑每秒能够进行数百万次计算。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似‘不拉丝’，黄铜质地硬不拉丝
words.example_en: The brass on the door handle is shiny.
words.example_zh: 门把手上的黄铜闪闪发亮。
words.en_def: A metallic alloy of copper and zinc used in many industrial and plumbing applications.

sentences.en: The brass are not going to like this.
sentences.zh: 黄铜们不会喜欢这样的。

sentences.en: You've got a lot of brass telling me to do that!
sentences.zh: 有很多大佬叫我这么做！

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似‘不锐驰’，不遵守规则就不能顺利驰骋
words.example_en: His action is a serious breach of the contract.
words.example_zh: 他的行为严重违反了合同。
words.en_def: A gap or opening made by breaking or battering, as in a wall, fortification or levee / embankment; the space between the parts of a solid body rent by violence

sentences.en: A clear breach is when the waves roll over the vessel without breaking. A clean breach is when everything on deck is swept away.
sentences.zh: 明显的破裂是指波浪翻过船只而没有破裂。 干净的突破是指甲板上的所有东西都被冲走。

sentences.en: They breached the outer wall, but not the main one.
sentences.zh: 他们突破了外墙，但没有攻破主墙。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似‘不瑞克’，不耐用就容易打破
words.example_en: He accidentally broke the glass on the table.
words.example_zh: 他不小心打破了桌子上的玻璃。
words.en_def: An instance of breaking something into two or more pieces.

sentences.en: The femur has a clean break and so should heal easily.
sentences.zh: 股骨已完全断裂，因此应该很容易愈合。

sentences.en: He waited minutes for a break in the traffic to cross the highway.
sentences.zh: 他等了几分钟，等待交通中断才穿过高速公路。

sentences.en: Let’s take a five-minute break.
sentences.zh: 我们休息五分钟吧。

words.mnemonic_zh: break（打破）+ down（向下），东西打破向下就出故障
words.example_en: The car had a breakdown on the highway.
words.example_zh: 汽车在高速公路上出了故障。
words.en_def: A failure, particularly mechanical; something that has failed

sentences.en: We saw a breakdown by the side of the road.
sentences.zh: 我们在路边看到了故障。

sentences.en: After so much stress, he suffered a breakdown and simply gave up.
sentences.zh: 承受了如此大的压力后，他崩溃了，干脆放弃了。

sentences.en: Looking at the breakdown of the budget, I see a few items we could cut.
sentences.zh: 看看预算的细目，我发现有一些项目可以削减。

words.mnemonic_zh: break（打破）+ through（穿过），打破障碍穿过就是突破
words.example_en: Scientists have made a breakthrough in cancer research.
words.example_zh: 科学家们在癌症研究方面取得了突破。
words.en_def: An advance through and past enemy lines.

sentences.en: Albert Einstein is credited with making some of the greatest breakthroughs in modern physics.
sentences.zh: 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦被认为在现代物理学中取得了一些最伟大的突破。

sentences.en: a breakthrough technological advance
sentences.zh: 突破性的技术进步

words.mnemonic_zh: breed 音似“不瑞德”，不遵守道德的繁殖方式，助记“繁殖”。
words.example_en: Farmers breed cows to improve milk production.
words.example_zh: 农民们培育奶牛以提高产奶量。
words.en_def: All animals or plants of the same species or subspecies.

sentences.en: a breed of animal
sentences.zh: 一种动物

sentences.en: People who were taught classical Greek and Latin at school are a dying breed.
sentences.zh: 在学校学习古典希腊语和拉丁语的人正在走向消亡。

sentences.en: a pond breeds fish; a northern country breeds stout men
sentences.zh: 池塘养鱼； 北方国家出产壮汉

words.mnemonic_zh: bribe 音似“不来不”，不给贿赂事情就不来，助记“行贿”。
words.example_en: He tried to bribe the official to get the contract.
words.example_zh: 他试图贿赂官员以获得那份合同。
words.en_def: Something (usually money) given in exchange for influence or as an inducement to dishonesty.

sentences.en: She was accused of trying to bribe the jury into making false statements.
sentences.zh: 她被指控试图贿赂陪审团做出虚假陈述。

sentences.en: to bribe somebody's compliance
sentences.zh: 贿赂某人使其服从

words.mnemonic_zh: broad（宽）+ band（带），宽的带就是宽带。
words.example_en: Many families now use broadband for high - speed internet access.
words.example_zh: 现在许多家庭使用宽带进行高速上网。
words.en_def: A wide band of electromagnetic frequencies

words.mnemonic_zh: broad（宽）+ -en（使……化），使变宽就是拓宽。
words.example_en: Travel can broaden your horizons and enrich your knowledge.
words.example_zh: 旅行可以拓宽你的视野并丰富你的知识。
words.en_def: To make broad or broader.

sentences.en: Travel broadens the mind.
sentences.zh: 旅行可以开阔视野。

sentences.en: The roads gradually broadened as we drove into the countryside.
sentences.zh: 当我们驶入乡村时，道路逐渐变宽。

words.mnemonic_zh: broad（宽）+ -ly（地），宽范围地就是广泛地。
words.example_en: The plan was broadly accepted by the committee.
words.example_zh: 该计划大体上得到了委员会的认可。
words.en_def: Widely and openly.

words.mnemonic_zh: bronze 音似“不溶汁”，青铜不易熔成汁，助记“青铜”。
words.example_en: The statue is made of solid bronze.
words.example_zh: 这座雕像是由实心青铜制成的。
words.en_def: A naturally occurring or man-made alloy of copper, usually in combination with tin, but also with one or more other metals.

sentences.en: She wanted to win the tournament, but had to settle for the bronze after being beaten in the semi-finals.
sentences.zh: 她本想赢得比赛，但在半决赛失利后只得屈居铜牌。

sentences.en: My mother bronzed my first pair of baby shoes.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈把我的第一双婴儿鞋晒成了古铜色。

words.mnemonic_zh: browse（浏览）+ -er（者），浏览的人或工具就是浏览器或浏览者。
words.example_en: This browser allows users to access various websites easily.
words.example_zh: 这款浏览器让用户能够轻松访问各种网站。
words.en_def: A person or animal who browses.

words.mnemonic_zh: brut（野蛮）+ -al（的），就是残忍、野蛮的。
words.example_en: The brutal dictator oppressed his people for many years.
words.example_zh: 那个残暴的独裁者欺压他的人民多年。
words.en_def: Savagely violent, vicious, ruthless, or cruel

words.mnemonic_zh: bubble 发音像气泡破裂声，助记“气泡”。
words.example_en: Children like to blow bubbles with soap water.
words.example_zh: 孩子们喜欢用肥皂水吹泡泡。
words.en_def: A spherically contained volume of air or other gas, especially one made from soapy liquid.

sentences.en: bubbles in window glass, or in a lens
sentences.zh: 窗玻璃或镜片中存在气泡

sentences.en: dot-com bubble
sentences.zh: 网络泡沫

sentences.en: Are you having a bubble?!
sentences.zh: 你有泡沫吗？！

words.mnemonic_zh: buck 音似“巴克”，可联想成钱的代称。
words.example_en: This book costs ten bucks.
words.example_zh: 这本书售价十美元。
words.en_def: A male deer, antelope, sheep, goat, rabbit, hare, and sometimes the male of other animals such as the hamster, ferret and shad.

sentences.en: Can I borrow five bucks?
sentences.zh: 我可以借五块钱吗？

sentences.en: Corporations will do anything to make a buck.
sentences.zh: 公司会不择手段地赚钱。

sentences.en: That skinny guy? C'mon, he can't weigh more than a buck and a quarter [125 pounds].
sentences.zh: 那个瘦子？ 来吧，他的体重不能超过一美元又四分之一 [125 磅]。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“开宾”，想象打开门迎接宾客的小屋
words.example_en: The hunters lived in a small cabin in the forest.
words.example_zh: 猎人们住在森林里的一间小屋里。
words.en_def: A small dwelling characteristic of the frontier, especially when built from logs with simple tools and not constructed by professional builders, but by those who meant to live in it.

sentences.en: Abraham Lincoln was born in a log cabin.
sentences.zh: 亚伯拉罕·林肯出生在一个小木屋里。

sentences.en: the captain's cabin:  Passengers shall remain in their cabins.
sentences.zh: 机长室：  乘客应留在自己的机舱内。

words.mnemonic_zh: cabin（小屋）加 et 变“小屋子”，像橱柜
words.example_en: The documents are stored in the wooden cabinet.
words.example_zh: 文件存放在木制橱柜里。
words.en_def: A storage closet either separate from, or built into, a wall.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: calcul（计算）加 ation 成计算的结果
words.example_en: The calculation of the project cost took hours.
words.example_zh: 计算项目成本花了好几个小时。
words.en_def: The act or process of calculating.

sentences.en: By my calculation, we should be there by midnight.
sentences.zh: 根据我的计算，我们应该在午夜之前到达那里。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“靠”，靠电话呼叫
words.example_en: He will call the repairman tomorrow.
words.example_zh: 他明天会打电话给修理工。
words.en_def: A telephone conversation.

sentences.en: I received several calls today.
sentences.zh: 今天我接到几个电话。

sentences.en: I paid a call to a dear friend of mine.
sentences.zh: 我给我的一位好朋友打了电话。

sentences.en: The ship made a call at Southampton.
sentences.zh: 该船停靠在南安普敦。

words.mnemonic_zh: camp（营地）开展活动成运动
words.example_en: The government launched a campaign against pollution.
words.example_zh: 政府发起了一场反污染运动。
words.en_def: A series of operations undertaken to achieve a set goal.

sentences.en: The company is targeting children in their latest advertising campaign.
sentences.zh: 该公司在最新的广告活动中瞄准了儿童。

sentences.en: She campaigned for better social security.
sentences.zh: 她致力于改善社会保障。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: cancel（取消）加 ation 表取消的行为
words.example_en: The cancellation of the concert disappointed fans.
words.example_zh: 音乐会的取消让歌迷们很失望。
words.en_def: The act, process, or result of cancelling; as, the cancellation of certain words in a contract, or of the contract itself.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“看我丝”，想象看帆布丝缕
words.example_en: The artist painted on a large canvas.
words.example_zh: 艺术家在一块大画布上作画。
words.en_def: A type of coarse cloth, woven from hemp, useful for making sails and tents or as a surface for paintings.

sentences.en: The author takes rural midwestern life as a canvas for a series of tightly woven character studies.
sentences.zh: 作者以中西部农村生活为画布，进行一系列紧密交织的人物研究。

sentences.en: He spent the night under canvas.
sentences.zh: 他在帆布下过夜。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“开普”，想象打开瓶盖
words.example_en: He put on his cap and went out.
words.example_zh: 他戴上帽子出去了。
words.en_def: A close-fitting hat, either brimless or peaked.

sentences.en: The children were all wearing caps to protect them from the sun.
sentences.zh: 孩子们都戴着帽子来防晒。

sentences.en: He took the cap off the bottle and splashed himself with some cologne.
sentences.zh: 他取下瓶盖，往身上喷了一些古龙水。

sentences.en: He had golden caps on his teeth.
sentences.zh: 他的牙齿上戴着金色的帽子。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: capable（有能力的）加 ity 表能力
words.example_en: Her capability in solving problems is remarkable.
words.example_zh: 她解决问题的能力很出色。
words.en_def: The power or ability to generate an outcome

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: cap（容纳）加 acity 表容纳的量
words.example_en: The stadium has a capacity of 50,000 people.
words.example_zh: 这个体育场能容纳五万人。
words.en_def: The ability to hold, receive or absorb

sentences.en: It was hauling a capacity load.
sentences.zh: 它正在牵引容量负载。

sentences.en: Its capacity rating was 150 tons per hour, but its actual maximum capacity was 200 tons per hour.
sentences.zh: 其额定产能为150吨/小时，但实际最大产能为200吨/小时。

sentences.en: There will be a capacity crowd at Busch stadium for the sixth game.
sentences.zh: 第六场比赛布希体育场将挤满观众。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示主义、学说
words.mnemonic_zh: 资本（capital）盛行成主义（-ism）
words.example_en: Capitalism has had a profound impact on global economic development.
words.example_zh: 资本主义对全球经济发展产生了深远影响。
words.en_def: A socio-economic system based on private ownership of resources or capital.

words.mnemonic_zh: 拥有资本（capital）的人（-ist）是资本家
words.example_en: The capitalist aimed to maximize profits in the market.
words.example_zh: 这位资本家旨在市场中实现利润最大化。
words.en_def: A person who is a supporter of capitalism.

sentences.en: capitalist countries
sentences.zh: 资本主义国家

sentences.en: capitalist warriors
sentences.zh: 资本主义战士

words.mnemonic_zh: 用手抓（capt）住就是捕获（capture）
words.example_en: The police managed to capture the suspect last night.
words.example_zh: 警方昨晚成功抓获了嫌疑人。
words.en_def: An act of capturing; a seizing by force or stratagem.

sentences.en: the capture of a lover's heart
sentences.zh: 俘获爱人的心

sentences.en: video capture
sentences.zh: 视频捕捉

sentences.en: to capture an enemy, a vessel, or a criminal
sentences.zh: 捕获敌人、船只或罪犯

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“卡够”，卡车装够的就是货物
words.example_en: The ship is carrying a lot of valuable cargo.
words.example_zh: 这艘船载着许多贵重货物。
words.en_def: Freight carried by a ship, aircraft, or motor vehicle.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为、状态或事物
words.mnemonic_zh: carry（搬运）的行为变成了 carriage（运输）
words.example_en: The carriage rattled along the cobblestone street.
words.example_zh: 马车沿着鹅卵石街道嘎嘎作响地前行。
words.en_def: The act of conveying; carrying.

sentences.en: The carriage ride was very romantic.
sentences.zh: 马车之旅非常浪漫。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“开瑞”，开车运载货物
words.example_en: He can easily carry this heavy box upstairs.
words.example_zh: 他能轻松地把这个重箱子搬到楼上。
words.en_def: A manner of transporting or lifting something; the grip or position in which something is carried.

sentences.en: Adjust your carry from time to time so that you don't tire too quickly.
sentences.zh: 不时调整你的携带方式，这样你就不会太快疲劳。

sentences.en: The carry on this trade is 25 basis points per annum.
sentences.zh: 该交易的利差为每年 25 个基点。

sentences.en: to carry an account to the ledger
sentences.zh: 将账户记入分类账

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“刻吾”，就是雕刻我
words.example_en: The artist will carve a statue out of this block of wood.
words.example_zh: 这位艺术家将用这块木头雕刻一座雕像。
words.en_def: A carucate.

sentences.en: give that turkey a careful carve
sentences.zh: 仔细地切那只火鸡

sentences.en: You carve the roast and I'll serve the vegetables.
sentences.zh: 你切烤肉，我来端蔬菜。

sentences.en: to carve a name into a tree
sentences.zh: 将名字刻在树上

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“卡西诺”，可联想去那里玩的地方是赌场
words.example_en: Many tourists visit the casino to try their luck.
words.example_zh: 许多游客去赌场碰碰运气。
words.en_def: A public building or room for entertainment, especially gambling.

words.mnemonic_zh: 意外（casu）发生就有伤亡（casualty）
words.example_en: The earthquake caused many casualties in the area.
words.example_zh: 地震在该地区造成了许多人员伤亡。
words.morph_note: “alty”形式并非典型常见后缀，此处仅为配合教学拆解
words.en_def: Something that happens by chance, especially an unfortunate event; an accident, a disaster.

words.suffix_cn: 无实际意义，部分英式拼写保留
words.mnemonic_zh: catalog 表目录，加 ue 还是目录
words.example_zh: 请查看商品目录来选择你想要的物品。
words.example_en: Please check the catalogue to select the items you want.
words.en_def: A systematic list of names, books, pictures etc.

words.mnemonic_zh: 卡特专门搞餐饮服务
words.example_en: The restaurant caters to customers with various dietary needs.
words.example_zh: 这家餐厅为有不同饮食需求的顾客提供服务。
words.en_def: Caterer

sentences.en: The merchants are the purveyors of fine selections.
sentences.zh: 商人是精品的提供者。

words.mnemonic_zh: 卡头的是牛
words.example_en: The farmer raises a large number of cattle on his farm.
words.example_zh: 这位农民在他的农场里养了大量的牛。
words.en_def: Domesticated bovine animals (cows, bulls, steers etc).

sentences.en: Do you want to raise cattle?
sentences.zh: 你想养牛吗？

sentences.en: goods and cattle
sentences.zh: 货物和牲畜

words.mnemonic_zh: 考思原因
words.example_en: The heavy rain was the main cause of the flood.
words.example_zh: 大雨是洪水的主要原因。
words.en_def: (often with of, typically of adverse results) The source of, or reason for, an event or action; that which produces or effects a result.

sentences.en: They identified a burst pipe as the cause of the flooding.
sentences.zh: 他们确定水管爆裂是导致洪水的原因。

sentences.en: The end of the war was a cause for celebration.
sentences.zh: 战争的结束是值得庆祝的。

sentences.en: The lightning caused thunder.
sentences.zh: 闪电引起了雷声。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 考特很谨慎
words.example_en: You should exercise caution when driving on icy roads.
words.example_zh: 在结冰的路面上开车时你应该格外小心。
words.en_def: Precept or warning against evil or danger of any kind; exhortation to wariness; advice; injunction; prudence in regard to danger; provident care

sentences.en: The guideline expressed caution against excessive radiographic imaging.
sentences.zh: 该指南对过度放射线成像表示谨慎。

sentences.en: Oh, that boy, he's a caution! He does make me laugh.
sentences.zh: 哦，那个男孩，他是一个警告！ 他确实让我发笑。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 考忒斯很谨慎
words.example_en: He is a cautious investor who avoids high - risk stocks.
words.example_zh: 他是个谨慎的投资者，避开高风险股票。
words.en_def: Careful; using or exercising caution; tentative

sentences.en: He took a few cautious steps toward the cave.
sentences.zh: 他小心翼翼地朝山洞走了几步。

words.mnemonic_zh: 思思停止了思考
words.example_en: The noise from the construction site ceased at night.
words.example_zh: 建筑工地的噪音在夜间停止了。
words.en_def: Cessation; extinction (see without cease).

sentences.en: And with that, his twitching ceased.
sentences.zh: 就这样，他的抽搐停止了。

sentences.en: And with that, he ceased twitching.
sentences.zh: 就这样，他不再抽搐了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 塞么特里埋死人
words.example_en: They visited their ancestors' graves in the cemetery.
words.example_zh: 他们去公墓祭拜祖先的坟墓。
words.en_def: A place where the dead are buried; a graveyard or memorial park.

words.mnemonic_zh: 森特儿在中心
words.example_en: The central area of the city is always crowded with people.
words.example_zh: 城市的中心区域总是人来人往。
words.en_def: Being in the centre.

words.mnemonic_zh: 塞瑞欧是谷物
words.example_en: Many people like to have cereal for breakfast.
words.example_zh: 很多人喜欢早餐吃谷类食物。
words.en_def: A type of grass (such as wheat, rice or oats) cultivated for its edible grains.

sentences.en: Which cereal would you like for breakfast?
sentences.zh: 您早餐想吃哪种麦片？

words.mnemonic_zh: 拆么不拆房间
words.example_en: The judge entered the chamber to prepare for the trial.
words.example_zh: 法官进入议事室为审判做准备。
words.en_def: A room or set of rooms, particularly:

sentences.en: The resolution, which speedily passed the Senate, was unable to gain a majority in the lower chamber.
sentences.zh: 该决议很快在参议院获得通过，但未能在众议院获得多数票。

sentences.en: A canal lock chamber; a furnace chamber; a test chamber
sentences.zh: 运河闸室； 炉室； 一个测试室

sentences.en: Dianne loaded a cartridge into the chamber of the rifle, then prepared to take aim at the target.
sentences.zh: 黛安娜将一颗子弹装入步枪的枪膛，然后准备瞄准目标。

words.mnemonic_zh: change（改变）加上 able（可……的），就是可改变的
words.example_en: The weather here is changeable, so bring an umbrella.
words.example_zh: 这里的天气多变，所以带把伞。
words.en_def: Capable of being changed.

sentences.en: The weather is very changeable today: we've had bright sunshine, clouds, wind and rain in the same half-hour.
sentences.zh: 今天的天气变化无常：在同一个半小时内，有明媚的阳光，有云彩，有风，有雨。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“吵死”，混乱时很吵
words.example_en: The sudden power failure threw the whole city into chaos.
words.example_zh: 突然停电使整个城市陷入混乱。
words.en_def: The unordered state of matter in classical accounts of cosmogony.

sentences.en: After the earthquake, the local hospital was in chaos
sentences.zh: 地震发生后，当地医院一片混乱

words.mnemonic_zh: chaos（混乱）加 tic 变成形容词
words.example_en: The room was in a chaotic state after the party.
words.example_zh: 派对结束后，房间一片混乱。
words.en_def: A character having a chaotic alignment.

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“刻入我”，性格特征刻入我心
words.example_en: His strong character helps him face difficulties bravely.
words.example_zh: 他坚强的性格帮助他勇敢面对困难。
words.en_def: A being involved in the action of a story.

sentences.en: A single locus governing the petal colour character was detected on the linkage group A2.
sentences.zh: 在连锁群 A2 上检测到控制花瓣颜色特征的单个基因座。

sentences.en: A study of the suspect's character and his cast iron alibi ruled him out.
sentences.zh: 对嫌疑人性格和不在场证据的研究排除了他的嫌疑。

sentences.en: "You may not like to eat liver," said Calvin's father, "but it builds character."
sentences.zh: “你可能不喜欢吃肝脏，”卡尔文的父亲说，“但它可以塑造性格。”

words.cn_def: 描绘……的特征；具有……的特征
words.mnemonic_zh: character（特征）加 ize 变成使有特征的动词
words.example_en: This region is characterized by its beautiful scenery.
words.example_zh: 这个地区以其美丽的风景为特色。
words.en_def: To depict someone or something a particular way (often negative).

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“插着”，充电要插着
words.example_en: The hotel will charge you for extra services.
words.example_zh: 酒店会为额外服务向你收费。
words.en_def: The amount of money levied for a service.

sentences.en: There will be a charge of five dollars.
sentences.zh: 将收取五美元的费用。

sentences.en: Pickett did not die leading his famous charge.
sentences.zh: 皮克特并没有在他著名的冲锋中死去。

sentences.en: That's a slanderous charge of abuse of trust.
sentences.zh: 这是滥用信任的诽谤性指控。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“ Charm（女神名）”，女神有魅力
words.example_en: The old town has a unique charm that attracts many tourists.
words.example_zh: 这座古镇有独特的魅力，吸引了很多游客。
words.en_def: An object, act or words believed to have magic power (usually carries a positive connotation).

sentences.en: It works like a charm.
sentences.zh: 它就像一个魅力。

sentences.en: He had great personal charm.
sentences.zh: 他很有个人魅力。

sentences.en: She wears a charm bracelet on her wrist.
sentences.zh: 她手腕上戴着一条魅力手镯。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“查特”，查特许状
words.example_en: The company operates under a special charter.
words.example_zh: 这家公司根据一份特殊的特许状运营。
words.en_def: A document issued by some authority, creating a public or private institution, and defining its purposes and privileges.

sentences.en: 2005 November 30, Stephen Foley "The market where 'caveat emptor' has become a charter for fraud" The Independent, London
sentences.zh: 2005 年 11 月 30 日，Stephen Foley，“‘买者自负’已成为欺诈宪章的市场”《独立报》，伦敦

words.mnemonic_zh: chat（聊天）加 ty 变成爱聊天的
words.example_en: The chatty neighbor always has a lot to say.
words.example_zh: 那个爱闲聊的邻居总有很多话要说。
words.en_def: Of a person, chatting a lot or fond of chatting.

sentences.en: Chatty error messages may help attackers to compromise your server.
sentences.zh: 喋喋不休的错误消息可能会帮助攻击者破坏您的服务器。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“欺婆”，用低价欺负婆婆
words.example_en: You can buy some cheap fruits at the market.
words.example_zh: 你可以在市场上买到一些便宜的水果。
words.en_def: Trade; traffic; chaffer; chaffering.

sentences.en: the cheap trick of hiding deadly lava under pushable blocks
sentences.zh: 将致命的熔岩隐藏在可推动的方块下的廉价技巧

sentences.en: Insurance is expensive, but don't be so cheap that you risk losing your home because of a fire.
sentences.zh: 保险很贵，但不要太便宜，以免冒着因火灾而失去房屋的风险。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: chill（寒冷）加 y 变成形容词，寒冷的
words.example_en: It's rather chilly outside, so wear a warm coat.
words.example_zh: 外面相当冷，所以穿件暖和的外套。
words.en_def: Cold enough to cause discomfort.

sentences.en: I’m getting rather chilly over here – could you shut the window please?
sentences.zh: 我这里有点冷——你能把窗户关上吗？

sentences.en: She gave me a chilly look when I made the suggestion.
sentences.zh: 当我提出建议时，她冷冷地看了我一眼。

words.mnemonic_zh: 谐音“可老司特柔”，联想医生特别强调胆固醇问题
words.example_en: High cholesterol levels can lead to heart problems.
words.example_zh: 高胆固醇水平会导致心脏问题。
words.morph_note: 该词词源复杂，不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: A sterol lipid synthesized by the liver and transported in the bloodstream to the membranes of all animal cells; it plays a central role in many biochemical processes and, as a lipoprotein that coats the walls of blood vessels, is associated with cardiovascular disease.

sentences.en: improve your cholesterol; lower your cholesterol
sentences.zh: 改善你的胆固醇； 降低胆固醇

words.cn_def: 家务杂事；日常零星工作
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“吵”，做家务事有时让人烦得想吵
words.example_en: Doing household chores takes up a lot of time.
words.example_zh: 做家务杂事要花很多时间。
words.en_def: A task, especially a difficult, unpleasant, or routine one.

sentences.en: Washing dishes is a chore, but we cannot just stop eating.
sentences.zh: 洗碗是一件苦差事，但我们不能就这样停止吃饭。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表性质、特征
words.mnemonic_zh: chron（时间）加 ic，和时间相关，长期的
words.example_en: He suffers from chronic back pain.
words.example_zh: 他患有慢性背痛。
words.en_def: Marijuana, typically of high quality.

sentences.en: chronic unemployment; chronic poverty; chronic anger; chronic life
sentences.zh: 长期失业； 长期贫困； 长期愤怒； 慢性生活

sentences.en: chronic cough; chronic headache; chronic illness
sentences.zh: 慢性咳嗽； 慢性头痛； 慢性疾病

sentences.en: Chronic patients must learn to live with their condition.
sentences.zh: 慢性病患者必须学会忍受自己的病情。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“呛可”，想象大块食物呛到
words.example_en: He ate a big chunk of chocolate.
words.example_zh: 他吃了一大块巧克力。
words.en_def: A part of something that has been separated.

sentences.en: The statue broke into chunks.
sentences.zh: 雕像碎成碎片。

sentences.en: a chunk of granite
sentences.zh: 一块花岗岩

sentences.en: examples of chunks would include "in accordance with", "the results of", and "so far"
sentences.zh: 块的例子包括“根据”、“结果”和“到目前为止”

words.mnemonic_zh: circ（圆）加 ate，像绕圈一样循环传播
words.example_en: Blood circulates in the human body.
words.example_zh: 血液在人体中循环。
words.en_def: To move in circles or through a circuit

sentences.en: to circulate money or gossip
sentences.zh: 传播金钱或八卦

words.mnemonic_zh: 由 circulate 变来，加 ation 成名词
words.example_en: The circulation of information is very fast today.
words.example_zh: 如今信息传播得非常快。
words.en_def: The act of moving in a circle, or in a course which brings the moving body to the place where its motion began.

sentences.en: The new bills will come into circulation next Friday.
sentences.zh: 新钞票将于下周五开始流通。

words.mnemonic_zh: citizen（公民）加 ship，成公民身份
words.example_en: He applied for citizenship in that country.
words.example_zh: 他申请了那个国家的公民身份。
words.en_def: The status of being a citizen, in its various senses.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表性质、特征
words.mnemonic_zh: civ（公民）加 ic，和公民有关的
words.example_en: Civic duties are important for a society.
words.example_zh: 公民义务对一个社会很重要。
words.en_def: Of, relating to, or belonging to a city, a citizen, or citizenship; municipal or civil.

sentences.en: Thousands of people came to the Civic Center to show off their civic pride.
sentences.zh: 数千人来到市政中心展示他们的公民自豪感。

sentences.en: civic duty
sentences.zh: 公民义务

words.mnemonic_zh: civil（公民）加 ian，表公民身份的人，平民
words.example_en: Many civilians were affected by the war.
words.example_zh: 许多平民受到了战争的影响。
words.en_def: A person following the pursuits of civil life, especially one who is not an active member of the armed forces.

sentences.en: Three civilians were apprehended by the soldiers and taken away in a military vehicle.
sentences.zh: 三名平民被士兵逮捕并用军车带走。

sentences.en: The bathroom was for employees only, so no civilians were allowed to use it.
sentences.zh: 卫生间仅供员工使用，平民不得使用。

sentences.en: He worked as a civilian journalist for ten years before being employed by the public broadcaster.
sentences.zh: 在受雇于公共广播公司之前，他担任了十年的平民记者。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: clar 表清楚，加 ity 成名词表清晰状态
words.example_en: The report presented the data with great clarity.
words.example_zh: 报告非常清晰地展示了数据。
words.en_def: The state or measure of being clear, either in appearance, thought or style; lucidity.

sentences.en: Lack of clarity on the part of the teacher will cause confusion among the students.
sentences.zh: 老师的表述不清晰，会导致学生的困惑。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似碰撞声，助记冲突碰撞意
words.example_en: Their opinions often clash on important issues.
words.example_zh: 他们在重要问题上的意见常常相左。
words.en_def: A loud sound, like the crashing together of metal objects.

sentences.en: I heard a clash from the kitchen, and rushed in to find the cat had knocked over some pots and pans.
sentences.zh: 我听到厨房里传来一阵碰撞声，我冲进去，发现猫打翻了一些锅碗瓢盆。

sentences.en: a clash of beliefs
sentences.zh: 信仰的冲突

sentences.en: She was wearing a horrible clash of red and orange.
sentences.zh: 她穿着红色和橙色的可怕冲突的衣服。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: class 表类别，加 ification 成分类行为
words.example_en: The library uses a special classification system.
words.example_zh: 图书馆使用一种特殊的分类系统。
words.en_def: The act of forming into a class or classes; a distribution into groups, as classes, orders, families, etc., according to some common relations or attributes.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似用力抓东西声，助记紧抓意
words.example_en: The wet clothes clung to his body.
words.example_zh: 湿衣服贴在他身上。
words.en_def: Fruit (especially peach) whose flesh adheres strongly to the pit.

sentences.en: Seaweed clung to the anchor.
sentences.zh: 海藻粘在锚上。

sentences.en: Wood clings.
sentences.zh: 木头紧贴。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关
words.mnemonic_zh: clin 表临床，加 ical 成与临床有关的
words.example_en: The doctor has rich clinical experience.
words.example_zh: 这位医生有丰富的临床经验。
words.en_def: A medical student's session spent in a real-world nursing environment.

sentences.en: Medicine is now more often practiced in a clinical setting than in the home.
sentences.zh: 现在，医学更多的是在临床环境中而不是在家里进行。

sentences.en: a clinical convert: one who turns to religion on their death-bed
sentences.zh: 临床皈依者：临终时皈依宗教的人

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: clos 表关闭，加 ure 成关闭的结果
words.example_en: The closure of the factory affected many workers.
words.example_zh: 工厂的关闭影响了很多工人。
words.en_def: An event or occurrence that signifies an ending.

sentences.en: the closure of a door, or of a chink
sentences.zh: 门或缝隙的关闭

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似一群东西聚集的嘈杂声，助记群簇意
words.example_en: A cluster of stars can be seen in the sky.
words.example_zh: 天空中可以看到一群星星。
words.en_def: A group or bunch of several discrete items that are close to each other.

sentences.en: A cluster of flowers grew in the pot.
sentences.zh: 花盆里长出了一簇花。

sentences.en: The Pleiades cluster contains seven bright stars.
sentences.zh: 昴宿星团包含七颗明亮的恒星。

sentences.en: examples of clusters would include "in accordance with", "the results of" and "so far"
sentences.zh: 集群的例子包括“根据”、“结果”和“到目前为止”

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: co 表共同，alit 表联合，加 ion 成联盟
words.example_en: The political parties formed a coalition government.
words.example_zh: 各政党组成了联合政府。
words.en_def: A temporary group or union of organizations, usually formed for a particular advantage.

sentences.en: The Liberal Democrats and Conservative parties formed a coalition government in 2010.
sentences.zh: 2010年，自由民主党和保守党组成联合政府。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关
words.mnemonic_zh: coast 是海岸，加 al 成与海岸有关的
words.example_en: Many tourists visit the coastal cities in summer.
words.example_zh: 许多游客夏天会去沿海城市旅游。
words.en_def: Relating to the coast; on or near the coast, as a coastal town, a coastal breeze

words.mnemonic_zh: 想象公鸡尾巴色彩斑斓，如鸡尾酒多样
words.example_en: He ordered a delicious cocktail at the bar.
words.example_zh: 他在酒吧点了一杯美味的鸡尾酒。
words.morph_note: 此词来源有多种说法，此处按构词形式简单拆分助记
words.en_def: A mixed alcoholic beverage.

sentences.en: Scientists found a cocktail of pollutants in the river downstream from the chemical factory.
sentences.zh: 科学家在化工厂下游的河流中发现了多种污染物。

sentences.en: He dined and cocktailed her at the most exclusive bars and restaurants.
sentences.zh: 他在最高档的酒吧和餐馆里为她用餐并调制了鸡尾酒。

words.mnemonic_zh: cogn（知道）+ itive，和知道相关即认知的
words.example_en: Cognitive skills are essential for learning new knowledge.
words.example_zh: 认知技能对于学习新知识至关重要。
words.en_def: Cognate.

words.mnemonic_zh: co（一起）+ incid（发生），一起发生即相符
words.example_en: Their interests coincide in promoting environmental protection.
words.example_zh: 他们在推动环境保护方面的利益是一致的。
words.en_def: To occupy exactly the same space.

sentences.en: The two squares coincide nicely.
sentences.zh: 这两个正方形很好地重合。

sentences.en: The conference will coincide with his vacation.
sentences.zh: 会议将与他的假期同时进行。

sentences.en: Our ideas coincide, except in certain areas.
sentences.zh: 我们的想法是一致的，除了某些领域。

words.mnemonic_zh: col（一起）+ labor（劳动），一起劳动即合作
words.example_en: They collaborate to finish the difficult project on time.
words.example_zh: 他们合作按时完成了这个艰巨的项目。
words.en_def: To work together with others to achieve a common goal.

sentences.en: Let's collaborate on this project, and get it finished faster.
sentences.zh: 让我们合作完成这个项目，并更快地完成它。

sentences.en: If you collaborate with the occupying forces, you will be shot.
sentences.zh: 如果你与占领军合作，你就会被枪杀。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: col（一起）+ labor（劳动）+ ation，一起劳动的行为即合作
words.example_en: The collaboration between the two companies brings great benefits.
words.example_zh: 两家公司的合作带来了巨大的利益。
words.en_def: The act of collaborating.

sentences.en: Collaboration can be a useful part of the creative process.
sentences.zh: 协作可以成为创作过程中有用的一部分。

sentences.en: The husband-and-wife artists will release their new collaboration in June this year.
sentences.zh: 这对夫妻艺术家将于今年六月发布他们的新合作作品。

sentences.en: He has been charged with collaboration.
sentences.zh: 他被指控串通一气。

words.mnemonic_zh: col（一起）+ lect（收集）+ ive，一起收集的即集体的
words.example_en: They made a collective decision to solve the problem.
words.example_zh: 他们做出了一个集体决定来解决这个问题。
words.en_def: A farm owned by a collection of people

sentences.en: the collective body of a nation
sentences.zh: 一个民族的集体体

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: col（一起）+ lis（碰撞）+ ion，一起碰撞的结果即碰撞
words.example_en: The collision of the two cars caused a traffic jam.
words.example_zh: 两辆车的碰撞造成了交通堵塞。
words.en_def: An instance of colliding.

words.mnemonic_zh: coloni（殖民地）+ al，和殖民地有关即殖民地的
words.example_en: The country has a long - standing colonial history.
words.example_zh: 这个国家有悠久的殖民历史。
words.en_def: A person from a country that is or was controlled by another.

words.mnemonic_zh: column（专栏）+ ist，写专栏的人即专栏作家
words.example_en: The columnist wrote an article about social issues.
words.example_zh: 这位专栏作家写了一篇关于社会问题的文章。
words.en_def: A regular writer of a column, such as in a magazine or newspaper

words.mnemonic_zh: com（一起）+ bat（战斗），一起战斗即打击
words.example_en: They combat crime to maintain social order.
words.example_zh: 他们打击犯罪以维护社会秩序。
words.en_def: A battle, a fight (often one in which weapons are used).

sentences.en: It has proven very difficult to combat drug addiction.
sentences.zh: 事实证明，戒除毒瘾非常困难。

words.mnemonic_zh: com（强调）+ fort（力量），给予力量即安慰
words.example_en: A warm blanket brings comfort on a cold night.
words.example_zh: 一条温暖的毯子在寒冷的夜晚带来舒适。
words.en_def: Contentment, ease.

sentences.en: Sleep in comfort with our new mattress.
sentences.zh: 使用我们的新床垫让您享受舒适的睡眠。

sentences.en: the comforts of home
sentences.zh: 家一般的舒适

sentences.en: We still have the spare tire? That's a comfort at least.
sentences.zh: 我们还有备胎吗？ 这至少是一种安慰。

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起听命令
words.example_en: The general can command thousands of soldiers on the battlefield.
words.example_zh: 将军能在战场上指挥数千名士兵。
words.en_def: An order to do something.

sentences.en: I was given a command to cease shooting.
sentences.zh: 我接到命令停止射击。

sentences.en: to have command of an army
sentences.zh: 指挥军队

sentences.en: England has long held command of the sea
sentences.zh: 英国长期掌握制海权

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起开始
words.example_en: The concert will commence at 8 o'clock this evening.
words.example_zh: 音乐会将于今晚 8 点开始。
words.en_def: To begin, start.

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起表达观点的内容
words.example_en: The sports commentator gave a lively commentary on the game.
words.example_zh: 体育解说员对比赛进行了生动的解说。
words.en_def: A series of comments or annotations; especially, a book of explanations or expositions on the whole or a part of some other work

sentences.en: Caesar's Commentaries on the Gallic War
sentences.zh: 凯撒对高卢战争的评论

sentences.en: We listened to the football commentary while watching the match.
sentences.zh: 我们边看比赛边听足球解说。

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起表达观点的人
words.example_en: The political commentator analyzed the current situation in depth.
words.example_zh: 政治评论员深入分析了当前形势。
words.en_def: A person who comments; especially someone who is paid to give his/her opinions in the media about current affairs, sports, etc.

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起做贸易
words.example_en: International commerce plays a vital role in the global economy.
words.example_zh: 国际贸易在全球经济中起着至关重要的作用。
words.en_def: The exchange or buying and selling of commodities; especially the exchange of merchandise, on a large scale, between different places or communities; extended trade or traffic.

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起被派出去的人
words.example_en: The commissioner is responsible for handling important matters.
words.example_zh: 专员负责处理重要事务。
words.en_def: A member of a commission.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起交易的物品
words.example_en: The prices of commodities have fluctuated recently.
words.example_zh: 最近商品价格有所波动。
words.en_def: Anything movable (a good) that is bought and sold.

sentences.en: The price of crude oil is determined in continuous trading between professional players in World's many commodities exchanges.
sentences.zh: 原油的价格是由世界众多商品交易所的专业人士之间的持续交易决定的。

sentences.en: Although they were once in the forefront of consumer electronics, the calculators have become a mere commodity.
sentences.zh: 尽管计算器曾经处于消费电子产品的最前沿，但现在它已经成为一种普通商品。

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起有的，就是普通常见的
words.example_en: This is a common problem in many families.
words.example_zh: 这是许多家庭中常见的问题。
words.en_def: Mutual good, shared by more than one.

sentences.en: The two competitors have the common aim of winning the championship.
sentences.zh: 两位选手有着共同的目标，那就是夺得冠军。

sentences.en: It is common to find sharks off this coast.
sentences.zh: 在这个海岸附近发现鲨鱼是很常见的。

sentences.en: It differs from the common blackbird in the size of its beak.
sentences.zh: 它与普通黑鸟的不同之处在于其喙的大小。

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，表示方式、程度
words.mnemonic_zh: 普通情况的状态
words.example_en: People commonly make mistakes when they are tired.
words.example_zh: 人们疲劳时通常会犯错。
words.en_def: As a rule; frequently; usually

words.mnemonic_zh: 为大家共同事业奋斗的人
words.example_en: The communist dedicated his life to the revolutionary cause.
words.example_zh: 这位共产主义者将一生献给了革命事业。
words.en_def: An advocate of a society based on the common ownership of property; a proponent of communism.

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起改变位置去上班，即通勤
words.example_en: He has to commute two hours every day to work.
words.example_zh: 他每天得花两小时通勤去上班。
words.en_def: To exchange substantially; to abate but not abolish completely, a penalty, obligation, or payment in return for a great, single thing or an aggregate; to cash in; to lessen

sentences.en: to commute tithes into rentcharges for a sum; to commute market rents for a premium, to commute daily fares for a season ticket
sentences.zh: 将什一税转换为一笔租金； 以溢价换算市场租金，以季票换算每日票价

sentences.en: A pair of matrices share the same set of eigenvectors if and only if they commute.
sentences.zh: 当且仅当一对矩阵可交换时，它们共享同一组特征向量。

sentences.en: I commute from Brooklyn to Manhattan by bicycle.
sentences.zh: 我骑自行车从布鲁克林到曼哈顿。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起分享面包的人就是同伴
words.example_en: She found a good companion for her journey.
words.example_zh: 她为自己的旅行找到了一个好伙伴。
words.en_def: A friend, acquaintance, or partner; someone with whom one spends time or keeps company

sentences.en: His dog has been his trusted companion for the last five years.
sentences.zh: 过去五年来，他的狗一直是他值得信赖的伴侣。

sentences.en: The companion guide gives an in-depth analysis of this particular translation.
sentences.zh: 配套指南对这个特定的翻译进行了深入分析。

sentences.en: a companion of the Bath
sentences.zh: 巴斯的同伴

words.mnemonic_zh: 能一起进行比较的就是可比较的
words.example_en: This task is comparable to the one we did last month.
words.example_zh: 这项任务和我们上个月做的那个差不多。
words.en_def: Something suitable for comparison.

sentences.en: An elephant is comparable in size to a double-decker bus.
sentences.zh: 大象的大小与双层巴士相当。

sentences.en: Six and forty-two are comparable in the divides order, but six and nine are not.
sentences.zh: 六和四十二在除法顺序上具有可比性，但六和九则不然。

sentences.en: "Big" is a comparable adjective, since it can take the forms "bigger" and "biggest"; but "unique" is not comparable, except in disputed, but common, usage.
sentences.zh: “Big”是一个可比形容词，因为它可以采用“bigger”和“biggest”的形式； 但“独特”是不具有可比性的，除非在有争议但常见的用法中。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示“与……有关的”
words.mnemonic_zh: 和比较相关的就是比较的
words.example_en: We should make a comparative analysis of these data.
words.example_zh: 我们应该对这些数据进行比较分析。
words.en_def: (grammar) A construction showing a relative quality, in English usually formed by adding more or appending -er. For example, the comparative of green is greener; of evil, more evil.

sentences.en: comparative anatomy
sentences.zh: 比较解剖学

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 和别人一起感受痛苦，就是同情
words.example_en: The nurse showed great compassion for the patients.
words.example_zh: 护士对病人表现出极大的同情。
words.en_def: Deep awareness of the suffering of another, coupled with the wish to relieve it.

words.mnemonic_zh: 能一起忍受的就是兼容的
words.example_en: These software programs are compatible with each other.
words.example_zh: 这些软件程序彼此兼容。
words.en_def: Something that is compatible with something else.

sentences.en: a computer company that sells IBM compatibles
sentences.zh: 一家销售 IBM 兼容机的计算机公司

sentences.en: This printer isn't compatible with my computer.
sentences.zh: 这台打印机与我的计算机不兼容。

sentences.en: My neighbours and I are not very compatible: they're loud and I'm an introvert.
sentences.zh: 我和我的邻居不太兼容：他们很吵闹，而我很内向。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起推动，就是迫使某人做某事
words.example_en: The law can compel parents to send their children to school.
words.example_zh: 法律可以迫使父母送孩子上学。
words.en_def: To drive together, round up

sentences.en: Logic compels the wise, while fools feel compelled by emotions.
sentences.zh: 逻辑强迫智者，而愚者则被情感强迫。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，常表示具有某种性质
words.cn_def: 引人注目的；令人信服的
words.mnemonic_zh: 能推动大家注意力的就是引人注目的
words.example_en: He gave a compelling speech at the meeting.
words.example_zh: 他在会议上发表了一场令人信服的演讲。
words.en_def: To drive together, round up

sentences.en: Logic compels the wise, while fools feel compelled by emotions.
sentences.zh: 逻辑强迫智者，而愚者则被情感强迫。

sentences.en: There are compelling reasons why a manager should have previous experience.
sentences.zh: 有很多令人信服的理由说明经理应该拥有以前的经验。

sentences.en: The politician had compelling ambition.
sentences.zh: 这位政治家有着令人信服的野心。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起支付钱来弥补损失，即补偿
words.example_en: The company should compensate the customers for the loss.
words.example_zh: 公司应该为顾客的损失进行赔偿。
words.en_def: To do (something good) after (something bad) happens

sentences.en: It is hard work, but they will compensate you well for it.
sentences.zh: 虽然工作很辛苦，但他们会给你很好的补偿。

sentences.en: His loud voice cannot compensate for a lack of personality.
sentences.zh: 他响亮的声音无法弥补个性的缺失。

sentences.en: I don't like driving that old car because it always steers a little to the left so I'm forever compensating for that when I drive it. Trust me, it gets annoying real fast.
sentences.zh: 我不喜欢开那辆旧车，因为它总是稍微向左转向，所以当我驾驶它时，我永远会对此进行补偿。 相信我，它很快就会变得烦人。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 补偿行为的结果就是赔偿款
words.example_en: The workers got a generous compensation for their injury.
words.example_zh: 工人们因受伤获得了一笔丰厚的赔偿款。
words.en_def: The act or principle of compensating.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起力争，体现个人能力
words.example_en: His competence in handling difficult situations is well - recognized.
words.example_zh: 他处理困难局面的能力广受认可。
words.en_def: The quality or state of being competent, i.e. able or suitable for a general role.

sentences.en: That question is out with the competence of this court and must be taken to a higher court.
sentences.zh: 这个问题不属于本法院的管辖范围，必须提交给更高一级的法院。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 一起力争的人，有能力胜任
words.example_en: A competent teacher should be patient with students.
words.example_zh: 一位称职的教师应该对学生有耐心。
words.en_def: Having sufficient skill, knowledge, ability, or qualifications.

sentences.en: He is a competent skier and an expert snowboarder.
sentences.zh: 他是一位出色的滑雪运动员，也是一位滑雪板专家。

sentences.en: For any disagreements arising from this contract, the competent court shall be the Springfield Circuit Court.
sentences.zh: 对于因本合同引起的任何争议，管辖法院为斯普林菲尔德巡回法院。

words.mnemonic_zh: 把东西堆在一起，就是汇编
words.example_en: She needs to compile a report on market trends.
words.example_zh: 她需要汇编一份关于市场趋势的报告。
words.en_def: An act of compiling code.

sentences.en: Samuel Johnson compiled one of the most influential dictionaries of the English language.
sentences.zh: 塞缪尔·约翰逊编撰了最具影响力的英语词典之一。

sentences.en: After I compile this program I'll run it and see if it works.
sentences.zh: 编译该程序后，我将运行它并查看它是否有效。

sentences.en: There must be an error in my source code because it won't compile.
sentences.zh: 我的源代码中一定有错误，因为它无法编译。

words.mnemonic_zh: 使劲抱怨，就成了投诉
words.example_en: The manager received several complaints about the service.
words.example_zh: 经理收到了几条关于服务的投诉。
words.en_def: The act of complaining.

sentences.en: I have no complaints about the quality of his work, but I don't enjoy his company.
sentences.zh: 我对他的工作质量没有任何抱怨，但我不喜欢他的陪伴。

sentences.en: Don't come too close; I've got this nasty complaint.
sentences.zh: 不要靠得太近； 我收到了这个令人讨厌的投诉。

synonyms: reporting an offence/offense to the police/authorities

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 强调填满的东西，就是补充物
words.example_en: The wine is a perfect complement to the meal.
words.example_zh: 这酒是这顿饭的完美搭配。
words.en_def: A protective substance that exists in the serum or other bodily fluid and is capable of killing microorganisms; complement.

sentences.en: The complement of blue is orange.
sentences.zh: 蓝色的补色是橙色。

sentences.en: The complement of the odd numbers is the even numbers, relative to the natural numbers.
sentences.zh: 相对于自然数，奇数的补码是偶数。

sentences.en: The complement of 01100101_2 is 10011010_2.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 强调完成的状态，就是结束
words.example_en: The completion of the project took longer than expected.
words.example_zh: 项目的完成比预期花费了更长时间。
words.en_def: The act or state of being or making something complete; conclusion, accomplishment.

words.mnemonic_zh: 东西缠在一起，就复杂了
words.example_en: The problem is too complex to be solved easily.
words.example_zh: 这个问题太复杂，不容易解决。
words.en_def: A network of interconnected systems.

sentences.en: Jim has a real complex about working for a woman boss.
sentences.zh: 吉姆对为女老板工作感到非常复杂。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 复杂的性质就是复杂性
words.example_en: The complexity of the system requires expert knowledge.
words.example_zh: 这个系统的复杂性需要专业知识。
words.en_def: The state of being complex; intricacy; entanglement.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态或行为
words.mnemonic_zh: 强调顺从的状态，即遵守
words.example_en: The company ensures compliance with all regulations.
words.example_zh: 公司确保遵守所有规定。
words.en_def: An act of complying.

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调缠在一起，就使事情复杂了
words.example_en: Adding new rules will only complicate the situation.
words.example_zh: 增加新规则只会使情况变得复杂。
words.en_def: To make complex; to modify so as to make something intricate or difficult.

sentences.en: Don't complicate yourself in issues that are beyond the scope of your understanding.
sentences.zh: 不要让自己在超出你理解范围的问题上变得复杂化。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: com一起，plic缠绕，ation表状态，一起缠绕成复杂情况
words.example_en: The surgery was successful, but a complication arose afterward.
words.example_zh: 手术成功了，但后来出现了并发症。
words.en_def: The act or process of complicating.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为、手段或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: com共同，pli履行（意愿），ment后缀，一同履行心意即称赞
words.example_en: She received countless compliments on her beautiful dress.
words.example_zh: 她穿着漂亮的裙子，收到了无数称赞。
words.en_def: An expression of praise, congratulation, or respect.

words.mnemonic_zh: com一起，ply履行，一起履行要求即遵守
words.example_en: All passengers must comply with the safety regulations.
words.example_zh: 所有乘客都必须遵守安全规定。
words.en_def: To yield assent; to accord; to acquiesce, agree, consent; to adapt oneself, to conform.

words.mnemonic_zh: com一起，pon放置，ent表物，放在一起的东西是组成部分
words.example_en: Each component of the machine plays a crucial role.
words.example_zh: 机器的每个部件都起着至关重要的作用。
words.en_def: A smaller, self-contained part of a larger entity. Often refers to a manufactured object that is part of a larger device.

sentences.en: A CPU is a component of a computer.
sentences.zh: CPU 是计算机的一个组件。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: com一起，pos放置，ition表行为结果，放在一起的成果是作品
words.example_en: The composition of the painting shows great skill.
words.example_zh: 这幅画的创作显示出高超的技艺。
words.en_def: The act of putting together; assembly.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有...性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: com一起，prehens抓住，ive表性质，一起抓住所有即全面的
words.example_en: The report provides a comprehensive analysis of the problem.
words.example_zh: 报告对这个问题进行了全面分析。
words.en_def: A comprehensive school.

sentences.en: When there are diametrically opposing views on a big issue that concerns millions of people, doing comprehensive research just makes sense.
sentences.zh: 当对涉及数百万人的重大问题存在截然相反的观点时，进行全面的研究才有意义。

words.mnemonic_zh: 由comprehensive加ly变副词，全面的方式
words.example_en: The issue should be considered comprehensively before making a decision.
words.example_zh: 做决定前应全面考虑这个问题。
words.en_def: In a comprehensive manner; in an all-inclusive or wide-ranging fashion.

words.mnemonic_zh: com一起，prise抓住，一起抓住即包含
words.example_en: The committee comprises ten members from different fields.
words.example_zh: 委员会由来自不同领域的十名成员组成。
words.en_def: To be made up of; to consist of (especially a comprehensive list of parts).

sentences.en: The parts are comprised by the whole.
sentences.zh: 部分是由整体组成的。

sentences.en: Our committee comprises a president, secretary, treasurer and five other members.
sentences.zh: 我们的委员会由主席、秘书、财务主管和其他五名成员组成。

sentences.en: A team is comprised of its members.
sentences.zh: 团队由其成员组成。

words.mnemonic_zh: com一起，promis承诺，一起承诺达成妥协
words.example_en: We had to reach a compromise to solve the conflict.
words.example_zh: 我们不得不达成妥协来解决冲突。
words.en_def: The settlement of differences by arbitration or by consent reached by mutual concessions.

sentences.en: a compromise of character or right
sentences.zh: 品格或权利的妥协

sentences.en: He tried to compromise the security in the computer by guessing the password.
sentences.zh: 他试图通过猜测密码来破坏计算机的安全性。

words.mnemonic_zh: com一起，put计算，一起计算即得出结果
words.example_en: The computer can compute complex equations in seconds.
words.example_zh: 计算机能在几秒内计算复杂的方程式。
words.en_def: Computational power

sentences.en: Can anyone here compute the square root of 10201?
sentences.zh: 这里有人能算出 10201 的平方根吗？

sentences.en: Does that compute, or do I need to explain further?
sentences.zh: 这可以计算吗，还是我需要进一步解释？

words.mnemonic_zh: 共同藏起来就是隐藏
words.example_en: He tried to conceal the truth from his parents.
words.example_zh: 他试图向他的父母隐瞒真相。
words.en_def: To hide something from view or from public knowledge, to try to keep something secret.

sentences.en: He tried to conceal the truth about his health.
sentences.zh: 他试图隐瞒有关他健康状况的真相。

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起走一步，就是让步
words.example_en: He finally conceded that he was wrong.
words.example_zh: 他最终承认自己错了。
words.en_def: To yield or suffer; to surrender; to grant

sentences.en: He conceded the race once it was clear he could not win.
sentences.zh: 一旦他明显无法获胜，他就认输了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起拿想法，就是构思
words.example_en: Scientists often conceive new theories to explain phenomena.
words.example_zh: 科学家们常常构思新理论来解释各种现象。
words.en_def: To develop an idea; to form in the mind; to plan; to devise; to originate.

sentences.en: Assisted procreation can help those trying to conceive.
sentences.zh: 辅助生殖可以帮助那些试图怀孕的人。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 构思的结果形成概念
words.example_en: His conception of justice is quite different from ours.
words.example_zh: 他对正义的概念和我们的截然不同。
words.en_def: The act of conceiving.

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起去关注，就是关心
words.example_en: This problem concerns everyone in the community.
words.example_zh: 这个问题关系到社区里的每一个人。
words.en_def: That which affects one’s welfare or happiness. A matter of interest to someone. The adposition before the matter of interest is usually over, about or for.

sentences.en: Judy's eyes filled with concern as she listened to the news report.
sentences.zh: 朱迪听着新闻报道，眼里充满了担忧。

sentences.en: The employees’ attitude is really hurting the concern.
sentences.zh: 员工的态度确实让人担忧。

sentences.en: A good prince concerns himself in the happiness of his subjects.
sentences.zh: 一个好的君主关心臣民的幸福。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 让步这个行为就是特许权
words.example_en: The company was granted a concession to build the bridge.
words.example_zh: 该公司获得了建造这座桥的特许权。
words.en_def: The act of conceding.

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起关闭，事情结束
words.example_en: They concluded the meeting with a plan for the future.
words.example_zh: 他们以一个未来计划结束了会议。
words.en_def: To end; to come to an end.

sentences.en: The story concluded with a moral.
sentences.zh: 这个故事以一个寓意结束。

sentences.en: to conclude a bargain
sentences.zh: 达成协议

sentences.en: From the evidence, I conclude that this man was murdered.
sentences.zh: 根据证据，我断定这个人是被谋杀的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起制造出来的东西是具体的
words.example_en: We need some concrete evidence to prove his guilt.
words.example_zh: 我们需要一些具体的证据来证明他的罪行。
words.en_def: A solid mass formed by the coalescence of separate particles; a compound substance, a concretion.

sentences.en: The road was made of concrete that had been poured in large slabs.
sentences.zh: 这条路是用大块混凝土浇筑而成的。

sentences.en: I hate grass, so I concreted over my lawn.
sentences.zh: 我讨厌草，所以我在草坪上浇了混凝土。

sentences.en: Fuzzy videotapes and distorted sound recordings are not concrete evidence that bigfoot exists.
sentences.zh: 模糊的录像带和扭曲的录音并不是大脚怪存在的具体证据。

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起惩罚，就是谴责
words.example_en: The international community condemned the act of terrorism.
words.example_zh: 国际社会谴责了恐怖主义行为。
words.en_def: To strongly criticise or denounce; to excoriate the perpetrators of.

sentences.en: The president condemned the terrorists.
sentences.zh: 总统谴责恐怖分子。

sentences.en: The house was condemned after it was badly damaged by fire.
sentences.zh: 这所房子因火灾严重受损后受到谴责。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 一起说出来的要求就是条件
words.example_en: The condition of the old house is quite poor.
words.example_zh: 那所老房子的状况相当差。
words.en_def: A logical clause or phrase that a conditional statement uses. The phrase can either be true or false.

sentences.en: Environmental protection is a condition for sustainability.   What other planets might have the right conditions for life?   The union had a dispute over sick time and other conditions of employment.
sentences.zh: 环境保护是可持续发展的条件。 还有哪些行星可能具备适合生命存在的条件？ 工会在病假和其他就业条件方面存在争议。

sentences.en: My aunt couldn't walk up the stairs in her condition.
sentences.zh: 我姨妈的身体状况无法走上楼梯。

sentences.en: National reports on the condition of public education are dismal.   The condition of man can be classified as civilized or uncivilized.
sentences.zh: 关于公共教育状况的国家报告令人沮丧。 人的状况可以分为文明的或不文明的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起带来想法商讨
words.example_en: The board will confer tomorrow to discuss the new project.
words.example_zh: 董事会明天将开会商讨新项目。
words.en_def: To grant as a possession; to bestow.

sentences.en: The college has conferred an honorary degree upon the visiting Prime Minister.
sentences.zh: 该学院已向来访的总理授予荣誉学位。

sentences.en: They were in a huddle, conferring about something.
sentences.zh: 他们挤在一起，讨论着什么事情。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 强烈说出就是坦白
words.example_en: His confession shocked everyone in the courtroom.
words.example_zh: 他的坦白让法庭上的每个人都很震惊。
words.en_def: The open admittance of having done something (especially something bad).

sentences.en: Without the real murderer's confession, an innocent person will go to jail.
sentences.zh: 没有真凶的供述，一个无辜的人就会进监狱。

sentences.en: He forced me to sign a confession!
sentences.zh: 他逼我签认罪书！

sentences.en: I went to confession and now I feel much better about what I had done.
sentences.zh: 我去忏悔，现在我对自己所做的事情感觉好多了。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 极度信任才能知道的是机密
words.example_en: This is a confidential document, so keep it safe.
words.example_zh: 这是一份机密文件，要妥善保管。
words.en_def: Kept, or meant to be kept, secret within a certain circle of persons; not intended to be known publicly

sentences.en: The newspaper claims a leaked confidential report by the government admits to problems with corrupt MPs.
sentences.zh: 该报称，政府一份泄露的机密报告承认存在腐败议员的问题。

sentences.en: Sitting in front of the fire, they became quite confidential, and began to gossip.
sentences.zh: 坐在火炉前，他们变得相当保密，并开始闲聊。

sentences.en: a confidential agent; a confidential servant; a confidential whisper
sentences.zh: 机密代理人； 机密仆人； 秘密的耳语

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 一起塑造出来的样子就是配置
words.example_en: The configuration of the new software needs to be adjusted.
words.example_zh: 新软件的配置需要调整。
words.en_def: Form, as depending on the relative disposition of the parts of a thing's shape; figure; form factor.

words.mnemonic_zh: 强化界限就是限制
words.example_en: The police confined the suspect to a small room.
words.example_zh: 警察把嫌疑人关在一个小房间里。
words.en_def: (chiefly in the plural) A boundary or limit.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 强烈确定就是确认
words.example_en: We need confirmation of the meeting time.
words.example_zh: 我们需要确认会议时间。
words.en_def: An official indicator that things will happen as planned.

sentences.en: We will send you a written confirmation of your hotel booking.
sentences.zh: 我们将向您发送酒店预订的书面确认信息。

sentences.en: The announcement in the newspaper was a confirmation of my suspicions.
sentences.zh: 报纸上的消息证实了我的怀疑。

words.mnemonic_zh: 相互在前面就是面对
words.example_en: He must confront his fears to achieve his goal.
words.example_zh: 他必须面对自己的恐惧才能实现目标。
words.en_def: To stand or meet facing, especially in competition, hostility or defiance; to come face to face with

sentences.en: We should confront him about the missing money.
sentences.zh: 我们应该就丢失的钱与他对质。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 相互在前面对抗的状态
words.example_en: The confrontation between the two groups led to chaos.
words.example_zh: 两组人之间的冲突导致了混乱。
words.en_def: The act of confronting or challenging another, especially face to face.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 东西都聚到一起就堵塞了
words.example_en: Traffic congestion is a big problem in big cities.
words.example_zh: 交通堵塞是大城市的一个大问题。
words.en_def: The hindrance or blockage of the passage of something, for example a fluid, mixture, traffic, people, etc. (due to an excess of this or due to a partial or complete obstruction), resulting in overfilling or overcrowding.

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起为喜事高兴
words.example_en: We should congratulate him on his promotion.
words.example_zh: 我们应该祝贺他升职。
words.en_def: To express one’s sympathetic pleasure or joy to the person(s) it is felt for.

sentences.en: Remind me to congratulate Dave and Lisa on their wedding.
sentences.zh: 提醒我祝贺戴夫和丽莎的婚礼。

sentences.en: I congratulated myself on the success of my plan.
sentences.zh: 我祝贺自己计划的成功。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起（con-）聚成一群（greg）人，就是会众
words.example_en: The congregation listened attentively to the priest's sermon.
words.example_zh: 会众们专心聆听牧师的布道。
words.en_def: The act of congregating or collecting together.

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起（con-）走来（gress）开会，和议会有关
words.example_en: The congressional committee is discussing the new policy.
words.example_zh: 国会委员会正在讨论新政策。
words.en_def: Of or pertaining to a congress.

words.mnemonic_zh: 全力（con-）去争取（quer），就能征服
words.example_en: Alexander the Great managed to conquer many kingdoms.
words.example_zh: 亚历山大大帝成功征服了许多王国。
words.en_def: To defeat in combat; to subjugate.

sentences.en: In 1453, the Ottoman Empire conquered Istanbul.
sentences.zh: 1453年，奥斯曼帝国征服伊斯坦布尔。

sentences.en: Today I conquered my fear of flying by finally boarding a plane.
sentences.zh: 今天，我终于登上了飞机，克服了对飞行的恐惧。

sentences.en: to conquer freedom;   to conquer a peace
sentences.zh: 征服自由； 征服和平

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家都知道（con- + sci）的道德准则，就是良心
words.example_en: His conscience troubled him after he told the lie.
words.example_zh: 他说谎后，良心备受煎熬。
words.en_def: The moral sense of right and wrong, chiefly as it affects one's own behaviour.

sentences.en: Your conscience is your highest authority.
sentences.zh: 你的良心是你的最高权威。

words.cn_def: 认真负责的；本着良心的
words.mnemonic_zh: 心里都知道（con- + sci）责任，所以认真负责
words.example_en: The conscientious employee always finishes his work on time.
words.example_zh: 这位认真负责的员工总是按时完成工作。
words.en_def: Thorough, careful, or vigilant in one’s task performance.

sentences.en: He was a thoughtful and conscientious worker.
sentences.zh: 他是一位有思想、尽职尽责的工人。

sentences.en: The advice of wise and conscientious women.
sentences.zh: 明智而尽责的女性的建议。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起（con-）知道（sci）情况，就是有意识的
words.example_en: She was conscious of the danger approaching.
words.example_zh: 她意识到危险正在逼近。
words.en_def: The part of the mind that is aware of itself; the consciousness.

sentences.en: The noise woke me, but it was another few minutes before I was fully conscious.
sentences.zh: 噪音吵醒了我，但又过了几分钟我才完全清醒。

sentences.en: Only highly intelligent beings can be fully conscious.
sentences.zh: 只有高度智慧的生物才能具有完全意识。

sentences.en: I was conscious of a noise behind me.   a very class-conscious analysis
sentences.zh: 我意识到身后有声音。 非常有阶级意识的分析

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 有意识（conscious）的状态，就是意识
words.example_en: The patient gradually regained consciousness after the operation.
words.example_zh: 病人手术后逐渐恢复了意识。
words.en_def: The state of being conscious or aware; awareness.

words.mnemonic_zh: 紧紧跟随（con- + secut），就是连续的
words.example_en: The team won five consecutive games this season.
words.example_zh: 这个赛季该队连续赢了五场比赛。
words.en_def: A sequence of notes or chords that results from repeated shifts in pitch of the same interval.

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起（con-）有相同感觉（sens），就是共识
words.example_en: There is a consensus among the members on this issue.
words.example_zh: 成员们在这个问题上达成了共识。
words.en_def: A process of decision-making that seeks widespread agreement among group members.

sentences.en: After years of debate over the best wine to serve at Thanksgiving, no real consensus has emerged.
sentences.zh: 经过多年关于感恩节最佳葡萄酒的争论，尚未达成真正的共识。

sentences.en: a financial consensus forecast
sentences.zh: 财务共识预测

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起（con-）有相同想法（sent），就同意了
words.example_zh: The parents consented to their daughter's marriage.
words.example_en: 父母同意了女儿的婚事。
words.en_def: Voluntary agreement or permission.

sentences.en: After reflecting a little bit, I've consented.
sentences.zh: 我稍微想了一下，就同意了。

words.prefix_cn: 共同、一起，此处有强调意义
words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起保持，就是保护
words.example_en: The conservation of wildlife is crucial for ecological balance.
words.example_zh: 保护野生动物对生态平衡至关重要。
words.en_def: The act of preserving, guarding, or protecting; the keeping (of a thing) in a safe or entire state; preservation.

words.prefix_cn: 共同、一起，此处有强调意义
words.mnemonic_zh: 一直保持旧态，就是保守的
words.example_en: He has conservative views on social issues.
words.example_zh: 他在社会问题上持保守观点。
words.en_def: A person who favors maintenance of the status quo.

sentences.en: The curriculum committee at this university is extremely conservative.
sentences.zh: 这所大学的课程委员会非常保守。

sentences.en: At a conservative estimate, growth may even be negative next year.
sentences.zh: 保守估计，明年甚至可能出现负增长。

words.prefix_cn: 共同、一起，此处有强调意义
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起保存资源
words.example_en: We should conserve water during the dry season.
words.example_zh: 旱季时我们应该节约用水。
words.en_def: Wilderness where human development is prohibited.

sentences.en: to conserve fruits with sugar
sentences.zh: 用糖保存水果

words.mnemonic_zh: 像观星一样深入思考
words.example_en: You should consider all the factors before making a decision.
words.example_zh: 你在做决定前应该考虑所有因素。
words.en_def: To think about seriously.

sentences.en: Consider that we’ve had three major events and the year has hardly begun.
sentences.zh: 考虑一下我们已经发生了三件重大事件，而这一年才刚刚开始。

sentences.en: I’m considering going to the beach tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我正在考虑明天去海滩。

sentences.en: Consider yourself lucky, but consider your opponent skillful.
sentences.zh: 认为自己很幸运，但也认为对手很熟练。

words.root_cn: 星星，古时观察星星思考
words.mnemonic_zh: 深入思考他人感受，就是体贴的
words.example_en: She is a considerate friend who always cares about others.
words.example_zh: 她是个体贴的朋友，总是关心他人。
words.en_def: To think about seriously.

sentences.en: Consider that we’ve had three major events and the year has hardly begun.
sentences.zh: 考虑一下我们已经发生了三件重大事件，而这一年才刚刚开始。

sentences.en: I’m considering going to the beach tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我正在考虑明天去海滩。

sentences.en: Consider yourself lucky, but consider your opponent skillful.
sentences.zh: 认为自己很幸运，但也认为对手很熟练。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 一直站在一起，就是有一致性
words.example_en: The consistency of his work is highly praised.
words.example_zh: 他工作的连贯性受到高度赞扬。
words.en_def: Local coherence.

sentences.en: They want to achieve a high degree of consistency in their process and their product.
sentences.zh: 他们希望在流程和产品中实现高度的一致性。

sentences.en: Mix it until it has the consistency of a thick paste.
sentences.zh: 将其混合直至具有稠糊状的稠度。

words.mnemonic_zh: 使变得坚固，就是巩固
words.example_en: The company plans to consolidate its market position.
words.example_zh: 公司计划巩固其市场地位。
words.en_def: To combine into a single unit; to group together or join.

sentences.en: He consolidated his luggage into a single large bag.
sentences.zh: 他将行李整合到一个大袋子里。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示场所、群体
words.mnemonic_zh: 设立选民的区域，就是选区
words.example_en: The politician needs to win the support of his constituency.
words.example_zh: 这位政治家需要赢得其选区选民的支持。
words.en_def: A district represented by one or more elected officials.

sentences.en: John was elected to parliament from the Bedford constituency.
sentences.zh: 约翰从贝德福德选区当选为议会议员。

words.mnemonic_zh: 把东西放在一起，就组成了
words.example_en: These factors together constitute a major problem.
words.example_zh: 这些因素共同构成了一个重大问题。
words.en_def: An established law.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 设立规定的文件，就是宪法
words.example_en: The country's constitution guarantees certain basic rights.
words.example_zh: 该国宪法保障某些基本权利。
words.en_def: The act, or process of setting something up, or establishing something; the composition or structure of such a thing; its makeup.

sentences.en: He has a strong constitution, so he should make a quick recovery from the illness.
sentences.zh: 他的体质很强，应该能很快康复。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，具有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起建立的，和宪法有关
words.example_en: The court made a constitutional decision on this case.
words.example_zh: 法院对这个案件做出了符合宪法的裁决。
words.en_def: A walk that is taken regularly for good health and wellbeing.

sentences.en: Brexit has rocked the foundations and plunged everyone into a state of heightened constitutional anxiety.
sentences.zh: 英国脱欧动摇了根基，让每个人都陷入了一种高度宪法焦虑的状态。

sentences.en: The Court of Appeal ruled against the accused and found the law constitutional.
sentences.zh: 上诉法院裁定被告败诉，并认为该法律符合宪法。

sentences.en: a constitutional infirmity
sentences.zh: 体质虚弱

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起拉紧，形成约束
words.example_en: Financial constraint forced the company to cut costs.
words.example_zh: 资金限制迫使公司削减成本。
words.en_def: Something that constrains; a restriction.

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起构建，有建设性
words.example_en: They had a constructive discussion about the project.
words.example_zh: 他们就这个项目进行了富有建设性的讨论。
words.en_def: Relating to or causing construction.

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起商讨，去咨询
words.example_en: He decided to consult an expert on this problem.
words.example_zh: 他决定就这个问题咨询一位专家。
words.en_def: The act of consulting or deliberating; consultation

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或过程
words.mnemonic_zh: 一起商讨的行为，即咨询磋商
words.example_en: The doctor had a consultation with the patient's family.
words.example_zh: 医生和患者家属进行了磋商。
words.en_def: The act of consulting.

words.mnemonic_zh: 完全拿取，就是消耗掉
words.example_en: The machine consumes a lot of energy.
words.example_zh: 这台机器消耗大量能源。
words.en_def: To use up.

sentences.en: The power plant consumes 30 tons of coal per hour.
sentences.zh: 该发电厂每小时消耗30吨煤。

sentences.en: Baby birds consume their own weight in food each day.
sentences.zh: 小鸟每天消耗与自身重量相同的食物。

sentences.en: Desire consumed him.
sentences.zh: 欲望吞噬了他。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 消耗行为的结果，即消费量
words.example_en: The country's energy consumption is increasing rapidly.
words.example_zh: 这个国家的能源消耗正在迅速增长。
words.en_def: The act of eating, drinking or using.

sentences.en: The consumption of snails as food is more common in France than in England.
sentences.zh: 在法国，将蜗牛作为食物食用比在英国更常见。

sentences.en: gross national consumption
sentences.zh: 国民总消费

sentences.en: The fire's consumption of the forest caused ecological changes.
sentences.zh: 火灾对森林的消耗导致了生态变化。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起接触，有联系
words.example_en: Keep in contact with me when you are abroad.
words.example_zh: 你在国外时要和我保持联系。
words.en_def: The act of touching physically; being in close association.

sentences.en: I haven't been in contact with her for years.
sentences.zh: 我已经很多年没有和她联系了。

sentences.en: Touch the contact to ground and read the number again.
sentences.zh: 将触点接地并再次读取数字。

sentences.en: The salesperson had a whole binder full of contacts for potential clients.
sentences.zh: 销售人员有一整本活页夹，里面装满了潜在客户的联系方式。

words.mnemonic_zh: 长时间加强思考，即深思
words.example_en: He sat there contemplating his future.
words.example_zh: 他坐在那里深思自己的未来。
words.en_def: To look at on all sides or in all its aspects; to view or consider with continued attention; to regard with deliberate care; to meditate on; to study, ponder, or consider.

sentences.en: I contemplated doing the project myself, but it would have taken too long.
sentences.zh: 我考虑自己做这个项目，但需要太长时间。

words.mnemonic_zh: 加强轻视，就是蔑视
words.example_en: His actions showed his contempt for the rules.
words.example_zh: 他的行为显示出他对规则的蔑视。
words.en_def: The state or act of contemning; the feeling or attitude of regarding someone or something as inferior, base, or worthless; scorn, disdain.

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起伸展能力去竞争
words.example_en: Several teams contend for the championship every year.
words.example_zh: 每年有几支队伍竞争冠军。
words.en_def: To strive in opposition; to contest; to dispute; to vie; to quarrel; to fight.

sentences.en: In this paper the author contends that no useful results can be obtained if this method is used.
sentences.zh: 在这篇论文中，作者认为，如果使用这种方法，将无法获得有用的结果。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起伸展能力竞争的人
words.example_en: The young boxer is a strong contender in the match.
words.example_zh: 这位年轻的拳击手是这场比赛的有力竞争者。
words.en_def: Someone who competes with one or more other people.

words.mnemonic_zh: 共同容纳的东西就是内容
words.example_en: The content of this book is very informative.
words.example_zh: 这本书的内容很有信息量。
words.en_def: (except in phrases) Satisfaction, contentment; pleasure.

sentences.en: You can't have any more - you'll have to content yourself with what you already have.
sentences.zh: 你不能再拥有更多了——你必须满足于你已经拥有的。

sentences.en: They were in a state of sleepy content after supper.
sentences.zh: 晚饭后他们处于昏昏欲睡的状态。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 一起伸展观点引发争论
words.example_en: There is a lot of contention about this policy.
words.example_zh: 关于这项政策有很多争论。
words.en_def: Argument, contest, debate, strife, struggle.

sentences.en: It is my contention that state lotteries are taxes on stupid people.
sentences.zh: 我的观点是，国家彩票是对愚蠢的人征税。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起接受考验的人是参赛者
words.example_en: The contestants are preparing for the final round.
words.example_zh: 参赛者们正在为最后一轮比赛做准备。
words.en_def: A participant in a contest; specifically, a person who plays a game, as on a TV game show.

words.mnemonic_zh: 文本共同构成的就是上下文
words.example_en: You need to understand the context to grasp the meaning.
words.example_zh: 你需要理解上下文才能领会意思。
words.en_def: The surroundings, circumstances, environment, background or settings that determine, specify, or clarify the meaning of an event or other occurrence.

sentences.en: In what context did your attack on him happen? - We had a pretty tense relationship at the time, and when he insulted me I snapped.
sentences.zh: 你是在什么情况下对他进行攻击的？ - 当时我们的关系非常紧张，当他侮辱我时，我勃然大怒。

sentences.en: Without any context, I can't tell you if the "dish" refers to the food, or the thing you eat it on.
sentences.zh: 在没有任何上下文的情况下，我无法告诉你“菜”是指食物，还是指你吃它的东西。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 一直共同保持的状态是不间断的
words.example_en: He got annoyed by the continual noise outside.
words.example_zh: 他被外面持续的噪音惹恼了。
words.en_def: Recurring in steady, rapid succession.

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词变来
words.mnemonic_zh: 持续状态的副词形式
words.example_en: The baby cries continually at night.
words.example_zh: 婴儿晚上不停地哭。
words.en_def: In a continual manner; non-stop.

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起拉业务的人是承包商
words.example_en: The contractor is responsible for building the bridge.
words.example_zh: 承包商负责建造这座桥。
words.en_def: A person or company that builds or improves buildings.

words.mnemonic_zh: 说相反的话就是反驳
words.example_en: His actions contradict his words.
words.example_zh: 他的行动与他的话相矛盾。
words.en_def: To deny the truth of (a statement or statements).

sentences.en: His testimony contradicts hers.
sentences.zh: 他的证词与她的证词相矛盾。

sentences.en: Everything he says contradicts me.
sentences.zh: 他所说的一切都与我相矛盾。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 反着说就产生矛盾
words.example_en: There is a clear contradiction between his words and actions.
words.example_zh: 他的言行之间存在明显的矛盾。
words.en_def: The act of contradicting.

sentences.en: His contradiction of the proposal was very interesting.
sentences.zh: 他对这个提议的反驳非常有趣。

sentences.en: There is a contradiction in Clarence Page's statement that a woman should have the right to choose and decide for herself whether to have an abortion, and at the same time she should not have that right.
sentences.zh: 克拉伦斯·佩奇的说法存在矛盾，即女性应该有权利自己选择和决定是否堕胎，但同时又不应该有这种权利。

sentences.en: Marx believed that the contradictions of capitalism would lead to socialism.
sentences.zh: 马克思认为，资本主义的矛盾将导致社会主义。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表性质、特征
words.mnemonic_zh: 前缀表相反，就是对立的
words.example_en: The results were contrary to what we had expected.
words.example_zh: 结果与我们预期的相反。
words.en_def: The opposite.

sentences.en: contrary winds
sentences.zh: 逆风

sentences.en: What may be "politically correct" could be contrary to the teachings of Jesus.
sentences.zh: 所谓的“政治正确”可能与耶稣的教义相悖。

sentences.en: a contrary disposition; a contrary child
sentences.zh: 相反的倾向； 一个相反的孩子

words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起给予就是贡献
words.example_en: Everyone should contribute to protecting the environment.
words.example_zh: 每个人都应该为保护环境做出贡献。
words.en_def: To give something that is or becomes part of a larger whole.

sentences.en: to contribute articles to a journal
sentences.zh: 向期刊投稿

words.mnemonic_zh: 做贡献的人就是贡献者
words.example_en: The magazine has many regular contributors.
words.example_zh: 这本杂志有很多固定的投稿人。
words.en_def: A benefactor; someone who donates to charity or some cause.

sentences.en: I am a longstanding financial contributor to Amnesty International.
sentences.zh: 我是国际特赦组织的长期财务捐助者。

sentences.en: He was a regular contributor to Greenpeace protests.
sentences.zh: 他是绿色和平组织抗议活动的定期捐助者。

sentences.en: With her strength and intelligence, she was an important contributor to the victorious effort.
sentences.zh: 凭借她的力量和智慧，她为胜利的努力做出了重要贡献。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘控头’，控制上头
words.example_en: He can't control his temper when he's angry.
words.example_zh: 他生气时无法控制自己的脾气。
words.morph_note: 该词词源较复杂，不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: Influence or authority over something.

sentences.en: The government has complete control over the situation.
sentences.zh: 政府完全控制局势。

sentences.en: With a simple remote, he could control the toy truck.
sentences.zh: 通过一个简单的遥控器，他就可以控制玩具卡车。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、性质
words.mnemonic_zh: 意见反转对立就有争议
words.example_en: The new policy has caused a lot of controversy.
words.example_zh: 新政策引发了很多争议。
words.en_def: A debate or discussion of opposing opinions; (generally) strife.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家都能来，很便利
words.example_en: For your convenience, we offer free delivery.
words.example_zh: 为了您的便利，我们提供免费送货服务。
words.en_def: The quality of being convenient.

sentences.en: Fast food is popular because of its cost and convenience.
sentences.zh: 快餐因其成本低和方便而受到欢迎。

sentences.en: We will come over and begin the work at your convenience.
sentences.zh: 我们将在您方便的时候过来开始工作。

sentences.en: These are equally viable times and I propose we alternate between the two times in order to convenience as many people as possible.
sentences.zh: 这些都是同样可行的时间，我建议我们交替使用这两个时间，以方便尽可能多的人。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 大家一起来参加大会
words.example_en: The annual convention will be held next month.
words.example_zh: 年度大会将于下个月举行。
words.en_def: A meeting or gathering.

sentences.en: The convention was held in Geneva.
sentences.zh: 大会在日内瓦举行。

sentences.en: The EU installed an inter-institutional Convention to draft a European constitution.
sentences.zh: 欧盟设立了机构间公约来起草欧洲宪法。

sentences.en: The Vienna convention at the Vienna Congress (1814-15) standardized most of diplomatic conduct for generations.
sentences.zh: 维也纳会议（1814-15 年）的《维也纳公约》规范了几代人的大部分外交行为。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 一起转变就有转换结果
words.example_en: The conversion of the old building took a long time.
words.example_zh: 旧建筑的改造花了很长时间。
words.en_def: The act of converting something or someone.

sentences.en: His conversion to Christianity
sentences.zh: 他皈依基督教

sentences.en: the conversion of a horse
sentences.zh: 马的转变

sentences.en: the conversion of equations; the conversion of proportions
sentences.zh: 方程的转换； 比例的转换

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起携带信息去传达
words.example_en: The letter conveyed his deep love for her.
words.example_zh: 那封信传达了他对她深深的爱。
words.en_def: To move (something) from one place to another.

sentences.en: Air conveys sound. Water is conveyed through the pipe.
sentences.zh: 空气传递声音。 水通过管道输送。

sentences.en: to convey an impression; to convey information
sentences.zh: 传达印象； 传达信息

sentences.en: He conveyed ownership of the company to his daughter.
sentences.zh: 他将公司的所有权转让给了他的女儿。

words.mnemonic_zh: 完全征服罪犯使其服罪
words.example_en: The jury convicted the suspect of murder.
words.example_zh: 陪审团裁定嫌疑犯犯有谋杀罪。
words.en_def: A person convicted of a crime by a judicial body.

sentences.en: His remarks convicted him of a lack of sensitivity.
sentences.zh: 他的言论证明他缺乏敏感性。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 罪犯被定罪源于彻底被战胜
words.example_en: His strong conviction led him to pursue the goal.
words.example_zh: 他坚定的信念促使他去追求目标。
words.en_def: A firmly held belief.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……特性
words.mnemonic_zh: 完全征服他人，说辞有说服力
words.example_en: The lawyer presented a convincing argument.
words.example_zh: 律师提出了一个有说服力的论据。
words.en_def: To make someone believe, or feel sure about something, especially by using logic, argument or evidence.

sentences.en: I wouldn't have or do something, unless I'm convinced that it's good.
sentences.zh: 我不会做某事，除非我确信它是好的。

sentences.en: Our convincing evidence was sufficient in the end to win the trial.
sentences.zh: 我们的证据足够令人信服，最终赢得了审判。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“酷”，很酷很冷静
words.example_en: The cool breeze made the evening pleasant.
words.example_zh: 凉爽的微风让夜晚十分惬意。
words.en_def: A moderate or refreshing state of cold; moderate temperature of the air between hot and cold; coolness.

sentences.en: in the cool of the morning
sentences.zh: 在凉爽的早晨

sentences.en: Linen has made cool and breathable clothing for millennia.
sentences.zh: 几千年来，亚麻一直用来制作凉爽透气的服装。

sentences.en: If you have a reddish complexion, you should mainly wear cool colors.
sentences.zh: 如果肤色偏红，则应以冷色为主。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: cool加上ness，表凉爽冷静状态
words.example_en: The coolness of the cellar was a relief.
words.example_zh: 地窖里的凉爽让人感到轻松。
words.en_def: The state of being cool, i.e. chilly.

words.mnemonic_zh: 一起工作就是合作
