sentences.en: His position in society moved ever downward.
sentences.zh: 他的社会地位不断下降。

words.mnemonic_zh: downward 加 s 变成副词，向下地
words.example_en: Leaves fell downwards in the autumn wind.
words.example_zh: 树叶在秋风中向下飘落。
words.en_def: Towards a lower place; towards what is below.

sentences.en: Gravity pulls everything downwards.
sentences.zh: 重力将所有东西向下拉。

sentences.en: After the rise in oil prices, the economy headed downwards.
sentences.zh: 油价上涨后，经济开始下行。

words.mnemonic_zh: dozen 加 s 表示多个一打，即许多
words.example_en: Dozens of people gathered at the concert.
words.example_zh: 几十个人聚集在音乐会上。
words.en_def: A set of twelve.

sentences.en: Can I have a dozen eggs, please?
sentences.zh: 请问我可以吃一打鸡蛋吗？

sentences.en: There must have been dozens of examples just on the first page.
sentences.zh: 仅仅第一页上肯定有几十个例子。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘拽福特’，拽出初步的东西，像草稿
words.example_en: He wrote a draft of his speech quickly.
words.example_zh: 他很快地写了一篇演讲稿的草稿。
words.en_def: A current of air, usually coming into a room or vehicle.

sentences.en: She took a deep draft from the bottle of water.
sentences.zh: 她从瓶子里深深地喝了一口水。

sentences.en: His first drafts were better than most authors' final products.
sentences.zh: 他的初稿比大多数作者的最终作品都要好。

sentences.en: He left the country to avoid the draft.
sentences.zh: 他离开这个国家是为了避免征兵。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘拽恩’，用力拽让水流出
words.example_en: They need to drain the water from the pool.
words.example_zh: 他们需要把池子里的水排干。
words.en_def: A conduit allowing liquid to flow out of an otherwise contained volume; a plughole (UK)

sentences.en: The drain in the kitchen sink is clogged.
sentences.zh: 厨房水槽的排水管堵塞了。

sentences.en: That rental property is a drain on our finances.
sentences.zh: 出租房产消耗了我们的财务。

sentences.en: The clogged sink drained slowly.
sentences.zh: 堵塞的水槽排水缓慢。

words.mnemonic_zh: 词根表激烈，加 ic 变成激烈的
words.example_en: Drastic measures are needed to solve this problem.
words.example_zh: 需要采取极端措施来解决这个问题。
words.en_def: A powerful, fast-acting purgative medicine.

sentences.en: If our third attempt fails, we may need drastic ideas.
sentences.zh: 如果我们的第三次尝试失败，我们可能需要激进的想法。

words.mnemonic_zh: drastic 加 ally 变成副词，激烈地
words.example_en: The weather has changed drastically recently.
words.example_zh: 最近天气变化很大。
words.en_def: To a drastic degree.

sentences.en: This recession has been drastically different.
sentences.zh: 这次经济衰退的情况截然不同。

sentences.en: Lisa always wore shorts and a T-shirt, which clashed drastically with her brother's thick winter coat.
sentences.zh: 丽莎总是穿着短裤和T恤，这与她哥哥厚厚的冬衣形成了鲜明的对比。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘抓福特’，像抓住一股气流
words.example_en: There's a draught coming through the window.
words.example_zh: 有一股风从窗户吹进来。
words.en_def: A current of air, usually coming into a room or vehicle.

sentences.en: She took a deep draft from the bottle of water.
sentences.zh: 她从瓶子里深深地喝了一口水。

sentences.en: His first drafts were better than most authors' final products.
sentences.zh: 他的初稿比大多数作者的最终作品都要好。

sentences.en: He left the country to avoid the draft.
sentences.zh: 他离开这个国家是为了避免征兵。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“拽”，有拉的动作感
words.example_en: She can draw beautiful pictures with a pencil.
words.example_zh: 她能用铅笔画出漂亮的画。
words.en_def: The result of a contest that neither side has won; a tie.

sentences.en: The game ended in a draw.
sentences.zh: 比赛以平局结束。

sentences.en: The draw is on Saturday.
sentences.zh: 抽奖日期为周六。

sentences.en: She had to draw upon her experience to solve the problem.
sentences.zh: 她必须利用自己的经验来解决这个问题。

words.mnemonic_zh: draw（拉）+ back（回），拉回来的东西即缺点
words.example_en: The high price is a major drawback of this product.
words.example_zh: 高价格是这款产品的主要缺点。
words.en_def: A disadvantage; something that detracts or takes away.

sentences.en: Poor fuel economy is a common drawback among larger vehicles.
sentences.zh: 燃油经济性差是大型车辆的常见缺点。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“滴浮特”，滴在水上浮着特像漂流
words.example_en: The leaves drift slowly on the surface of the pond.
words.example_zh: 树叶在池塘水面上慢慢漂流。
words.en_def: (physical) Movement; that which moves or is moved.

sentences.en: genetic drift
sentences.zh: 遗传漂变

sentences.en: The balloon was drifting in the breeze.
sentences.zh: 气球在微风中飘荡。

sentences.en: He drifted from town to town, never settling down.
sentences.zh: 他从一个城镇漂泊到另一个城镇，从未安定下来。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“拽我”，开车要“拽”着车动
words.example_en: He likes to drive his new car on the highway.
words.example_zh: 他喜欢在高速公路上开他的新车。
words.en_def: Motivation to do or achieve something; ability coupled with ambition.

sentences.en: Crassus had wealth and wit, but Pompey had drive and Caesar as much again.
sentences.zh: 克拉苏拥有财富和智慧，但庞培和凯撒同样拥有动力。

sentences.en: Napoleon's drive on Moscow was as determined as it was disastrous.
sentences.zh: 拿破仑对莫斯科的进攻既坚决又是灾难性的。

sentences.en: Some old model trains have clockwork drives.
sentences.zh: 一些旧模型火车有发条驱动器。

words.suffix_cn: 动词的现在分词或动名词后缀
words.mnemonic_zh: drive（驾驶）加 -ing 表示驾驶这个行为
words.example_en: Driving in heavy traffic can be very stressful.
words.example_zh: 在交通拥堵时开车会很有压力。
words.en_def: To provide an impetus for motion or other physical change, to move an object by means of the provision of force thereto.

sentences.en: You drive nails into wood with a hammer.
sentences.zh: 您用锤子将钉子钉入木头。

sentences.en: My wife's constant harping about the condition of the house threatens to drive me to distraction.
sentences.zh: 我妻子总是喋喋不休地谈论房子的状况，这让我心烦意乱。

sentences.en: to drive twenty thousand head of cattle from Texas to the Kansas railheads; to drive sheep out of a field
sentences.zh: 将两万头牛从德克萨斯州赶到堪萨斯州的铁路终点站； 把羊赶出田地

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“坠破”，像东西坠落摔破
words.example_en: The temperature will drop significantly tonight.
words.example_zh: 今晚气温将大幅下降。
words.en_def: A small quantity of liquid, just large enough to hold its own round shape via surface tension, especially one that falls from a source of liquid.

sentences.en: Put three drops of oil into the mixture.
sentences.zh: 将三滴油放入混合物中。

sentences.en: asked for just a drop more tea; she was thirsty and there wasn't a drop of water to be found
sentences.zh: 要求多喝一滴茶； 她渴了，却找不到一滴水

sentences.en: It doesn't matter where you're from; anyone who enjoys the drop is a friend of mine.
sentences.zh: 你来自哪里并不重要； 任何喜欢掉落的人都是我的朋友。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“撞”进水里，容易淹死
words.example_en: He nearly drowned when he fell into the river.
words.example_zh: 他掉进河里差点淹死。
words.en_def: To die from suffocation while immersed in water or other fluid.

sentences.en: The answers intelligence services seek are often drowned in the flood of information they can now gather.
sentences.zh: 情报部门寻求的答案常常被他们现在收集的大量信息淹没。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“拽”干，把水分拽干就干燥了
words.example_en: The dry weather makes the grass turn yellow.
words.example_zh: 干燥的天气使草变黄了。
words.en_def: The process by which something is dried.

sentences.en: This towel is still damp: I think it needs another dry.
sentences.zh: 这条毛巾还是湿的：我想它需要再次干燥。

sentences.en: The clothes dried on the line.
sentences.zh: 衣服在绳子上晾干了。

sentences.en: Devin dried her eyes with a handkerchief.
sentences.zh: 德文用手帕擦干眼睛。

words.mnemonic_zh: du（二）+ al，有双重之意
words.example_en: The new device has a dual - function design.
words.example_zh: 新设备有双重功能设计。
words.en_def: Of an item that is one of a pair, the other item in the pair.

sentences.en: The octahedron is the dual of the cube.
sentences.zh: 八面体是立方体的对偶。

sentences.en: a dual-headed computer
sentences.zh: 双头计算机

sentences.en: Modern Arabic displays a dual number, as did Homeric Greek.
sentences.zh: 现代阿拉伯语显示双数，荷马希腊语也是如此。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“嘟”，像配音发出的声音
words.example_en: They dubbed the movie into several languages.
words.example_zh: 他们把这部电影配成了几种语言。
words.en_def: To confer knighthood; the conclusion of the ceremony was marked by a tap on the shoulder with a sword.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“打了”，被打了变迟钝
words.example_en: The lecture was so dull that many students fell asleep.
words.example_zh: 讲座太枯燥了，很多学生都睡着了。
words.en_def: To render dull; to remove or blunt an edge or something that was sharp.

sentences.en: Years of misuse have dulled the tools.
sentences.zh: 多年的误用已经使这些工具变得迟钝。

sentences.en: He drinks to dull the pain.
sentences.zh: 他喝酒来减轻疼痛。

sentences.en: A razor will dull with use.
sentences.zh: 剃刀会随着使用而变钝。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“大木”，像大木头一样又哑又笨
words.example_en: He felt dumb when he couldn't answer the simple question.
words.example_zh: 当他答不出那个简单的问题时，觉得自己很愚蠢。
words.en_def: Unable to speak; lacking power of speech (kept in "deaf, dumb, and blind").

sentences.en: His younger brother was born dumb, and communicated with sign language.
sentences.zh: 他的弟弟天生哑巴，靠手语交流。

sentences.en: dumb show
sentences.zh: 哑剧

sentences.en: You are so dumb! You don't even know how to make toast!
sentences.zh: 你太笨了！ 你根本不知道怎么做吐司！

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“当扑”，东西当垃圾扑出去
words.example_en: People shouldn't dump waste into the river.
words.example_zh: 人们不应该把垃圾倒进河里。
words.en_def: A place where waste or garbage is left; a ground or place for dumping ashes, refuse, etc.; a disposal site.

sentences.en: A toxic waste dump.
sentences.zh: 有毒废物倾倒场。

sentences.en: The new XML dump is coming soon.
sentences.zh: 新的 XML 转储即将推出。

sentences.en: Don't feel bad about moving away from this dump.
sentences.zh: 离开这个垃圾场不要感到难过。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“ duo（多）”，两个人也有点多
words.example_en: The comedy duo always makes the audience laugh.
words.example_zh: 这个喜剧二人组总能让观众发笑。
words.en_def: Two people who work or collaborate together as partners; especially, those who perform music together.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: dur（持续）+ ation（状态），持续的状态即持续时间
words.example_en: The duration of the concert was about two hours.
words.example_zh: 音乐会持续了大约两个小时。
words.en_def: An amount of time or a particular time interval.

sentences.en: Rationing will last at least for the duration.
sentences.zh: 配给至少会持续一段时间。

words.mnemonic_zh: dynam（动力）+ ic（……的），有动力的就是有活力的
words.example_en: The dynamic young leader brought new ideas to the company.
words.example_zh: 这位有活力的年轻领导给公司带来了新想法。
words.en_def: A characteristic or manner of an interaction; a behavior.

sentences.en: Watch the dynamic between the husband and wife when they disagree.
sentences.zh: 当夫妻意见不一致时，观察他们之间的动态。

sentences.en: The study of fluid dynamics quantifies turbulent and laminar flows.
sentences.zh: 流体动力学的研究量化了湍流和层流。

sentences.en: If you pay attention to the dynamics as you play, it's a very moving piece.
sentences.zh: 如果你在演奏时注意动态，就会发现这是一首非常感人的作品。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“一个”，一心想要一个，很渴望
words.example_en: The kids are eager to open their presents.
words.example_zh: 孩子们急切地想打开他们的礼物。
words.en_def: Sharp; sour; acid.

sentences.en: I was eager to show my teacher how much I'd learned over the holidays.
sentences.zh: 我渴望向老师展示我在假期里学到了多少东西。

sentences.en: an eager algorithm
sentences.zh: 急切的算法

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，常表示行为的结果
words.mnemonic_zh: earn（赚取）+ ings，赚取的结果就是收入
words.example_en: His earnings this month are quite high.
words.example_zh: 他这个月的收入相当高。
words.en_def: Wages, money earned, income.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“一撕”，撕东西很轻松
words.example_en: She finished the task with ease.
words.example_zh: 她轻松地完成了任务。
words.en_def: Ability, the means to do something, particularly:

sentences.en: He eased his conscience by confessing.
sentences.zh: 他坦白了自己的良心。

sentences.en: He loosened his shoe to ease the pain.
sentences.zh: 他松开鞋子以减轻疼痛。

sentences.en: The provision of extra staff eased their workload.
sentences.zh: 额外人员的配备减轻了他们的工作量。

words.mnemonic_zh: ease（轻松）+ ly（……地），轻松地
words.example_en: He can solve the problem easily.
words.example_zh: 他能轻松地解决这个问题。
words.en_def: Comfortably, without discomfort or anxiety.

sentences.en: Individuals without a family network are easily controlled.
sentences.zh: 没有家庭网络的个人很容易被控制。

sentences.en: This is easily the best meal I have eaten.
sentences.zh: 这无疑是我吃过的最好的一餐。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“哎，口”，张嘴发出声音就有回声
words.example_en: The echo of the gunshot could be heard in the valley.
words.example_zh: 枪声的回声在山谷中都能听到。
words.en_def: A reflected sound that is heard again by its initial observer.

sentences.en: Sid echoed his father's point of view.
sentences.zh: 席德赞同他父亲的观点。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关
words.mnemonic_zh: eco（生态）+ log（学科）+ ical（……的），有关生态学科的
words.example_en: Ecological balance is crucial for the survival of species.
words.example_zh: 生态平衡对物种的生存至关重要。
words.en_def: Relating to ecology, the interrelationships of organisms and their environment.

words.mnemonic_zh: eco（生态）+ log（学科）+ y，研究生态的学科
words.example_en: Ecology focuses on the relationship between organisms and their environment.
words.example_zh: 生态学专注于生物与其环境之间的关系。
words.en_def: The branch of biology dealing with the relationships of organisms with their environment and with each other.

words.mnemonic_zh: ed（吃）+ ible（可……的），可以吃的
words.example_en: Some mushrooms are edible, while others are poisonous.
words.example_zh: 有些蘑菇可食用，而有些则有毒。
words.en_def: Anything edible.

sentences.en: edible fruit
sentences.zh: 食用水果

sentences.en: Although stale, the bread was edible.
sentences.zh: 虽然面包不新鲜了，但还是可以吃的。

words.mnemonic_zh: e（出）+ duc（引导）+ ator（人），引导学生成长的人
words.example_en: Good educators can inspire students to achieve their potential.
words.example_zh: 优秀的教育工作者能激励学生发挥潜力。
words.en_def: A person distinguished for his/her educational work, a teacher.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: ef（出）+ fect（做）+ iveness（性质），做出成果的性质
words.example_en: The effectiveness of this new drug needs further testing.
words.example_zh: 这种新药的有效性需要进一步测试。
words.en_def: The property of being effective, of achieving results.

sentences.en: The effectiveness of the drug was well established.
sentences.zh: 该药物的有效性已得到充分证实。

sentences.en: He questioned the effectiveness of the treatment.
sentences.zh: 他质疑治疗的有效性。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: ef（出）+ fic（做）+ iency（性质），做出成果的效率
words.example_en: The company aims to improve efficiency in production processes.
words.example_zh: 公司旨在提高生产流程的效率。
words.en_def: The extent to which time is well used for the intended task.

sentences.en: The efficiency of the planning department is deplorable.
sentences.zh: 规划部门的效率低得可怜。

sentences.en: The efficiency of this loudspeaker is 40%.
sentences.zh: 该扬声器的效率为40%。

sentences.en: I have an efficiency available June through July.
sentences.zh: 我有六月到七月的效率。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“一个”，一个人的自我
words.example_en: His ego often gets in the way of good decision - making.
words.example_zh: 他的自负常常妨碍他做出正确的决定。
words.en_def: The self, especially with a sense of self-importance.

words.mnemonic_zh: e（出）+ labor（劳作）+ ate（使……），使劳作成果展现出来
words.example_en: Please elaborate on your plan in more detail.
words.example_zh: 请更详细地阐述你的计划。
words.en_def: To develop in detail or complexity

sentences.en: Could you elaborate on the plot for your novel for me?
sentences.zh: 你能为我详细说明一下你的小说的情节吗？

sentences.en: After reading a long, elaborate description, I was impressed but no wiser.
sentences.zh: 读完长篇大论的描述后，我印象深刻，但并没有更明智。

sentences.en: I stared for hours at the elaborate pattern in the rug.
sentences.zh: 我盯着地毯上精致的图案看了几个小时。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关
words.mnemonic_zh: e（出）+ lect（选择）+ oral（……的），与选出来有关的
words.example_en: The electoral system plays a key role in a democratic country.
words.example_zh: 选举制度在民主国家中起着关键作用。
words.en_def: Relating to or composed of electors.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“挨闷踢”，空荡荡才会挨闷踢
words.example_en: The empty house looked rather desolate in the moonlight.
words.example_zh: 那所空房子在月光下显得十分荒凉。
words.en_def: (usually plural) A container, especially a bottle, whose contents have been used up, leaving it empty.

sentences.en: Put the empties out to be recycled.
sentences.zh: 把空的东西拿出来回收。

sentences.en: The cinema emptied quickly after the end of the film.
sentences.zh: 电影结束后，电影院很快就空了。

sentences.en: Salmon River empties on the W shore about 2 miles below Bear River.
sentences.zh: 萨蒙河 (Salmon River) 在熊河 (Bear River) 下方约 2 英里处的西岸注入水。

words.mnemonic_zh: en使 + act行动，使行动起来，即制定法规等
words.example_en: The government decided to enact new laws to protect the environment.
words.example_zh: 政府决定制定新法律来保护环境。
words.en_def: Purpose; determination

words.mnemonic_zh: en使 + close关闭，使关闭起来，即围住
words.example_en: They plan to enclose the garden with a fence.
words.example_zh: 他们计划用栅栏把花园围起来。
words.en_def: To surround with a wall, fence, etc.

sentences.en: to enclose lands
sentences.zh: 圈地

sentences.en: Please enclose a stamped self-addressed envelope if you require a reply.
sentences.zh: 如果您需要回复，请附上贴好邮票的回邮信封。

words.mnemonic_zh: en使 + compass范围，使进入范围，即涵盖
words.example_en: This book encompasses a wide range of topics on history.
words.example_zh: 这本书涵盖了广泛的历史主题。
words.en_def: To form a circle around; to encircle.

sentences.en: This book on English grammar encompasses all irregular verbs.
sentences.zh: 这本英语语法书涵盖了所有不规则动词。

sentences.en: Drake encompassed the globe.
sentences.zh: 德雷克涵盖了全球。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果等
words.mnemonic_zh: en使 + courage勇气，使有勇气的东西，即鼓励
words.example_en: His words of encouragement gave her the strength to face the difficulty.
words.example_zh: 他鼓励的话语给了她面对困难的力量。
words.en_def: The act of encouraging

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有某种性质
words.cn_def: 鼓舞人心的；令人鼓舞的
words.mnemonic_zh: en使 + courage勇气，使人有勇气的，即鼓舞人心的
words.example_en: The encouraging news made everyone in the team excited.
words.example_zh: 这个鼓舞人心的消息让团队里的每个人都很兴奋。
words.en_def: To mentally support; to motivate, give courage, hope or spirit.

sentences.en: I encouraged him during his race.
sentences.zh: 我在比赛期间鼓励他。

sentences.en: We encourage the use of bicycles in the town centre.
sentences.zh: 我们鼓励在市中心使用自行车。

sentences.en: The royal family has always encouraged the arts in word and deed
sentences.zh: 王室一直在言行上鼓励艺术

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“俺得味”，俺得努力才有滋味
words.example_en: They will endeavour to finish the project on time.
words.example_zh: 他们将努力按时完成这个项目。
words.en_def: A sincere attempt; a determined or assiduous effort towards a specific goal; assiduous or persistent activity.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示无、没有
words.cn_def: 无尽的；无穷的；没完没了的
words.mnemonic_zh: end结束 + less无，没有结束的，即无尽的
words.example_zh: 孩子们似乎有无穷的精力。
words.example_en: Children seem to have endless energy.
words.en_def: Having no end.

sentences.en: endless time; endless praise
sentences.zh: 无尽的时间； 无尽的赞美

sentences.en: an endless line
sentences.zh: 无尽的线

words.mnemonic_zh: en使 + dorse背部，使在背面签字，即支持、背书
words.example_en: Many celebrities endorse various products to promote sales.
words.example_zh: 许多名人代言各种产品以促进销售。
words.en_def: A diminutive of the pale, usually appearing in pairs on either side of a pale.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果等
words.mnemonic_zh: en使 + dorse背部 + ment后缀，使在背面签字的行为，即认可
words.example_en: The company got an important endorsement from a well - known expert.
words.example_zh: 该公司得到了一位知名专家的重要认可。
words.en_def: The act or quality of endorsing

sentences.en: Companies sometimes pay millions for product endorsement by celebrities.
sentences.zh: 公司有时会支付数百万美元来请名人代言产品。

sentences.en: Mr. Jones paid extra for the flood damage endorsement on his house insurance.
sentences.zh: 琼斯先生为他的房屋保险的洪水损失担保支付了额外费用。

sentences.en: Once she obtained the endorsement of her night flying hours, Joanna was approved to take the pilot's examination.
sentences.zh: 一旦获得夜间飞行时间的认可，乔安娜就被批准参加飞行员考试。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: equ（相等）+ ity（表性质），即相等的性质，平等
words.example_en: They are fighting for gender equality in the workplace.
words.example_zh: 他们正在为职场中的性别平等而斗争。
words.en_def: The fact of being equal.

words.mnemonic_zh: equ（相等）+ ly（副词后缀），表示相等地，同样地
words.example_en: All students should be treated equally in school.
words.example_zh: 在学校里所有学生都应被平等对待。
words.en_def: (manner) In an equal manner; in equal shares or proportion; with equal and impartial justice; evenly

sentences.en: All citizens are equally taxed.
sentences.zh: 所有公民均平等纳税。

sentences.en: The gas stations are equally far from the highway.
sentences.zh: 加油站距离高速公路同样远。

sentences.en: John suffered setbacks at his job. Equally, Frank's business slowed.
sentences.zh: 约翰在工作中遭遇挫折。 同样，弗兰克的生意也放缓了。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: equ（相等）+ ation（名词后缀），等式两边是相等的
words.example_en: Can you solve this difficult equation?
words.example_zh: 你能解出这个难题的方程式吗？
words.en_def: The act or process of equating two or more things, or the state of those things being equal (that is, identical).

sentences.en: We need to bring the balance of power into equation
sentences.zh: 我们需要将力量平衡纳入方程式

words.mnemonic_zh: equ（相等）+ ivalent（有……性质），即有相等性质的，等价的
words.example_en: This English word has an equivalent in Chinese.
words.example_zh: 这个英语单词在中文里有对应的等价词。
words.en_def: Anything that is virtually equal to something else, or has the same value, force, etc.

sentences.en: To burn calories, a thirty-minute jog is equivalent to a couple of hamburgers.
sentences.zh: 为了燃烧卡路里，三十分钟的慢跑相当于两个汉堡。

sentences.en: A square may be equivalent to a triangle.
sentences.zh: 正方形可以等价于三角形。

words.mnemonic_zh: e（向上）+ rect（直），向上变直，即直立、建立
words.example_en: They plan to erect a monument in the park.
words.example_zh: 他们计划在公园里立一座纪念碑。
words.en_def: Upright; vertical or reaching broadly upwards.

sentences.en: The penis should be fully erect before commencing copulation.
sentences.zh: 开始交配前阴茎应完全勃起。

sentences.en: OK, baby, I'm erect now. Let's get it on!
sentences.zh: 好吧，宝贝，我现在勃起了。 让我们开始吧！

sentences.en: to erect a house or a fort
sentences.zh: 建造房屋或堡垒

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: e（向外）+ ros（咬）+ ion（名词后缀），向外咬，即侵蚀
words.example_en: Soil erosion is a serious problem in this area.
words.example_zh: 土壤侵蚀在这个地区是个严重的问题。
words.en_def: The result of having been worn away or eroded, as by a glacier on rock or the sea on a cliff face.

sentences.en: the erosion of a person's trust
sentences.zh: 一个人的信任受到侵蚀

words.mnemonic_zh: escal（梯子）+ ate（使），像爬梯子一样逐步上升，即升级
words.example_en: The conflict between the two countries began to escalate.
words.example_zh: 两国之间的冲突开始逐步升级。
words.en_def: To increase (something) in extent or intensity; to intensify or step up.

sentences.en: The shooting escalated the existing hostility.
sentences.zh: 枪击事件加剧了现有的敌对情绪。

sentences.en: The tech 1 escalated the caller to a tech 2.
sentences.zh: 技术 1 将呼叫者升级为技术 2。

words.mnemonic_zh: es（向外）+ cape（抓住），从被抓住的状态向外，即逃脱
words.example_en: The prisoner managed to escape from the jail.
words.example_zh: 囚犯设法从监狱里逃了出来。
words.en_def: The act of leaving a dangerous or unpleasant situation.

sentences.en: The prisoners made their escape by digging a tunnel.
sentences.zh: 囚犯们挖了一条隧道越狱。

sentences.en: You forgot to insert an escape in the datastream.
sentences.zh: 您忘记在数据流中插入转义符。

sentences.en: The factory was evacuated after toxic gases escaped from a pipe.
sentences.zh: 有毒气体从管道中逸出后，工厂被疏散。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: ess（存在）+ ence（表性质），事物存在的根本性质，即本质
words.example_en: The essence of love is understanding and tolerance.
words.example_zh: 爱的本质是理解和包容。
words.en_def: The inherent nature of a thing or idea.

sentences.en: essence of Jojoba
sentences.zh: 荷荷巴精华

sentences.en: vanilla essence
sentences.zh: 香草精

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: establish（建立）+ ment（名词后缀），建立的行为或结果，即建立、机构
words.example_en: The establishment of this organization aims to help the poor.
words.example_zh: 这个组织的建立旨在帮助穷人。
words.en_def: The act of establishing; a ratifying or ordaining; settlement; confirmation.

sentences.en: Since their establishment of the company in 1984, they have grown into a global business.
sentences.zh: 自 1984 年成立以来，他们已发展成为一家全球性企业。

sentences.en: The firm celebrated twenty years since their establishment by updating their look.
sentences.zh: 该公司通过更新外观来庆祝成立二十周年。

sentences.en: Exposing the shabby parts of the establishment.
sentences.zh: 暴露该机构的破旧部分。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外走，超过界限
words.example_en: The cost of the project will exceed our initial estimate.
words.example_zh: 这个项目的成本将超过我们最初的估计。
words.en_def: To be larger, greater than (something).

sentences.en: The company's 2005 revenue exceeds that of 2004.
sentences.zh: 公司2005年的收入超过2004年。

sentences.en: The quality of her essay has exceeded my expectations.
sentences.zh: 她的论文质量超出了我的预期。

sentences.en: Your password cannot exceed eight characters.
sentences.zh: 您的密码不能超过八个字符。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 向外突出，就是卓越
words.example_en: The school is famous for its academic excellence.
words.example_zh: 这所学校以其卓越的学术水平而闻名。
words.en_def: The quality of being excellent; brilliance

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有…性质的
words.cn_def: 杰出的； exceptional例句：The athlete showed exceptional talent in the competition. 运动员在比赛中展现出了杰出的才华。这个词来自“ex（出）+cept（拿）”，表示被拿出去的、与众不同的，所以是杰出的意思。
words.mnemonic_zh: 特意拿出的，自然杰出
words.example_en: The athlete showed exceptional talent in the competition.
words.example_zh: 这位运动员在比赛中展现出了非凡的天赋。
words.en_def: An exception, or something having an exceptional value

sentences.en: What an exceptional flower!
sentences.zh: 多么特别的花啊！

sentences.en: The quality of the beer was exceptional.
sentences.zh: 啤酒的品质非常出色。

sentences.en: an exceptional curve; an exceptional divisor
sentences.zh: 异常的曲线； 例外除数

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词加 -ly 变来，表示…地
words.mnemonic_zh: 杰出的程度，极其突出
words.example_en: The weather this summer is exceptionally hot.
words.example_zh: 今年夏天的天气异常炎热。
words.en_def: To an unusual, remarkable or exceptional degree.

words.mnemonic_zh: 走出正常范围，就是过量
words.example_en: Excess of sugar in the diet can lead to health problems.
words.example_zh: 饮食中糖分过量会导致健康问题。
words.en_def: The state of surpassing or going beyond limits; the being of a measure beyond sufficiency, necessity, or duty; that which exceeds what is usual or proper

sentences.en: The excess of heavy water was given away to the neighbouring country.
sentences.zh: 多余的重水被送给邻国。

sentences.en: The difference between two numbers is the excess of one over the other.
sentences.zh: 两个数字之间的差异是一个数字超出另一个数字的差值。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 超出正常行走范围，是过度的
words.example_en: He has an excessive love for junk food.
words.example_zh: 他对垃圾食品有着过度的喜爱。
words.en_def: Exceeding the usual bounds of something; extravagant; immoderate.

sentences.en: Putting a wide vibrato on a single 16th triplet note at 160 beats per minute seems rather excessive.
sentences.zh: 以每分钟 160 拍的速度将宽颤音放在单个第 16 个三连音音符上似乎有点过分了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 关到外面，就是排除
words.example_en: The price excludes tax and service charges.
words.example_zh: 这个价格不包括税和服务费。
words.en_def: To bar (someone) from entering; to keep out.

sentences.en: to exclude young animals from the womb or from eggs
sentences.zh: 将幼小动物排除在子宫或鸡蛋之外

sentences.en: Count from 1 to 30, but exclude the prime numbers.
sentences.zh: 从 1 数到 30，但排除素数。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 把人关到外面的行为，即排斥
words.example_en: His exclusion from the team made him very sad.
words.example_zh: 他被球队排除在外，这让他非常伤心。
words.en_def: The act of excluding or shutting out; removal from consideration or taking part.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 只关自己，排他独占
words.example_en: This club has exclusive membership benefits.
words.example_zh: 这个俱乐部有专属的会员福利。
words.en_def: Information (or an artefact) that is granted or obtained exclusively.

sentences.en: The editor agreed to keep a lid on a potentially disastrous political scoop in exchange for an exclusive of a happier nature.
sentences.zh: 这位编辑同意对可能带来灾难性的政治独家新闻进行保密，以换取更快乐的本性的独家报道。

sentences.en: Exclusive clubs tend to serve exclusive brands of food and drinks, in the same exorbitant price range, such as the 'finest' French châteaux.
sentences.zh: 独家俱乐部往往以同样高昂的价格提供独家品牌的食品和饮料，例如“最好的”法国城堡。

sentences.en: The teacher's pet commands the teacher's exclusive attention.
sentences.zh: 老师的宠物引起了老师的特别关注。

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词加 -ly 变来，表示…地
words.mnemonic_zh: 排他性质的状态，专门地进行
words.example_en: The magazine is published exclusively for women.
words.example_zh: 这本杂志是专门为女性出版的。
words.en_def: (focus) to the exclusion of anything or anyone else; solely or entirely

words.mnemonic_zh: 彻底跟随计划做，即执行
words.example_en: The company will execute a new marketing strategy next month.
words.example_zh: 公司下个月将执行一项新的营销策略。
words.en_def: To kill as punishment for capital crimes.

sentences.en: There are certain states where it is lawful to execute prisoners convicted of certain crimes.
sentences.zh: 在某些州，处决犯有某些罪行的囚犯是合法的。

sentences.en: I'll execute your orders as soon as this meeting is adjourned.
sentences.zh: 会议休会后我将立即执行您的命令。

sentences.en: to execute a difficult piece of music brilliantly
sentences.zh: 出色地演奏一首困难的音乐

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: execute 的名词，执行的行为或结果
words.example_en: The execution of the project requires careful planning.
words.example_zh: 项目的实施需要精心规划。
words.en_def: The act, manner or style of executing (actions, maneuvers, performances).

sentences.en: The mission's successful execution lifted the troops' morale.
sentences.zh: 任务的成功执行极大地鼓舞了部队的士气。

sentences.en: The entire machine slowed down during the execution of the virus checker.
sentences.zh: 在执行病毒检查程序期间，整个机器的速度变慢。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词或名词后缀，表有…性质的或人
words.mnemonic_zh: 执行事务的人，即管理人员
words.example_en: The executive made an important decision for the company.
words.example_zh: 这位管理人员为公司做出了重要决定。
words.en_def: A chief officer or administrator, especially one who can make significant decisions on their own authority.

sentences.en: an executive officer
sentences.zh: 执行官

sentences.en: an executive bathroom
sentences.zh: 行政浴室

words.mnemonic_zh: 把力量向外使，即运用
words.example_en: He can exert a great influence on his students.
words.example_zh: 他能对他的学生施加很大的影响。
words.en_def: To put in vigorous action.

sentences.en: I exerted myself in today's training.
sentences.zh: 今天的训练我很努力。

sentences.en: He considered exerting his influence on John to gain an advantage for himself.
sentences.zh: 他考虑向约翰施加影响，为自己谋取利益。

words.mnemonic_zh: 把力气向外抽，会精疲力竭
words.example_en: The long - distance running exhausted him completely.
words.example_zh: 长跑让他彻底精疲力竭了。
words.en_def: A system consisting of the parts of an engine through which burned gases or steam are discharged; see also exhaust system.

sentences.en: Moisture of the earth is exhausted by evaporation.
sentences.zh: 地球上的水分通过蒸发而耗尽。

sentences.en: to exhaust a treasury
sentences.zh: 耗尽国库

sentences.en: I exhausted my strength walking up the hill.
sentences.zh: 我用尽了全身的力气往山上走。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 像把东西抽干一样彻底，即详尽的
words.example_en: They made an exhaustive study of the problem.
words.example_zh: 他们对这个问题进行了详尽的研究。
words.en_def: Including every possible element

sentences.en: We made an exhaustive list.
sentences.zh: 我们列出了一份详尽的清单。

words.mnemonic_zh: 把东西向外拿出来，即展览
words.example_en: The museum will exhibit some ancient artifacts next week.
words.example_zh: 博物馆下周将展出一些古代文物。
words.en_def: An instance of exhibiting.

sentences.en: The museum's new exhibit is drawing quite a crowd.
sentences.zh: 博物馆的新展览吸引了很多人。

sentences.en: Exhibit A is this photograph of the corpse.
sentences.zh: 证物 A 是这张尸体的照片。

sentences.en: He wanted to exhibit his baseball cards.
sentences.zh: 他想展示他的棒球卡。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外走，被流放到外面
words.example_en: The king sent the traitor into exile.
words.example_zh: 国王把叛徒流放了。
words.en_def: The state of being banished from one's home or country.

sentences.en: He lived in exile.
sentences.zh: 他过着流亡的生活。

sentences.en: She lived as an exile.
sentences.zh: 她过着流放的生活。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外站出来，即存在
words.example_en: Many different species exist in this forest.
words.example_zh: 这片森林里存在着许多不同的物种。
words.en_def: (stative) to be; have existence; have being or reality

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、性质
words.mnemonic_zh: exist 的名词，存在的状态
words.example_en: The existence of this ancient tribe is a mystery.
words.example_zh: 这个古代部落的存在是个谜。
words.en_def: The state of being, existing, or occurring; beinghood.

sentences.en: In order to destroy evil, we must first acknowledge its existence.
sentences.zh: 为了消灭邪恶，我们首先必须承认它的存在。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外走的地方就是出口
words.example_en: The emergency exit should always be kept clear.
words.example_zh: 紧急出口应始终保持畅通。
words.en_def: An act of going out or going away, or leaving; a departure.

sentences.en: He made his exit at the opportune time.
sentences.zh: 他在适当的时候退出了。

sentences.en: the untimely exit of a respected politician
sentences.zh: 一位受人尊敬的政治家过早退出

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 向外花费的钱就是支出
words.example_en: The company's expenditure on research has increased this year.
words.example_zh: 该公司今年在研究方面的支出有所增加。
words.en_def: Act of expending or paying out.

sentences.en: The expenditure of time, money, and political capital on this project has been excessive.
sentences.zh: 这个项目花费的时间、金钱和政治资本过多。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外花的钱就是费用
words.example_en: The travel expenses include flights and accommodation.
words.example_zh: 旅行费用包括机票和住宿。
words.en_def: A spending or consuming, often a disbursement of funds.

sentences.en: Buying the car was a big expense, but will be worth it in the long run.
sentences.zh: 买车是一笔很大的开支，但从长远来看是值得的。

sentences.en: Jones reached the final at the expense of Smith, who couldn't beat him.
sentences.zh: 琼斯进入了决赛，但史密斯未能击败他。

sentences.en: It should be acceptable to expense a business lunch with a client.
sentences.zh: 与客户共进商务午餐应该是可以接受的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外尝试的就是实验性的
words.example_en: They are conducting an experimental study on new drugs.
words.example_zh: 他们正在对新药进行一项实验性研究。
words.en_def: The subject of an experiment.

sentences.en: Chemistry is an experimental science.
sentences.zh: 化学是一门实验科学。

sentences.en: an experimental engine
sentences.zh: 实验引擎

sentences.en: experimental knowledge
sentences.zh: 实验知识

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外呼出最后一口气，生命到期
words.example_en: Your passport will expire next month.
words.example_zh: 你的护照下个月到期。
words.en_def: To die.

sentences.en: The patient expired in hospital.
sentences.zh: 患者在医院去世。

sentences.en: My library card will expire next week.
sentences.zh: 我的借书证下周就到期了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外展开，意思就明确了
words.example_en: He gave explicit instructions on how to operate the machine.
words.example_zh: 他明确说明了如何操作这台机器。
words.en_def: Very specific, clear, or detailed.

sentences.en: I gave explicit instructions for him to stay here, but he followed me, anyway.
sentences.zh: 我明确指示他留在这里，但他还是跟着我。

sentences.en: The film had several scenes including explicit language and sex.
sentences.zh: 这部电影有几个场景，包括露骨的语言和性爱。

words.mnemonic_zh: 明确的加上副词后缀就是明确地
words.example_en: She stated explicitly that she would not attend the meeting.
words.example_zh: 她明确表示不会参加会议。
words.en_def: In an explicit manner.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 向外利用资源就是开发
words.example_en: The exploitation of natural resources should be sustainable.
words.example_zh: 自然资源的开发应该是可持续的。
words.en_def: The act of utilizing something; industry.

sentences.en: the exploitation of children in beauty pageants
sentences.zh: 选美比赛中对儿童的剥削

sentences.en: Undocumented migrants are vulnerable to exploitation
sentences.zh: 无证移民很容易受到剥削

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 向外探索未知就是勘探
words.example_en: Space exploration has always fascinated mankind.
words.example_zh: 太空探索一直吸引着人类。
words.en_def: The process of exploring.

sentences.en: The exploration of unknown areas was often the precursor to colonization.
sentences.zh: 对未知地区的探索往往是殖民的前兆。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 向外炸开就是爆炸
words.example_en: The explosion caused a lot of damage to the building.
words.example_zh: 爆炸给那座建筑物造成了很大的破坏。
words.en_def: A violent release of energy (sometimes mechanical, nuclear, or chemical.)

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外（ex-）爆发（plos）的，就是易爆炸的
words.example_en: Firefighters handled the explosive device with extreme caution.
words.example_zh: 消防员极其谨慎地处理了爆炸装置。
words.en_def: Any explosive substance.

sentences.en: an explosive device
sentences.zh: 爆炸装置

sentences.en: an explosive fire
sentences.zh: 爆炸性火灾

sentences.en: an explosive accusation
sentences.zh: 爆炸性指控

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 向外（ex-）放置（pos），就会暴露
words.example_en: Prolonged exposure to sunlight may damage your skin.
words.example_zh: 长时间暴露在阳光下可能会损害你的皮肤。
words.en_def: The condition of being exposed, uncovered, or unprotected.

sentences.en: Limit your exposure to harsh chemicals.   Get as much exposure to a new language as you can.
sentences.zh: 限制接触刺激性化学物质。 尽可能多地接触新语言。

sentences.en: They rented a cabin with a beautiful southern exposure.
sentences.zh: 他们租了一间朝南风景优美的小屋。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表比较或描述
words.mnemonic_zh: 向外（ex-）的部分，就是外部的
words.example_en: The exterior walls of the building are being painted.
words.example_zh: 建筑物的外墙正在粉刷。
words.morph_note: root 含义经过简化处理
words.en_def: The outside part, parts or surface of something.

sentences.en: The sticker was attached to the exterior of the package
sentences.zh: 贴纸贴在包装外部

sentences.en: She is our new minister of the exterior
sentences.zh: 她是我们新任的外务部长

sentences.en: the exterior part of a sphere
sentences.zh: 球体的外部部分

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外（ex-）被刺杀掉，所以灭绝了
words.example_en: Many species have become extinct due to human activities.
words.example_zh: 由于人类活动，许多物种已经灭绝。
words.en_def: To make extinct; to extinguish or annihilate.

sentences.en: Poor Edward's cigarillo was already extinct.
sentences.zh: 可怜的爱德华的小雪茄已经绝迹了。

sentences.en: Luckily, such ideas about race are extinct in current sociological theory.
sentences.zh: 幸运的是，这种关于种族的想法在当前的社会学理论中已经消失了。

sentences.en: The dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
sentences.zh: 恐龙已经灭绝了数百万年。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: extinct 加名词后缀，表灭绝状态
words.example_en: The extinction of dinosaurs is a mystery to scientists.
words.example_zh: 恐龙的灭绝对科学家来说是个谜。
words.en_def: The action of making or becoming extinct; annihilation.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“额外”，意思就是额外地
words.example_en: He works extra hard to achieve his goals.
words.example_zh: 他格外努力地工作以实现自己的目标。
words.en_def: Something additional, such as an item above and beyond the ordinary school curriculum, or added to the usual charge on a bill.

sentences.en: Extra, extra! Read all about it!
sentences.zh: 额外，额外！ 阅读所有关于它的内容！

sentences.en: I don't mind doing some extra work, as long as I get extra pay.
sentences.zh: 我不介意做一些额外的工作，只要我能得到额外的报酬。

sentences.en: You unfollowed her for posting cat memes? You're so extra!
sentences.zh: 你因为发布猫表情包而取消关注她？ 你真是多余啊！

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外（ex-）拉（tract），就是提取
words.example_en: Scientists can extract DNA from various organisms.
words.example_zh: 科学家可以从各种生物体中提取 DNA。
words.en_def: Something that is extracted or drawn out.

sentences.en: I used an extract of Hemingway's book to demonstrate culture shock.
sentences.zh: 我用海明威的书的摘录来展示文化冲击。

sentences.en: extract of beef
sentences.zh: 牛肉提取物

sentences.en: quinine is the most important extract of Peruvian bark.
sentences.zh: 奎宁是秘鲁树皮最重要的提取物。

words.mnemonic_zh: 极端（extrem-）的人就是极端主义者
words.example_en: The government is taking measures to deal with extremists.
words.example_zh: 政府正在采取措施对付极端主义者。
words.en_def: A person who holds extreme views, especially one who advocates such views; a radical or fanatic.

words.mnemonic_zh: 向外（extro-）转（vert）的人，性格外向
words.example_en: Extroverts usually enjoy social gatherings.
words.example_zh: 外向的人通常喜欢社交聚会。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“帆布可”，帆布是一种织物
words.example_en: This store sells a variety of high - quality fabrics.
words.example_zh: 这家商店销售各种高质量的布料。
words.en_def: An edifice or building.

sentences.en: cloth of a beautiful fabric
sentences.zh: 美丽的布料

sentences.en: the fabric of our lives
sentences.zh: 我们生活的结构

sentences.en: cotton fabric
sentences.zh: 棉织物

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 像传说故事一样精彩，所以是绝妙的
words.example_en: The view from the mountaintop is truly fabulous on a clear day.
words.example_zh: 在晴朗的日子里，山顶的景色真是美极了。
words.en_def: Of or relating to fable, myth or legend.

words.mnemonic_zh: 让事情变得容易，就是促进
words.example_en: New software can facilitate the process of data analysis.
words.example_zh: 新软件可以使数据分析过程更便捷。
words.en_def: To make easy or easier.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态等
words.mnemonic_zh: 因共同行动形成的一群人，就是派别
words.example_en: There are several factions within the political party.
words.example_zh: 该政党内部有几个派别。
words.en_def: A group of people, especially within a political organization, which expresses a shared belief or opinion different from people who are not part of the group.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 有教学能力的一群人是全体教员
words.example_en: The faculty at this university is highly qualified.
words.example_zh: 这所大学的教师队伍资质很高。
words.en_def: The academic staff at schools, colleges, universities or not-for-profit research institutes, as opposed to the students or support staff.

sentences.en: She transferred from the Faculty of Science to the Faculty of Medicine.
sentences.zh: 她从理学院转到医学院。

sentences.en: He lived until he reached the age of 90 with most of his faculties intact.
sentences.zh: 他一直活到90岁，大部分身体机能都完好无损。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“废的”，东西破旧褪色就快废了
words.example_en: The colors of the old painting have faded over time.
words.example_zh: 那幅旧画的颜色随着时间的推移已经褪色了。
words.en_def: A golf shot that (for the right-handed player) curves intentionally to the right. See slice, hook, draw.

sentences.en: The milkman's whistling faded into the distance.
sentences.zh: 送奶工的口哨声渐渐消失在远方。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“费尔”，做事不偏袒，就公平
words.example_en: The judge made a fair decision in the case.
words.example_zh: 法官在这个案件中做出了公正的裁决。
words.en_def: Something which is fair (in various senses of the adjective).

sentences.en: When will we learn to distinguish between the fair and the foul?
sentences.zh: 我们什么时候才能学会辨别公平与不公平？

sentences.en: Monday's child is fair of face.
sentences.zh: 星期一的孩子脸色白皙。

sentences.en: After scratching out and replacing various words in the manuscript, he scribed a fair copy to send to the publisher.
sentences.zh: 在划掉并替换手稿中的各个文字后，他写了一份公平的副本并发送给出版商。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 公平的性质状态就是公平公正
words.example_en: We should always strive for fairness in our dealings.
words.example_zh: 我们在交往中应该始终追求公平。
words.en_def: The property of being fair or equitable.

sentences.en: Some questioned the fairness of the new laws.
sentences.zh: 一些人质疑新法律的公平性。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“非客”，不像真客人，是假装的
words.example_en: He tried to fake his illness to avoid work.
words.example_zh: 他试图装病来逃避工作。
words.en_def: Something which is not genuine, or is presented fraudulently.

sentences.en: to fake a marriage
sentences.zh: 假结婚

sentences.en: Which fur coat looks fake?
sentences.zh: 哪件皮草大衣看上去很假？

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“佛”，佛像仿佛会从高处落下
words.example_en: Leaves fall from the trees in autumn.
words.example_zh: 秋天树叶从树上落下。
words.en_def: The act of moving to a lower position under the effect of gravity.

sentences.en: the fall of Rome
sentences.zh: 罗马的陷落

sentences.en: He set up his rival to take the fall.
sentences.zh: 他陷害他的对手来承受失败。

sentences.en: Have the goodness to secure the falls of the mizzen halyards.
sentences.zh: 一定要保护好后桅升降索的坠落。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音接近“佛思”，胡思乱想出来的是虚假的
words.example_en: The witness gave false testimony in court.
words.example_zh: 证人在法庭上作了伪证。
words.en_def: One of two options on a true-or-false test.

sentences.en: The student received a failing grade for circling every true and false on her quiz.
sentences.zh: 该学生因在测验中圈出所有正确和错误的内容而获得了不及格的成绩。

sentences.en: false legislation, false punishment
sentences.zh: 错误的立法、错误的惩罚

sentences.en: false teeth
sentences.zh: 假牙

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“粉丝内特”，粉丝被内特深深吸引
words.example_en: The ancient stories fascinate children with their magic and mystery.
words.example_zh: 古老的故事以其魔力和神秘吸引着孩子们。
words.en_def: To evoke an intense interest or attraction in someone.

sentences.en: The flickering TV fascinated the cat.
sentences.zh: 闪烁的电视让猫着迷。

sentences.en: We were fascinated by the potter's skill.
sentences.zh: 我们被陶工的技艺所折服。

sentences.en: Her gait fascinates all men.
sentences.zh: 她的步态令所有男人着迷。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: fascinate的名词形式，有魔力的状态
words.example_en: His fascination with astronomy led him to study the stars every night.
words.example_zh: 他对天文学的迷恋使他每晚都去研究星星。
words.en_def: The act of bewitching, or enchanting

sentences.en: To my fascination, the skies turned all kinds of colours.
sentences.zh: 令我着迷的是，天空变成了各种各样的颜色。

sentences.en: Life after death had always been a great fascination to him.
sentences.zh: 死后的生命一直对他非常着迷。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“肥头”，肥头大耳易有致命疾病
words.example_en: The driver's carelessness caused a fatal accident on the highway.
words.example_zh: 司机的粗心在高速公路上造成了致命事故。
words.en_def: A fatality; an event that leads to death.

sentences.en: a fatal wound; a fatal disease; that fatal day; a fatal mistake
sentences.zh: 致命伤； 一种致命的疾病； 那个致命的日子； 致命的错误

sentences.en: a fatal error; a fatal exception
sentences.zh: 致命错误； 致命的异常

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“废特”，特别废可能命运不好
words.example_en: Many people believe that fate determines our life paths.
words.example_zh: 许多人相信命运决定我们的人生道路。
words.en_def: The presumed cause, force, principle, or divine will that predetermines events.

sentences.en: Accept your fate.
sentences.zh: 接受你的命运。

sentences.en: The oracle's prediction fated Oedipus to kill his father; not all his striving could change what would occur.
sentences.zh: 神谕的预言注定俄狄浦斯要杀死他的父亲； 他的所有努力都无法改变即将发生的事情。

words.mnemonic_zh: fat加后缀，变胖的
words.example_en: Doctors advise people to avoid fatty foods for good health.
words.example_zh: 医生建议人们为了健康避免吃高脂肪食物。
words.en_def: Containing, composed of, or consisting of fat.

sentences.en: It's hardly surprising, when it has to support that enormous gut! Lose some weight, fatty!
sentences.zh: 当它必须支持巨大的肠道时，这并不奇怪！ 胖子，减肥吧！

words.mnemonic_zh: favour加后缀，可被赞同的，有利的
words.example_zh: The company received favourable reviews from its customers.
words.example_en: 该公司得到了客户的好评。
words.en_def: Pleasing, encouraging or approving.

sentences.en: The candidate wearing the business suite made a favourable impression.
sentences.zh: 穿着商务套装的候选人给人留下了良好的印象。

sentences.en: We made quick progress, due to favourable winds.
sentences.zh: 由于顺风，我们进展很快。

sentences.en: The rain stopped at a favourable time for our tennis match.
sentences.zh: 雨停的时间对我们的网球比赛来说是有利的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“费事啵”，做起来不费事就是可行的
words.example_en: The engineer found a feasible solution to the problem.
words.example_zh: 工程师找到了一个可行的解决问题的办法。
words.en_def: Able to be done in practice.

sentences.en: His plan to rid Trafalgar Square of pigeons by bringing in peregrine falcons to eat them was dismissed as not feasible.
sentences.zh: 他计划通过引入游隼来吃掉特拉法加广场上的鸽子，但由于不可行而被驳回。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“肥死特”，盛宴吃到肥死
words.example_en: They held a grand feast to celebrate their victory.
words.example_zh: 他们举行了盛大的宴会来庆祝胜利。
words.en_def: A very large meal, often of a ceremonial nature.

sentences.en: We had a feast to celebrate the harvest.
sentences.zh: 我们举办了一场盛宴来庆祝丰收。

sentences.en: It was a feast for the eyes.
sentences.zh: 这真是一场视觉盛宴。

sentences.en: I feasted on turkey and dumplings.
sentences.zh: 我吃了火鸡和饺子。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“废特”，特别费劲完成的功绩
words.example_en: Climbing the mountain alone is a remarkable feat.
words.example_zh: 独自攀登这座山是一项了不起的壮举。
words.en_def: A relatively rare or difficult accomplishment.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“肥的”，喂养能变肥的
words.example_en: Farmers feed cows with fresh grass every day.
words.example_zh: 农民们每天用新鲜的草喂奶牛。
words.en_def: Food given to (especially herbivorous) animals.

sentences.en: They sell feed, riding helmets, and everything else for horses.
sentences.zh: 他们出售饲料、骑马头盔和其他马匹用品。

sentences.en: a satellite feed
sentences.zh: 卫星馈送

sentences.en: the paper feed of a printer
sentences.zh: 打印机的进纸

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 形式上的，就是正式的
words.example_en: They held a formal dinner to celebrate the occasion.
words.example_zh: 他们举办了一场正式晚宴来庆祝这个场合。
words.en_def: Formalin.

sentences.en: Jenny took Sam to her Year 12 formal.
sentences.zh: 珍妮带山姆参加她的 12 年级正式舞会。

sentences.en: She spoke formal English, without any dialect.
sentences.zh: 她说的是正式英语，没有任何方言。

sentences.en: I'd like to make a formal complaint.
sentences.zh: 我想提出正式投诉。

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词后缀 al 加 ly 构成
words.mnemonic_zh: 正式的加上副词后缀，表正式地
words.example_en: He formally announced his resignation at the meeting.
words.example_zh: 他在会议上正式宣布了辞职。
words.en_def: In a formal manner.

sentences.en: He was dressed too formally for the occasion.
sentences.zh: 他在这个场合穿得太正式了。

sentences.en: He formally filed a complaint, which involved much paperwork.
sentences.zh: 他正式提出投诉，其中涉及大量文书工作。

sentences.en: He proved it formally but gave his students no intuitive feel for the matter.
sentences.zh: 他正式证明了这一点，但没有给他的学生直观的感觉。

words.cn_def: n. 格式；版式；v. 使格式化
words.mnemonic_zh: 使有形式，即格式化
words.example_en: You need to format the document in the correct style.
words.example_zh: 你需要将文档按正确的格式排版。
words.en_def: The layout of a publication or document.

sentences.en: The radio station changed the format of its evening program.
sentences.zh: 广播电台改变了晚间节目的格式。

sentences.en: I lost weeks of work when I inadvertently formatted my hard drive.
sentences.zh: 由于无意中格式化了硬盘，我损失了数周的工作。

words.mnemonic_zh: 固定形式的，就是公式
words.example_en: The scientist discovered a new formula for this problem.
words.example_zh: 这位科学家为这个问题发现了一个新公式。
words.en_def: Any mathematical rule expressed symbolically.

sentences.en: H2O is the formula for water.
sentences.zh: H2O是水的分子式。

sentences.en: The company's winning formula includes excellent service and quality products.
sentences.zh: 该公司的制胜秘诀包括卓越的服务和优质的产品。

sentences.en: The formula of the rocket fuel has not been revealed.
sentences.zh: 火箭燃料的配方尚未透露。

words.suffix_cn: 动词后缀，表示使…化、做…事
words.mnemonic_zh: 使形成，即制定、规划
words.example_en: They managed to formulate a new strategy for the project.
words.example_zh: 他们成功为这个项目制定了一个新策略。
words.en_def: To reduce to, or express in, a formula; to put in a clear and definite form of statement or expression.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“佛思”，佛祖思索后向前走
words.example_en: He stepped forth to greet the guests.
words.example_zh: 他走上前去迎接客人。
words.en_def: Forward in time, place or degree.

sentences.en: The plants in spring put forth leaves.
sentences.zh: 春天的植物长出了叶子。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表主动、正在进行等
words.cn_def: 即将到来的；乐意提供信息的
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前来的，就是即将到来的
words.example_en: We are looking forward to the forthcoming concert.
words.example_zh: 我们期待着即将到来的音乐会。
words.en_def: An act of coming forth.

sentences.en: I shall vote in the forthcoming election.
sentences.zh: 我将在即将到来的选举中投票。

sentences.en: The money was not forthcoming.
sentences.zh: 钱没有到。

sentences.en: Once I explained why I needed to know, she was really forthcoming.
sentences.zh: 当我解释了为什么我需要知道后，她真的很热情。

words.cn_def: adv. 向前；adj. 向前的；v. 转发
words.mnemonic_zh: 朝着前方的方向
words.example_en: Please forward this email to your colleagues.
words.example_zh: 请将这封邮件转发给你的同事。
words.en_def: One of the eight players (comprising two props, one hooker, two locks, two flankers and one number eight, collectively known as the pack) whose primary task is to gain and maintain possession of the ball (compare back).

sentences.en: I'll be glad to forward your mail to you while you're gone.
sentences.zh: 当您离开时，我很乐意将您的邮件转发给您。

sentences.en: The fire was confined to the forward portion of the store.
sentences.zh: 火势仅限于商店的前部。

sentences.en: The stock price is currently 12 times forward earnings.
sentences.zh: 目前股价是预期市盈率的12倍。

words.cn_def: v. 培养；促进；adj. 收养的
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“佛斯特”，佛祖施恩，培养万物
words.example_en: Parents should foster their children's interests.
words.example_zh: 父母应该培养孩子的兴趣。
words.en_def: A foster parent.

sentences.en: Some fosters end up adopting.
sentences.zh: 一些寄养者最终被收养。

sentences.en: Our company fosters an appreciation for the arts.
sentences.zh: 我们公司培养对艺术的鉴赏力。

sentences.en: foster parents
sentences.zh: 养父母

words.cn_def: adj. 难闻的；犯规的；n. 犯规；v. 犯规
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“否哦”，让人否定的，就是难闻的、不好的
words.example_zh: The player committed a foul during the game.
words.example_en: 这名球员在比赛中犯规了。
words.en_def: Covered with, or containing unclean matter; dirty.

sentences.en: A ship's bottom is foul when overgrown with barnacles
sentences.zh: 当船底长满藤壶时，船底就变得肮脏

sentences.en: His foul language causes many people to believe he is uneducated.
sentences.zh: 他的脏话让很多人认为他没有受过教育。

sentences.en: He has a foul set of friends.
sentences.zh: 他有一群肮脏的朋友。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: found（建立）+ ation，建立的成果就是基础、基金会
words.example_en: The foundation supports many scientific research projects.
words.example_zh: 该基金会支持许多科研项目。
words.en_def: The act of founding, fixing, establishing, or beginning to erect.

sentences.en: The foundation of his institute has been wrought with difficulty.
sentences.zh: 他的研究所的建立是艰难的。

sentences.en: The foundations of this construction have been laid out.
sentences.zh: 这一建设的基础已经奠定。

sentences.en: The Wikimedia Foundation, Inc. is the parent organization of the Wiktionary collaborative project.
sentences.zh: 维基媒体基金会是维基词典协作项目的母组织。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: frag（易破碎）+ ile，容易被打破，即易碎、脆弱
words.example_en: Handle these fragile items with great care.
words.example_zh: 小心处理这些易碎物品。
words.en_def: Easily broken or destroyed, and thus often of subtle or intricate structure.

sentences.en: He is a very fragile person and gets easily depressed.
sentences.zh: 他是一个非常脆弱的人，很容易感到沮丧。

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想“fran”音似“贩”，经营特许商品的权利
words.example_en: He bought a franchise to open a fast - food restaurant.
words.example_zh: 他购买了一家快餐店的加盟权。
words.morph_note: 该词不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: The right to vote at a public election or referendum; see: suffrage, suffragette.

sentences.en: McDonalds has exported its franchise.
sentences.zh: 麦当劳已出口其特许经营权。

sentences.en: The Whalers' home city of Hartford was one of many for the franchise.
sentences.zh: 捕鲸者队的主场哈特福德是该球队的众多主场城市之一。

sentences.en: the Star Wars franchise
sentences.zh: 星球大战系列

words.mnemonic_zh: frank（坦率）+ ly，以坦率的方式，即坦率地
words.example_en: Frankly, I don't think this plan will work.
words.example_zh: 坦率地说，我认为这个计划行不通。
words.en_def: (manner) In a frank, open or (too) honest manner.

sentences.en: He spoke frankly about the economy.
sentences.zh: 他坦率地谈到了经济。

words.mnemonic_zh: 谐音“拂拭”，拂去灰尘得新鲜
words.example_en: They always eat fresh fruits and vegetables.
words.example_zh: 他们总是吃新鲜的水果和蔬菜。
words.en_def: A rush of water, along a river or onto the land; a flood.

sentences.en: He followed the fresh hoofprints to find the deer.
sentences.zh: 他顺着新鲜的蹄印找到了鹿。

sentences.en: After taking a beating in the boxing ring, the left side of his face looked like fresh meat.
sentences.zh: 在拳击场上挨了一拳之后，他的左脸看起来就像是新鲜的肉。

sentences.en: What a nice fresh breeze.
sentences.zh: 多么清新的微风啊。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: fric（摩擦）+ tion，摩擦的行为或状态
words.example_en: There is some friction between the two departments.
words.example_zh: 两个部门之间存在一些冲突。
words.en_def: The rubbing of one object or surface against another.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“弗莱吓他”，被吓到就是惊吓、恐怖
words.example_en: The sudden noise gave her a great fright.
words.example_zh: 突然的噪音把她吓了一跳。
words.en_def: A state of terror excited by the sudden appearance of danger; sudden and violent fear, usually of short duration; a sudden alarm.

words.cn_def: 富有成效的；硕果累累的
words.mnemonic_zh: fruit（果实）+ ful，充满果实，即硕果累累、有成效
words.example_en: The meeting was a fruitful one, producing many good ideas.
words.example_zh: 会议富有成效，产生了许多好主意。
words.en_def: Favourable to the growth of fruit or useful vegetation; not barren.

sentences.en: The extra work in the office turned out to be fruitful after all—I got promoted
sentences.zh: 办公室里的加班终究还是有收获的——我升职了

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，用于修饰人，表感受
words.mnemonic_zh: frustrate（挫败）+ ed，人被挫败后会沮丧
words.example_zh: 他因多次失败而感到非常沮丧。
words.example_en: He felt very frustrated after repeated failures.
words.en_def: To disappoint or defeat; to vex by depriving of something expected or desired.

sentences.en: It frustrates me to do all this work and then lose it all.
sentences.zh: 完成所有这些工作然后又失去一切，这让我很沮丧。

sentences.en: My clumsy fingers frustrate my typing efforts.
sentences.zh: 我笨拙的手指阻碍了我的打字努力。

sentences.en: This test frustrates me because if I fail, it'll destroy my grade.
sentences.zh: 这次考试让我很沮丧，因为如果我失败了，我的成绩就会下降。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，用于修饰物，表性质
words.cn_def: 令人沮丧的；令人懊恼的
words.mnemonic_zh: frustrate（挫败）+ ing，事情让人挫败，即令人沮丧
words.example_en: It's a frustrating experience to deal with such difficult problems.
words.example_zh: 处理如此难题是一次令人沮丧的经历。
words.en_def: To disappoint or defeat; to vex by depriving of something expected or desired.

sentences.en: It frustrates me to do all this work and then lose it all.
sentences.zh: 完成所有这些工作然后又失去一切，这让我很沮丧。

sentences.en: My clumsy fingers frustrate my typing efforts.
sentences.zh: 我笨拙的手指阻碍了我的打字努力。

sentences.en: This test frustrates me because if I fail, it'll destroy my grade.
sentences.zh: 这次考试让我很沮丧，因为如果我失败了，我的成绩就会下降。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: frustr（挫败）+ ation，挫败的状态即挫折
words.example_en: He showed his frustration by kicking the wall.
words.example_zh: 他踢墙来发泄自己的挫败感。
words.en_def: The feeling of annoyance when one's actions are criticized or hindered

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“负姆斯”，背着刺鼻气味的人
words.example_en: The fumes from the chemicals made her feel sick.
words.example_zh: 化学药品的刺鼻气味让她感到恶心。
words.en_def: A gas or vapour/vapor that is strong-smelling or dangerous to inhale.

sentences.en: Don't stand around in there breathing the fumes while the adhesive cures.
sentences.zh: 当粘合剂固化时，不要站在那儿呼吸烟雾。

sentences.en: Lead fume is a greyish powder, mainly comprising lead sulfate.
sentences.zh: 铅烟是一种浅灰色粉末，主要成分是硫酸铅。

sentences.en: the fumes of passion
sentences.zh: 激情的烟雾

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: funct（执行）+ ion，执行的事即功能
words.example_en: The main function of the heart is to pump blood.
words.example_zh: 心脏的主要功能是泵血。
words.en_def: What something does or is used for.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: funct（功能）+ ional，具有功能的
words.example_en: This furniture is both beautiful and functional.
words.example_zh: 这件家具既美观又实用。
words.en_def: A function that takes a function as its argument; More precisely: A function y=f(x) whose argument x varies in a space of (real valued, complex valued) functions and whose value belongs to a monodimensional space. An example: the definite integration of integrable real functions in a real interval.

sentences.en: That sculpture is not merely artistic, but also functional: it can be used as a hatrack.
sentences.zh: 该雕塑不仅具有艺术性，而且具有实用性：它可以用作帽子跑道。

sentences.en: A functional construction element generally must meet higher technical but lower aesthetical requirements
sentences.zh: 功能性建筑元素通常必须满足较高的技术要求但较低的美观要求

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“放的”，放着的钱即资金
words.example_en: They set up a fund to help the poor.
words.example_zh: 他们设立了一项基金来帮助穷人。
words.en_def: A sum or source of money.

sentences.en: a fund for the maintenance of underprivileged students
sentences.zh: 资助贫困学生的基金

sentences.en: Several major funds were declared insolvent recently.
sentences.zh: 几家主要基金最近被宣布破产。

sentences.en: He drew on his immense fund of knowledge.
sentences.zh: 他利用了自己丰富的知识。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或过程
words.mnemonic_zh: fund（资金）+ ing，资金的提供即资助
words.example_en: The project needs more funding to be completed.
words.example_zh: 这个项目需要更多资金才能完成。
words.en_def: To pay for.

sentences.en: He used his inheritance to fund his gambling addiction.
sentences.zh: 他用自己的遗产来资助他的赌博瘾。

sentences.en: The council is providing funding to the church to repair the roof.
sentences.zh: 该委员会正在向教堂提供资金来修复屋顶。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或过程
words.mnemonic_zh: fund（资金）+ raise（筹集）+ ing，筹集资金的行为
words.example_en: The school organized a fundraising event last week.
words.example_zh: 学校上周组织了一场筹款活动。
words.en_def: The process of collecting money by requesting donations from individuals and businesses.

words.mnemonic_zh: fund（资金）加 s 表复数
words.example_en: The company's funds are running low.
words.example_zh: 公司的资金正在减少。
words.en_def: A sum or source of money.

sentences.en: a fund for the maintenance of underprivileged students
sentences.zh: 资助贫困学生的基金

sentences.en: Several major funds were declared insolvent recently.
sentences.zh: 几家主要基金最近被宣布破产。

sentences.en: He drew on his immense fund of knowledge.
sentences.zh: 他利用了自己丰富的知识。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“翻了儿”，人没了要办葬礼
words.example_en: Many people attended his funeral.
words.example_zh: 许多人参加了他的葬礼。
words.en_def: A ceremony to honour and remember a deceased person. Often distinguished from a memorial service by the presence of the body of the deceased.

sentences.en: Many mourners turned up at the local artist's funeral to pay homage.
sentences.zh: 许多哀悼者出现在当地艺术家的葬礼上表达敬意。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示已完成的状态
words.mnemonic_zh: furnish（配备）+ ed，已配备家具的
words.example_en: The furnished apartment is very popular among students.
words.example_zh: 这套配备家具的公寓在学生中很受欢迎。
words.en_def: To provide a place with furniture, or other equipment.

words.mnemonic_zh: fuss音似“烦死”，大惊小怪让人烦
words.example_en: There's no need to make a fuss about such a small problem.
words.example_zh: 没必要为这么小的问题大惊小怪。
words.en_def: Excessive activity, worry, bother, or talk about something.

sentences.en: They made a big fuss about the wedding plans.
sentences.zh: 他们对婚礼计划大惊小怪。

sentences.en: If you make enough of a fuss about the problem, maybe they'll fix it for you.
sentences.zh: 如果你对这个问题大惊小怪，也许他们会帮你解决。

sentences.en: They made a great fuss over the new baby.
sentences.zh: 他们为这个新生婴儿大惊小怪。

words.mnemonic_zh: gadget音似“盖的”，小工具常能盖东西
words.example_en: This new gadget can simplify many daily tasks.
words.example_zh: 这个新的小工具能简化很多日常任务。
words.en_def: A thing whose name cannot be remembered; thingamajig, doohickey.

sentences.en: He bought a neat new gadget for shredding potatoes.
sentences.zh: 他买了一个漂亮的新玩意儿，用来切土豆丝。

words.mnemonic_zh: gain音似“耕耘”，耕耘能获得收获
words.example_en: He managed to gain a lot of experience from the project.
words.example_zh: 他设法从这个项目中获得了很多经验。
words.en_def: The act of gaining; acquisition.

sentences.en: Looks like you've gained a new friend.
sentences.zh: 看起来你又多了一位新朋友。

sentences.en: The sick man gains daily.
sentences.zh: 病人每天都有收获。

sentences.en: to gain a battle; to gain a case at law
sentences.zh: 赢得一场战斗； 赢得法律诉讼

words.mnemonic_zh: gallon音似“加仑”，直接音译
words.example_en: This car consumes about 20 gallons of fuel per month.
words.example_zh: 这辆车每月大约消耗20加仑的燃料。
words.en_def: A unit of volume, equivalent to eight pints

sentences.en: The pipe burst and gallons of water flooded into the kitchen.
sentences.zh: 水管爆裂，数加仑的水涌进厨房。

words.suffix_cn: 动词的现在分词形式，也可作名词后缀表示行为
words.mnemonic_zh: gamble（赌博）加ing成赌博行为
words.example_en: Gambling can lead to serious financial problems.
words.example_zh: 赌博可能会导致严重的经济问题。
words.en_def: To take a risk, with the potential of a positive outcome.

sentences.en: He gambled his reputation on the outcome.
sentences.zh: 他把自己的名誉赌在了结果上。

words.mnemonic_zh: garden加s变多个花园
words.example_en: The gardens in this park are very beautiful.
words.example_zh: 这个公园里的花园非常漂亮。
words.en_def: An outdoor area containing one or more types of plants, usually plants grown for food or ornamental purposes.

sentences.en: a vegetable garden  a flower garden
sentences.zh: 菜园  花园

sentences.en: This house has a swimming pool, a tent, a swing set and a fountain in the garden.  We were drinking lemonade and playing croquet in the garden.  Our garden is overgrown with weeds.
sentences.zh: 这所房子的花园里设有游泳池、帐篷、秋千和喷泉。 我们一边喝柠檬水，一边在花园里玩槌球。 我们的花园杂草丛生。

sentences.en: N.B. From a commentary on Song of Solomon 4:16, which was written in Hebrew c. 950 BC; book footnotes are shown here within brackets. Many scholars disagree with this Biblical interpretation, which is included as evidence of the word's usage in 1995 rather than its intended meaning in 950 BC.
sentences.zh: 注意： 摘自对雅歌 4:16 的注释，该书是用希伯来语写的。 公元前 950 年； 本书的脚注显示在此处的括号内。 许多学者不同意这种圣经解释，该解释被纳入作为该词在 1995 年使用的证据，而不是其在公元前 950 年的本意。

words.mnemonic_zh: garment音似“嘎门特”，想象衣服款式奇特把门卡住
words.example_en: This garment is made of high - quality fabric.
words.example_zh: 这件衣服是由高品质的面料制成的。
words.en_def: A single item of clothing.

words.mnemonic_zh: gather音似“盖着”，大家聚集在一起像被盖住
words.example_en: People often gather in the square on weekends.
words.example_zh: 人们经常在周末聚集在广场上。
words.en_def: A plait or fold in cloth, made by drawing a thread through it; a pucker.

sentences.en: I've been gathering ideas from the people I work with.
sentences.zh: 我一直在从同事那里收集想法。

sentences.en: She gathered the shawl about her as she stepped into the cold.
sentences.zh: 当她走进寒冷的地方时，她裹紧了围巾。

sentences.en: From his silence, I gathered that things had not gone well.
sentences.zh: 从他的沉默中，我推断事情进展不顺利。

words.suffix_cn: 动词的现在分词形式，也可作名词后缀表示行为或活动
words.mnemonic_zh: gather加ing成聚集的活动即聚会
words.example_en: There was a large gathering at the community center last night.
words.example_zh: 昨晚社区中心有一场大型聚会。
words.en_def: A meeting or get-together; a party or social function.

sentences.en: I met her at a gathering of engineers and scientists.
sentences.zh: 我是在一次工程师和科学家的聚会上认识她的。

sentences.en: A gathering of fruit.
sentences.zh: 水果的聚集。

sentences.en: This gathering machine forms the backbone of a bookbinding operation.
sentences.zh: 该收集机构成了装订操作的支柱。

words.mnemonic_zh: gaze音似“盖茨”，想象盯着盖茨看
words.example_en: She stood there and gazed at the beautiful sunset.
words.example_zh: 她站在那里凝视着美丽的日落。
words.en_def: A fixed look; a look of eagerness, wonder, or admiration; a continued look of attention.

sentences.en: In fact, for Antonioni this gazing is probably the most fundamental of all cognitive activities ... (from Thinking in the Absence of Image)
sentences.zh: 事实上，对于安东尼奥尼来说，这种凝视可能是所有认知活动中最基本的……（来自《没有图像的思考》）

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、性质
words.mnemonic_zh: hard（艰难）加上 ship（状态），就是艰难的状态
words.example_en: Many people faced great hardship during the economic crisis.
words.example_zh: 在经济危机期间，许多人面临着巨大的困苦。
words.en_def: Difficulty or trouble; hard times.

sentences.en: He has survived periods of financial hardship before.
sentences.zh: 他以前曾经历过经济困难时期。

words.mnemonic_zh: hard（硬的）和 ware（物品）组合，就是硬的物品
words.example_en: The computer's hardware needs to be upgraded regularly.
words.example_zh: 计算机的硬件需要定期升级。
words.en_def: Fixtures, equipment, tools and devices used for general-purpose construction and repair of a structure or object. Also such equipment as sold as stock by a store of the same name, e.g. hardware store.

sentences.en: military hardware
sentences.zh: 军事硬件

words.mnemonic_zh: harmon 发音像“和睦”，加上 y 表示名词，就是和谐
words.example_en: We should strive for harmony in our daily life.
words.example_zh: 我们应该在日常生活中努力追求和谐。
words.en_def: Agreement or accord.

sentences.en: a harmony of the Gospels
sentences.zh: 福音书的和谐

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“呵斥”，给人严厉的感觉
words.example_en: The teacher gave the students a harsh criticism.
words.example_zh: 老师严厉地批评了学生们。
words.en_def: To negatively criticize.

sentences.en: Quit harshing me already, I said that I was sorry!
sentences.zh: 别再骂我了，我已经说了对不起了！

sentences.en: Dude, you're harshing my buzz.
sentences.zh: 伙计，你打扰了我的嗡嗡声。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“哈，我收”，代表收获
words.example_en: This year's harvest is much better than last year's.
words.example_zh: 今年的收成比去年好得多。
words.en_def: The third season of the year; autumn; fall.

sentences.en: Harvest is usually very damp and rainy.
sentences.zh: 收获时通常非常潮湿多雨。

sentences.en: This year's cotton harvest was great but the corn harvest was disastrous.
sentences.zh: 今年棉花丰收，但玉米歉收。

sentences.en: Harvesting is a stressing, thirsty occupation
sentences.zh: 收割是一项压力大、口渴的职业

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“嘿，特”，特别讨厌
words.example_en: She hates to be interrupted when she is working.
words.example_zh: 她讨厌工作时被打断。
words.en_def: An object of hatred.

sentences.en: One of my pet hates is traffic wardens.
sentences.zh: 我最讨厌的人之一就是交通协管员。

sentences.en: He gave me a look filled with pure hate.
sentences.zh: 他用充满仇恨的眼神看着我。

sentences.en: Do not fear; he who fears hates; he who hates kills. — attributed to Gandhi
sentences.zh: 不要害怕； 恐惧的人会憎恨； 憎恨者杀人。 ——归功于甘地

words.mnemonic_zh: hate（恨）加上 red（联想到红脸，愤怒），就是仇恨
words.example_en: Their hatred for each other has lasted for years.
words.example_zh: 他们彼此之间的仇恨已经持续多年了。
words.en_def: Strong aversion; intense dislike

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“嚎特”，幽灵嚎叫着常出没
words.example_en: The memory of that accident still haunts him.
words.example_zh: 那次事故的记忆仍然萦绕在他心头。
words.en_def: A place at which one is regularly found; a habitation or hangout.

sentences.en: I went back the town I used to live and visited all my old haunts.
sentences.zh: 我回到了我曾经住过的小镇，参观了所有我常去的地方。

sentences.en: A couple of ghosts haunt the old, burnt-down house.
sentences.zh: 几个鬼魂在这座被烧毁的老房子里出没。

sentences.en: The memory of his past failures haunted him.
sentences.zh: 过去失败的记忆一直困扰着他。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“害着的”，意味着有危害
words.example_en: Smoking is a serious hazard to your health.
words.example_zh: 吸烟对你的健康有严重危害。
words.en_def: The chance of suffering harm; danger, peril, risk of loss.

sentences.en: He encountered the enemy at the hazard of his reputation and life.
sentences.zh: 他冒着名誉和生命危险遭遇敌人。

sentences.en: The video game involves guiding a character on a skateboard past all kinds of hazards.
sentences.zh: 该视频游戏涉及引导角色在滑板上越过各种危险。

sentences.en: I'll hazard a guess.
sentences.zh: 我大胆猜测一下。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“害的”，头部容易受伤
words.example_en: He hurt his head when he fell down.
words.example_zh: 他摔倒时伤到了头部。
words.en_def: The part of the body of an animal or human which contains the brain, mouth and main sense organs.

sentences.en: Be careful when you pet that dog on the head; it may bite.
sentences.zh: 当你抚摸那只狗的头时要小心； 它可能会咬人。

sentences.en: What does it say at the head of the page?
sentences.zh: 页面顶部写了什么？

sentences.en: We are having a difficult time making head against this wind.
sentences.zh: 我们正面临着逆风而行的困难。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，常表示动作或行为的结果
words.mnemonic_zh: head（头）加 ing 表与头相关的事物，如标题
words.example_en: The report's main heading clearly indicates its topic.
words.example_zh: 报告的主标题清晰地表明了其主题。
words.en_def: To be in command of. (See also head up.)

sentences.en: Who heads the board of trustees?
sentences.zh: 谁领导董事会？

sentences.en: A group of clowns headed the procession.
sentences.zh: 一群小丑在游行队伍中走在最前面。

sentences.en: How does the ship head?
sentences.zh: 船的航向如何？

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，有 …… 性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: heaven（天堂）加 ly 变成像天堂一样的
words.example_en: The couple enjoyed a heavenly evening under the stars.
words.example_zh: 这对情侣在星空下享受了一个美妙的夜晚。
words.en_def: Relating to the sky or outer space, regarded as the realm of the sun, moon, planets, and stars.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“咳踢客”，忙得又咳又踢客人
words.example_en: She had a hectic day at the office dealing with multiple projects.
words.example_zh: 她在办公室忙碌了一天，处理多个项目。
words.en_def: A hectic fever.

sentences.en: hectic fever
sentences.zh: 潮热

sentences.en: The city center is so hectic at 8 in the morning that I go to work an hour beforehand to avoid the crowds
sentences.zh: 市中心早上八点就很热闹，我提前一小时去上班，以避免人群拥挤

words.mnemonic_zh: height（高度）加 en 表示使高度增加
words.example_en: The music can heighten the atmosphere of the party.
words.example_zh: 音乐可以增强派对的氛围。
words.en_def: To make high; to raise higher; to elevate.

sentences.en: to heighten a flavor or a tint
sentences.zh: 增强味道或色调

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表否定，无 …… 的
words.mnemonic_zh: help（帮助）加 less 表示没有帮助的
words.example_en: The lost child looked helpless in the crowd.
words.example_zh: 迷路的孩子在人群中显得很无助。
words.en_def: Unable to defend oneself.

sentences.en: a helpless urge
sentences.zh: 无奈的冲动

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“很思”，很思考后得出因此
words.example_zh: 他错过了末班车，因此不得不步行回家。
words.example_en: He missed the last bus and hence had to walk home.
words.en_def: From here, from this place, away

sentences.en: Get thee hence, Satan!
sentences.zh: 撒旦，快走吧！

sentences.en: After a long battle, my poor daughter was taken hence.
sentences.zh: 经过长时间的战斗，我可怜的女儿被带走了。

sentences.en: A year hence it will be forgotten.
sentences.zh: 一年后，它就会被遗忘。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态、结果等
words.mnemonic_zh: herit（继承）加 age 表示继承的东西即遗产
words.example_en: We should protect our cultural heritage from damage.
words.example_zh: 我们应该保护我们的文化遗产不受破坏。
words.en_def: An inheritance; property that may be inherited.

sentences.en: The university requires heritage Spanish students to enroll in a specially designed Spanish program not available to non-heritage students.
sentences.zh: 该大学要求西班牙裔学生参加专门设计的西班牙语课程，该课程不适用于非西班牙裔学生。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，有 …… 性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: hero（英雄）加 ic 表示具有英雄特质的
words.example_en: The firefighters' heroic actions saved many lives.
words.example_zh: 消防员的英勇行为拯救了许多生命。
words.en_def: A heroic verse.

sentences.en: heroic deeds
sentences.zh: 英雄事迹

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态等
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“嗨啊瑞可”，嗨的等级排序即等级制度
words.example_en: The company has a strict hierarchy in management.
words.example_zh: 公司在管理上有严格的等级制度。
words.en_def: A body of authoritative officials organized in nested ranks.

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想为高大的物体形象
words.example_en: The high building stands out in the city skyline.
words.example_zh: 那座高楼在城市天际线中很显眼。
words.en_def: A high point or position, literally or figuratively; an elevated place; a superior region; a height; the sky; heaven.

sentences.en: It was one of the highs of his career.
sentences.zh: 这是他职业生涯的巅峰之一。

sentences.en: That pill gave me a high for a few hours, before I had a comedown.
sentences.zh: 那药让我兴奋了几个小时，然后我就情绪低落了。

sentences.en: A large high is centred on the Azores.
sentences.zh: 一个大高地以亚速尔群岛为中心。

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，表方式或程度
words.mnemonic_zh: high（高）加上 ly 成副词，表程度高
words.example_en: The new policy is highly beneficial to small businesses.
words.example_zh: 新政策对小企业非常有益。
words.en_def: In a high or esteemed manner.

sentences.en: He spoke highly of you.
sentences.zh: 他对你评价很高。

sentences.en: He is in a highly visible job.
sentences.zh: 他从事着一份引人注目的工作。

words.cn_def: 极其滑稽的；十分可笑的
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“黑了肉丝”，想象黑了的肉丝很滑稽
words.example_en: The comedian's performance was so hilarious that the audience couldn't stop laughing.
words.example_zh: 这位喜剧演员的表演极其滑稽，观众们笑得停不下来。
words.en_def: Very funny; causing great merriment and laughter.

sentences.en: a hilarious joke
sentences.zh: 一个搞笑的笑话

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“恨他”，恨他不给提示
words.example_en: She gave him a subtle hint about the surprise party.
words.example_zh: 她给了他一个关于惊喜派对的微妙暗示。
words.en_def: A clue.

sentences.en: I needed a hint to complete the crossword.
sentences.zh: 我需要提示才能完成填字游戏。

sentences.en: He gave me a hint that my breath smelt.
sentences.zh: 他给了我一个暗示：我的呼吸有味道。

sentences.en: I could taste a hint of lemon in the wine.
sentences.zh: 我能尝到酒里淡淡的柠檬味。

words.mnemonic_zh: history（历史）加 ian 成研究历史的人
words.example_en: The historian spent years researching ancient civilizations.
words.example_zh: 这位历史学家花了数年时间研究古代文明。
words.en_def: A writer of history; a chronicler; an annalist.

words.cn_def: 在历史上；从历史角度看
words.mnemonic_zh: history（历史）加 ally 成从历史角度
words.example_en: Historically, this region has been an important trade route.
words.example_zh: 从历史角度看，这个地区一直是重要的贸易路线。
words.en_def: In a historic manner; with reference to history or the historical record.

sentences.en: Historically speaking, this company has always collected payment before starting work.
sentences.zh: 从历史上看，这家公司一直都是先收款后开工。

sentences.en: Historically, this company collected payment before starting work.
sentences.zh: 从历史上看，该公司在开始工作之前收取付款。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“嘿特”，嘿！特别用力击打
words.example_en: The ball hit the window and broke the glass.
words.example_zh: 球撞到窗户，打碎了玻璃。
words.en_def: A blow; a punch; a striking against; the collision of one body against another; the stroke that touches anything.

sentences.en: The hit was very slight.
sentences.zh: 受到的打击非常轻微。

sentences.en: The catcher got a hit to lead off the fifth.
sentences.zh: 捕手击中一垒安打，领先第五局。

sentences.en: Where am I going to get my next hit?
sentences.zh: 我将在哪里获得下一次打击？

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“厚的”，拿着厚的东西
words.example_en: He can hold the heavy box easily with his strong arms.
words.example_zh: 他凭借强壮的手臂能轻松地拿着那个重箱子。
words.en_def: A grasp or grip.

sentences.en: Keep a firm hold on the handlebars.
sentences.zh: 牢牢握住车把。

sentences.en: Can I have a hold of the baby?
sentences.zh: 我可以抱一下宝宝吗？

sentences.en: Senator X placed a hold on the bill, then went to the library and placed a hold on a book.
sentences.zh: X 参议员暂缓了账单，然后去图书馆暂缓了一本书。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“厚礼”，神圣之地要送厚礼
words.example_en: This is a holy place that many pilgrims visit.
words.example_zh: 这是一个许多朝圣者前来参观的神圣地方。
words.en_def: A thing that is extremely holy; used almost exclusively in Holy of Holies.

sentences.en: I'm planning to visit the holy city of Jerusalem this Christmas.
sentences.zh: 我计划今年圣诞节参观圣城耶路撒冷。

sentences.en: My grandmother is a very holy woman.
sentences.zh: 我的祖母是一个非常圣洁的女人。

sentences.en: Holy cow, I can’t believe he actually lost the race!
sentences.zh: 天哪，我不敢相信他真的输了比赛！

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“后母”，后母的地方也是家
words.example_en: After a long - day work, he always looks forward to going home.
words.example_zh: 经过漫长的一天工作后，他总是盼望着回家。
words.en_def: A dwelling.

sentences.en: the home of the pine
sentences.zh: 松树的家

sentences.en: The dog homed.
sentences.zh: 狗回家了。

sentences.en: The missile was able to home in on the target.
sentences.zh: 导弹能够跟踪目标。

words.mnemonic_zh: home（家）和 land（土地）结合，有家的土地即故乡
words.example_en: Many overseas Chinese dream of returning to their homeland one day.
words.example_zh: 许多海外华人梦想有一天回到他们的祖国。
words.en_def: The country that one regards as home.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 有幽默（humor）特质的（ous）就是幽默的
words.example_en: The humorous story made everyone in the room burst into laughter.
words.example_zh: 这个幽默的故事让房间里的每个人都大笑起来。
words.en_def: Full of humor or arousing laughter; funny.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“很饿”，容易联想饥饿
words.example_en: The long - distance runner felt a great hunger after the race.
words.example_zh: 长跑运动员在比赛后感到极度饥饿。
words.en_def: A need or compelling desire for food.

sentences.en: I have a hunger to win.
sentences.zh: 我渴望胜利。

sentences.en: I hungered for your love.
sentences.zh: 我渴望你的爱。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“夯它”，打猎时要追捕它
words.example_en: They often hunt for wild rabbits in the forest on weekends.
words.example_zh: 他们经常在周末去森林里猎野兔。
words.en_def: The act of hunting.

sentences.en: Her uncle will go out and hunt for deer, now that it is open season.
sentences.zh: 现在是开放季节，她叔叔会出去打鹿。

sentences.en: The little girl was hunting for shells on the beach.
sentences.zh: 小女孩正在海滩上寻找贝壳。

sentences.en: He was hunted from the parish.
sentences.zh: 他在教区被追捕。

words.mnemonic_zh: 氢（hydrogen）是能生成水（hydro）的物质
words.example_en: Hydrogen is a crucial element in many chemical reactions.
words.example_zh: 氢在许多化学反应中是一种关键元素。
words.en_def: The lightest chemical element (symbol H), with an atomic number of 1 and atomic weight of 1.00794.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“嗨洁净”，卫生就是要保持洁净
words.example_en: Good hygiene habits can prevent many diseases.
words.example_zh: 良好的卫生习惯可以预防许多疾病。
words.en_def: The science of health, its promotion and preservation.

sentences.en: Hygiene is an important consideration in places where food is prepared.
sentences.zh: 在准备食物的地方，卫生是一个重要的考虑因素。

sentences.en: They have poor personal hygiene.
sentences.zh: 他们的个人卫生很差。

words.cn_def: 歇斯底里的；异常激动的
words.mnemonic_zh: 有癔病（hyster）特征的（ical）就是歇斯底里的
words.example_en: The fans became hysterical when their idol appeared on the stage.
words.example_zh: 当偶像出现在舞台上时，粉丝们变得歇斯底里。
words.en_def: Of, or arising from hysteria.

words.mnemonic_zh: 由冰（ice）形成的山（berg）就是冰山
words.example_en: The Titanic hit an iceberg and sank in the end.
words.example_zh: 泰坦尼克号撞上了一座冰山，最终沉没了。
words.en_def: A huge mass of ocean-floating ice which has broken off a glacier or ice shelf

sentences.en: The Titanic hit an iceberg and sank.
sentences.zh: 泰坦尼克号撞上冰山并沉没。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“一点”，一点灵感就是想法
words.example_en: His new idea about the project impressed the whole team.
words.example_zh: 他关于这个项目的新想法给整个团队留下了深刻印象。
words.en_def: An abstract archetype of a given thing, compared to which real-life examples are seen as imperfect approximations; pure essence, as opposed to actual examples.

sentences.en: The mere idea of you is enough to excite me.
sentences.zh: 仅仅想到你就足以让我兴奋。

sentences.en: I have an idea of how we might escape.
sentences.zh: 我知道我们该如何逃脱。

sentences.en: Yeah, that's the idea.
sentences.zh: 是的，就是这个想法。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示…主义的、…风格的
words.mnemonic_zh: 有理想（ideal）特质的（istic）就是理想主义的
words.example_en: The young politician is very idealistic about social reform.
words.example_zh: 这位年轻的政治家对社会改革抱有非常理想主义的态度。
words.en_def: Of or pertaining to an idealist or to idealism.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 识别（identify）这个动作的结果（ation）就是识别、鉴定
words.example_en: The police asked for his identification before entering the building.
words.example_zh: 警察在他进入大楼前要求查看他的身份证明。
