words.example_en: We need to adjust the parameters to optimize the result.
words.example_zh: 我们需要调整参数以优化结果。
words.en_def: A value kept constant during an experiment, equation, calculation or similar, but varied over other versions of the experiment, equation, calculation, etc.

sentences.en: Roughly, a tuple of arguments could be thought of as a vector, whereas a tuple of parameters could be thought of as a covector (i.e., linear functional). When a function is called, a parameter tuple becomes "bound" to an argument tuple, allowing the function instance itself to be computed to yield a return value. This would be roughly analogous to applying a covector to a vector (by taking their dot product (or, rather, matrix-product of row vector and column vector)) to obtain a scalar.
sentences.zh: 粗略地说，参数元组可以被视为向量，而参数元组可以被视为协向量（即线性函数）。 当调用函数时，参数元组“绑定”到参数元组，从而允许计算函数实例本身以产生返回值。 这大致类似于将协向量应用于向量（通过取它们的点积（或者更确切地说，行向量和列向量的矩阵积））来获得标量。

sentences.en: The parameter of the principal axis of a conic section is called the latus rectum.
sentences.zh: 圆锥曲线的主轴参数称为直肠纬度。

words.mnemonic_zh: parent（父母）+ al，和父母有关的
words.example_en: Parental support is very important for a child's growth.
words.example_zh: 父母的支持对孩子的成长非常重要。
words.en_def: A person fulfilling a parental role.

sentences.en: Nowadays there are all kinds of potential parentals besides parents, grandparents, aunts and uncles, step-parents, in-laws, older siblings and cousins, and those in civil unions.
sentences.zh: 如今，除了父母、祖父母、阿姨叔叔、继父母、姻亲、年长的兄弟姐妹和表兄弟姐妹以及民事结合者之外，还有各种各样的潜在父母。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“怕瑞许”，怕在教区受约束
words.example_en: The priest is responsible for the affairs of the parish.
words.example_zh: 牧师负责教区的事务。
words.en_def: In the Anglican, Eastern Orthodox, Lutheran and Roman Catholic Church, an administrative part of a diocese that has its own church.

sentences.en: 1991, Melissa Bradley Kirkpatrick, Re-parishing the Countryside: Progressivism and Religious Interests in Rural Life Reform, 1908-1934
sentences.zh: 1991 年，梅丽莎·布拉德利·柯克帕特里克 (Melissa Bradley Kirkpatrick)，《重新教区乡村：农村生活改革中的进步主义和宗教利益，1908-1934 年》

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关
words.mnemonic_zh: parliament是议会，加上ary表示与议会有关
words.example_en: The parliamentary session will discuss the new policy next week.
words.example_zh: 议会会议下周将讨论这项新政策。
words.en_def: A parliamentary train.

sentences.en: Parliamentary procedures are sometimes slow.
sentences.zh: 议会程序有时很慢。

sentences.en: Britain is a parliamentary democracy.
sentences.zh: 英国是议会民主制国家。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……性质
words.mnemonic_zh: part是部分，ial让它变成部分的
words.example_en: The project has achieved partial success so far.
words.example_zh: 到目前为止，该项目取得了部分成功。
words.en_def: A partial derivative: a derivative with respect to one independent variable of a function in multiple variables while holding the other variables constant.

sentences.en: So far, I have only pieced together a partial account of the incident.
sentences.zh: 到目前为止，我只拼凑出该事件的部分内容。

sentences.en: It's easy to prove partial correctness, but it's not obvious that it is also totally correct.
sentences.zh: 证明部分正确很容易，但完全正确并不明显。

sentences.en: The referee is blatantly partial!
sentences.zh: 裁判明显偏袒！

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，修饰动词、形容词等
words.mnemonic_zh: partial加ly，把部分的变成副词
words.example_en: The problem was partially solved by the new method.
words.example_zh: 这个问题被新方法部分解决了。
words.en_def: To a partial degree or extent, incompletely.

words.mnemonic_zh: participate表示参与，ant表示参与的人
words.example_en: The participants in the seminar shared their experiences.
words.example_zh: 研讨会上的参与者分享了他们的经验。
words.en_def: One who participates.

sentences.en: All participants must adhere to the rules of the competition.
sentences.zh: 所有参赛者必须遵守比赛规则。

words.mnemonic_zh: part部分，icular强调部分的特殊性
words.example_en: We need to pay attention to this particular detail.
words.example_zh: 我们需要注意这个特定的细节。
words.en_def: A small individual part of something larger; a detail, a point.

sentences.en: I couldn't find the particular model you asked for, but I hope this one will do.
sentences.zh: 我找不到您要求的特定型号，但我希望这个能找到。

sentences.en: I don't appreciate your particular brand of cynicism.
sentences.zh: 我不欣赏你那种愤世嫉俗的态度。

sentences.en: He brought no particular news.
sentences.zh: 他没有带来任何具体消息。

words.suffix_cn: 动名词或现在分词后缀
words.mnemonic_zh: pass经过，ing表示动作的进行或状态
words.example_en: The passing of time makes people cherish the present more.
words.example_zh: 时间的流逝让人们更加珍惜当下。
words.en_def: To change place.

sentences.en: passing cars
sentences.zh: 过往车辆

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……性质
words.mnemonic_zh: pass承受，ive表示被动承受的状态
words.example_en: He always takes a passive attitude towards challenges.
words.example_zh: 他对挑战总是持消极态度。
words.en_def: (grammar) The passive voice of verbs.

sentences.en: He remained passive during the protest.
sentences.zh: 他在抗议期间保持被动。

sentences.en: a passive balloon; a passive aeroplane; passive flight, such as gliding and soaring
sentences.zh: 被动气球； 被动式飞机； 被动飞行，例如滑翔和翱翔

words.mnemonic_zh: past牧养，or指牧养人的牧师
words.example_en: The pastor gave a sermon in the church on Sunday.
words.example_zh: 牧师周日在教堂布道。
words.en_def: A shepherd; someone who tends to a flock of animals.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示相关的事物
words.mnemonic_zh: paste面团，ry表示用面团做的糕点
words.example_zh: She bought some pastries at the bakery this morning.
words.example_en: 她今天早上在面包店买了一些糕点。
words.en_def: A baked food item made from flour and fat pastes such as pie crust; also tarts, bear claws, napoleons, puff pastries, etc.

sentences.en: That pastry shop sells not just pastries, but all kinds of baked goods.
sentences.zh: 那家糕点店不仅卖糕点，还卖各种烘焙食品。

sentences.en: That pastry shop sells not just pastry, but all kinds of baked goods.
sentences.zh: 那家糕点店不仅卖糕点，还卖各种烘焙食品。

sentences.en: He learned pastry from the great Gaston Lenôtre.
sentences.zh: 他向伟大的加斯顿·莱诺特 (Gaston Lenôtre) 学习糕点制作。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“怕吃”，怕吃这块补丁？联想小块补丁
words.example_en: There is a patch on his old jeans.
words.example_zh: 他的旧牛仔裤上有一块补丁。
words.en_def: A piece of cloth, or other suitable material, sewed or otherwise fixed upon a garment to repair or strengthen it, especially upon an old garment to cover a hole.

sentences.en: His sleeves had patches on the elbows where different fabric had been sewn on to replace material that had worn away.
sentences.zh: 他的袖子肘部有补丁，缝上了不同的布料以替换磨损的材料。

sentences.en: I can't afford to replace the roof, which is what it really needs. I'll have the roofer apply a patch.
sentences.zh: 我买不起更换屋顶，但这才是它真正需要的。 我会让屋顶工补上补丁。

sentences.en: "This patch should hold until you reach the city," the mechanic said as he patted the car's hood.
sentences.zh: “这个补丁应该一直持续到你到达城市为止，”机械师一边拍着汽车的引擎盖一边说道。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“怕疼的”，有专利就不怕被侵权疼了
words.example_en: The company holds a patent for this innovative technology.
words.example_zh: 该公司拥有这项创新技术的专利。
words.en_def: A declaration issued by a government agency declaring someone the inventor of a new invention and having the privilege of stopping others from making, using or selling the claimed invention; a letter patent.

sentences.en: That is a patent ductus arteriosus.
sentences.zh: 这就是动脉导管未闭。

sentences.en: Those claims are patent nonsense.
sentences.zh: 这些说法显然是无稽之谈。

sentences.en: letters patent
sentences.zh: 字母专利

words.mnemonic_zh: path（路）+ way（路），两条路就是通道
words.example_en: A narrow pathway leads to the beautiful garden.
words.example_zh: 一条狭窄的小路通向那座美丽的花园。
words.en_def: A footpath or other path or track.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“派戳”，派人去戳查就是巡逻
words.example_en: The security guards patrol the building every night.
words.example_zh: 保安每晚都在大楼里巡逻。
words.en_def: A going of the rounds along the chain of sentinels and between the posts, by a guard, usually consisting of three or four men, to insure greater security from attacks on the outposts.

sentences.en: a customs patrol
sentences.zh: 海关巡逻队

sentences.en: to patrol a beat
sentences.zh: 巡逻一拍

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“派戳人”，派人来资助的人
words.example_en: The museum relies on patrons to support its exhibitions.
words.example_zh: 博物馆依靠赞助人来支持其展览。
words.en_def: One who protects or supports; a defender or advocate.

sentences.en: This car park is for patrons only.
sentences.zh: 该停车场仅供顾客使用。

words.mnemonic_zh: pay（支付）+ able（可…的），可支付的
words.example_en: The bill is payable within 30 days.
words.example_zh: 账单应在 30 天内支付。
words.en_def: (in the plural) Debts owed by a business; liabilities.

sentences.en: Is value-added tax payable on planning application fees?
sentences.zh: 规划申请费需要缴纳增值税吗？

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“匹克”，像匹克球一样尖尖的山峰
words.example_en: The climbers reached the peak of the mountain at dawn.
words.example_zh: 登山者在黎明时分到达了山顶。
words.en_def: A point; the sharp end or top of anything that terminates in a point; as, the peak, or front, of a cap.

sentences.en: The stock market reached a peak in September 1929.
sentences.zh: 1929 年 9 月，股市达到顶峰。

sentences.en: They reached the peak after 8 hours of climbing.
sentences.zh: 经过8个小时的攀登，他们到达了山顶。

sentences.en: peak-brails
sentences.zh: 峰值盲文

words.mnemonic_zh: peas（耕种）+ ant（人），耕种的人是农民
words.example_en: Peasants work hard in the fields all year round.
words.example_zh: 农民们全年都在田里辛勤劳作。
words.en_def: A member of the lowly social class that toils on the land, constituted by small farmers and tenants, sharecroppers, farmhands and other laborers on the land where they form the main labor force in agriculture and horticulture.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“皮裤哩”，穿皮裤很独特奇怪
words.example_en: He has a peculiar way of speaking.
words.example_zh: 他说话的方式很奇怪。
words.en_def: That which is peculiar; a sole or exclusive property; a prerogative; a characteristic.

sentences.en: It would be rather peculiar to see a kangaroo hopping down a city street.
sentences.zh: 看到一只袋鼠在城市街道上跳跃是相当奇怪的。

sentences.en: Kangaroos are peculiar to Australia.
sentences.zh: 袋鼠是澳大利亚特有的动物。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“皮儿”，同一批生产的“皮儿”，是同龄人
words.example_en: Children often compare themselves with their peers.
words.example_zh: 孩子们经常和同龄人作比较。
words.en_def: A look; a glance.

sentences.en: a peer of the realm
sentences.zh: 领域的同侪

words.mnemonic_zh: pension（养老金）+ er（人），领养老金的人
words.example_en: Many pensioners enjoy a quiet life in the countryside.
words.example_zh: 许多退休人员喜欢在乡村过宁静的生活。
words.en_def: Someone who lives on a pension, especially the retirement or old age pension.

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“不勒死”，想象到一个宽松的地方
words.example_en: This place is famous for its beautiful scenery.
words.example_zh: 这个地方以其美丽的风景而闻名。
words.en_def: (physical) An area; somewhere within an area.

sentences.en: I'm in a strange place at the moment.
sentences.zh: 我现在正处于一个奇怪的地方。

sentences.en: three decimal places;  the hundreds place
sentences.zh: 小数点后三位； 数百个地方

sentences.en: That's what I said in the first place!
sentences.zh: 我一开始就是这么说的！

words.suffix_cn: 动词的现在分词形式，也可作名词后缀
words.mnemonic_zh: plan（计划）加上 ing 表示正在做计划
words.example_en: Urban planning is crucial for a city's development.
words.example_zh: 城市规划对城市的发展至关重要。
words.en_def: To design (a building, machine, etc.).

sentences.en: The architect planned the building for the client.
sentences.zh: 建筑师为客户规划了这座建筑。

sentences.en: They jointly planned the project in phases, with good detail for the first month.
sentences.zh: 他们共同分阶段规划了该项目，第一个月就制定了详细的计划。

sentences.en: He planned to go, but work intervened.
sentences.zh: 他本来打算去，但工作中断了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“扑哩啊”，像在急切地恳求
words.example_en: His plea for help was ignored by others.
words.example_zh: 他的求助请求被其他人忽视了。
words.en_def: An appeal, petition, urgent prayer or entreaty.

sentences.en: a plea for mercy
sentences.zh: 求饶

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“扑哩得”，好像努力恳求得到某物
words.example_en: He pleaded with the judge for mercy.
words.example_zh: 他恳求法官宽大处理。
words.en_def: To present (an argument or a plea), especially in a legal case.

sentences.en: The defendant has decided to plead not guilty.
sentences.zh: 被告决定不认罪。

sentences.en: He pleaded with me not to leave the house.
sentences.zh: 他恳求我不要离开家。

sentences.en: Not wishing to attend the banquet, I pleaded illness.
sentences.zh: 我不愿参加宴会，便以生病为借口。

words.mnemonic_zh: pleas（使愉悦）加上 urable 表示可带来愉悦的
words.example_en: They had a pleasurable time at the party last night.
words.example_zh: 他们昨晚在聚会上度过了一段愉快的时光。
words.en_def: That gives pleasure

sentences.en: The massage was a pleasurable experience.
sentences.zh: 按摩是一次愉快的经历。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“铺来这”，把承诺铺到这里
words.example_en: He made a pledge to protect the environment.
words.example_zh: 他承诺保护环境。
words.en_def: A solemn promise to do something.

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“扑拉个”，想象扑拉个插头
words.example_en: Don't forget to pull out the plug when not using it.
words.example_zh: 不用的时候别忘了拔掉插头。
words.en_def: A pronged connecting device which fits into a mating socket, especially an electrical one.

sentences.en: I pushed the plug back into the electrical socket and the lamp began to glow again.
sentences.zh: 我将插头重新插入电源插座，灯又开始发光。

sentences.en: Pull the plug out of the tub so it can drain.
sentences.zh: 将塞子从浴缸中拔出，以便排水。

sentences.en: He preferred a plug of tobacco to loose chaw.
sentences.zh: 他更喜欢一根烟草而不是松散的嚼烟。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“扑浪急”，像扑进海浪很急切
words.example_en: He plunged into the river to save the child.
words.example_zh: 他跳进河里去救那个孩子。
words.en_def: The act of plunging or submerging

sentences.en: A plunge into the sea
sentences.zh: 一头扎进海里

sentences.en: to plunge the body into water
sentences.zh: 将身体浸入水中

sentences.en: to plunge a dagger into the breast;   to plunge a nation into war
sentences.zh: 将匕首插入胸部； 使一个国家陷入战争

words.mnemonic_zh: point（要点）加 less 表示没有要点，即无意义
words.example_en: Arguing with him is a pointless waste of time.
words.example_zh: 和他争论是毫无意义的浪费时间。
words.en_def: Having no point or sharp tip; terminating squarely or in a rounded end.

sentences.en: a pointless knife
sentences.zh: 毫无意义的刀

sentences.en: a pointless remark
sentences.zh: 无意义的话

sentences.en: Since the decision has already been made, further discussion seems pointless.
sentences.zh: 既然决定已经做出，再讨论似乎也没什么意义了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“剖”，想象把杆剖成两半
words.example_en: The flag fluttered on top of the pole.
words.example_zh: 旗帜在杆顶飘扬。
words.en_def: Originally, a stick; now specifically, a long and slender piece of metal or (especially) wood, used for various construction or support purposes.

sentences.en: Huck Finn poled that raft southward down the Mississippi because going northward against the current was too much work.
sentences.zh: 哈克·芬恩（Huck Finn）撑着木筏沿密西西比河向南航行，因为逆流向北航行的工作量太大。

sentences.en: He poled off the serial of the Gulfstream to confirm its identity.
sentences.zh: 他打开湾流号的序列号来确认其身份。

sentences.en: to pole beans or hops
sentences.zh: 到极豆或啤酒花

words.mnemonic_zh: 政策是为大众利益制定，联想‘保利（谐音）大家利益’
words.example_en: The government has adopted a new economic policy to boost growth.
words.example_zh: 政府已采取一项新的经济政策以促进增长。
words.en_def: A principle of behaviour, conduct etc. thought to be desirable or necessary, especially as formally expressed by a government or other authoritative body.

sentences.en: The Communist Party has a policy of returning power to the workers.
sentences.zh: 共产党有一项将权力还给工人的政策。

words.mnemonic_zh: ‘poll’发音像‘抛’，抛问题做民意调查
words.example_en: A recent poll shows that most people support the new law.
words.example_zh: 最近的一项民意调查显示，大多数人支持这项新法律。
words.en_def: A survey of people, usually statistically analyzed to gauge wider public opinion.

sentences.en: The student council had a poll to see what people want served in the cafeteria.
sentences.zh: 学生会进行了一项民意调查，了解人们希望食堂提供什么服务。

sentences.en: The polls close at 8 p.m.
sentences.zh: 投票于晚上 8 点结束。

sentences.en: He polled a hundred votes more than his opponent.
sentences.zh: 他比他的对手多了一百票。

words.mnemonic_zh: ‘pond’发音似‘胖的’，胖的水域像池塘
words.example_en: There are many ducks swimming in the pond.
words.example_zh: 有许多鸭子在池塘里游泳。
words.en_def: An inland body of standing water, either natural or man-made, that is smaller than a lake.

sentences.en: I haven't been back home across the pond in twenty years.
sentences.zh: 我已经二十年没有回过池塘对面的家了。

words.mnemonic_zh: ‘pony’发音像‘跑你’，小马爱跑
words.example_zh: The little girl loves to ride her pony in the field.
words.example_en: 小女孩喜欢在田野里骑她的小马。
words.en_def: A small horse; specifically, any of several small breeds of horse under 14.2 hands at the withers.

sentences.en: 1879, “Some Queer Interviews: Interview with a Pony of Beer”, Puck, Vol. 5–6, p. 435
sentences.zh: 1879 年，“一些酷儿访谈：采访一匹啤酒小马”，Puck，卷。 5-6，p。 第435章

words.mnemonic_zh: ‘poor’是差，加‘ly’成副词表差的状态
words.example_en: He performed poorly in the exam because of his illness.
words.example_zh: 他因为生病在考试中表现很差。
words.en_def: In a poor manner or condition; without plenty, or sufficiency, or suitable provision for comfort.

sentences.en: to live poorly
sentences.zh: 过着贫穷的生活

sentences.en: to do poorly in business
sentences.zh: 生意不好

sentences.en: He plays tennis poorly.
sentences.zh: 他网球打得不好。

words.cn_def: 突然出现；发出砰的响声
words.mnemonic_zh: ‘pop’发音像砰的一声
words.example_en: He popped into the room without making a sound.
words.example_zh: 他一声不响地突然进了房间。
words.en_def: A loud, sharp sound as of a cork coming out of a bottle.

sentences.en: Listen to the pop of a champagne cork.
sentences.zh: 聆听香槟软木塞的爆裂声。

sentences.en: Lunch was sandwiches and a bottle of pop.
sentences.zh: 午餐是三明治和一瓶汽水。

sentences.en: Go in the store and buy us three pops.
sentences.zh: 去商店给我们买三瓶汽水。

words.mnemonic_zh: ‘port’能携带，‘able’表可，可携带即便携
words.example_en: This portable charger can charge your phone several times.
words.example_zh: 这个便携式充电器可以给你的手机充几次电。
words.en_def: A portable building used for temporary purposes, particularly:

sentences.en: a portable pension plan
sentences.zh: 便携式养老金计划

words.mnemonic_zh: 能携带纸张册子的包，就是公文包
words.example_en: The investor diversified his portfolio to reduce risk.
words.example_zh: 投资者分散投资组合以降低风险。
words.en_def: A case for carrying papers, drawings, photographs, maps and other flat documents.

sentences.en: I would like to introduce you to our portfolio of services.
sentences.zh: 我想向您介绍我们的服务组合。

sentences.en: product portfolio
sentences.zh: 产品组合

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表动作、状态、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: ‘port’搬运东西会分成份，加‘ion’成名词表一份
words.example_en: She only ate a small portion of the cake.
words.example_zh: 她只吃了一小份蛋糕。
words.en_def: An allocated amount.

words.mnemonic_zh: ‘port’像把特征‘携带’出来，描绘事物
words.example_en: The artist portrayed the beautiful scenery on the canvas.
words.example_zh: 艺术家在画布上描绘了美丽的风景。
words.en_def: To paint or draw the likeness of.

sentences.en: I will portray a king on horseback.
sentences.zh: 我将描绘一位骑在马背上的国王。

sentences.en: For my next movie, I will be portraying Shakespeare.
sentences.zh: 在我的下一部电影中，我将扮演莎士比亚。

words.mnemonic_zh: 把身体摆个姿势放置好
words.example_en: The model posed gracefully for the camera.
words.example_zh: 模特为相机优雅地摆好了姿势。
words.en_def: Common cold, head cold; catarrh.

sentences.en: Please adopt a more graceful pose for my camera.
sentences.zh: 请为我的相机摆出更优雅的姿势。

sentences.en: To pose a model for a picture.
sentences.zh: 给模特摆姿势拍照。

words.mnemonic_zh: 放置自己坐下，稳拥有
words.example_en: He possesses great talent in music.
words.example_zh: 他在音乐方面极具天赋。
words.en_def: To have; to have ownership of.

sentences.en: He does not even possess a working telephone.
sentences.zh: 他甚至没有可用的电话。

sentences.en: They thought he was possessed by evil spirits.
sentences.zh: 他们认为他被邪灵附身了。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关
words.mnemonic_zh: 和邮政有关的
words.example_en: The postal service ensures timely delivery of letters.
words.example_zh: 邮政服务确保信件及时送达。
words.en_def: Relating to the collection, sorting and delivery of mail.

sentences.en: for all your postal needs
sentences.zh: 满足您所有的邮政需求

words.mnemonic_zh: 往后放置时间，即推迟
words.example_en: They decided to postpone the meeting until next week.
words.example_zh: 他们决定将会议推迟到下周。
words.en_def: To delay or put off an event, appointment etc.

words.mnemonic_zh: 身体放置的状态即姿势
words.example_en: Good posture is important for your health.
words.example_zh: 良好的姿势对健康很重要。
words.en_def: The way a person holds and positions their body.

sentences.en: If you're finished posturing in front of the mirror, can I use the bathroom now?
sentences.zh: 如果你在镜子前摆好了姿势，我现在可以去趟浴室吗？

sentences.en: The politicians couldn't really care less about the issue: they're just posturing for the media.
sentences.zh: 政客们根本不在乎这个问题：他们只是在向媒体摆姿态。

sentences.en: to posture oneself; to posture a model
sentences.zh: 摆出自己的姿势； 给模型摆姿势

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“怕我”，有力量才让人怕
words.example_en: The president holds great power in the country.
words.example_zh: 总统在这个国家拥有巨大权力。
words.en_def: Ability to do or undergo something.

sentences.en: the mechanical powers
sentences.zh: 机械功率

sentences.en: This CD player is powered by batteries.
sentences.zh: 此 CD 播放机由电池供电。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关
words.mnemonic_zh: 和实践有关的就是实用的
words.example_en: We need to find a practical solution to this problem.
words.example_zh: 我们需要找到一个实际的解决这个问题的办法。
words.en_def: A part of an exam or series of exams in which the candidate has to demonstrate their practical ability

sentences.en: Jack didn't get an engineering degree, but has practical knowledge of metalworking.
sentences.zh: 杰克没有获得工程学位，但拥有金属加工的实用知识。

sentences.en: Jack's knowledge has the practical benefit of giving us useful prototype parts.
sentences.zh: 杰克的知识具有实际意义，可以为我们提供有用的原型零件。

sentences.en: All in all, Jack's a very practical chap.
sentences.zh: 总而言之，杰克是一个非常务实的人。

words.mnemonic_zh: 从事实践就是练习
words.example_en: She practises the piano every day.
words.example_zh: 她每天都练习钢琴。
words.en_def: To repeat (an activity) as a way of improving one's skill in that activity.

sentences.en: You should practise playing piano every day.
sentences.zh: 你应该每天练习弹钢琴。

sentences.en: If you want to speak French well, you need to practise.
sentences.zh: 如果你想说好法语，你需要练习。

sentences.en: They gather to practise religion every Saturday.
sentences.zh: 他们每周六聚集在一起进行宗教活动。

words.mnemonic_zh: 从事实践的人
words.example_en: A medical practitioner should have high - level skills.
words.example_zh: 医疗从业者应该具备高水平的技能。
words.en_def: A person who practices a profession or art, especially law or medicine.

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“普瑞兹”，普遍让人觉得瑞气，值得称赞
words.example_en: The teacher praised the student for his hard work.
words.example_zh: 老师因学生努力学习而表扬了他。
words.en_def: Commendation; favourable representation in words

sentences.en: Be sure to praise Bobby for his excellent work at school this week.
sentences.zh: 一定要赞扬鲍比本周在学校的出色表现。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“普瑞曲”，想象牧师普及道理的曲子即布道
words.example_en: The priest often preaches about love and forgiveness in the church.
words.example_zh: 牧师经常在教堂里宣讲爱与宽恕。
words.en_def: A religious discourse.

sentences.en: A learned local Muslim used to preach in the small mosque every Friday.
sentences.zh: 当地一位博学的穆斯林每周五都会在小清真寺里传教。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先（pre-）小心（caut），即采取预防措施
words.example_en: Taking precautions can reduce the risk of getting sick.
words.example_zh: 采取预防措施可以降低患病的风险。
words.en_def: Previous caution or care; caution previously employed to prevent misfortune or to secure good

sentences.en: his life was saved by precaution
sentences.zh: 预防措施挽救了他的生命

sentences.en: to take precautions against risks of accident
sentences.zh: 采取预防措施，防范事故风险

words.suffix_cn: 形容词或名词后缀，此处为名词后缀表示事物
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先（pre-）走（ced）在前的事，即先例
words.example_en: This case sets a new precedent for future legal disputes.
words.example_zh: 这个案例为未来的法律纠纷树立了新的先例。
words.en_def: An act in the past which may be used as an example to help decide the outcome of similar instances in the future.

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词后缀 -e 加 -ly 构成，表示方式
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先（pre-）切割（cis）好，即精确地
words.example_en: The experiment was carried out precisely as planned.
words.example_zh: 实验严格按照计划精确地进行。
words.en_def: (manner) In a precise manner; exactly.

sentences.en: I always try to express myself precisely.
sentences.zh: 我总是试图准确地表达自己。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先（pre-）切割（cis）的结果，就是精确
words.example_en: The machine works with high precision to produce quality products.
words.example_zh: 这台机器以高精度运行，生产出优质产品。
words.en_def: The state of being precise or exact; exactness.

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先（pre-）拿取（dat）猎物的动物，即捕食者
words.example_zh: 狮子是草原上凶猛的捕食者。
words.example_en: Lions are fierce predators on the grassland.
words.en_def: Any animal or other organism that hunts and kills other organisms (their prey), primarily for food.

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先（pre-）走（de-）在前面的人，即前辈
words.example_en: The new manager has big shoes to fill after his predecessor.
words.example_zh: 新经理在他的前任之后，要挑起重担。
words.en_def: One who precedes; one who has preceded another in any state, position, office, etc.; one whom another follows or comes after, in any office or position.

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词后缀 -ant 加 -ly 构成，表示程度
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先（pre-）统治（domin），说明主要地
words.example_en: The region is predominantly covered by forests.
words.example_zh: 该地区主要被森林覆盖。
words.en_def: In a predominant manner. Most commonly or frequently by a large margin.

sentences.en: The membership is predominantly elderly, 90% are over age 60.
sentences.zh: 会员以老年人为主，其中90%年龄在60岁以上。

words.mnemonic_zh: 承担（pregn）宝宝的状态，即怀孕
words.example_en: Proper care is essential during pregnancy.
words.example_zh: 怀孕期间适当的护理至关重要。
words.en_def: The condition of being pregnant.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先（pre-）判断（jud），易产生偏见
words.example_en: We should not let prejudice affect our decisions.
words.example_zh: 我们不应让偏见影响我们的决定。
words.en_def: An adverse judgment or opinion formed beforehand or without knowledge of the facts.

sentences.en: I am free of all prejudices. I hate everyone equally.
sentences.zh: 我没有任何偏见。 我同样讨厌每个人。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有某种特征
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先判断，就容易产生偏见
words.example_en: A prejudiced person often makes unfair judgments.
words.example_zh: 一个有偏见的人常常做出不公平的判断。
words.en_def: To have a negative impact on (someone's position, chances etc.).

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先到开端，所以是初步的
words.example_en: They conducted a preliminary investigation into the incident.
words.example_zh: 他们对该事件进行了初步调查。
words.en_def: A preparation for a main matter; an introduction.

sentences.en: These are just the preliminary results.
sentences.zh: 这些只是初步结果。

words.mnemonic_zh: 首要的首领就是首相或总理
words.example_en: The premier addressed the nation on TV last night.
words.example_zh: 昨晚首相在电视上向全国发表讲话。
words.en_def: (Westminster system) The head of government in parliament and leader of the cabinet.

sentences.en: The composer invited all his friends when they premiered the movie he orchestrated, we got to see it before anyone but the crew.
sentences.zh: 作曲家在首映他精心编排的电影时邀请了他所有的朋友，我们在除了工作人员之外的任何人之前看到了它。

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先放置的条件就是前提
words.example_en: The argument is based on a false premise.
words.example_zh: 这个论点建立在一个错误的前提之上。
words.en_def: A proposition antecedently supposed or proved; something previously stated or assumed as the basis of further argument; a condition; a supposition.

sentences.en: trespass on another’s premises
sentences.zh: 侵入他人的场所

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先安置人的地方就是营业场所等
words.example_en: Smoking is forbidden on these premises.
words.example_zh: 这些场所禁止吸烟。
words.en_def: Land, and all the built structures on it, especially when considered as a single place.

sentences.en: trespass on another’s premises
sentences.zh: 侵入他人的场所

words.mnemonic_zh: 优先拿到的就是奖金或要付的额外费用
words.example_en: You need to pay a premium for express delivery.
words.example_zh: 你需要为快递支付额外费用。
words.en_def: A prize or award.

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先写好药方或规则
words.example_en: The doctor prescribed some medicine for my cough.
words.example_zh: 医生为我的咳嗽开了一些药。
words.en_def: To order (a drug or medical device) for use by a particular patient (under licensed authority).

sentences.en: The doctor prescribed aspirin.
sentences.zh: 医生开了阿司匹林。

sentences.en: The property meets the criteria prescribed by the regulations.
sentences.zh: 该房产符合法规规定的标准。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先写好的东西，就是处方
words.example_en: You need a prescription to buy this medicine.
words.example_zh: 你需要处方才能买这种药。
words.en_def: The act of prescribing a rule, law, etc..

sentences.en: "Jurisdiction to prescribe" is a state's authority to make its laws applicable to certain persons or activities. -- Richard G. Alexander, Iran and Libya Sanctions Act of 1996: Congress exceeds its jurisdiction to prescribe law. Washington and Lee Law Review, 1997.
sentences.zh: “规定管辖权”是国家使其法律适用于某些个人或活动的权力。 ——理查德·亚历山大 (Richard G. Alexander)，《1996 年伊朗和利比亚制裁法》：国会超越其制定法律的管辖权。 华盛顿和李法律评论，1997 年。

sentences.en: The surgeon wrote a prescription for a pain killer and physical therapy.
sentences.zh: 外科医生开了止痛药和物理治疗的处方。

sentences.en: The pharmacist gave her a bottle containing her prescription.
sentences.zh: 药剂师给了她一瓶装有她的处方的瓶子。

words.mnemonic_zh: 接近现在的时间，就是目前或不久
words.example_zh: 他目前正在努力完成这个项目。
words.example_en: He is presently working hard to finish the project.
words.en_def: Immediately, at once; quickly.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先做好保存的事，就是保护保存
words.example_en: The preservation of historical buildings is very important.
words.example_zh: 保护历史建筑非常重要。
words.en_def: The act of preserving; care to preserve; act of keeping from destruction, decay or any ill.

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先就坐，主持会议
words.example_en: The dean will preside over the graduation ceremony tomorrow.
words.example_zh: 院长明天将主持毕业典礼。
words.en_def: To act as president or chairperson.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、职位
words.cn_def: 总统（或校长、院长等）的职位（或任期）
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先就坐的职位任期
words.example_en: His presidency was marked by many significant reforms.
words.example_zh: 他的任期以许多重大改革为标志。
words.en_def: The office or role of president.

sentences.en: After many years as a party leader, she finally ascended to the presidency.
sentences.zh: 在担任党魁多年后，她终于登上了总统宝座。

sentences.en: Because of the president's lame duck status, the presidency was often hampered by congressional actions.
sentences.zh: 由于总统的跛脚鸭身份，总统任期经常受到国会行动的阻碍。

sentences.en: Ernest was a historian specializing in the presidency of Herbert Hoover.
sentences.zh: 欧内斯特是一位专门研究赫伯特·胡佛总统任期的历史学家。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关
words.mnemonic_zh: 和预先就坐职位相关的
words.example_en: The presidential candidate gave a powerful speech last night.
words.example_zh: 总统候选人昨晚发表了一篇有力的演讲。
words.en_def: Pertaining to a president or presidency.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 压的行为产生压力
words.example_en: High blood pressure can lead to serious health problems.
words.example_zh: 高血压会导致严重的健康问题。
words.en_def: A pressing; a force applied to a surface.

sentences.en: Apply pressure to the wound to stop the bleeding.
sentences.zh: 对伤口施加压力以止血。

sentences.en: the pressure of poverty; the pressure of taxes; the pressure of motives on the mind; the pressure of civilization.
sentences.zh: 贫困的压力； 税收压力； 动机对心灵的压力； 文明的压力。

sentences.en: She has felt pressure lately because her boss expects her to get the job done by the first.
sentences.zh: 她最近感到压力很大，因为老板希望她第一时间完成工作。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“拍死敌”，有威望才能拍死敌人
words.example_en: The university has high prestige in the academic world.
words.example_zh: 这所大学在学术界有很高的声望。
words.morph_note: 该词历史词源复杂，不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: The quality of how good the reputation of something or someone is, how favourably something or someone is regarded.

sentences.en: Oxford has a university of very high prestige.
sentences.zh: 牛津拥有一所享有很高声誉的大学。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……的
words.mnemonic_zh: 有威望的就是有声望的
words.example_en: He got a job in a prestigious law firm.
words.example_zh: 他在一家有声望的律师事务所找到了一份工作。
words.en_def: Of high prestige.

sentences.en: She has a prestigious job with an international organization.
sentences.zh: 她在一家国际组织中拥有一份享有盛誉的工作。

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词后缀 -able 加 -ly 构成，表示可能地
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先拿定想法，大概如此
words.example_en: Presumably, the train is delayed due to the bad weather.
words.example_zh: 大概是因为恶劣天气，火车晚点了。
words.en_def: Able to be sensibly presumed

sentences.en: Presumably, he will attend the opening.
sentences.zh: 据推测，他将出席开幕式。

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先拿定主意去推测
words.example_en: We can presume that he missed the bus.
words.example_zh: 我们可以推测他没赶上公交车。
words.en_def: With infinitive object: to be so presumptuous as (to do something) without proper authority or permission.

sentences.en: I wouldn't presume to tell him how to do his job.
sentences.zh: 我不会冒昧地告诉他如何做他的工作。

sentences.en: Don't make the decision yourself and presume too much.
sentences.zh: 不要自己做决定并假设太多。

sentences.en: Dr. Livingstone, I presume?
sentences.zh: 我想是利文斯通博士吧？

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先有力量就能战胜
words.example_en: Justice will prevail in the end.
words.example_zh: 正义最终会获胜。
words.en_def: To be superior in strength, dominance, influence or frequency; to have or gain the advantage over others; to have the upper hand; to outnumber others.

sentences.en: Red colour prevails in the Canadian flag.
sentences.zh: 加拿大国旗以红色为主。

sentences.en: In his day and age, such practices prevailed all over Europe.
sentences.zh: 在他那个时代，这种做法在整个欧洲都很盛行。

sentences.en: I prevailed on him to wait.
sentences.zh: 我说服他等待。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、性质
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先有力量的状态就是盛行
words.example_en: The prevalence of this disease is a serious concern.
words.example_zh: 这种疾病的流行是一个严重的问题。
words.en_def: The quality or condition of being prevalent; wide extension or spread.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 预先走来阻止，即预防
words.example_en: Prevention of diseases is better than cure in many cases.
words.example_zh: 在很多情况下，预防疾病比治疗疾病更好。
words.en_def: The act of preventing or hindering; obstruction of action, access, or approach; thwarting.

sentences.en: a fire prevention campaign
sentences.zh: 防火运动

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“扑锐”，像扑向尖锐目标，即猎物
words.example_en: The lion stalked its prey through the long grass.
words.example_zh: 狮子在深草丛中悄悄跟踪它的猎物。
words.en_def: Anything, as goods, etc., taken or got by violence; anything taken by force from an enemy in war

sentences.en: The rabbit was eaten by the coyote, so the rabbit is the coyote's prey.
sentences.zh: 兔子被郊狼吃掉了，所以兔子是郊狼的猎物。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“普莱斯”，普通商品价格
words.example_en: The price of this house is beyond our budget.
words.example_zh: 这所房子的价格超出了我们的预算。
words.en_def: The cost required to gain possession of something.

sentences.en: I paid a high price for my folly.
sentences.zh: 我为我的愚蠢付出了高昂的代价。

sentences.en: to price eggs
sentences.zh: 给鸡蛋定价

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示无、没有
words.mnemonic_zh: 没有价格的，就是无价的
words.example_en: Her smile is a priceless treasure for him.
words.example_zh: 她的微笑对他来说是无价之宝。
words.en_def: So precious as not to be sold at any price; invaluable.

words.mnemonic_zh: 最初状态的，就是原始的
words.example_en: Primitive people used simple tools to hunt.
words.example_zh: 原始人用简单的工具打猎。
words.en_def: An original or primary word; a word not derived from another, as opposed to derivative.

sentences.en: primitive innocence;   the primitive church
sentences.zh: 原始的纯真； 原始教堂

sentences.en: a primitive style of dress
sentences.zh: 原始风格的服饰

sentences.en: primitive ideas
sentences.zh: 原始观念

words.mnemonic_zh: 首要的状态，即主要的
words.example_en: The principal reason for his failure is lack of effort.
words.example_zh: 他失败的主要原因是缺乏努力。
words.en_def: The money originally invested or loaned, on which basis interest and returns are calculated.

sentences.en: A portion of your mortgage payment goes to reduce the principal, and the rest covers interest.
sentences.zh: 您的抵押贷款付款的一部分用于减少本金，其余部分用于支付利息。

sentences.en: My principal sells metal shims.
sentences.zh: 我的校长销售金属垫片。

sentences.en: Smith is the principal architect of this design.
sentences.zh: 史密斯是该设计的主要建筑师。

words.mnemonic_zh: 首要的准则，即原则
words.example_en: He always adheres to his principles in life.
words.example_zh: 他在生活中总是坚持自己的原则。
words.en_def: A fundamental assumption or guiding belief.

sentences.en: We need some sort of principles to reason from.
sentences.zh: 我们需要某种原则来推理。

sentences.en: The principle of least privilege holds that a process should only receive the permissions it needs.
sentences.zh: 最小权限原则认为进程应该只接收它需要的权限。

sentences.en: I don't doubt your principles.
sentences.zh: 我不怀疑你的原则。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“扑rint”，像扑到纸上印，即打印
words.example_en: Please print this document for me.
words.example_zh: 请帮我打印这份文件。
words.en_def: Books and other material created by printing presses, considered collectively or as a medium.

sentences.en: TV and the internet haven't killed print.
sentences.zh: 电视和互联网并没有消灭印刷品。

sentences.en: Write in print using block letters.
sentences.zh: 使用印刷体书写。

sentences.en: The print is too small for me to read.
sentences.zh: 印刷品太小，我无法阅读。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“颇锐”，有抢先的感觉，即优先的
words.example_en: He has a prior engagement this evening.
words.example_zh: 他今晚已有约在先。
words.en_def: A high-ranking member of a monastery, usually lower in rank than an abbot.

sentences.en: I had no prior knowledge you were coming.
sentences.zh: 我事先并不知道你会来。

sentences.en: His prior residence was smaller than his current one.
sentences.zh: 他以前的住处比现在的住处小。

sentences.en: The doctor had known three months prior.
sentences.zh: 医生三个月前就知道了。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 使变成私有的过程，即私有化
words.example_en: The privatization of the company led to many changes.
words.example_zh: 公司的私有化带来了许多变化。
words.en_def: The transfer of a company or organization from government to private ownership and control.

words.mnemonic_zh: 把东西变成私人的也就是使私有化
words.example_en: The government decided to privatize some state - owned enterprises.
words.example_zh: 政府决定将一些国有企业私有化。
words.en_def: To release government control of (a business or industry) to private industry.

words.mnemonic_zh: 私人拥有的特殊权益就是特权
words.example_en: Only a few people have the privilege to attend the event.
words.example_zh: 只有少数人有特权参加这个活动。
words.en_def: (ecclesiastical law) An exemption from certain laws granted by the Pope.

sentences.en: All first-year professors here must teach four courses a term, yet you're only teaching one! What entitled you to such a privilege?
sentences.zh: 这里所有的一年级教授每学期必须教授四门课程，而你只教授一门！ 是什么让您享有这样的特权？

sentences.en: Your honor, my client is not required to answer that; her response is protected by attorney-client privilege.
sentences.zh: 法官大人，我的委托人不需要回答这个问题； 她的回答受到律师-委托人特权的保护。

sentences.en: to privilege representatives from arrest
sentences.zh: 使代表免受逮捕

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……的
words.mnemonic_zh: 拥有特权的就是有特权的
words.example_en: The privileged group enjoys many special benefits.
words.example_zh: 有特权的群体享有许多特殊福利。
words.en_def: To grant some particular right or exemption to; to invest with a peculiar right or immunity; to authorize

sentences.en: to privilege representatives from arrest
sentences.zh: 使代表免受逮捕

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 证明事情发生的状态就是可能性
words.example_en: The probability of winning the lottery is extremely low.
words.example_zh: 中彩票的概率极低。
words.en_def: The state of being probable; likelihood.

sentences.en: The probability of an event A occurring is denoted P(A).
sentences.zh: 事件 A 发生的概率表示为 P(A)。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“破不”，要打破谜团就得探究
words.example_en: The police decided to probe deeper into the case.
words.example_zh: 警方决定对这个案件进行更深入的调查。
words.en_def: Any of various medical instruments used to explore wounds, organs, etc.

sentences.en: They launched a probe into the cause of the accident.
sentences.zh: 他们对事故原因展开调查。

sentences.en: Insert the probe into the soil and read the temperature.
sentences.zh: 将探头插入土壤并读取温度。

sentences.en: If you probe further, you may discover different reasons.
sentences.zh: 如果你进一步探究，你可能会发现不同的原因。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关的，具有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 和问题有关的就是成问题的
words.example_en: The new policy seems to have some problematic aspects.
words.example_zh: 新政策似乎有一些成问题的方面。
words.en_def: (chiefly in the plural) A problem or difficulty in a particular field of study.

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前走就是继续进行
words.example_en: After a short break, they will proceed with the meeting.
words.example_zh: 短暂休息后，他们将继续开会。
words.en_def: To move, pass, or go forward or onward; to advance; to carry on

sentences.en: To proceed on a journey.
sentences.zh: 继续旅行。

sentences.en: To proceed with a story or argument.
sentences.zh: 继续讲故事或争论。

sentences.en: Light proceeds from the sun.
sentences.zh: 光来自太阳。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前走的过程就是进程
words.example_en: The proceeding of the conference was well - documented.
words.example_zh: 会议的进程被详细记录下来。
words.en_def: To move, pass, or go forward or onward; to advance; to carry on

sentences.en: To proceed on a journey.
sentences.zh: 继续旅行。

sentences.en: To proceed with a story or argument.
sentences.zh: 继续讲故事或争论。

sentences.en: Light proceeds from the sun.
sentences.zh: 光来自太阳。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前走获得的成果可理解为收益
words.example_en: The proceeds from the concert will go to charity.
words.example_zh: 音乐会的收益将捐给慈善机构。
words.en_def: To move, pass, or go forward or onward; to advance; to carry on

sentences.en: To proceed on a journey.
sentences.zh: 继续旅行。

sentences.en: To proceed with a story or argument.
sentences.zh: 继续讲故事或争论。

sentences.en: Light proceeds from the sun.
sentences.zh: 光来自太阳。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程
words.mnemonic_zh: process 的行为过程就是处理
words.example_en: The data processing takes a lot of time and effort.
words.example_zh: 数据处理需要大量的时间和精力。
words.en_def: To perform a particular process on a thing.

sentences.en: We have processed the data using our proven techniques, and have come to the following conclusions.
sentences.zh: 我们使用经过验证的技术处理数据，并得出以下结论。

sentences.en: I didn't know she had a criminal record. That will take me a while to process.
sentences.zh: 我不知道她有犯罪记录。 这需要我一段时间来处理。

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先写程序的人就是程序员
words.example_en: The programmer fixed the software bug efficiently.
words.example_zh: 程序员高效地修复了软件漏洞。
words.en_def: One who writes computer programs; a software developer.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前走就是进展
words.example_en: The progression of the project was slower than expected.
words.example_zh: 项目的进展比预期要慢。
words.en_def: The act of moving from one thing to another.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有...性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前走的就是进步的
words.example_en: The company has a progressive management style.
words.example_zh: 这家公司有先进的管理风格。
words.en_def: A person who actively favors or strives for progress towards improved conditions, as in society or government.

sentences.en: a progressive politician
sentences.zh: 进步的政治家

sentences.en: a progressive school
sentences.zh: 进步的学校

sentences.en: progressive paralysis
sentences.zh: 进行性瘫痪

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前投掷形成投影
words.example_en: The projection on the screen was very clear.
words.example_zh: 屏幕上的投影非常清晰。
words.en_def: Something which projects, protrudes, juts out, sticks out, or stands out.

sentences.en: The face of the cliff had many projections that were big enough for birds to nest on.
sentences.zh: 悬崖表面有许多突起物，大得足以让鸟儿在上面筑巢。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前变长就是延长
words.example_en: They decided to prolong the meeting for another hour.
words.example_zh: 他们决定把会议再延长一个小时。
words.en_def: To extend in space or length.

sentences.en: The government shouldn't prolong deciding on this issue any further.
sentences.zh: 政府不应再拖延对此问题的决定。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示已完成的状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前变长了就是延长的
words.example_en: The prolonged drought affected the local agriculture.
words.example_zh: 持续的干旱影响了当地的农业。
words.en_def: To extend in space or length.

sentences.en: The government shouldn't prolong deciding on this issue any further.
sentences.zh: 政府不应再拖延对此问题的决定。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有...性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前突出的就是显著的
words.example_en: He is a prominent figure in the academic field.
words.example_zh: 他是学术领域的杰出人物。
words.en_def: Standing out, or projecting; jutting; protuberant

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有...特征的
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前派送希望，有前途
words.example_en: The young athlete shows a promising future.
words.example_zh: 这位年轻运动员展现出光明的未来。
words.en_def: To commit to (some action or outcome), or to assure (a person) of such commitment; to make an oath or vow.

sentences.en: He promised to never return to this town again.
sentences.zh: 他发誓再也不会回到这个小镇。

sentences.en: The clouds promise rain.
sentences.zh: 云预示着会下雨。

sentences.en: a promising young apprentice
sentences.zh: 一个有前途的年轻学徒

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前推动就是促进、提升
words.example_en: The new policy aims to promote economic growth.
words.example_zh: 新政策旨在促进经济增长。
words.en_def: To raise (someone) to a more important, responsible, or remunerative job or rank.

sentences.en: He promoted his clerk to office manager.
sentences.zh: 他把他的职员提升为办公室经理。

sentences.en: They promoted the abolition of daylight saving time.
sentences.zh: 他们推动废除夏令时。

sentences.en: At the end of the season, three teams are promoted to the Premier League.
sentences.zh: 赛季结束后，三支球队升入英超。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前推动的结果是促进、晋升
words.example_en: His hard work led to a quick promotion.
words.example_zh: 他的努力工作使他很快得到晋升。
words.en_def: An advancement in rank or position.

sentences.en: I'll have to give myself a promotion!
sentences.zh: 我得给自己升职了！

sentences.en: the promotion of the idea of global warming in schools
sentences.zh: 在学校宣传全球变暖的观念

sentences.en: The price cut is serving as a promotion of the manufacturer's new beverage varieties.
sentences.zh: 此次降价是为了促销制造商的新饮料品种。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表被动或完成
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前宣布的，自然显著
words.example_en: There is a pronounced difference in their shopping habits.
words.example_zh: 他们的购物习惯有明显的差异。
words.en_def: To declare formally, officially or ceremoniously.

sentences.en: I hereby pronounce you man and wife.
sentences.zh: 我在此宣布你们结为夫妻。

sentences.en: The doctor pronounced them legally dead.
sentences.zh: 医生宣布他们合法死亡。

sentences.en: The judge had pronounced often before, but never in front of such a crowd.
sentences.zh: 法官以前曾多次宣判，但从未在如此众多的人群面前宣判过。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前传播的内容，就是宣传
words.example_en: The government spread propaganda to promote the new policy.
words.example_zh: 政府传播宣传内容以推广新政策。
words.en_def: A concerted set of messages aimed at influencing the opinions or behavior of large numbers of people.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 按部分分配，得出比例
words.example_en: A large proportion of students prefer online courses.
words.example_zh: 很大一部分学生更喜欢在线课程。
words.en_def: A quantity of something that is part of the whole amount or number.

sentences.en: the proportion of the parts of a building, or of the body
sentences.zh: 建筑物或身体各部分的比例

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前放置的想法，就是提议
words.example_en: His proposition about the project was well - received.
words.example_zh: 他关于这个项目的提议很受欢迎。
words.en_def: The act of offering (an idea) for consideration.

sentences.en: “'Wiktionary is a good dictionary' is a proposition” is a proposition.
sentences.zh: “‘维基词典是一本好词典’是一个命题”是一个命题。

sentences.en: the propositions of Wyclif and Huss
sentences.zh: 威克利夫和胡斯的主张

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前跟随追究，就是起诉
words.example_en: The police decided to prosecute the suspect.
words.example_zh: 警方决定起诉嫌疑人。
words.en_def: To start criminal proceedings against.

sentences.en: to prosecute a man for trespass, or for a riot
sentences.zh: 起诉某人非法侵入或骚乱

sentences.en: to prosecute a right or a claim in a court of law
sentences.zh: 在法庭上起诉一项权利或索赔

sentences.en: to prosecute a scheme, hope, or claim
sentences.zh: 执行一项计划、希望或主张

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 起诉这个行为
words.example_en: The prosecution presented strong evidence in court.
words.example_zh: 检方在法庭上出示了有力的证据。
words.en_def: The act of prosecuting a scheme or endeavor.

sentences.en: The prosecution of the war fell to Winston Churchill.
sentences.zh: 战争的起诉权落到了温斯顿·丘吉尔的肩上。

words.mnemonic_zh: 负责起诉的人
words.example_en: The prosecutor cross - examined the witness.
words.example_zh: 检察官对证人进行了交叉询问。
words.en_def: A prosecuting attorney.

sentences.en: Annie Jay was the Wisconsin government prosecutor in the trial of a man for forging his client's signature.
sentences.zh: 安妮·杰伊是威斯康星州政府检察官，正在审理一名伪造委托人签名的男子。

sentences.en: The prosecutor got the witness to admit he was lying.
sentences.zh: 检察官让证人承认他在撒谎。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前看的，就是未来预期的
words.example_en: The company is looking for prospective employees.
words.example_zh: 公司正在寻找有潜力的未来员工。
words.en_def: The scene before or around, in time or in space; view; prospect.

sentences.en: I'm meeting the prospectives at 3.
sentences.zh: 我将于 3 点与潜在客户会面。

sentences.en: Prospective students are those who have already applied to the university, but have yet to be admitted.
sentences.zh: 未来的学生是指已经申请大学但尚未被录取的学生。

sentences.en: What some other languages convey with prospective aspect, English conveys with expressions like going to drive the car home.
sentences.zh: 其他一些语言用前瞻性的方式表达，而英语则用诸如“going the car home”之类的表达方式来表达。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 朝着希望发展，走向繁荣
words.example_en: The country achieved great prosperity after the reform.
words.example_zh: 改革后这个国家实现了巨大的繁荣。
words.en_def: The condition of being prosperous, of having good fortune

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…的
words.mnemonic_zh: 具有繁荣特质的
words.example_en: The prosperous city attracts many tourists.
words.example_zh: 这座繁荣的城市吸引了很多游客。
words.en_def: Characterized by success

sentences.en: Trading Babe Ruth was far more prosperous for the Yankees than for the Red Sox.
sentences.zh: 交易贝比·鲁斯对洋基队来说比对红袜队来说要繁荣得多。

sentences.en: He was raised in a very prosperous household.
sentences.zh: 他在一个非常富裕的家庭长大。

sentences.en: He chose a prosperous lottery number that evening.
sentences.zh: 那天晚上他选了一个大吉大利的彩票号码。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前站出来揽客的人，就是妓女或男妓
words.example_en: The social worker tried to help the prostitute get out of that life.
words.example_zh: 社工试图帮助那个妓女摆脱那种生活。
words.en_def: Any person (especially a woman) who has sexual intercourse or engages in other sexual activity for payment, especially as a means of livelihood.

words.mnemonic_zh: 在前面保护的，就是防护性的
words.example_en: Parents usually have a protective instinct towards their children.
words.example_zh: 父母通常对自己的孩子有保护本能。
words.en_def: Something that protects.

sentences.en: Mother bears are famously protective of their cubs.
sentences.zh: 熊妈妈对幼崽的保护是出了名的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“补蛋白”，可联想补充蛋白质
words.example_en: Eggs are an excellent source of protein.
words.example_zh: 鸡蛋是优质的蛋白质来源。
words.en_def: Any of numerous large, complex naturally-produced molecules composed of one or more long chains of amino acids, in which the amino acid groups are held together by peptide bonds.

words.mnemonic_zh: 预先接触处理的事项，形成了协议
words.example_en: They signed a new protocol on environmental protection.
words.example_zh: 他们签署了一项新的环境保护协议。
words.en_def: The minutes, or official record, of a negotiation or transaction; especially a document drawn up officially which forms the legal basis for subsequent agreements based on it.

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前提供东西的人，就是提供者
words.example_en: The internet service provider offers high - speed connections.
words.example_zh: 这家互联网服务提供商提供高速网络连接。
words.en_def: One who, or that which, provides a service, commodity, or the means for subsistence.

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前去统治管理的区域，就是省份
words.example_en: He lives in a small town in the southern province.
words.example_zh: 他住在南部省份的一个小镇上。
words.en_def: A region of the earth or of a continent; a district or country.

words.mnemonic_zh: 和省份统治有关的，就是省级的
words.example_en: The provincial government launched a new education policy.
words.example_zh: 省政府推出了一项新的教育政策。
words.en_def: A person belonging to a province; one who is provincial.

sentences.en: a provincial dialect
sentences.zh: 一种省方言

sentences.en: a provincial synod
sentences.zh: 省级会议

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前提供东西的行为，就是供应
words.example_en: The provision of clean water is essential for the community.
words.example_zh: 为社区提供清洁的水至关重要。
words.en_def: An item of goods or supplies, especially food, obtained for future use.

sentences.en: We increased our provision for bad debts on credit sales going into the recession.
sentences.zh: 我们在经济衰退期间增加了信贷销售坏账准备金。

sentences.en: An arrest shall be made in accordance with the provisions of this Act.
sentences.zh: 逮捕，依照本法规定办理。

sentences.en: to provision an army
sentences.zh: 提供军队

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前呼喊去招惹，就是挑衅激怒
words.example_en: His words were intended to provoke an argument.
words.example_zh: 他的话是故意挑起争吵的。
words.en_def: To cause someone to become annoyed or angry.

sentences.en: Don't provoke the dog; it may try to bite you.
sentences.zh: 不要激怒狗； 它可能会试图咬你。

words.mnemonic_zh: 和精神治疗有关的，就是精神科的
words.example_en: The hospital has a psychiatric department for mental patients.
words.example_zh: 这家医院有一个为精神病人设立的精神科。
words.en_def: Of, or relating to, psychiatry.

words.mnemonic_zh: public（公众的）加上 ly 后缀，变成公开地
words.example_en: The politician publicly admitted his mistake during the press conference.
words.example_zh: 这位政治家在新闻发布会上公开承认了他的错误。
words.en_def: In public, openly, in an open and public manner.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“跑死”，跑步时脉搏会加快
words.example_en: The doctor checked the patient's pulse carefully to diagnose the illness.
words.example_zh: 医生仔细检查了病人的脉搏以诊断病情。
words.en_def: A normally regular beat felt when arteries are depressed, caused by the pumping action of the heart.

sentences.en: In the dead of night, all was still but the pulsing light.
sentences.zh: 夜深人静，万籁俱寂，只有灯光闪烁。

sentences.en: Hot blood pulses through my veins.
sentences.zh: 热血在我的血管里跳动。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“碰”，水泵工作时会有碰撞声
words.example_en: The mechanic fixed the water pump to ensure the normal water supply.
words.example_zh: 机械师修好了水泵以确保正常供水。
words.en_def: A device for moving or compressing a liquid or gas.

sentences.en: This pump can deliver 100 gallons of water per minute.
sentences.zh: 该泵每分钟可输送 100 加仑的水。

sentences.en: It takes thirty pumps to get 10 litres; he did 50 pumps of the weights.
sentences.zh: 需要 30 泵才能获得 10 升； 他做了 50 次举重。

sentences.en: This pump is out of order, but you can gas up at the next one.
sentences.zh: 这台泵坏了，但你可以用下一台加油。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“碰吃”，像猛击时的声音
words.example_en: He got angry and punched the wall in frustration.
words.example_zh: 他生气了，沮丧地猛击墙壁。
words.en_def: A hit or strike with one's fist.

sentences.en: If she punches me, I'm gonna break her nose.
sentences.zh: 如果她打我，我就打断她的鼻子。

sentences.en: He punched a hit into shallow left field.
sentences.zh: 他将一击击入浅左外野。

sentences.en: to punch one with the end of a stick or the elbow
sentences.zh: 用棍子末端或肘部打人

words.mnemonic_zh: pure（纯的）加 ly 后缀，表纯粹地
words.example_en: The decision was made purely based on economic considerations.
words.example_zh: 这个决定完全是基于经济因素做出的。
words.en_def: Wholly; really, completely.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: pure（纯的）加 ity 后缀，表纯净
words.example_en: The purity of the water in this mountain spring is very high.
words.example_zh: 这座山泉水的纯净度非常高。
words.en_def: The state or degree of being pure.

words.mnemonic_zh: pur（向前）+ sue（跟随），向前跟随即追求
words.example_en: She decided to pursue a career in medicine to help others.
words.example_zh: 她决定从事医学事业以帮助他人。
words.en_def: To follow urgently, originally with intent to capture or harm; to chase.

sentences.en: Her rival pursued a quite different course.
sentences.zh: 她的竞争对手采取了完全不同的做法。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“扑嘘”，像推东西时用力的声音
words.example_en: He used all his strength to push the heavy box.
words.example_zh: 他用尽全力推那个沉重的箱子。
words.en_def: A short, directed application of force; an act of pushing.

sentences.en: Give the door a hard push if it sticks.
sentences.zh: 如果门卡住了，用力推一下。

sentences.en: One more push and the baby will be out.
sentences.zh: 再用力一推，宝宝就会出来。

sentences.en: Let's give one last push on our advertising campaign.
sentences.zh: 让我们为我们的广告活动做最后的努力。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“爬走”，解谜题像在摸索着爬走
words.example_en: The math puzzle really challenged the students' thinking ability.
words.example_zh: 这道数学难题真的挑战了学生们的思维能力。
words.en_def: Anything that is difficult to understand or make sense of.

sentences.en: Where he went after he left the house is a puzzle.
sentences.zh: 他离开家后去了哪里是一个谜。

sentences.en: to be in a puzzle
sentences.zh: 陷入困境

sentences.en: We puzzled over the curious-shaped lock, but were unable to discover how the key should be inserted.
sentences.zh: 我们对形状奇特的锁感到困惑，但不知道钥匙应该如何插入。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“拍锐米的”，想象拍金字塔很锐利
words.example_en: The ancient Egyptians built magnificent pyramids as tombs for pharaohs.
words.example_zh: 古埃及人建造了宏伟的金字塔作为法老的陵墓。
words.en_def: An ancient massive construction with a square or rectangular base and four triangular sides meeting in an apex, such as those built as tombs in Egypt or as bases for temples in Mesoamerica.

sentences.en: Build your pyramid with all cards face down, except the cards in the bottom row.
sentences.zh: 建造金字塔时，除底行的牌外，所有牌都面朝下。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 让自己达到合格状态，就有了资格
words.example_en: He has the necessary qualifications for this challenging job.
words.example_zh: 他具备这份具有挑战性工作所需的资质。
words.en_def: The act or process of qualifying for a position, achievement etc.

sentences.en: Qualification for this organization is extraordinarily difficult.
sentences.zh: 获得该组织的资格非常困难。

sentences.en: What are your qualifications for this job?
sentences.zh: 你有什么资格胜任这份工作？

sentences.en: I accept your offer, but with the following qualification.
sentences.zh: 我接受你方的提议，但有以下资格。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“快问”，快速询问有疑问的事
words.example_en: The customer sent a query about the product's warranty.
words.example_zh: 顾客就产品的保修问题发了一个询问。
words.en_def: A question, an inquiry (US), an enquiry (UK).

sentences.en: The teacher answered the student’s query concerning biosynthesis.
sentences.zh: 老师解答了学生关于生物合成的疑问。

sentences.en: The database admin switched on query logging for debugging purposes.
sentences.zh: 数据库管理员打开查询日志记录以进行调试。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“快思特”，快速思考探索
words.example_en: The knight went on a quest to find the lost treasure.
words.example_zh: 骑士踏上了寻找失落宝藏的探索之旅。
words.en_def: A journey or effort in pursuit of a goal (often lengthy, ambitious, or fervent); a mission.

sentences.en: to rove in quest of game, of a lost child, of property, etc.
sentences.zh: 四处游荡寻找游戏、迷失的孩子、财产等。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“阔它”，给它规定一个范围额度
words.example_en: The company has set a sales quota for each department.
words.example_zh: 公司为每个部门设定了销售配额。
words.en_def: A proportional part or share; the share or proportion assigned to each in a division.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“扣它”，引用话语就像扣住它
words.example_en: The speaker quoted a famous saying to support his point.
words.example_zh: 演讲者引用了一句名言来支持他的观点。
words.en_def: A quotation; a statement attributed to a person.

sentences.en: After going over the hefty quotes, the board decided it was cheaper to have the project executed by its own staff.
sentences.zh: 在仔细考虑了高额报价后，董事会决定由自己的员工执行该项目会更便宜。

sentences.en: The writer quoted the president.
sentences.zh: 作者引用了总统的话。

sentences.en: The writer quoted the president's speech.
sentences.zh: 作者引用了总统的讲话。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“锐驰”，快速奔跑比赛
words.example_en: The athletes are ready for the 100 - meter race.
words.example_zh: 运动员们准备好参加百米赛跑了。
words.en_def: A contest between people, animals, vehicles, etc. where the goal is to be the first to reach some objective. Example: Several horses run in a horse race, and the first one to reach the finishing post wins

sentences.en: The race around the park was won by Johnny, who ran faster than the others.
sentences.zh: 约翰尼赢得了围绕公园的比赛，他跑得比其他人都快。

sentences.en: the race to cure cancer
sentences.zh: 治愈癌症的竞赛

sentences.en: The drivers were racing around the track.
sentences.zh: 车手们在赛道上竞速。

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，表示方式、程度等
words.mnemonic_zh: 基于种族方面
words.example_en: The community is racially diverse and harmonious.
words.example_zh: 这个社区在种族上多元化且和谐。
words.en_def: Relating to race.

sentences.en: a racially aggravated attack
sentences.zh: 种族严重的攻击

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音就是“雷达”的音译
words.example_en: The ship uses radar to detect other vessels at sea.
words.example_zh: 这艘船用雷达探测海上的其他船只。
words.en_def: A method of detecting distant objects and determining their position, velocity, or other characteristics by analysis of sent radio waves (usually microwaves) reflected from their surfaces

sentences.en: His sensitive radar for hidden alliances keeps him out of trouble.
sentences.zh: 他对隐藏联盟的敏感雷达使他摆脱了麻烦。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 放射的行为产生辐射
words.example_en: Excessive radiation can be harmful to human health.
words.example_zh: 过量的辐射会对人体健康有害。
words.en_def: The shooting forth of anything from a point or surface, like diverging rays of light.

sentences.en: heat radiation
sentences.zh: 热辐射

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 触及根本的，容易是激进的
words.example_en: The government proposed some radical reforms to the system.
words.example_zh: 政府提出了一些对该体制的激进改革措施。
words.en_def: (historical: 19th-century Britain) A member of the most progressive wing of the Liberal Party; someone favouring social reform (but generally stopping short of socialism).

sentences.en: His beliefs are radical.
sentences.zh: 他的信念是激进的。

sentences.en: The spread of the cancer required radical surgery, and the entire organ was removed.
sentences.zh: 癌症扩散需要进行根治性手术，整个器官被切除。

sentences.en: a radical quantity; a radical sign
sentences.zh: 根数； 一个激进的迹象

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: rar（稀有）加 ity 表性质，就是稀有状态
words.example_en: The rarity of this species makes it highly valuable.
words.example_zh: 这个物种的稀有性使其极具价值。
words.en_def: A measure of the scarcity of an object.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“锐特”，有快速、特别的感觉，和比率、速度有关
words.example_en: The exchange rate fluctuates constantly.
words.example_zh: 汇率不断波动。
words.en_def: The worth of something; value.

sentences.en: At the height of his powers, he was producing pictures at the rate of four a year.
sentences.zh: 在他的巅峰时期，他以每年四张的速度制作影片。

sentences.en: The car was speeding down here at a hell of a rate.
sentences.zh: 车子以极快的速度从这里驶来。

sentences.en: The rate of production at the factory is skyrocketing.
sentences.zh: 工厂的生产率正在飙升。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，常表行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: rate（评估）加 ing 表示评估的结果，即评分
words.example_en: The hotel has a high customer rating.
words.example_zh: 这家酒店有很高的客户评分。
words.en_def: To assign or be assigned a particular rank or level.

sentences.en: She is rated fourth in the country.
sentences.zh: 她在全国排名第四。

sentences.en: They rate his talents highly.
sentences.zh: 他们对他的才华评价很高。

sentences.en: He rated this book brilliant.
sentences.zh: 他评价这本书非常棒。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“锐秋”，秋天收获有比例，联想比率
words.example_en: The ratio of boys to girls in this class is 2:1.
words.example_zh: 这个班级里男生和女生的比例是 2:1。
words.en_def: A number representing a comparison between two named things.

sentences.en: The schoolchildren ganged up to ratio the school catering over its shamefully undemocratic inclusion of vegetables in meals.
sentences.zh: 学生们联合起来，对学校的膳食与在膳食中添加蔬菜的可耻的不民主行为进行了比较。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: rat（推理）加 ional 表有推理性质，就是理性的
words.example_en: We should make rational decisions in difficult situations.
words.example_zh: 在困难情况下我们应该做出理性的决定。
words.en_def: A rational number: a number that can be expressed as the quotient of two integers.

sentences.en: The quotient of two rationals is again a rational.
sentences.zh: 两个有理数的商又是一个有理数。

sentences.en: Man is a rational creature.
sentences.zh: 人是一种理性的生物。

sentences.en: His statements were quite rational.
sentences.zh: 他的说法非常有道理。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“锐”，光线很锐利
words.example_en: A ray of sunlight pierced through the clouds.
words.example_zh: 一缕阳光穿透了云层。
words.en_def: A beam of light or radiation.

sentences.en: I saw a ray of light through the clouds.
sentences.zh: 我看到一丝光透过云层。

sentences.en: Unfortunately he didn't have a ray of hope.
sentences.zh: 不幸的是，他没有抱任何希望。

words.mnemonic_zh: re（反）+ act（行动），反过来行动就是反应
words.example_en: People often react differently to stress.
words.example_zh: 人们对压力的反应常常不同。
words.en_def: An emoji used to express a reaction to a post on social media.

sentences.en: Sad reacts only
sentences.zh: 只有悲伤的反应

sentences.en: Every body reacts on the body that impels it from its natural state.
sentences.zh: 每个身体都会对身体产生反应，迫使其脱离自然状态。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示身份、地位、群体
words.mnemonic_zh: reader（读者）加 ship 表群体，就是读者群
words.example_en: The magazine's readership has been increasing steadily.
words.example_zh: 这本杂志的读者群一直在稳步增长。
words.en_def: The collected readers of a publication.

sentences.en: The village newspaper has a readership of only 200 people.
sentences.zh: 村报的读者只有200人。

sentences.en: the Nora Chadwick Readership in Celtic Studies
sentences.zh: 凯尔特研究中的诺拉·查德威克读者群

words.mnemonic_zh: ready（准备好）加 ly 成副词，准备好做就是乐意容易
words.example_en: He readily agreed to help us.
words.example_zh: 他乐意地同意帮助我们。
words.en_def: Without unwillingness or hesitation; showing readiness.

sentences.en: The suspect readily answered all questions the police officers asked him.
sentences.zh: 嫌疑人爽快地回答了民警提出的所有问题。

sentences.en: readily available;  readily achievable
sentences.zh: 随时可用； 容易实现的

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: ready（准备好）加 ness 表状态，就是准备就绪
words.example_en: Her readiness to learn impressed the teacher.
words.example_zh: 她乐于学习的态度给老师留下了深刻印象。
words.en_def: The state or degree of being ready; preparedness.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 重新使有能力，就是康复
words.example_en: The patient needs a long - term rehabilitation program after the accident.
words.example_zh: 事故发生后，患者需要一个长期的康复计划。
words.en_def: The process of rehabilitating somebody or something.

words.mnemonic_zh: 反复做，就是排练
words.example_en: The actors are rehearsing the play for the upcoming performance.
words.example_zh: 演员们正在为即将到来的演出排练这出戏。
words.en_def: To repeat, as what has been already said; to tell over again; to recite.

sentences.en: There's no need to rehearse the same old argument; we've heard it before, and we all agree.
sentences.zh: 没有必要重复同样的旧论点； 我们以前听说过，而且都同意。

sentences.en: The witness rehearsed the events of the night before for the listening detectives.
sentences.zh: 目击者向侦听的侦探复述了前一天晚上发生的事情。

sentences.en: The lawyer advised her client to rehearse her testimony before the trial date.
sentences.zh: 律师建议她的委托人在审判日期之前排练她的证词。

words.mnemonic_zh: 联想国王统治时的威严形象
words.example_en: The king's reign brought peace and prosperity to the country.
words.example_zh: 国王的统治给国家带来了和平与繁荣。
words.en_def: The exercise of sovereign power.

sentences.en: England prospered under Elizabeth I's reign.
sentences.zh: 英国在伊丽莎白一世的统治下繁荣昌盛。

sentences.en: The reign of Victoria was a long one.
sentences.zh: 维多利亚的统治是漫长的。

sentences.en: He reigned in an autocratic manner.
sentences.zh: 他以专制方式统治。

words.mnemonic_zh: 再次使强大，就是加强
words.example_en: They decided to reinforce the wall to prevent it from collapsing.
words.example_zh: 他们决定加固这堵墙以防它倒塌。
words.en_def: To strengthen, especially by addition or augmentation.

sentences.en: He reinforced the handle with a metal rod and a bit of tape.
sentences.zh: 他用一根金属棒和一些胶带加固了手柄。

sentences.en: The right homework will reinforce and complement the lesson!
sentences.zh: 正确的家庭作业将巩固和补充课程！

sentences.en: Advertising for fast food can reinforce unhealthy dietary tendencies.
sentences.zh: 快餐广告可能会强化不健康的饮食倾向。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 扔回去，就是拒绝
words.example_en: His rejection of the offer surprised everyone in the meeting.
words.example_zh: 他拒绝了这个提议，这让会议上的每个人都很惊讶。
words.en_def: The act of rejecting.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 相关联带来的，是相对的
words.example_en: We should consider the relative importance of each task.
words.example_zh: 我们应该考虑每项任务的相对重要性。
words.en_def: Someone in the same family; someone connected by blood, marriage, or adoption.

sentences.en: Why do my relatives always talk about sex?
sentences.zh: 为什么我的亲戚总是谈论性？

sentences.en: The relative URL /images/pic.jpg, when evaluated in the context of http://example.com/docs/pic.html, corresponds to the absolute URL http://example.com/images/pic.jpg.
sentences.zh: 在 http://example.com/docs/pic.html 上下文中计算时，相对 URL /images/pic.jpg 对应于绝对 URL http://example.com/images/pic.jpg。

sentences.en: relative to your earlier point about taxes, ...
sentences.zh: 相对于您之前关于税收的观点，...

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新变松弛，就是放松
words.example_en: People often relax by listening to music after work.
words.example_zh: 人们下班后常通过听音乐来放松。
words.en_def: To calm down.

sentences.en: to relax a rope or cord
sentences.zh: 放松绳索或绳索

sentences.en: to relax discipline
sentences.zh: 放松纪律

sentences.en: Amusement relaxes the mind.
sentences.zh: 娱乐可以放松心灵。

words.mnemonic_zh: 往回放开，就是释放
words.example_en: The company will release a new product next month.
words.example_zh: 该公司下个月将发布一款新产品。
words.en_def: The event of setting (someone or something) free (e.g. hostages, slaves, prisoners, caged animals, hooked or stuck mechanisms).

sentences.en: The video store advertised that it had all the latest releases.
sentences.zh: 这家音像商店宣称拥有所有最新版本。

sentences.en: They marked the occasion with a release of butterflies.
sentences.zh: 他们通过释放蝴蝶来纪念这一时刻。

sentences.en: He released his grasp on the lever.
sentences.zh: 他松开了控制杆。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 相关联提起的，是相关性
words.example_en: The teacher emphasized the relevance of this topic to our daily life.
words.example_zh: 老师强调了这个话题与我们日常生活的相关性。
words.en_def: The property or state of being relevant or pertinent.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、能力
words.mnemonic_zh: 依靠的能力，就是可靠性
words.example_en: The reliability of this machine is very important for our work.
words.example_zh: 这台机器的可靠性对我们的工作非常重要。
words.en_def: The quality of being reliable, dependable or trustworthy.

words.mnemonic_zh: re（再）+locate（安置），再次安置就是迁移
words.example_en: The company decided to relocate its factory to a rural area.
words.example_zh: 公司决定将工厂迁至农村地区。
words.en_def: To move (something) from one place to another.

sentences.en: We had to relocate the magazine rack because we bruised our shins on it too frequently when it was near the door.
sentences.zh: 我们不得不重新安置杂志架，因为当它靠近门时，我们经常被它擦伤小腿。

sentences.en: Alfred relocated to Colorado Springs to take advantage of the boom in the defense industry.
sentences.zh: 阿尔弗雷德搬到科罗拉多斯普林斯，以利用国防工业的繁荣。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 内心对抗挣扎，所以不情愿
words.example_en: He was reluctant to accept the new job offer.
words.example_zh: 他不太愿意接受新的工作邀约。
words.en_def: Opposing; offering resistance (to).

sentences.en: She was reluctant to lend him the money
sentences.zh: 她不愿意借钱给他

words.mnemonic_zh: 由reluctant加副词后缀，不情愿地做事
words.example_en: She reluctantly agreed to attend the meeting.
words.example_zh: 她勉强同意参加会议。
words.en_def: In a reluctant or hesitant manner.

words.mnemonic_zh: 留下的就是剩余部分
words.example_en: He ate half of the cake and gave the remainder to his sister.
words.example_zh: 他吃了一半蛋糕，把剩下的给了妹妹。
words.en_def: A part or parts remaining after some has/have been removed.

sentences.en: My son ate part of his cake and I ate the remainder.
sentences.zh: 我儿子吃了一部分蛋糕，我吃了剩下的。

sentences.en: 11 divided by 2 is 5 remainder 1.
sentences.zh: 11除以2等于5余1。

sentences.en: 10 minus 4 leaves a remainder of 6
sentences.zh: 10 减 4 余数 6

words.mnemonic_zh: 留下的东西成了遗迹或剩余物
words.example_en: The archaeologists discovered the remains of an ancient city.
words.example_zh: 考古学家发现了一座古城的遗迹。
words.en_def: (chiefly in the plural) That which is left; relic; remainder.

sentences.en: There was no food in the house, so I had to remain hungry.
sentences.zh: 家里没有食物，我只能挨饿。

sentences.en: The light remained red for two full minutes.
sentences.zh: 红灯持续了整整两分钟。

sentences.en: The victim's remains were one small piece of bone.
sentences.zh: 受害者的遗体是一小块骨头。

words.mnemonic_zh: 特别值得注意，所以显著
words.example_en: The weather has changed remarkably in the past few days.
words.example_zh: 过去几天天气变化显著。
words.en_def: (manner) In a remarkable manner.

sentences.en: He performed the piece remarkably, offering novel interpretations to its nearly cliched passages.
sentences.zh: 他出色地演奏了这首曲子，对近乎陈词滥调的段落提供了新颖的解释。

sentences.en: That dog is remarkably fierce.
sentences.zh: 那只狗非常凶猛。

sentences.en: Remarkably, three State assembly elections were decided by a total of fewer than one hundred votes.
sentences.zh: 值得注意的是，三场州议会选举都是以不到一百票的总票数决定的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新让病好，就是治疗补救
words.example_en: They are trying to find a remedy for the economic crisis.
words.example_zh: 他们正试图找到应对经济危机的办法。
words.en_def: Something that corrects or counteracts.

words.mnemonic_zh: 让人再次想起的东西是提醒物
words.example_en: The calendar serves as a reminder of important events.
words.example_zh: 日历可作为重要事件的提醒物。
words.en_def: Someone or something that reminds.

sentences.en: He left a note as a reminder to get groceries.
sentences.zh: 他留下了一张纸条，提醒大家去买杂货。

sentences.en: She ignored first the reminder of 80 cents. At the end, she was sentenced to pay 200 euros!
sentences.zh: 她首先忽略了80美分的提醒。 最终，她被判支付200欧元！

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 移动离开就是去除或搬迁
words.example_en: The removal of the old furniture took a whole day.
words.example_zh: 搬走旧家具花了一整天时间。
words.en_def: The process of moving, or the fact of being removed.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“让得”，让人得到就是给予
words.example_en: The new policy will render great benefits to the local economy.
words.example_zh: 新政策将给当地经济带来巨大益处。
words.en_def: Stucco or plaster applied to walls (mostly to outside masonry walls).

sentences.en: A low-resolution render might look blocky.
sentences.zh: 低分辨率渲染可能看起来是块状的。

sentences.en: The shot rendered her immobile.
sentences.zh: 这一枪使她动弹不得。

sentences.en: The pianist rendered the Beethoven sonata beautifully.
sentences.zh: 这位钢琴家优美地演绎了贝多芬奏鸣曲。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 重新放置的东西，就是替代物
words.example_en: The old equipment needs a replacement to improve efficiency.
words.example_zh: 旧设备需要一个替代物来提高效率。
words.en_def: A person or thing that takes the place of another; a substitute.

sentences.en: The replacement of that broken light-bulb will have to wait until I can buy a new one.
sentences.zh: 更换那个坏掉的灯泡必须等到我能买一个新的为止。

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，表示根据传闻
words.mnemonic_zh: 回传消息被人说，就是据报道
words.example_en: The movie, reportedly very interesting, will be on next week.
words.example_zh: 据报道，这部非常有趣的电影下周上映。
words.en_def: According to reports or rumors; supposedly.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 反复呈现就是一种表现或代表
words.example_en: This painting is a good representation of his style.
words.example_zh: 这幅画是他风格的一个很好体现。
words.en_def: That which represents something else.

sentences.en: The Venus of Willendorf was an early representation of the female body.
sentences.zh: 维伦多夫的维纳斯是女性身体的早期代表。

sentences.en: We are no longer happy with your representation of our company at trade events.
sentences.zh: 我们对您在贸易活动中代表我们公司不再感到满意。

sentences.en: People who cannot afford representation are eligible for government assistance.
sentences.zh: 无力承担代理费用的人有资格获得政府援助。

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新生产就是繁殖或复制
words.example_en: Some organisms can reproduce asexually.
words.example_zh: 有些生物可以无性繁殖。
words.en_def: To produce an image or copy of.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 重新产出的结果就是繁殖或复制的产物
words.example_en: The reproduction of this ancient painting is very accurate.
words.example_zh: 这幅古画的复制品非常逼真。
words.en_def: The act of reproducing new individuals biologically.

sentences.en: Unauthorized reproduction of this article is prohibited.
sentences.zh: 本文未经授权禁止转载。

sentences.en: Jim was proud of the Rembrandt reproduction he owned.
sentences.zh: 吉姆为他拥有的伦勃朗复制品感到自豪。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词或名词后缀，这里表名词，指具有某种特征的事物
words.mnemonic_zh: 会爬的动物就是爬行动物
words.example_en: Many reptiles are cold - blooded animals.
words.example_zh: 许多爬行动物是冷血动物。
words.en_def: A cold-blooded vertebrate of the class Reptilia.

sentences.en: a reptile race or crew; reptile vices
sentences.zh: 爬行动物种族或团队； 爬行动物的恶习

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调公共利益的国家就是共和国
words.example_en: The country has been a republic since its independence.
words.example_zh: 这个国家自独立以来一直是共和国。
words.en_def: A state where sovereignty rests with the people or their representatives, rather than with a monarch or emperor; a country with no monarchy.

sentences.en: The United States is a republic; the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland is a constitutional monarchy.
sentences.zh: 美国是一个共和国； 大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国是君主立宪制国家。

sentences.en: The Republic of Udmurtia is west of the Permian Oblast.
sentences.zh: 乌德穆尔特共和国位于二叠纪州以西。

words.mnemonic_zh: 能反复被人认可的就是声誉好的
words.example_en: This is a reputable company with a long - standing history.
words.example_zh: 这是一家有悠久历史、声誉良好的公司。
words.en_def: Having a good reputation; honourable.

sentences.en: He was a reputable businessman.
sentences.zh: 他是一位有信誉的商人。

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调相似的状态就是像
words.example_en: The little girl resembles her mother very much.
words.example_zh: 这个小女孩非常像她的妈妈。
words.en_def: To be like or similar to (something); to represent as similar.

sentences.en: The twins resemble each other.
sentences.zh: 这对双胞胎彼此相似。

words.mnemonic_zh: 强调停留的状态就是居住
words.example_en: He resides in a small town near the mountains.
words.example_zh: 他居住在一个靠近山区的小镇上。
words.en_def: To dwell permanently or for a considerable time; to have a settled abode for a time; to remain for a long time.

words.mnemonic_zh: 再看一遍就是回顾、复习
words.example_en: He decided to review his notes before the exam.
words.example_zh: 他决定在考试前复习一下笔记。
words.en_def: A second or subsequent reading of a text or artifact in an attempt to gain new insights.

sentences.en: I need to make a review of the book before I can understand it.
sentences.zh: 我需要先回顾一下这本书，然后才能理解它。

sentences.en: The newspaper review was full of praise for the play.
sentences.zh: 报纸评论对该剧赞不绝口。

sentences.en: The victims demanded a full judicial review of the case.
sentences.zh: 受害者要求对此案进行全面司法审查。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 再次有生命就是复兴
words.example_en: The city is experiencing an economic revival.
words.example_zh: 这座城市正在经历经济复苏。
words.en_def: The act of reviving, or the state of being revived

sentences.en: the revival of hot pants
sentences.zh: 热裤的复兴

sentences.en: the revival of a debt barred by limitation; the revival of a revoked will
sentences.zh: 受限制的债务的恢复； 已撤销遗嘱的恢复

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新活过来就是复苏
words.example_en: The fresh air soon revived him.
words.example_zh: 新鲜空气很快使他苏醒过来。
words.en_def: To return to life; to become reanimated or reinvigorated.

sentences.en: Her grandmother refused to be revived if she lost consciousness.
sentences.zh: 如果她失去知觉，她的祖母将拒绝被救醒。

sentences.en: Classical learning revived in the fifteenth century.
sentences.zh: 古典学术在十五世纪复兴。

sentences.en: This new paint job should revive the surgery waiting room.
sentences.zh: 这项新的油漆工作将使手术候诊室焕然一新。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，有…性质的；名词后缀，人
words.mnemonic_zh: 彻底转变就是革命
words.example_en: The revolutionary ideas changed the society greatly.
words.example_zh: 这些革命思想极大地改变了社会。
words.en_def: A revolutionist; a person who revolts.

sentences.en: revolutionary agitators
sentences.zh: 革命煽动者

sentences.en: a revolutionary new tool
sentences.zh: 革命性的新工具

words.mnemonic_zh: 有奖励的事情就是值得做的
words.example_en: Doing volunteer work can be very rewarding.
words.example_zh: 做志愿工作会很有收获。
words.en_def: To give a reward to or for.

sentences.en: Why are you rewarding that bad behaviour?
sentences.zh: 你为什么要奖励这种不良行为？

sentences.en: Decorations are meant to reward the most meritous acts and services.
sentences.zh: 装饰品旨在奖励最有贡献的行为和服务。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“热脱里克”，热情脱离理智就是花言巧语
words.example_en: His speech was full of empty rhetoric.
words.example_zh: 他的演讲全是空洞的花言巧语。
words.morph_note: 该词词源复杂，教学上一般不做拆分
words.en_def: The art of using language, especially public speaking, as a means to persuade.

sentences.en: It’s only so much rhetoric.
sentences.zh: 这只是这么多的言辞。

sentences.en: A rhetorical question is one used merely to make a point, with no response expected.
sentences.zh: 反问句仅用于表达观点，不期望得到答复。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 富有的状态就是富裕、丰富
words.example_en: The richness of the local culture impressed the tourists.
words.example_zh: 当地文化的丰富性给游客留下了深刻印象。
words.en_def: The state or quality of being rich; richdom; wealth.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“来复”，是一种枪
words.example_en: The soldier carried a rifle on his shoulder.
words.example_zh: 士兵肩上扛着一支步枪。
words.morph_note: 该词不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: A shouldered firearm with a long, rifled barrel to improve range and accuracy.

sentences.en: She made a mess when she rifled through the stack of papers, looking for the title document.
sentences.zh: 当她翻阅一堆文件寻找产权文件时，她把事情弄得一团糟。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“ riot（闹）”，联想闹事
words.example_en: The police were called to control the riot.
words.example_zh: 警察被叫来控制骚乱。
words.morph_note: 该词不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: Wanton or unrestrained behavior; uproar; tumult.

sentences.en: In summer this flower garden is a riot of colour.
sentences.zh: 夏季，这座花园色彩缤纷。
