sentences.en: The nuclear protesters rioted outside the military base.
sentences.zh: 核抗议者在军事基地外发生骚乱。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“哩破”，联想撕裂
words.example_zh: 他不小心把衬衫撕裂了。
words.example_en: He accidentally ripped his shirt.
words.morph_note: 该词不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: A tear (in paper, etc.).

sentences.en: to rip a garment; to rip up a floor
sentences.zh: 撕破衣服； 撕毁地板

sentences.en: My shirt ripped when it was caught on a bramble.
sentences.zh: 当我的衬衫被荆棘缠住时，它被撕破了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 想象太阳升起(rise)，给人希望
words.example_en: The sun begins to rise slowly in the early morning.
words.example_zh: 清晨，太阳开始慢慢升起。
words.en_def: To move, or appear to move, physically upwards relative to the ground.

sentences.en: to rise a hill
sentences.zh: 升起一座小山

sentences.en: to rise a fish, or cause it to come to the surface of the water
sentences.zh: 使鱼升起，或使其浮出水面

sentences.en: Exercise is usually accompanied by a temporary rise in blood pressure.
sentences.zh: 运动通常伴随着血压暂时升高。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“锐刻”，冒险要锐利果断
words.example_en: Taking on this project involves a high level of risk.
words.example_zh: 承接这个项目有很高的风险。
words.en_def: A possible adverse event or outcome

sentences.en: 2006, Trever Ramsey on BBC News website, Exercise 'cuts skin cancer risk' read at http//news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/health/4764535.stm on 14 May 2006
sentences.zh: 2006 年，特雷弗·拉姆齐 (Trever Ramsey) 在 BBC 新闻网站上发表了运动“降低皮肤癌风险”的文章，网址为：http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/health/4764535.stm，2006 年 5 月 14 日

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: rit（仪式）加后缀变仪式相关的事物
words.example_en: They follow a strict ritual every morning before work.
words.example_zh: 他们每天上班前都遵循严格的惯例。
words.en_def: Rite; a repeated set of actions

sentences.en: They carried out the ritual carefully.
sentences.zh: 他们小心翼翼地进行着仪式。

sentences.en: They performed the ritual lighting of the candles.
sentences.zh: 他们举行了点燃蜡烛的仪式。

words.root_cn: 河流，原指共用一条河的人产生竞争
words.mnemonic_zh: riv（河）边争水源，成了 rival（对手）
words.example_en: The two companies have been rivals for many years.
words.example_zh: 这两家公司已经竞争多年了。
words.en_def: A competitor (person, team, company, etc.) with the same goal as another, or striving to attain the same thing. Defeating a rival may be a primary or necessary goal of a competitor.

sentences.en: Chris is my biggest rival in the 400-metre race.
sentences.zh: 克里斯是我在 400 米比赛中最大的对手。

sentences.en: As a social historian, he has no rival.
sentences.zh: 作为社会历史学家，他没有对手。

sentences.en: to rival somebody in love
sentences.zh: 与相爱的人竞争

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“若巴斯达”，像巴斯达一样强壮
words.example_en: He maintains a robust body by exercising regularly.
words.example_zh: 他通过定期锻炼保持强健的身体。
words.en_def: Evincing strength and health; strong.

sentences.en: A robust wall was put up.
sentences.zh: 一堵坚固的墙竖了起来。

sentences.en: robust employment
sentences.zh: 强劲的就业

words.mnemonic_zh: 想象一块大大的 rock（岩石）
words.example_en: The waves crashed against the huge rock on the shore.
words.example_zh: 波浪拍打着岸边的巨大岩石。
words.en_def: A formation of minerals, specifically:

sentences.en: Pearl Rock near Cape Cod is so named because the morning sun makes it gleam like a pearl.
sentences.zh: 科德角附近的珍珠岩因早晨的阳光使其像珍珠一样闪闪发光而得名。

sentences.en: I'll have a whisky on the rocks, please.
sentences.zh: 请给我一杯加冰块威士忌。

sentences.en: While we're in Brighton, let's get a stick of rock!
sentences.zh: 当我们在布莱顿的时候，让我们拿一根石头吧！

words.mnemonic_zh: rock（岩石）加 -y 变成有岩石的
words.example_en: The rocky path made the journey quite difficult.
words.example_zh: 这条崎岖的小路让行程变得相当艰难。
words.en_def: Unstable; easily rocked.

sentences.en: The table was rocky, so we put a book under one leg.
sentences.zh: 桌子很石头，所以我们把一本书放在一条腿下。

sentences.en: His new album is quite rocky.
sentences.zh: 他的新专辑相当摇滚。

sentences.en: Their relationship had weathered some rocky times, but they loved each other.
sentences.zh: 他们的关系经历了一些困难时期，但他们彼此相爱。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“若的”，好像是你的杆
words.example_en: The fisherman held a long rod by the lake.
words.example_zh: 渔夫在湖边握着一根长杆。
words.en_def: A straight, round stick, shaft, bar, cane, or staff.

sentences.en: When I hooked a snake and not a fish, I got so scared I dropped my rod in the water.
sentences.zh: 当我钓到一条蛇而不是一条鱼时，我非常害怕，我把鱼竿掉进了水里。

sentences.en: The judge imposed on the thief a sentence of fifteen strokes with the rod.
sentences.zh: 法官判处小偷鞭十五下。

sentences.en: I notched a rod and used it to measure the length of rope to cut.
sentences.zh: 我在一根杆上刻了凹口，用它来测量要切割的绳子的长度。

words.mnemonic_zh: rot（旋转）加 -ate 变成使旋转
words.example_en: The Earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
words.example_zh: 地球每 24 小时绕地轴自转一次。
words.en_def: To spin, turn, or revolve.

sentences.en: He rotated in his chair to face me.
sentences.zh: 他在椅子上旋转面对我。

sentences.en: The nurses' shifts rotate each week.
sentences.zh: 护士每周轮班。

sentences.en: The aircraft rotates at sixty knots.
sentences.zh: 飞机以六十节的速度旋转。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 由 rotate 变来，表旋转的动作或状态
words.example_en: The rotation of the wheels makes the car move forward.
words.example_zh: 车轮的转动使汽车前进。
words.en_def: The act of turning around a centre or an axis.

sentences.en: The earth's rotation about its axis is responsible for its being slightly oblate rather than a sphere.
sentences.zh: 地球绕地轴自转使其呈扁圆形而不是球体。

sentences.en: Earth's moon completes a rotation every twenty-seven days or so.
sentences.zh: 地球的月球大约每二十七天旋转一周。

sentences.en: In rotation, each member of the group would be responsible for the beacon fire.
sentences.zh: 小组中的每个成员轮流负责信标点火。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘若抚’，若抚摸它感觉粗糙
words.example_en: The rough surface of the wall hurt his hands.
words.example_zh: 墙壁粗糙的表面弄伤了他的手。
words.en_def: The unmowed part of a golf course.

sentences.en: Rough in the shape first, then polish the details.
sentences.zh: 先粗略形状，再打磨细节。

sentences.en: a rough estimate; a rough sketch of a building; a rough plan
sentences.zh: 粗略估计； 建筑物的草图； 一个粗略的计划

sentences.en: rough sea
sentences.zh: 波涛汹涌的大海

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像‘入必湿’，垃圾扔进去必湿
words.example_en: Please take the rubbish out when you leave.
words.example_zh: 你离开时请把垃圾带出去。
words.en_def: Refuse, waste, garbage, junk, trash.

sentences.en: The rubbish is collected every Thursday in Gloucester, but on Wednesdays in Cheltenham.
sentences.zh: 格洛斯特每周四收集垃圾，切尔滕纳姆每周三收集垃圾。

sentences.en: Much of what they sell is rubbish.
sentences.zh: 他们卖的很多东西都是垃圾。

sentences.en: Everything the teacher said during that lesson was rubbish. How can she possibly think that a bass viol and a cello are the same thing?
sentences.zh: 老师在那堂课上说的一切都是垃圾。 她怎么可能认为低音提琴和大提琴是同一个东西？

words.mnemonic_zh: rude加ly，粗鲁变副词
words.example_en: He spoke rudely to the old man in the street.
words.example_zh: 他在街上对老人说话很粗鲁。
words.en_def: In a rude manner

words.mnemonic_zh: rude加ness，粗鲁成名词
words.example_en: His rudeness made everyone uncomfortable.
words.example_zh: 他的无礼让每个人都不舒服。
words.en_def: The property of being rude.

sentences.en: His rudeness was inexcusable.
sentences.zh: 他的粗鲁是不可原谅的。

sentences.en: I'm sick of his rudenesses.
sentences.zh: 我厌倦了他的粗鲁行为。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘入哦’，进入要守规则
words.example_en: We must follow the rules at school.
words.example_zh: 我们在学校必须遵守规则。
words.en_def: A regulation, law, guideline.

sentences.en: All participants must adhere to the rules.
sentences.zh: 所有参与者都必须遵守规则。

sentences.en: As a rule, our senior editors are serious-minded.
sentences.zh: 一般来说，我们的高级编辑都是很严肃的。

sentences.en: a rule for extracting the cube root
sentences.zh: 提取立方根的规则

words.mnemonic_zh: rule加er，能定规则的人或量长度的物
words.example_en: The ruler made some important policies.
words.example_zh: 统治者制定了一些重要政策。
words.en_def: A (usually rigid), flat, rectangular measuring or drawing device with graduations in units of measurement; a straightedge with markings.

words.suffix_cn: 名词或形容词后缀，表行为或性质
words.mnemonic_zh: rule加ing，统治相关的动作或状态
words.example_en: The ruling of the court was fair.
words.example_zh: 法庭的裁决是公正的。
words.en_def: To regulate, be in charge of, make decisions for, reign over.

sentences.en: This game rules!
sentences.zh: 这个游戏规则！

sentences.en: a ruling passion
sentences.zh: 支配性的激情

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像‘入谬’，传入谬误成谣言
words.example_en: The rumour spread quickly in the small town.
words.example_zh: 谣言在小镇上迅速传播开来。
words.en_def: A statement or claim of questionable accuracy, from no known reliable source, usually spread by word of mouth.

sentences.en: There's a rumor going round that he's going to get married.
sentences.zh: 有传言说他要结婚了。

sentences.en: They say he used to be a thief, but that's just rumor.
sentences.zh: 他们说他曾经是个小偷，但这只是谣言。

sentences.en: John is rumored to be next in line for a promotion.
sentences.zh: 据传约翰将是下一个晋升的人选。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘软’，跑步久了腿发软
words.example_en: He likes to run in the park every morning.
words.example_zh: 他喜欢每天早上在公园里跑步。
words.en_def: To run.

sentences.en: I just got back from my morning run.
sentences.zh: 我刚刚晨跑回来。

sentences.en: I need to make a run to the store.
sentences.zh: 我需要跑去商店。

sentences.en: Let's go for a run in the car.
sentences.zh: 我们坐车去跑步吧。

words.mnemonic_zh: run和way组合，跑步的路即跑道
words.example_en: The plane is ready to take off on the runway.
words.example_zh: 飞机准备在跑道上起飞。
words.en_def: A defined, narrow section of land or an artificial structure used for access.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“rush”（冲），可联想快速冲出去的声音。
words.example_en: People often rush to work in the morning.
words.example_zh: 人们通常在早上匆忙赶去上班。
words.en_def: Any of several stiff plants of the genus Juncus, or the family Juncaceae, having hollow or pithy stems and small flowers, and often growing in marshes or near water.

sentences.en: A rush of business can be difficult to handle effectively for its unexpected volume.
sentences.zh: 由于业务量出乎意料，高峰期的业务可能难以有效处理。

sentences.en: Many errors were made in the rush to finish.
sentences.zh: 在匆忙完成的过程中犯了很多错误。

sentences.en: a rush of water;  a rush of footsteps
sentences.zh: 一股水流； 一阵急促的脚步声

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“塞克”，可想象用它塞东西。
words.example_en: He carried a sack of potatoes on his back.
words.example_zh: 他背着一袋土豆。
words.en_def: A bag; especially a large bag of strong, coarse material for storage and handling of various commodities, such as potatoes, coal, coffee; or, a bag with handles used at a supermarket, a grocery sack; or, a small bag for small items, a satchel.

sentences.en: The American sack of salt is 215 pounds; the sack of wheat, two bushels. — McElrath.
sentences.zh: 美国一袋盐重 215 磅； 一袋小麦，两蒲式耳。 ——麦克埃尔拉斯。

sentences.en: The sack of Rome.
sentences.zh: 罗马被洗劫。

sentences.en: He twisted his ankle sliding into the sack at second.
sentences.zh: 第二次他扭伤了脚踝，滑进了麻袋里。

words.mnemonic_zh: sacr（神圣）加 ed 表性质，即神圣的。
words.example_en: The church is a sacred place for believers.
words.example_zh: 教堂对信徒来说是一个神圣的地方。
words.en_def: Characterized by solemn religious ceremony or religious use, especially, in a positive sense; consecrated, made holy.

sentences.en: a sacred day
sentences.zh: 神圣的一天

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为或事物
words.mnemonic_zh: 为了神圣之事做出的行为，就是牺牲。
words.example_en: Parents often make sacrifices for their children.
words.example_zh: 父母常常为孩子做出牺牲。
words.en_def: The offering of anything to a god; a consecratory rite.

sentences.en: the sacrifice of one's spare time in order to volunteer
sentences.zh: 为了做志愿者而牺牲自己的业余时间

sentences.en: Venison has many advantages over meat from factory farms, although it still requires a hunter to sacrifice the life of a deer.
sentences.zh: 鹿肉比工厂化农场的肉有很多优点，尽管它仍然需要猎人牺牲鹿的生命。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“塞夫”，把丈夫塞起来很安全。
words.example_en: Children should always be kept in a safe environment.
words.example_zh: 孩子们应该始终处于安全的环境中。
words.en_def: A box, usually made of metal, in which valuables can be locked for safekeeping.

sentences.en: You’ll be safe here.
sentences.zh: 你在这里会很安全。

sentences.en: It’s safe to eat this.
sentences.zh: 吃这个是安全的。

sentences.en: We have to find a safe spot, where we can hide out until this is over.
sentences.zh: 我们必须找到一个安全的地方，在那里我们可以躲起来，直到事情结束。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表性质或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: safe 加 ty 变名词，表安全的性质。
words.example_en: We must ensure the safety of all passengers.
words.example_zh: 我们必须确保所有乘客的安全。
words.en_def: The condition or feeling of being safe; security; certainty.

sentences.en: If you push it to the limit, safety is not guaranteed.
sentences.zh: 如果把它推到极限，安全就得不到保障。

sentences.en: Be sure that the safety is set before proceeding.
sentences.zh: 在继续操作之前，请确保已设置好安全性。

sentences.en: He sacked the quarterback in the end zone for a safety.
sentences.zh: 为了安全起见，他在达阵区解雇了四分卫。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“圣特”，特别神圣的人。
words.example_en: Many people look up to the saint as a role - model.
words.example_zh: 很多人把这位圣徒视为榜样。
words.en_def: A person whom a church or another religious group has officially recognised as especially holy or godly; one eminent for piety and virtue.

sentences.en: Kateri Tekakwitha was proclaimed a saint.
sentences.zh: 卡泰里·特卡维萨 (Kateri Tekakwitha) 被宣布为圣人。

sentences.en: Dorothy Day was a living saint.
sentences.zh: 多萝西·戴是一位活着的圣人。

sentences.en: Many wish to see Pope John Paul II sainted immediately.
sentences.zh: 许多人希望看到教皇约翰·保罗二世立即被尊为圣。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“塞客”，为了塞住客人（找理由）。
words.example_en: For the sake of your health, you should exercise regularly.
words.example_zh: 为了你的健康，你应该定期锻炼。
words.en_def: Cause, interest or account

sentences.en: For the sake of argument
sentences.zh: 为了论证

sentences.en: For old times' sake
sentences.zh: 为了旧时光

words.mnemonic_zh: 神圣的行为决定，类似于批准或制裁。
words.example_en: The country faced economic sanctions from other nations.
words.example_zh: 这个国家面临其他国家的经济制裁。
words.en_def: An approval, by an authority, generally one that makes something valid.

sentences.en: The whalers had been operating in the contested waters off the island with sanction from the Japanese government.
sentences.zh: 这些捕鲸船一直在日本政府的批准下在该岛附近有争议的水域进行作业。

sentences.en: The United States enacted a new round of sanctions against the apartheid regime of South Africa.
sentences.zh: 美国对南非种族隔离政权实施新一轮制裁。

words.mnemonic_zh: 先满足（satisfact）再加上副词后缀，做事让人满意。
words.example_en: He completed the task satisfactorily within the deadline.
words.example_zh: 他在截止日期前圆满地完成了任务。
words.en_def: In a satisfactory manner, in a manner adequate to requirements.

words.mnemonic_zh: save加上ing，表save的动作或结果
words.example_en: Making small savings regularly can add up over time.
words.example_zh: 定期小额储蓄，时间久了会积少成多。
words.en_def: To prevent harm or difficulty.

sentences.en: The shift of the supplier gave us a saving of 10 percent.
sentences.zh: 供应商的转变为我们节省了 10%。

sentences.en: I invested all my savings in gold.
sentences.zh: 我把所有积蓄都投资在黄金上。

sentences.en: a saving cook
sentences.zh: 一个节约的厨师

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“噻”，说话发出的声音
words.example_en: He always says something interesting to make us laugh.
words.example_zh: 他总是说些有趣的事逗我们笑。
words.en_def: A chance to speak; the right or power to influence or make a decision.

sentences.en: Please say your name slowly and clearly.
sentences.zh: 请缓慢而清晰地说出你的名字。

sentences.en: Martha, will you say the Pledge of Allegiance?
sentences.zh: 玛莎，你能宣读效忠誓词吗？

sentences.en: He said he would be here tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 他说他明天会在这里。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“四看”，四处看即扫描、浏览
words.example_en: She scanned the document quickly for important information.
words.example_zh: 她快速浏览文件，寻找重要信息。
words.en_def: Close investigation.

sentences.en: The operators vacated the room during the scan.
sentences.zh: 扫描期间操作员离开房间。

sentences.en: The doctors looked at the scans and made a diagnosis.
sentences.zh: 医生查看了扫描结果并做出了诊断。

sentences.en: She scanned the passage carefully but could not find what she was looking for.
sentences.zh: 她仔细地浏览着这段文字，却找不到她要找的东西。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“撕嘎”，撕开皮肤留下伤疤
words.example_en: The scar on his face is a reminder of the accident.
words.example_zh: 他脸上的伤疤是那次事故的纪念。
words.en_def: A permanent mark on the skin, sometimes caused by the healing of a wound.

sentences.en: Seeing his parents die in a car crash scarred him for life.
sentences.zh: 目睹父母死于车祸，给他留下了终生的创伤。

words.mnemonic_zh: 和scar（伤疤）联想，稀少的东西像伤疤引人注意
words.example_en: Fresh water is becoming scarce in some regions.
words.example_zh: 在一些地区，淡水正变得稀缺。
words.en_def: Uncommon, rare; difficult to find; insufficient to meet a demand.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“吓死”，让人害怕
words.example_en: The loud noise scared the birds away.
words.example_zh: 巨大的声响把鸟儿吓跑了。
words.en_def: A minor fright.

sentences.en: Johnny had a bad scare last night.
sentences.zh: 约翰尼昨晚吓坏了。

sentences.en: a food-poisoning scare
sentences.zh: 食物中毒恐慌

sentences.en: Did it scare you when I said "Boo!"?
sentences.zh: 当我说“嘘！”时，你被吓到了吗？

words.suffix_cn: 形容词或动词过去式后缀
words.mnemonic_zh: scatter加ed，表已被分散的状态
words.example_en: The scattered houses are hidden among the trees.
words.example_zh: 分散的房屋隐藏在树林中。
words.en_def: To (cause to) separate and go in different directions; to disperse.

sentences.en: The crowd scattered in terror.
sentences.zh: 众人惊恐四散。

sentences.en: Her ashes were scattered at the top of a waterfall.
sentences.zh: 她的骨灰撒在瀑布顶上。

sentences.en: to scatter hopes or plans
sentences.zh: 驱散希望或计划

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…的性质
words.mnemonic_zh: scene加ic，有景色特点即风景优美
words.example_zh: 他们沿着风景优美的海岸线开车。
words.example_en: They drove along the scenic coastline.
words.en_def: A depiction of scenery

sentences.en: We have plenty of time: let's take the scenic route.
sentences.zh: 我们的时间很充裕：我们走风景优美的路线吧。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…的性质
words.mnemonic_zh: scept（怀疑）加ical，表怀疑的状态
words.example_en: He is sceptical about the new theory.
words.example_zh: 他对这个新理论持怀疑态度。
words.en_def: Having, or expressing doubt; questioning.

sentences.en: I can see why people are so skeptical [sic] about him, but I think he's on to something here. (regarded by organizations such as the BBC as an error)
sentences.zh: 我可以理解为什么人们对他如此怀疑[原文如此]，但我认为他在这里有所作为。 （被 BBC 等组织视为错误）

words.mnemonic_zh: schol（学习）加ar（人），爱学习的人是学者
words.example_en: The famous scholar gave a wonderful lecture.
words.example_zh: 这位著名学者做了一场精彩的讲座。
words.en_def: A student; one who studies at school or college, typically having a scholarship.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、性质
words.mnemonic_zh: 学者（scholar）具备的资格或权益（ship）就是奖学金或学问
words.example_en: He won a scholarship to study at a famous university.
words.example_zh: 他获得了一份奖学金，得以去一所著名大学学习。
words.en_def: A grant-in-aid to a student.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“撕开破”，把东西撕开破后，能看到的范围就大了
words.example_en: The scope of this project is quite wide.
words.example_zh: 这个项目的范围相当广泛。
words.en_def: The breadth, depth or reach of a subject; a domain.

sentences.en: the scope of an adverb
sentences.zh: 副词的范围

sentences.en: The surgeon will scope the football player's knee to repair damage to a ligament.
sentences.zh: 外科医生将检查足球运动员的膝盖以修复韧带损伤。

sentences.en: If we locally scope the user's login name, it won't be accessible from outside this function.
sentences.zh: 如果我们在本地范围内限制用户的登录名，则无法从此函数外部访问它。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“丝扣”，螺丝就是有丝扣的东西
words.example_en: He tightened the screw with a screwdriver.
words.example_zh: 他用螺丝刀拧紧了螺丝。
words.en_def: A device that has a helical function.

sentences.en: the skeleton screw (Caprella);  the sand screw
sentences.zh: 骨架螺钉（Caprella）； 砂螺丝

words.mnemonic_zh: scrutin（仔细检查）加上后缀 y 就成了仔细审查的名词
words.example_en: The report will be under close scrutiny by the board.
words.example_zh: 这份报告将受到董事会的严格审查。
words.en_def: Intense study of someone or something.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“西尔”，想象一只叫西尔的海豹
words.example_en: The document was stamped with an official seal.
words.example_zh: 文件上盖有官方印章。
words.en_def: A pinniped (Pinnipedia), particularly an earless seal (true seal) or eared seal.

sentences.en: The seals in the harbor looked better than they smelled.
sentences.zh: 港口里的海豹看起来比闻起来更好。

sentences.en: They're organizing a protest against sealing.
sentences.zh: 他们正在组织一场反对封锁的抗议活动。

sentences.en: The front of the podium bore the presidential seal.
sentences.zh: 讲台正面刻有总统印章。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“瑟去”，瑟瑟发抖地去寻找东西
words.example_en: They searched the area for the lost child.
words.example_zh: 他们在那个区域搜寻走失的孩子。
words.en_def: An attempt to find something.

sentences.en: With only five minutes until we were meant to leave, the search for the keys started in earnest.
sentences.zh: 距离我们离开还有五分钟，寻找钥匙的工作就正式开始了。

sentences.en: Search is a hard problem for computers to solve efficiently.
sentences.zh: 搜索是计算机高效解决的一个难题。

sentences.en: I searched the garden for the keys and found them in the vegetable patch.
sentences.zh: 我在花园里寻找钥匙，在菜地里找到了它们。

words.mnemonic_zh: 保管秘密（secret）的人（ary）就是秘书
words.example_en: The secretary typed the letter quickly.
words.example_zh: 秘书迅速地打好了信。
words.en_def: Someone entrusted with a secret; a confidant.

sentences.en: Ban Ki-Moon was a secretary general of the United Nations.
sentences.zh: 潘基文曾任联合国秘书长。

words.mnemonic_zh: 被划分（sect）出来的部分（or）就是部门或领域
words.example_en: The service sector is growing rapidly.
words.example_zh: 服务业正在迅速发展。
words.en_def: Section

sentences.en: public sector;  private sector
sentences.zh: 公共部门； 私营部门

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与……有关
words.mnemonic_zh: 和时代（secul）相关（ar）的，不是宗教的，就是世俗的
words.example_en: In a secular society, people have different beliefs.
words.example_zh: 在世俗社会里，人们有不同的信仰。
words.en_def: A secular ecclesiastic, or one not bound by monastic rules.

sentences.en: secular clergy in Catholicism
sentences.zh: 天主教的世俗神职人员

sentences.en: The secular games of ancient Rome were held to mark the end of a saeculum and the beginning of the next.
sentences.zh: 古罗马的世俗游戏是为了标志着一个时代的结束和下一个时代的开始。

sentences.en: The long-term growth in population and income accounts for most secular trends in economic phenomena.
sentences.zh: 人口和收入的长期增长是经济现象的大多数长期趋势的原因。

words.mnemonic_zh: 不用再挂念（cur），分开（se）危险，就是安全的
words.example_en: Make sure your data is stored in a secure place.
words.example_zh: 确保你的数据存放在安全的地方。
words.en_def: To make safe; to relieve from apprehensions of, or exposure to, danger; to guard; to protect.

sentences.en: to secure a creditor against loss; to secure a debt by a mortgage
sentences.zh: 确保债权人免受损失； 通过抵押贷款担保债务

sentences.en: to secure a prisoner; to secure a door, or the hatches of a ship
sentences.zh: 确保囚犯安全； 固定门或船舱口

sentences.en: to secure an estate
sentences.zh: 确保财产安全

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 不操心，所以有安全保障
words.example_en: The government is responsible for national security.
words.example_zh: 政府负责国家安全。
words.en_def: The condition of not being threatened, especially physically, psychologically, emotionally, or financially.

words.mnemonic_zh: 这个词发音像眼睛‘睇’东西
words.example_en: She can see a beautiful garden from her window.
words.example_zh: 她从窗户可以看到一个美丽的花园。
words.en_def: (stative) To perceive or detect with the eyes, or as if by sight.

sentences.en: 1999 saw the release of many great films.
sentences.zh: 1999 年上映了许多伟大的电影。

sentences.en: I'll see you hang for this!  I saw that they didn't make any more trouble.
sentences.zh: 我会看到你为此绞尽脑汁！ 我看他们没有再惹麻烦。

sentences.en: I saw the old lady safely across the road.
sentences.zh: 我看到老太太安全地过了马路。

words.mnemonic_zh: seem加上后缀，表似乎的样子
words.example_en: He is seemingly happy, but actually he's sad.
words.example_zh: 他表面上很开心，但实际上很悲伤。
words.en_def: As it appears; apparently.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 从群体分开的部分
words.example_en: This segment of the movie is very exciting.
words.example_zh: 电影的这一段非常精彩。
words.en_def: A length of some object.

sentences.en: a segment of rope
sentences.zh: 一段绳子

sentences.en: a segment of an orange;   a segment of a compound or divided leaf
sentences.zh: 一片橙子； 复叶或分叶的一部分

sentences.en: The news showed a segment on global warming.
sentences.zh: 该新闻播放了有关全球变暖的片段。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像‘细抓’，细细抓住
words.example_en: He managed to seize the opportunity.
words.example_zh: 他设法抓住了这个机会。
words.en_def: To deliberately take hold of; to grab or capture.

sentences.en: to seize a ship after libeling
sentences.zh: 诽谤后扣押一艘船

sentences.en: a fever seized him
sentences.zh: 他发烧了

sentences.en: to seize or stop one rope on to another
sentences.zh: 抓住或阻止一根绳子到另一根绳子上

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想‘seldom’似‘少登门’，所以很少
words.example_en: He seldom goes to the cinema these days.
words.example_zh: 这些天他很少去电影院。
words.en_def: Rare; infrequent.

sentences.en: They seldom come here now.
sentences.zh: 他们现在很少来这里了。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 分开选，有选择性
words.example_en: She is very selective about her friends.
words.example_zh: 她对朋友很挑剔。
words.en_def: Of or relating to the process of selection.

sentences.en: selective pressure
sentences.zh: 选择压力

sentences.en: He's very selective and spent hours in the store choosing a new shirt.
sentences.zh: 他非常挑剔，花了几个小时在商店里挑选一件新衬衫。

sentences.en: In the USA, military conscription is controlled by the Selective Service.
sentences.zh: 在美国，征兵由兵役局控制。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘自个儿’，就是自己
words.example_en: He always puts self first.
words.example_zh: 他总是把自己放在第一位。
words.en_def: One individual's personality, character, demeanor, or disposition.

sentences.en: one's true self; one's better self; one's former self
sentences.zh: 一个人的真实自我； 更好的自己； 以前的自己

sentences.en: a self bow: one made from a single piece of wood
sentences.zh: 自弓：由一整块木头制成的弓

sentences.en: This argument was put forward by the defendant self.
sentences.zh: 该辩解由被告人本人提出。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 自私的特性，用ness变名词
words.example_en: His selfishness made others angry.
words.example_zh: 他的自私让别人很生气。
words.en_def: The quality of being selfish; the condition of putting one's own interests before those of others.

words.mnemonic_zh: 资深的人成为参议员
words.example_en: The senator proposed a new law.
words.example_zh: 这位参议员提出了一项新法律。
words.en_def: A member, normally elected, in the house or chamber of a legislature called a senate. The legislatures of the United States and Canada have senators.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: sens感觉，ation表行为，合起来是感觉带来的轰动
words.example_en: The new movie created a great sensation in the town.
words.example_zh: 这部新电影在镇上引起了巨大的轰动。
words.en_def: A physical feeling or perception from something that comes into contact with the body; something sensed.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: sens感觉，ational有…性质，让人有强烈感觉的
words.example_en: The journalist wrote a sensational story about the scandal.
words.example_zh: 记者写了一篇关于这起丑闻的耸人听闻的报道。
words.en_def: Of or pertaining to sensation.

sentences.en: sensational nerves
sentences.zh: 感觉神经

words.mnemonic_zh: sens感觉，ibly表方式，凭感觉合理行事
words.example_en: He dealt with the problem sensibly and calmly.
words.example_zh: 他明智而冷静地处理了这个问题。
words.en_def: In a sensible manner; in a way that shows good sense.

words.mnemonic_zh: sens感觉，itivity表性质，对感觉的敏感性质
words.example_en: The skin's sensitivity to sunlight varies from person to person.
words.example_zh: 皮肤对阳光的敏感度因人而异。
words.en_def: The quality or state of being sensitive; sensitiveness.

words.mnemonic_zh: sent感觉，iment表状态，感觉的状态即情绪
words.example_en: There is a growing sentiment against the new policy.
words.example_zh: 反对新政策的情绪在不断增长。
words.en_def: A general thought, feeling, or sense.

sentences.en: The sentiment emerged that we were acting too soon.
sentences.zh: 人们开始认为我们行动得太早了。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: se分开，par分，ation表行为，分开的行为
words.example_en: The separation of the two countries led to many changes.
words.example_zh: 两国的分离导致了许多变化。
words.en_def: The act of disuniting two or more things, or the condition of being separated.

words.mnemonic_zh: sequ跟随，ence表状态，跟随的状态即顺序
words.example_en: Please put these numbers in the correct sequence.
words.example_zh: 请把这些数字按正确的顺序排列。
words.en_def: A set of things next to each other in a set order; a series

sentences.en: Complete the listed tasks in sequence.
sentences.zh: 按顺序完成列出的任务。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: seri系列，al有…性质，有系列性质的
words.example_en: The serial killer has been on the run for months.
words.example_zh: 这个连环杀手已经潜逃了几个月。
words.en_def: A work, such as a work of fiction, published in installments, often numbered and without a specified end.

sentences.en: Go to these sites for serials, cracks and keygens.
sentences.zh: 请访问这些网站获取序列号、破解补丁和注册机。

sentences.en: He was a serial entrepreneur, always coming up with a new way to make cash.
sentences.zh: 他是一位连续创业者，总是想出新的赚钱方式。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“瑟夫”，想象瑟夫在服务大家
words.example_en: The waiter serves customers with a warm smile.
words.example_zh: 服务员带着热情的微笑为顾客服务。
words.en_def: An act of putting the ball or shuttlecock in play in various games.

sentences.en: Whose serve is it?
sentences.zh: 是谁的发球？

sentences.en: I've received a summons for jury duty. It says I serve one day or one trial.
sentences.zh: 我收到了担任陪审员的传票。 上面写着我服刑一天或试用一次。

words.mnemonic_zh: serv服务，ice表行为，服务的行为
words.example_en: The hotel provides excellent service to its guests.
words.example_zh: 这家酒店为客人提供优质的服务。
words.en_def: An act of being of assistance to someone.

sentences.en: I say I did him a service by ending our relationship – now he can freely pursue his career.
sentences.zh: 我说我结束了我们的关系，帮了他一个忙——现在他可以自由地追求他的事业了。

sentences.en: Hair care is a service industry.
sentences.zh: 护发是一个服务行业。

sentences.en: This machine provides the name service for the LAN.
sentences.zh: 本机为 LAN 提供名称服务。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“塞它”，把东西塞到某个地方，即放置。
words.example_en: He set the book on the table and left the room.
words.example_zh: 他把书放在桌子上，然后离开了房间。
words.en_def: To put (something) down, to rest.

sentences.en: Set the tray there.
sentences.zh: 将托盘放在那里。

sentences.en: I have set my heart on running the marathon.
sentences.zh: 我已经下定决心要跑马拉松了。

sentences.en: to set a coach in the mud
sentences.zh: 把教练放在泥里

words.root_cn: set(放置) + back(向后)，放置回去引申为挫折
words.mnemonic_zh: set（放置）+ back（向后），事情被向后放，遇到挫折。
words.example_en: The project encountered a major setback last month.
words.example_zh: 该项目上个月遭遇了重大挫折。
words.en_def: An obstacle, delay, disadvantage, blow (an adverse event which retards or prevents progress towards a desired outcome)

sentences.en: After some initial setbacks, the expedition went safely on its way.
sentences.zh: 经过最初的一些挫折后，探险队安全上路。

sentences.en: Setbacks were initially used for structural reasons, but now are often mandated by land use codes.
sentences.zh: 退缩最初是出于结构原因而使用的，但现在通常是由土地使用法规强制要求的。

words.suffix_cn: 动词后缀，表反复、连续动作
words.mnemonic_zh: set本就有放置稳定之意，加上-le 更强调使稳定，解决事情、定居。
words.example_en: They decided to settle in the small town.
words.example_zh: 他们决定在这个小镇定居。
words.en_def: To conclude or resolve (something):

sentences.en: to settle her estate
sentences.zh: 解决她的遗产

sentences.en: the weather settled;  wait until the crowd settles before speaking
sentences.zh: 天气稳定了； 等人群安静下来再说话

sentences.en: the Saxons who settled in Britain
sentences.zh: 定居英国的撒克逊人

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: settle（解决、定居）+ ment（名词后缀），解决问题的结果或定居的地方。
words.example_en: The two sides reached a settlement after long - term negotiation.
words.example_zh: 经过长期谈判，双方达成了和解。
words.en_def: The act of settling.

words.mnemonic_zh: sew（缝纫）加上 -ing 变成缝纫的行为，即针线活。
words.example_en: She spends hours doing sewing every day.
words.example_zh: 她每天花几个小时做针线活。
words.en_def: To use a needle to pass thread repeatedly through (pieces of fabric) in order to join them together.

sentences.en: Balls were first made of grass or leaves held together by strings, and later of pieces of animal skin sewn together and stuffed with feathers or hay.
sentences.zh: 球最初是用草或树叶用绳子绑在一起制成的，后来又用动物皮片缝合在一起并填充羽毛或干草制成。

sentences.en: to sew money into a bag
sentences.zh: 把钱缝进袋子里

sentences.en: She put down her sewing and went to answer the door.
sentences.zh: 她放下针线活去开门。

words.mnemonic_zh: sex（性）+ ual（……的），和性相关的。
words.example_en: Sexual equality is an important social issue.
words.example_zh: 性别平等是一个重要的社会问题。
words.en_def: A species which reproduces by sexual rather than asexual reproduction, or a member of such a species.

sentences.en: Women face sexual discrimination in the workplace.
sentences.zh: 女性在工作场所面临性别歧视。

sentences.en: Giving oral sex is my favorite sexual act.
sentences.zh: 口交是我最喜欢的性行为。

sentences.en: She's a very sexual woman
sentences.zh: 她是一个非常性感的女人

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: sexual（性的）+ ity（名词后缀），表示性方面的特质、状态。
words.example_en: Understanding different sexualities is crucial for an inclusive society.
words.example_zh: 理解不同的性取向对一个包容的社会至关重要。
words.en_def: The quality of being sexual; that which is characterized or distinguished by sex.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“筛比”，像被筛过的破旧东西。
words.example_en: He always wears shabby clothes to work.
words.example_zh: 他总是穿着破旧的衣服去上班。
words.en_def: Torn or worn; unkempt.

sentences.en: They lived in a tiny apartment, with some old, shabby furniture.
sentences.zh: 他们住在一间小公寓里，里面有一些破旧的家具。

sentences.en: The fellow arrived looking rather shabby after journeying so far.
sentences.zh: 经过这么远的路程，这个家伙到达时看起来相当破旧。

sentences.en: shabby treatment
sentences.zh: 简陋的待遇

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“筛目”，像被众人审视而羞愧。
words.example_en: He felt great shame for his mistake.
words.example_zh: 他为自己的错误感到非常羞愧。
words.en_def: Uncomfortable or painful feeling due to recognition or consciousness of one's own impropriety or dishonor or something being exposed that should have been kept private.

sentences.en: The teenager couldn’t bear the shame of introducing his parents.
sentences.zh: 少年无法忍受介绍自己父母的耻辱。

sentences.en: It was a shame not to see the show after driving all that way.
sentences.zh: 开车走了这么远却没有看到演出，真是一种遗憾。

sentences.en: Shame, you poor thing, you must be cold!
sentences.zh: 真可惜，你这个可怜的东西，你一定很冷吧！

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示充满……的
words.mnemonic_zh: shame（羞耻）+ ful（充满……的），充满羞耻的。
words.example_en: His shameful behavior disappointed everyone.
words.example_zh: 他可耻的行为让每个人都很失望。
words.en_def: Causing or meriting shame or disgrace; disgraceful

words.mnemonic_zh: 持有股份的人就是股东
words.example_en: The shareholder expressed concerns about the company's future strategy.
words.example_zh: 股东对公司未来的战略表示担忧。
words.en_def: One who owns shares of stock in a corporation.

sentences.en: Shareholders are the real owners of a publicly traded business, but management runs it.
sentences.zh: 股东是上市企业的真正所有者，但管理层负责运营该企业。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“杀破”，锋利之物能杀破东西
words.example_en: Be careful with that sharp knife; it can easily cut your finger.
words.example_zh: 小心那把锋利的刀，它很容易割到你的手指。
words.en_def: The symbol ♯, placed after the name of a note in the key signature or before a note on the staff to indicate that the note is to be played a semitone higher.

sentences.en: The pitch pipe sounded out a perfect F♯ (F sharp).
sentences.zh: 音管发出完美的F♯（升F）音。

sentences.en: The piece was difficult to read after it had been transposed, since in the new key many notes were sharps.
sentences.zh: 这首曲子在移调后很难阅读，因为在新调中许多音符都是升号。

sentences.en: Beethoven's "Moonlight Sonata" is written in C♯ minor (C sharp minor.)
sentences.zh: 贝多芬的《月光奏鸣曲》是用C♯小调（升C小调）写成的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“筛它”，筛东西易使其破碎
words.example_en: The earthquake caused the glass windows to shatter into pieces.
words.example_zh: 地震使玻璃窗碎成了一片片。
words.en_def: A fragment of anything shattered.

sentences.en: to break a glass into shatters
sentences.zh: 将玻璃打碎

sentences.en: The miners used dynamite to shatter rocks.
sentences.zh: 矿工们使用炸药来炸碎岩石。

sentences.en: to be shattered in intellect; to have shattered hopes, or a shattered constitution
sentences.zh: 智力崩溃； 希望破灭，或者宪法破灭

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“筛的”，像筛东西一样把不需要的脱落掉
words.example_en: Snakes shed their skin as they grow to a larger size.
words.example_zh: 蛇长大时会蜕皮。
words.en_def: To part, separate or divide.

sentences.en: A metal comb shed her golden hair.
sentences.zh: 一把金属梳子梳理着她金色的头发。

sentences.en: When we found the snake, it was in the process of shedding its skin.
sentences.zh: 当我们发现这条蛇时，它正在蜕皮。

sentences.en: A tarpaulin sheds water.
sentences.zh: 防水布会漏水。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“希尔”，可想象希尔这个人很纯粹
words.example_en: His success is due to sheer hard work and dedication.
words.example_zh: 他的成功完全归功于辛勤努力和全身心投入。
words.en_def: A sheer curtain or fabric.

sentences.en: Use sheers to maximize natural light.
sentences.zh: 使用透明纱最大限度地利用自然光。

sentences.en: Her light, sheer dress caught everyone’s attention.
sentences.zh: 她那轻薄透明的连衣裙引起了所有人的注意。

sentences.en: I think it is sheer genius to invent such a thing.
sentences.zh: 我认为发明这样的东西真是天才。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“使敌”，盾牌能使敌人难以靠近
words.example_en: The knight held up his shield to defend against the enemy's attacks.
words.example_zh: 骑士举起盾牌抵御敌人的攻击。
words.en_def: Anything that protects or defends; defense; shelter; protection.

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“使福特”，像使福特车移动一样
words.example_en: They decided to shift the meeting to a later time.
words.example_zh: 他们决定把会议推迟到更晚的时间。
words.en_def: A modifier key whose main function is shifting between two or more functions of any of certain other keys (usually by pressing Shift and the other button simultaneously).

sentences.en: Just last week she bought a new shift at the market.
sentences.zh: 就在上周，她在市场上买了一件新的衣服。

sentences.en: We'll work three shifts a day till the job's done.
sentences.zh: 我们每天三班倒，直到工作完成。

sentences.en: There was a shift in the political atmosphere.
sentences.zh: 政治气氛发生了变化。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“晒恩”，阳光照耀似在晒恩情
words.example_en: The sun will shine brightly after the storm passes.
words.example_zh: 暴风雨过后太阳会明亮地照耀。
words.en_def: Brightness from a source of light.

sentences.en: She's certainly taken a shine to you.
sentences.zh: 她肯定对你很感兴趣。

sentences.en: My nephew tried other sports before deciding on football, which he shone at right away, quickly becoming the star of his school team.
sentences.zh: 我的侄子在决定选择足球之前尝试过其他运动，他很快就在足球中表现出色，很快成为学校球队的明星。

sentences.en: I shone my light into the darkness to see what was making the noise.
sentences.zh: 我用手电筒照进黑暗，看看是什么发出了噪音。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: ship（船运）加 ing 表示航运这个行为
words.example_en: The shipping industry plays a crucial role in global trade.
words.example_zh: 航运业在全球贸易中起着至关重要的作用。
words.en_def: The transportation of goods.

sentences.en: The shipping' is included in the quoted price.
sentences.zh: 运费已包含在报价中。

sentences.en: to ship freight by railroad
sentences.zh: 通过铁路运送货物

sentences.en: Our next issue ships early next year.
sentences.zh: 我们的下一期将于明年初发行。

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“倏特”，射击速度倏忽特别快
words.example_en: The hunter aimed and prepared to shoot the deer.
words.example_zh: 猎人瞄准并准备射杀那只鹿。
words.en_def: The emerging stem and embryonic leaves of a new plant.

sentences.en: The land shoots into a promontory.
sentences.zh: 陆地伸向海角。

sentences.en: Didn't you have a concert tonight?
sentences.zh: 今晚没有音乐会吗？

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，常表动作或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 短处‘来’了就是缺点
words.example_en: Everyone has some shortcomings that need to be overcome.
words.example_zh: 每个人都有一些需要克服的缺点。
words.en_def: Deficiency

words.mnemonic_zh: 让‘短’变得更短
words.example_en: They decided to shorten the meeting due to time constraints.
words.example_zh: 由于时间限制，他们决定缩短会议时间。
words.en_def: To make shorter; to abbreviate.

sentences.en: to shorten an allowance of food
sentences.zh: 减少食物的摄入量

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像‘瘦’，展示身材
words.example_en: The graph shows the trend of economic development.
words.example_zh: 图表显示了经济发展的趋势。
words.en_def: A play, dance, or other entertainment.

sentences.en: art show;  dog show
sentences.zh: 艺术展； 狗展

sentences.en: radio show;  television show
sentences.zh: 广播节目； 电视节目

sentences.en: Let's catch a show.
sentences.zh: 我们来看一场表演吧

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘吮’，吸一下就缩小
words.example_en: This sweater will shrink if you wash it in hot water.
words.example_zh: 这件毛衣用热水洗会缩水。
words.en_def: Shrinkage; contraction; recoil.

sentences.en: My shrink said that he was an enabler, bad for me.
sentences.zh: 我的心理医生说他是一个推动者，对我不利。

sentences.en: The dryer shrank my sweater.
sentences.zh: 烘干机使我的毛衣缩水了。

sentences.en: This garment will shrink when wet.
sentences.zh: 这件衣服湿了就会缩水。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像‘刷个’，刷个肩就是耸肩
words.example_en: He shrugged his shoulders when he didn't know the answer.
words.example_zh: 他不知道答案时耸了耸肩。
words.en_def: A lifting of the shoulders to signal indifference or a casual lack of knowledge.

sentences.en: He dismissed my comment with a shrug.
sentences.zh: 他耸耸肩驳斥了我的评论。

sentences.en: I asked him for an answer and he just shrugged.
sentences.zh: 我问他答案，他只是耸耸肩。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘傻头’，傻头傻脑来回跑像班车
words.example_en: The shuttle runs between the airport and the city center regularly.
words.example_zh: 班车定期往返于机场和市中心之间。
words.en_def: The part of a loom that carries the woof back and forth between the warp threads.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表性质或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 害羞的状态就是羞怯
words.example_en: Her shyness prevented her from making new friends easily.
words.example_zh: 她的羞怯使她难以轻易交到新朋友。
words.en_def: The quality of being shy; a fear of social interactions.

sentences.en: His shyness kept him from asking her to the prom.
sentences.zh: 他的害羞使他没有邀请她参加舞会。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘赛’，比赛输了会叹气
words.example_en: He sighed deeply when he heard the bad news.
words.example_zh: 他听到这个坏消息时深深地叹了口气。
words.en_def: A deep, prolonged audible inhale and exhale of breath; as when fatigued, frustrated, grieved, or relieved; the act of sighing.

sentences.en: He sighed over the lost opportunity.
sentences.zh: 他为失去的机会而叹息。

sentences.en: He silently sighed for his lost youth.
sentences.zh: 他默默地为自己逝去的青春叹息。

sentences.en: She sighed a sigh that was nearly a groan.
sentences.zh: 她叹了口气，近乎呻吟。

words.mnemonic_zh: 有标记的地方有重要意义
words.example_en: The discovery has great significance for scientific research.
words.example_zh: 这一发现对科学研究有重大意义。
words.en_def: The extent to which something matters; importance

sentences.en: As a juror your opinion is of great significance for the outcome of the trial.
sentences.zh: 作为陪审员，您的意见对于审判结果具有重要意义。

sentences.en: the significance of a gesture
sentences.zh: 一个手势的意义

words.mnemonic_zh: 以相似的方式就是相似地
words.example_en: Similarly, other companies are also facing this problem.
words.example_zh: 同样地，其他公司也面临着这个问题。
words.en_def: (manner) In a like style or manner.

sentences.en: The sisters dressed similarly.
sentences.zh: 姐妹俩穿着相似。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 简单的事物具有简单性，-ity表性质
words.example_en: The simplicity of this design makes it very user - friendly.
words.example_zh: 这种设计的简易性使其非常便于用户使用。
words.en_def: The state or quality of being simple

words.mnemonic_zh: 让事物变得简单，就是简化，-ify表使动
words.example_en: We should simplify the process to save time and energy.
words.example_zh: 我们应该简化流程以节省时间和精力。
words.en_def: To make simpler, either by reducing in complexity, reducing to component parts, or making easier to understand.

words.mnemonic_zh: 让变得相似，就是模拟，-ate表动作
words.example_en: The software can simulate real - life situations for training.
words.example_zh: 该软件可以模拟现实生活场景用于训练。
words.en_def: To model, replicate, duplicate the behavior, appearance or properties of.

sentences.en: We will use a smoke machine to simulate the fog you will actually encounter.
sentences.zh: 我们将使用烟雾机来模拟您实际遇到的雾。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 模拟这个动作的结果就是模拟状态，-ation表行为结果
words.example_en: The flight simulation helps pilots gain more experience.
words.example_zh: 飞行模拟有助于飞行员获得更多经验。
words.en_def: Something that simulates a system or environment in order to predict actual behaviour.

sentences.en: The most reliable simulation predicts that the hurricane will turn north.
sentences.zh: 最可靠的模拟预测飓风将转向北方。

sentences.en: Despite extensive simulation in the design phase, the aircraft failed to behave as expected.
sentences.zh: 尽管在设计阶段进行了广泛的模拟，但飞机的表现却未能达到预期。

sentences.en: Some kids in the classroom will be playing simulations after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后，教室里的一些孩子会玩模拟游戏。

words.mnemonic_zh: 同时发生的状态，-aneous表……的
words.example_en: They had simultaneous meetings in different rooms.
words.example_zh: 他们在不同的房间同时举行会议。
words.en_def: Happening at the same moment.

words.mnemonic_zh: 在同时发生的状态下，就是同时地，-aneously表方式
words.example_en: The two teams scored goals simultaneously in the game.
words.example_zh: 在比赛中，两队同时进球。
words.en_def: Occurring at the same time.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“心”，心里有罪过
words.example_en: He confessed his sins to the priest.
words.example_zh: 他向牧师忏悔了自己的罪过。
words.en_def: A violation of God's will or religious law.

sentences.en: As a Christian, I think this is a sin against God.
sentences.zh: 作为一名基督徒，我认为这是对神的犯罪。

sentences.en: No movie is without sin.
sentences.zh: 没有一部电影是没有罪恶的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“心舍”，舍得付出真心，就是真诚的
words.example_en: She gave him a sincere smile.
words.example_zh: 她给了他一个真诚的微笑。
words.en_def: Genuine; meaning what one says or does; heartfelt.

sentences.en: I believe he is sincere in his offer to help.
sentences.zh: 我相信他是真诚地愿意提供帮助。

sentences.en: She gave it a sincere, if misguided effort.
sentences.zh: 她付出了真诚的努力，尽管这种努力被误导了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 真诚的状态下做事，就是真诚地，-ly表方式
words.example_en: He apologized sincerely for his mistake.
words.example_zh: 他为自己的错误真诚地道歉。
words.en_def: In a sincere or earnest manner; honestly.

sentences.en: I sincerely hope they make it home safely.
sentences.zh: 我衷心希望他们能够平安回家。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“吸”，小口吸就是抿着喝
words.example_zh: 她优雅地抿了一口茶。
words.example_en: She sipped her tea gracefully.
words.en_def: To ooze or pass slowly through pores or other small openings, and in overly small quantities; said of liquids, etc.

sentences.en: The water steadily seeped in through the thirl.
sentences.zh: 水不断地从水滴里渗进来。

sentences.en: Fear began to seep into the local community over the contamination of their fishpond.
sentences.zh: 对鱼塘污染的恐惧开始渗透到当地社区。

sentences.en: The resistance movement against the invaders had slowly  seeped away.
sentences.zh: 反抗侵略者的反抗运动已经慢慢消退。

words.mnemonic_zh: situ（位置）+ ated，处于某个位置
words.example_en: The town is situated near the river.
words.example_zh: 这个城镇位于河边。
words.en_def: To place on or into a physical location.

sentences.en: The statue is situated in a corner hardly visible to the public, except through a window from an outside maintenance area situated behind the building.
sentences.zh: 这座雕像位于一个角落，公众很难看到，除非通过位于建筑物后面的外部维护区域的窗户。

sentences.en: The mayor is situated between probable censure and possible recall.
sentences.zh: 市长处于可能受到谴责和可能被罢免之间。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“快描”，快速描绘草图
words.example_en: He made a sketch of the beautiful view.
words.example_zh: 他画了一幅美丽风景的草图。
words.en_def: A rapidly executed freehand drawing that is not intended as a finished work, often consisting of a multitude of overlapping lines.

sentences.en: to keep sketch
sentences.zh: 保留草图

sentences.en: I usually sketch with a pen rather than a pencil.
sentences.zh: 我通常用钢笔而不是铅笔素描。

sentences.en: He sketched the accident, sticking to the facts as they had happened.
sentences.zh: 他描述了事故的经过，坚持所发生的事实。

words.mnemonic_zh: skill（技能）+ ful，充满技能的
words.example_en: The skilful chef cooked a delicious meal.
words.example_zh: 这位技艺娴熟的厨师做了一顿美味的饭菜。
words.en_def: Possessing skill, skilled.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“速跳”，快速跳过
words.example_en: He decided to skip the boring part of the book.
words.example_zh: 他决定跳过书中无聊的部分。
words.en_def: A leaping, jumping or skipping movement.

sentences.en: She will skip from one end of the sidewalk to the other.
sentences.zh: 她会从人行道的一端跳到另一端。

sentences.en: The rock will skip across the pond.
sentences.zh: 石头会跳过池塘。

sentences.en: I bet I can skip this rock to the other side of the pond.
sentences.zh: 我打赌我可以跳过这块石头到池塘的另一边。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“死拦”，使劲阻拦时会猛击
words.example_en: He slammed the door in anger.
words.example_zh: 他生气地砰地关上了门。
words.en_def: A sudden impact or blow.

sentences.en: I don't mean this as a slam, but you can be really impatient sometimes.
sentences.zh: 我并不是说这是一个大满贯，但有时你可能会非常不耐烦。

sentences.en: Don't slam the door!
sentences.zh: 别关上门！

sentences.en: Don't slam that trunk down on the pavement!
sentences.zh: 别把树干摔在人行道上！

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“私朗”，私下里朗朗上口的话是俚语
words.example_en: Young people often use a lot of slang.
words.example_zh: 年轻人经常使用很多俚语。
words.en_def: Language outside of conventional usage and in the informal register.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“啪”，模拟掌击声
words.example_en: She slapped him across the face.
words.example_zh: 她打了他一耳光。
words.en_def: A blow, especially one given with the open hand, or with something broad and flat.

sentences.en: She slapped him in response to the insult.
sentences.zh: 她打了他一巴掌以回应这种侮辱。

sentences.en: He slapped the reins against the horse's back.
sentences.zh: 他把缰绳拍在马背上。

sentences.en: The rain slapped against the window-panes.
sentences.zh: 雨点拍打着窗玻璃。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“唰”，砍东西的声音
words.example_en: The company decided to slash its prices.
words.example_zh: 公司决定大幅降价。
words.en_def: A slashing action or motion, particularly:

sentences.en: Slash generated during logging may constitute a fire hazard.
sentences.zh: 伐木过程中产生的切痕可能会引发火灾。

sentences.en: The province's traditional slash-and-burn agriculture was only sustainable with a much smaller population.
sentences.zh: 该省传统的刀耕火种农业只有在人口少得多的情况下才能可持续。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表状态或行为
words.mnemonic_zh: slave（奴隶）+ ry，奴隶所处的制度
words.example_en: Slavery was abolished in many countries in the 19th century.
words.example_zh: 19 世纪许多国家废除了奴隶制。
words.en_def: An institution or social practice of owning human beings as property, especially for use as forced laborers.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有……的性质
words.mnemonic_zh: sleep（睡觉）+ y，有想睡觉的状态
words.example_en: The child felt sleepy after a long - day play.
words.example_zh: 孩子玩了一整天后感到很困。
words.en_def: The gum that builds up in the eye; sleep, gound.

sentences.en: a sleepy drink or potion
sentences.zh: 助眠饮料或药水

sentences.en: a sleepy English village
sentences.zh: 一个沉睡的英国村庄

words.mnemonic_zh: 滑（slip）的特性，所以是滑溜溜的（slippery）
words.example_en: Be careful on the slippery road in winter.
words.example_zh: 冬天在滑的路上要小心。
words.en_def: Of a surface, having low friction, often due to being covered in a non-viscous liquid, and therefore hard to grip, hard to stand on without falling, etc.

sentences.en: Oily substances render things slippery.
sentences.zh: 油性物质使物体变得光滑。

sentences.en: a slippery person
sentences.zh: 一个滑溜的人

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“死咯喊”，死劲喊的就是口号
words.example_en: The company came up with a catchy slogan.
words.example_zh: 公司想出了一个朗朗上口的口号。
words.en_def: A catch phrase associated with the product or service being advertised.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“死咯特”，东西死死卡在特定的插槽里
words.example_en: Put the coin into the slot to use the machine.
words.example_zh: 把硬币放进插槽里来使用这台机器。
words.en_def: A broad, flat, wooden bar, a slat, especially as used to secure a door, window, etc.

sentences.en: to slot a door
sentences.zh: 给门开槽

sentences.en: The game offers four save slots.
sentences.zh: 游戏提供四个保存槽。

sentences.en: I walked past the poker tables and went straight to the slots.
sentences.zh: 我走过扑克桌，径直走向老虎机。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“时髦的”，时髦的人通常很聪明
words.example_en: The smart boy solved the difficult problem quickly.
words.example_zh: 那个聪明的男孩很快就解决了难题。
words.en_def: To hurt or sting.

sentences.en: After being hit with a pitch, the batter exclaimed "Ouch, my arm smarts!"
sentences.zh: 击球手被球击中后惊呼“哎呀，我的手臂受伤了！”

sentences.en: smart bomb
sentences.zh: 智能炸弹

sentences.en: You look smart in that business suit.
sentences.zh: 你穿那套西装看起来很聪明。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“死骂是”，生气到猛击东西还死骂
words.example_en: He tried to smash the window with a hammer.
words.example_zh: 他试图用锤子砸破窗户。
words.en_def: The sound of a violent impact; a violent striking together.

sentences.en: I could hear the screech of the brakes, then the horrible smash of cars colliding.
sentences.zh: 我能听到刹车的刺耳声，然后是汽车相撞的可怕撞击声。

sentences.en: The driver and two passengers were badly injured in the smash.
sentences.zh: 司机和两名乘客在车祸中受重伤。

sentences.en: This new show is sure to be a smash.
sentences.zh: 这部新剧注定会大受欢迎。

words.mnemonic_zh: 它是smoke和fog的合成，像烟又像雾的就是烟雾
words.example_en: The city is often covered by thick smog in winter.
words.example_zh: 这座城市冬天经常被浓雾笼罩。
words.morph_note: 该词为合成词，由smoke和fog缩合而成
words.en_def: A noxious mixture of particulates and gases that is the result of urban air pollution.

sentences.en: If the car is more than five years old, you'll have to have it smogged before you can register it.
sentences.zh: 如果汽车的车龄超过五年，您必须先对其进行烟雾处理，然后才能注册。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“死木”，打磨光滑的死木表面很光滑
words.example_en: The marble floor feels very smooth.
words.example_zh: 大理石地面摸起来很光滑。
words.en_def: Something that is smooth, or that goes smoothly and easily.

sentences.en: to smooth a person's temper
sentences.zh: 缓和一个人的脾气

sentences.en: Can I smooth your cat?
sentences.zh: 我可以抚平你的猫吗？

sentences.en: We hope for a smooth transition to the new system.
sentences.zh: 我们希望能够顺利过渡到新系统。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“是马苟”，像是偷偷摸摸骑马苟着走私
words.example_en: They were arrested for trying to smuggle drugs.
words.example_zh: 他们因企图走私毒品而被捕。
words.en_def: To import or export, illicitly or by stealth, without paying lawful customs charges or duties

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“死nap（打盹）”，劳累到突然折断的状态
words.example_en: The branch snapped under the heavy snow.
words.example_zh: 树枝在大雪的重压下突然折断了。
words.en_def: A quick breaking or cracking sound or the action of producing such a sound.

sentences.en: We took a few snaps of the old church before moving on.
sentences.zh: 在继续前进之前，我们拍了几张老教堂的照片。

sentences.en: a ginger snap
sentences.zh: 姜片

sentences.en: I can fix most vacuum cleaners in a snap.
sentences.zh: 我可以瞬间修好大多数吸尘器。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“嗖可”，水嗖一下就可以让东西湿透
words.example_en: Soak the clothes in warm water before washing.
words.example_zh: 洗衣服前先把衣服浸泡在温水中。
words.en_def: An immersion in water etc.

sentences.en: After the strenuous climb, I had a nice long soak in a bath.
sentences.zh: 经过艰苦的攀登后，我在浴缸里泡了很长一段时间。

sentences.en: I'm going to soak in the bath for a couple of hours.
sentences.zh: 我要在浴缸里泡几个小时。

sentences.en: Soak the beans overnight before cooking.
sentences.zh: 烹饪前将豆子浸泡过夜。

words.mnemonic_zh: some（一些）+ what（什么），表示程度有点
words.example_en: The task is somewhat difficult to complete within a day.
words.example_zh: 这项任务在一天内完成有点困难。
words.en_def: More or less; a certain quantity or degree; a part, more or less; something.

sentences.en: The crowd was somewhat larger than expected, perhaps due to the good weather.
sentences.zh: 可能是因为天气好的原因，人潮比想象的要多一些。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“桑的”，想象桑叶被风吹动的声音
words.example_en: The sound of waves soothes people's hearts.
words.example_zh: 海浪的声音抚慰着人们的心灵。
words.en_def: Healthy.

sentences.en: He was safe and sound.
sentences.zh: 他安然无恙。

sentences.en: Fred assured me the floorboards were sound.
sentences.zh: 弗雷德向我保证地板是完好的。

sentences.en: "How are you?" - "I'm sound."
sentences.zh: “你好吗？” - “我很健康。”

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“馊死”，坏东西的来源让人感觉馊
words.example_en: We need to find the source of this problem.
words.example_zh: 我们需要找到这个问题的根源。
words.en_def: The person, place or thing from which something (information, goods, etc.) comes or is acquired.

sentences.en: The accused refused to reveal the source of the illegal drugs she was selling.
sentences.zh: 被告拒绝透露她所销售的非法毒品的来源。

sentences.en: The main sources of the Euphrates River are the Karasu and Murat Rivers.
sentences.zh: 幼发拉底河的主要源头是卡拉苏河和穆拉特河。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: sover（超）+ eign（统治）+ ty，至高统治即主权
words.example_en: Every country has the right to protect its sovereignty.
words.example_zh: 每个国家都有权保护自己的主权。
words.en_def: (of a polity) The state of making laws and controlling resources without the coercion of other nations.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“嗖”，种子嗖地播出去
words.example_en: Farmers sow seeds in spring for a good harvest.
words.example_zh: 农民们在春天播种以获得好收成。
words.en_def: A female pig.

sentences.en: As you sow, so shall you reap.
sentences.zh: 当你播种时，你就会收获。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“搜呀”，搜呀搜找到大豆
words.example_en: Soya is widely used in the food industry.
words.example_zh: 大豆在食品工业中被广泛使用。
words.en_def: A common East Asian liquid sauce, made by subjecting boiled beans to long fermentation and then long digestion in salt and water.

sentences.en: I like a little soy with my rice.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在米饭中加一点酱油。

sentences.en: The soy crop is looking good this year.
sentences.zh: 今年大豆收成看起来不错。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: spac（空间）+ ious，有很多空间就是宽敞的
words.example_en: They live in a spacious house with a big garden.
words.example_zh: 他们住在一座带有大花园的宽敞房子里。
words.en_def: Having plenty of space; roomy.

sentences.en: The apartment has a spacious bedroom.
sentences.zh: 公寓设有宽敞的卧室。

sentences.en: The cabin offers a lovely spacious view of the mountain meadows.
sentences.zh: 小屋享有宽敞的山地草甸景色。

words.cn_def: 垃圾邮件；大量无用信息
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“死胖”，垃圾邮件像胖子一样讨人厌
words.example_en: Many people are troubled by spam emails every day.
words.example_zh: 很多人每天都被垃圾邮件所困扰。
words.en_def: (rarely countable) Unsolicited bulk electronic messages.

sentences.en: I get far too much spam.
sentences.zh: 我收到太多垃圾邮件。

sentences.en: Stop spamming that special attack!
sentences.zh: 停止发送垃圾邮件该特殊攻击！

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“四盼”，盼了四个阶段，跨度很长
words.example_en: The bridge has a long span over the river.
words.example_zh: 这座桥在河上有很长的跨度。
words.en_def: The space from the thumb to the end of the little finger when extended; nine inches; an eighth of a fathom.

sentences.en: He has a short attention span and gets bored within minutes.
sentences.zh: 他的注意力持续时间很短，几分钟之内就会感到无聊。

sentences.en: The suspension bridge spanned the canyon.
sentences.zh: 吊桥横跨峡谷。

sentences.en: The novel spans three centuries.
sentences.zh: 这部小说跨越了三个世纪。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“思辨”，思辨后留下备用的
words.example_en: Keep a spare key in case you lose yours.
words.example_zh: 留一把备用钥匙，以防你把自己的弄丢。
words.en_def: The act of sparing; moderation; restraint.

sentences.en: a spare diet
sentences.zh: 节食

sentences.en: I have no spare time.
sentences.zh: 我没有空闲时间。

sentences.en: a spare anchor; a spare bed or room
sentences.zh: 备用锚； 一张空床或房间

words.mnemonic_zh: 音似“啪”，像火花发出的声响
words.example_en: A single spark can start a prairie fire.
words.example_zh: 星星之火，可以燎原。
words.en_def: A small particle of glowing matter, either molten or on fire.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有……特征
words.mnemonic_zh: spark（火花）加上后缀，像火花般闪耀
words.example_en: The diamond ring looks sparkling in the sunlight.
words.example_zh: 这枚钻戒在阳光下闪闪发光。
words.en_def: To emit sparks; to throw off ignited or incandescent particles

sentences.en: The wood was sparkling in the bonfire.
sentences.zh: 木头在篝火中闪闪发光。

sentences.en: The stars sparkle in the sky.
sentences.zh: 星星在天空中闪闪发光。

sentences.en: sparkling water
sentences.zh: 汽水

words.mnemonic_zh: special（特殊的）加上后缀，代表特殊之处
words.example_en: Italian pizza is a speciality in this restaurant.
words.example_zh: 意大利披萨是这家餐厅的特色。
words.en_def: That in which one specializes; a chosen expertise or talent.

sentences.en: They cook well overall, but their true specialty is pasta.
sentences.zh: 他们总体上煮得很好，但他们真正的特色是面食。

words.suffix_cn: 动词过去式后缀，表使……化
words.mnemonic_zh: special（特殊的）加上后缀，变得专业化
words.example_en: This hospital has many specialized departments.
words.example_zh: 这家医院有很多专科科室。
words.en_def: To make distinct or separate, particularly:

words.mnemonic_zh: spec（看）加上后缀，看得很明确
words.example_en: You need to provide specific details about the plan.
words.example_zh: 你需要提供该计划的具体细节。
words.en_def: A distinguishing attribute or quality.

sentences.en: a highly specific test, specific and nonspecific symptoms
sentences.zh: 高度特异性的测试、特异性和非特异性症状

sentences.en: Quinine is a specific medicine in cases of malaria.
sentences.zh: 奎宁是治疗疟疾的特效药。

words.mnemonic_zh: specify（明确说明）加上后缀，形成说明文件
words.example_en: Please follow the specifications when using this machine.
words.example_zh: 使用这台机器时请遵循说明书。
words.en_def: An explicit set of requirements to be satisfied by a material, product, or service.

words.mnemonic_zh: spec（看）加上后缀，供人看的样本
words.example_en: The biologist examined the specimen under the microscope.
words.example_zh: 生物学家在显微镜下检查标本。
words.en_def: An individual instance that represents a class; an example.

sentences.en: early specimens of the art of Picasso
sentences.zh: 毕加索艺术的早期标本

words.mnemonic_zh: spect（看）加上后缀，值得一看的场面
words.example_en: The fireworks display was a really amazing spectacle.
words.example_zh: 烟花表演真是一场令人惊叹的奇观。
words.en_def: An exciting or extraordinary scene, exhibition, performance etc.

sentences.en: The horse race was a thrilling spectacle.
sentences.zh: 赛马真是一场惊心动魄的盛会。

sentences.en: He made a spectacle out of himself.
sentences.zh: 他创造了一场奇观。

words.mnemonic_zh: spect（看）加上后缀，能看到的光的范围
words.example_en: The visible spectrum includes various colors.
words.example_zh: 可见光谱包括各种颜色。
words.en_def: A range; a continuous, infinite, one-dimensional set, possibly bounded by extremes.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“四排了”，四个字母排好了就是拼写
words.example_en: Can you spell your name for me?
words.example_zh: 你能为我拼一下你的名字吗？
words.en_def: Words or a formula supposed to have magical powers.

sentences.en: He cast a spell to cure warts.
sentences.zh: 他施了一个咒语来治愈疣。

sentences.en: under a spell
sentences.zh: 下咒语

sentences.en: I find it difficult to spell because I'm dyslexic.
sentences.zh: 我发现拼写很困难，因为我有诵读困难。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“似球儿”，联想成球体。
words.example_en: The earth is often considered as a sphere in many scientific models.
words.example_zh: 在许多科学模型中，地球常被视为一个球体。
words.en_def: A regular three-dimensional object in which every cross-section is a circle; the figure described by the revolution of a circle about its diameter .

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“私奔”，私奔时心像在旋转。
words.example_en: The dancer can spin gracefully on the stage.
words.example_zh: 舞者能在舞台上优雅地旋转。
words.en_def: Rapid circular motion.

sentences.en: He put some spin on the cue ball.
sentences.zh: 他使母球产生了一些旋转。

sentences.en: The politician was mocked in the press for his reliance on spin rather than facts.
sentences.zh: 这位政治家因依赖谎言而非事实而受到媒体嘲笑。

sentences.en: I'm off out for a spin in my new sports car.
sentences.zh: 我要开着我的新跑车出去兜风。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“死掰”，死掰脊柱很危险。
words.example_en: He injured his spine in a car accident.
words.example_zh: 他在一场车祸中伤到了脊柱。
words.en_def: The series of bones situated at the back from the head to the pelvis of a person, or from the head to the tail of an animal; backbone, vertebral column.

words.cn_def: 聚光灯；公众注意的中心
words.mnemonic_zh: spot（地点）+ light（光），照在特定地点的光即聚光灯。
words.example_en: The new policy has been put in the spotlight recently.
words.example_zh: 最近这项新政策成为了公众关注的焦点。
words.en_def: A bright, directional light or lamp, especially one used to illuminate the focus or center of attention on a stage.

sentences.en: Some people enjoy the spotlight.
sentences.zh: 有些人喜欢成为众人瞩目的焦点。

sentences.en: We spotlight the star, but the supporting cast has all the great lines in this scene.
sentences.zh: 我们聚焦于明星，但配角们拥有这个场景中所有精彩的台词。

sentences.en: The news series served to spotlight corruption.
sentences.zh: 该系列新闻旨在关注腐败问题。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“厮抱死”，配偶要厮守一生。
words.example_en: His spouse is very supportive of his career.
words.example_zh: 他的配偶非常支持他的事业。
words.en_def: A person in a marriage or marital relationship.

sentences.en: People should treat their spouses with respect.
sentences.zh: 人们应该尊重自己的配偶。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“暗自瞟”，间谍常暗自瞟人。
words.example_en: The spy managed to get important secrets.
words.example_zh: 这名间谍设法获取了重要机密。
words.en_def: A person who secretly watches and examines the actions of other individuals or organizations and gathers information on them (usually to gain an advantage).

sentences.en: During the Cold War, Russia and America would each spy on each other for recon.
sentences.zh: 冷战期间，俄罗斯和美国会互相监视对方进行侦察。

sentences.en: I think I can spy that hot guy coming over here.
sentences.zh: 我想我能发现那个帅哥朝这边过来。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“死瓜的”，小队成员要紧密团结像绑在一起的瓜。
words.example_en: A squad of police officers arrived at the scene quickly.
words.example_zh: 一队警察迅速赶到了现场。
words.en_def: A group of people organized for some common purpose, usually of about ten members.

sentences.en: We squad on the fifth of the month.
sentences.zh: 我们这个月五号就组队。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“死鬼子”，想象死鬼子在挤压东西。
words.example_en: She can squeeze the juice out of an orange easily.
words.example_zh: 她能轻松地把橙子里的汁挤出来。
words.en_def: A close or tight fit.

sentences.en: I'm in a tight squeeze right now when it comes to my free time.
sentences.zh: 我现在的空闲时间很紧张。

sentences.en: a gentle squeeze on the arm
sentences.zh: 轻轻挤压手臂

sentences.en: I want to be your main squeeze.
sentences.zh: 我想成为你的主要挤压者。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“死她”，想象用刺的动作来“死她”。
words.example_en: The villain tried to stab the hero with a knife.
words.example_zh: 反派试图用刀刺男主角。
words.en_def: An act of stabbing or thrusting with an object.

sentences.en: a horn stab
sentences.zh: 角刺

sentences.en: If you stab him in the heart he won't live long enough to retaliate.
sentences.zh: 如果你刺伤他的心脏，他就活不了多久来报复。

sentences.en: to stab a dagger into a person
sentences.zh: 用匕首刺入某人

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: stabil（稳定）+ ity（表性质），即稳定性。
words.example_en: The country needs economic stability to develop.
words.example_zh: 国家需要经济稳定才能发展。
words.en_def: The condition of being stable or in equilibrium, and thus resistant to change.

words.mnemonic_zh: 词根稳定，加后缀变成使稳定的动作
words.example_en: The government took measures to stabilize the economy.
words.example_zh: 政府采取措施来稳定经济。
words.en_def: To make stable.

sentences.en: Jody stabilized the table by putting a book under the short leg.
sentences.zh: 乔迪把一本书放在短腿下面，稳定了桌子。

sentences.en: The country will stabilize after the next election ends.
sentences.zh: 下次选举结束后，国家将稳定下来。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“似长棍”，像长长的桩子
words.example_en: He has a big stake in the company.
words.example_zh: 他在这家公司有很大的股份。
words.en_def: A piece of wood or other material, usually long and slender, pointed at one end so as to be easily driven into the ground as a marker or a support or stay.

sentences.en: We have surveyor's stakes at all four corners of this field, to mark exactly its borders.
sentences.zh: 我们在这块场地的四个角都设有测量桩，以准确标记其边界。

sentences.en: Thomas Cranmer was burnt at the stake.
sentences.zh: 托马斯·克兰麦被烧死在火刑柱上。

sentences.en: The owners let the managers eventually earn a stake in the business.
sentences.zh: 所有者最终让经理们获得企业的股份。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 站着的状态引申为地位等
words.example_en: He has high standing in the academic community.
words.example_zh: 他在学术界有很高的地位。
words.en_def: (heading) To position or be positioned physically.

sentences.en: standing ovation
sentences.zh: 起立鼓掌

sentences.en: standing committee
sentences.zh: 常务委员会

sentences.en: standing water
sentences.zh: 积水

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“死塔克”，联想荒凉之地孤身一人
words.example_en: The stark reality made him realize his mistake.
words.example_zh: 严峻的现实让他意识到自己的错误。
words.en_def: Hard, firm; obdurate.

sentences.en: I picked my way forlornly through the stark, sharp rocks.
sentences.zh: 我在荒凉、锋利的岩石中孤独地选择了一条路。

sentences.en: A flower was growing, in stark contrast, out of the sidewalk.
sentences.zh: 与此形成鲜明对比的是，人行道上长出了一朵花。

sentences.en: He's gone stark, staring mad.
sentences.zh: 他表情严肃，怒目而视。

words.mnemonic_zh: 词根统计，后缀表相关，就是统计的
words.example_en: Statistical data shows a growing trend.
words.example_zh: 统计数据显示出一种增长趋势。
words.en_def: Of or pertaining to statistics.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“使舵”，就是把控舵来驾驶
words.example_en: He can steer the ship through the storm.
words.example_zh: 他能驾驶船只穿过风暴。
words.en_def: A suggestion about a course of action.

sentences.en: I steered homeward.
sentences.zh: 我开着车回家。

sentences.en: I find it very difficult to steer a skateboard.
sentences.zh: 我发现驾驶滑板非常困难。

sentences.en: The boat steers easily.
sentences.zh: 船很容易操纵。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“似藤”，植物的茎像藤
words.example_en: The stem of the tree is very thick.
words.example_zh: 这棵树的树干很粗。
words.en_def: The stock of a family; a race or generation of progenitors.

sentences.en: the stem of an apple or a cherry
sentences.zh: 苹果或樱桃的茎

sentences.en: to stem cherries; to stem tobacco leaves
sentences.zh: 给樱桃去梗； 去茎烟叶

sentences.en: The current crisis stems from the short-sighted politics of the previous government.
sentences.zh: 当前的危机源于上届政府的短视政治。

words.mnemonic_zh: 固定的立体类型就是刻板印象
words.example_en: We should break the stereotypes about different cultures.
words.example_zh: 我们应该打破对不同文化的刻板印象。
words.en_def: A conventional, formulaic, and often oversimplified or exaggerated conception, opinion, or image of (a person).

sentences.en: to stereotype the Bible
sentences.zh: 把圣经定型

words.mnemonic_zh: 词根刺激，加后缀成刺激物
words.example_en: The promise of a bonus was a great stimulus.
words.example_zh: 奖金的承诺是一个很大的激励因素。
words.en_def: Any external phenomenon that has an influence on a system, by triggering or modifying an internal phenomenon.

sentences.en: an economic stimulus
sentences.zh: 经济刺激

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“使动”，就是让动起来
words.example_en: The speech stirred the audience's emotions.
words.example_zh: 演讲激起了观众的情绪。
words.en_def: The act or result of stirring (moving around the particles of a liquid etc.)

sentences.en: Can you give the soup a little stir?
sentences.zh: 你能稍微搅拌一下汤吗？

sentences.en: She stirred the pudding with a spoon.
sentences.zh: 她用勺子搅拌布丁。

sentences.en: Would you please stand here and stir this pot so that the chocolate doesn't burn?
sentences.zh: 请你站在这里搅拌一下这个锅，这样巧克力就不会烧焦吗？

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: store（存）加上 -age，表存储的行为
words.example_en: The storage of goods in this warehouse is well - organized.
words.example_zh: 这个仓库里货物的存储安排得井井有条。
words.en_def: The act of storing goods; the state of being stored.

sentences.en: There's a lot of storage space in the loft.
sentences.zh: 阁楼里有很多存储空间。

sentences.en: I′d recommend backing up these files to storage before reinstalling the operating system.
sentences.zh: 我建议在重新安装操作系统之前将这些文件备份到存储中。

words.mnemonic_zh: 直着向前走，不绕弯，即直截了当
words.example_en: He gave a straightforward answer to the difficult question.
words.example_zh: 他对那个难题给出了一个直截了当的答案。
words.en_def: Proceeding in a straight course or manner; not deviating.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“使劲”，联想使劲拉紧
words.example_en: Don't strain your eyes by reading in dim light.
words.example_zh: 不要在昏暗的光线下看书，以免损伤眼睛。
words.en_def: Treasure.

sentences.en: There is a strain of madness in her family.
sentences.zh: 她的家庭里有一种疯狂的气氛。

sentences.en: They say this year's flu virus is a particularly virulent strain.
sentences.zh: 他们说，今年的流感病毒是一种毒性特别强的毒株。

sentences.en: he jumped up with a strain;   the strain upon the sailboat's rigging
sentences.zh: 他用力跳了起来。 帆船索具上的压力

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“丝线”，可联想成一缕丝线
words.example_en: She found a strand of hair on her coat.
words.example_zh: 她在自己的外套上发现了一缕头发。
words.en_def: The shore or beach of the sea or ocean; shore; beach.

sentences.en: Grand Strand
sentences.zh: 格兰德斯特兰德

sentences.en: Jones pops up; that's going to strand a pair.
sentences.zh: 琼斯突然出现； 这会让一对搁浅。

sentences.en: strand of hair.
sentences.zh: 一缕头发。

words.mnemonic_zh: strategy（战略）加 -ic 变成战略的
words.example_en: This is a strategic location for the military.
words.example_zh: 这是一个军事战略要地。
words.en_def: Of or pertaining to strategy

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表主动、特征
words.mnemonic_zh: strike（打动）加 -ing，能打动人的就是引人注目的
words.example_en: There is a striking difference between the two paintings.
words.example_zh: 这两幅画之间有显著的差异。
words.en_def: (sometimes with out or through) To delete or cross out; to scratch or eliminate.

sentences.en: Please strike the last sentence.
sentences.zh: 请删除最后一句。

sentences.en: A tree strikes its roots deep.
sentences.zh: 一棵树的根扎得很深。

sentences.en: They struck off along the river.
sentences.zh: 他们沿着河出发了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“撕去”，可联想剥去的动作
words.example_en: They stripped the old paint off the wall.
words.example_zh: 他们把旧漆从墙上剥了下来。
words.en_def: A long, thin piece of land; any long, thin area.

sentences.en: The countries were in dispute over the ownership of a strip of desert about 100 metres wide.
sentences.zh: 两国对一片宽约100米的沙漠地带的归属存在争议。

sentences.en: I have some strip left over after fitting out the kitchen.
sentences.zh: 装修厨房后我还剩下一些带子。

sentences.en: She stood up on the table and did a strip.
sentences.zh: 她站在桌子上，脱衣舞。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“死抓”，拼命抓住目标，即努力奋斗
words.example_en: He strives to achieve his long - term goal.
words.example_zh: 他努力实现自己的长期目标。
words.en_def: Striving; earnest endeavor; hard work.

words.mnemonic_zh: structure（结构）加 -al 变成结构上的
words.example_en: The building has some structural problems.
words.example_zh: 这座建筑存在一些结构上的问题。
words.en_def: Structural steel, used in construction.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“斯当波”，好像被东西挡住，易绊倒
words.example_en: He stumbled over a stone on the path.
words.example_zh: 他在小路上被一块石头绊倒了。
words.en_def: A fall, trip or substantial misstep.

sentences.en: He stumbled over a rock.
sentences.zh: 他被一块石头绊倒了。

sentences.en: I always stumble over verbs in Spanish.
sentences.zh: 我总是被西班牙语的动词绊倒。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘死等’，等得人震惊发呆
words.example_en: The sudden news stunned the whole family into silence.
words.example_zh: 突然传来的消息让全家人震惊得沉默不语。
words.en_def: The condition of being stunned.

sentences.en: Williams will need a lot of stun to avoid going in the middle pocket
sentences.zh: 威廉姆斯需要大量击晕才能避免进入中袋

sentences.en: Bill tried to stun the snake by striking it on the head.
sentences.zh: 比尔试图通过击打蛇的头部来击晕它。

sentences.en: He stood there stunned, looking at the beautiful, breath-taking sunrise.
sentences.zh: 他站在那里，看着美丽的、令人叹为观止的日出。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作、行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: sub（向下）把东西 miss（送）出去，即提交
words.example_en: The submission of the report is due next week.
words.example_zh: 报告的提交截止时间是下周。
words.en_def: The act of submitting or yielding; surrender.

sentences.en: Any submissions received after Friday will have marks deducted for lateness.
sentences.zh: 周五之后收到的任何提交都将因迟到而被扣分。

words.mnemonic_zh: sub（下方）scrib（写）者，在下面签字订阅的人
words.example_en: The magazine has gained many new subscribers this year.
words.example_zh: 这本杂志今年获得了很多新订阅者。
words.en_def: A person who subscribes to a publication or a service

sentences.en: Our magazine has over ten thousand subscribers.
sentences.zh: 我们的杂志有超过一万名订阅者。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: sub（下方）scrib（写）的行为，即签字订阅
words.example_en: He cancelled his subscription to the newspaper last month.
words.example_zh: 他上个月取消了报纸的订阅。
words.en_def: Access to a resource for a period of time, generally for payment.

sentences.en: I have a monthly subscription to the Daily Telegraph newspaper.
sentences.zh: 我每月订阅《每日电讯报》。

words.mnemonic_zh: sub（下面）sid（支持），从下面给予支持的钱即补贴
words.example_en: The government provides a subsidy for farmers to grow crops.
words.example_zh: 政府为农民种植农作物提供补贴。
words.en_def: Financial support or assistance, such as a grant.

sentences.en: Manufacturing firms are supported by government subsidies in some countries.
sentences.zh: 在一些国家，制造企业得到政府补贴的支持。

words.mnemonic_zh: sub（下面）stant（站立），下面有支撑，量很大很实质
words.example_en: They made substantial progress in the research project.
words.example_zh: 他们在研究项目中取得了重大进展。
words.en_def: Anything having substance; an essential part.

sentences.en: substantial life
sentences.zh: 充实的生活

sentences.en: a substantial fence or wall
sentences.zh: 坚固的栅栏或墙壁

sentences.en: a substantial freeholder
sentences.zh: 大量自由持有者

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词变来
words.mnemonic_zh: 由 substantial 变来，表状态程度
words.example_en: The price has decreased substantially this year.
words.example_zh: 今年价格大幅下降。
words.en_def: In a strong substantial manner; considerably.

words.mnemonic_zh: sub（下面）stit（放置），把下面的放上来替换
words.example_en: You can substitute honey for sugar in this recipe.
words.example_zh: 在这个食谱里，你可以用蜂蜜代替糖。
words.en_def: A replacement or stand-in for something that achieves a similar result or purpose.

sentences.en: I had no shallots so I substituted onion.
sentences.zh: 我没有青葱，所以我用洋葱代替。

sentences.en: I had to substitute new parts for the old ones.
sentences.zh: 我不得不用新零件替换旧零件。

sentences.en: I had to substitute old parts with the new ones.
sentences.zh: 我不得不用新零件替换旧零件。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 由 substitute 变来，表替换行为
words.example_en: The substitution of old equipment is necessary.
words.example_zh: 更换旧设备是必要的。
words.en_def: The act of substituting or the state of being substituted.

words.mnemonic_zh: sub （下面），藏在下面不易发现的即微妙的
words.example_en: There is a subtle difference between the two designs.
words.example_zh: 这两种设计之间有细微的差别。
words.morph_note: 该词拆分可能不符合严格词源学，但利于记忆
words.en_def: Hard to grasp; not obvious or easily understood; barely noticeable.

sentences.en: The difference is subtle, but you can hear it if you listen carefully.
sentences.zh: 差别很细微，但只要仔细听就能听出来。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示属于……的
words.mnemonic_zh: sub（靠近）+ urb（城市）+ an，靠近城市的地方即郊区
words.example_en: Many people prefer to live in suburban areas for a quieter life.
words.example_zh: 许多人更喜欢住在郊区，以享受更宁静的生活。
words.en_def: A person who lives in a suburb.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: suc（随后）+ cess（走）+ ion，随后不断走来，即一连串
words.example_en: A succession of rainy days spoiled our holiday plans.
words.example_zh: 一连串的雨天破坏了我们的假期计划。
words.en_def: An act of following in sequence.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: suc（随后）+ cess（走）+ ive，随后不断走，即连续的
words.example_en: He won three successive championships in the competition.
words.example_zh: 他在比赛中连续三次获得冠军。
words.en_def: Coming one after the other in a series.

sentences.en: They had won the title for five successive years.
sentences.zh: 他们已经连续五年获得冠军。

sentences.en: a successive title; a successive empire
sentences.zh: 连续的头衔； 连续的帝国

words.mnemonic_zh: suc（随后）+ cess（走）+ or，随后走来接替的人，即继任者
words.example_zh: 公司正在寻找这位退休经理的继任者。
words.example_en: The company is looking for a successor to the retiring manager.
words.en_def: A person or thing that immediately follows another in holding an office or title.

sentences.en: George W. Bush was successor to Bill Clinton as President of the US.
sentences.zh: 乔治·W·布什是比尔·克林顿的继任者，成为美国总统。

sentences.en: A limit ordinal is not the successor of any ordinal.
sentences.zh: 极限序数不是任何序数的后继。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“萨克”，像吸东西时的声音
words.example_en: The baby can suck milk from the bottle easily.
words.example_zh: 婴儿可以很容易地从奶瓶里吸奶。
words.en_def: An instance of drawing something into one's mouth by inhaling.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“诉”，起诉就是去诉说
words.example_en: He decided to sue the company for unfair dismissal.
words.example_zh: 他决定起诉公司，因其不公平解雇。
words.en_def: To file a legal action against someone, generally a non-criminal action.

sentences.en: to sue a ship
sentences.zh: 起诉一艘船

words.mnemonic_zh: sui（自己）+ cid（杀），自己杀自己即自杀
words.example_en: The high - pressure job may lead some people to consider suicide.
words.example_zh: 高压工作可能会让一些人考虑自杀。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“随特”，特别适合一起使用的一套房间
words.example_en: The hotel offers a luxurious suite with a sea view.
words.example_zh: 酒店提供一间带海景的豪华套间。
words.en_def: A retinue or company of attendants, as of a distinguished personage

sentences.en: the ambassador's suite
sentences.zh: 大使套房

sentences.en: a suite of minerals
sentences.zh: 一套矿物质

sentences.en: The Presidential suite is well appointed and allows for good security.
sentences.zh: 总统套房设备齐全，安全性良好。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“萨米特”，到达山顶就像到达特别的“米特”之地
words.example_en: Leaders from different countries attended the summit to discuss global issues.
words.example_zh: 来自不同国家的领导人参加峰会讨论全球问题。
words.en_def: A peak; the topmost point or surface, as of a mountain.

sentences.en: In summer, it is possible to hike to the summit of Mount Shasta.
sentences.zh: 夏季，可以徒步前往沙斯塔山的山顶。

sentences.en: They met for an international summit on environmental issues.
sentences.zh: 他们举行了一次有关环境问题的国际峰会。

sentences.en: I need to get summit to eat.
sentences.zh: 我需要去山顶吃饭。

words.root_cn: 可能来自拉丁语词根，表好
words.mnemonic_zh: super（超级）+ b，超级好就是极好的
words.example_en: The chef prepared a superb meal for the guests.
words.example_zh: 厨师为客人们准备了一顿美味佳肴。
words.morph_note: 词根部分较难追溯，这里采用常见教学简化拆解
words.en_def: First-rate; of the highest quality; exceptionally good.

sentences.en: This champagne is superb.
sentences.zh: 这香槟棒极了。

sentences.en: a superb edifice;  a superb colonnade
sentences.zh: 一座宏伟的建筑； 华丽的柱廊

words.mnemonic_zh: super（超）的就是优越的
words.example_en: This product is superior to others in quality.
words.example_zh: 这款产品在质量上比其他的更优越。
words.en_def: A person of higher rank or quality.

sentences.en: Rebecca had always thought shorts were far superior to pants, as they didn't constantly make her legs itch.
sentences.zh: 丽贝卡一直认为短裤比裤子优越得多，因为它们不会经常让她的腿发痒。

sentences.en: A genus is superior to a species.
sentences.zh: 属优于种。

sentences.en: the superior jaw; the superior part of an image
sentences.zh: 上颌； 图像的上部

words.mnemonic_zh: 在上面看着，即监督
words.example_en: The manager will supervise the project progress.
words.example_zh: 经理将监督项目的进展。
words.en_def: To oversee or direct a task or organization.

sentences.en: Without someone to supervise them, the group will lack direction.
sentences.zh: 如果没有人监督，团队就会缺乏方向。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: supervise 的名词形式，监督的行为
words.example_en: The construction work needs strict supervision.
