words.example_zh: 建筑工程需要严格的监督。
words.en_def: The act or instance of supervising.

sentences.en: Under his parents' supervision he drilled the holes in the wood.
sentences.zh: 在父母的监督下，他在木头上钻孔。

sentences.en: Do not attempt this without adequate supervision.
sentences.zh: 在没有充分监督的情况下，请勿尝试这样做。

words.mnemonic_zh: 进行监督的人
words.example_en: The supervisor checked the employees' work.
words.example_zh: 监督者检查了员工的工作。
words.en_def: A person with the official task of overseeing the work of a person or group, or of other operations and activities.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 从下面填满，起到补充作用
words.example_en: Vitamin supplements can boost your health.
words.example_zh: 维生素补充剂可以增进你的健康。
words.en_def: Something added, especially to make up for a deficiency.

sentences.en: There is a £2 supplement if you choose the steak.
sentences.zh: 如果选择牛排，需加收2英镑。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 从下面支撑的，就是支持的
words.example_en: He has a supportive family behind him.
words.example_zh: 他身后有一个支持他的家庭。
words.en_def: Providing support.

sentences.en: I had a very supportive coach who helped me.
sentences.zh: 我有一位非常支持我的教练，他帮助了我。

words.mnemonic_zh: 按所放置的说法，即据说
words.example_en: The movie is supposedly very interesting.
words.example_zh: 据说这部电影非常有趣。
words.en_def: As a matter of supposition; in the beliefs or according to the claims of some people.

sentences.en: According to your testimony, you were supposedly at home watching TV when the murder occurred.
sentences.zh: 根据你的证词，谋杀发生时你应该正在家里看电视。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向下压，即镇压、抑制
words.example_en: The government tried to suppress the protest.
words.example_zh: 政府试图镇压抗议活动。
words.en_def: To put an end to, especially with force, to crush, do away with; to prohibit, subdue.

sentences.en: Political dissent was brutally suppressed.
sentences.zh: 政治异见遭到残酷镇压。

sentences.en: I struggled to suppress my smile.
sentences.zh: 我努力压抑自己的笑容。

sentences.en: He unconsciously suppressed his memories of abuse.
sentences.zh: 他无意识地压抑了自己受虐待的记忆。

words.mnemonic_zh: 在上面的最高者
words.example_en: The supreme leader made an important decision.
words.example_zh: 最高领袖做出了一个重要决定。
words.en_def: The highest point.

sentences.en: supreme disgust; supreme courage
sentences.zh: 极度厌恶； 至高无上的勇气

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“ Surg（谐音： Surg 苏格）大波浪”，像波浪汹涌
words.example_en: There is a surge in the number of tourists this year.
words.example_zh: 今年游客数量激增。
words.en_def: A sudden transient rush, flood or increase.

sentences.en: He felt a surge of excitement.
sentences.zh: 他感到一阵兴奋。

sentences.en: A power surge at that generator created a blackout across the whole district.
sentences.zh: 该发电机的电涌导致整个地区停电。

sentences.en: Toaster sales surged last year.
sentences.zh: 去年烤面包机的销量猛增。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表与……有关的
words.mnemonic_zh: surg（外科）加 ical，和外科手术有关
words.example_en: The patient needs surgical treatment to remove the tumor.
words.example_zh: 病人需要进行外科手术来切除肿瘤。
words.en_def: Of, relating to, used in, or resulting from surgery.

sentences.en: The building was destroyed with a surgical air-strike.
sentences.zh: 该建筑在一次外科手术式的空袭中被摧毁。

words.mnemonic_zh: sur（超）加 plus（加），超出的部分即剩余
words.example_en: The country has a large surplus of agricultural products this year.
words.example_zh: 该国今年有大量农产品过剩。
words.en_def: That which remains when use or need is satisfied, or when a limit is reached; excess; overplus.

sentences.en: It is surplus to our needs
sentences.zh: 这超出了我们的需要

words.mnemonic_zh: sur（完全）下 render（交出），即投降放弃
words.example_en: The enemy finally decided to surrender after a long - term battle.
words.example_zh: 经过长时间战斗，敌人最终决定投降。
words.en_def: An act of surrendering, submission into the possession of another; abandonment, resignation.

sentences.en: I surrender!
sentences.zh: 我投降！

sentences.en: to surrender a right, privilege, or advantage
sentences.zh: 放弃权利、特权或优势

sentences.en: to surrender oneself to grief, to despair, to indolence, or to sleep
sentences.zh: 屈服于悲伤、绝望、懒惰或沉睡

words.mnemonic_zh: sur（在上面）看（veil），从上往下看就是监视
words.example_en: The police kept the suspect under 24 - hour surveillance.
words.example_zh: 警方对嫌疑人进行了 24 小时监视。
words.en_def: Close observation of an individual or group; person or persons under suspicion.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表动作或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: sus（下）面 pend（挂）着，是暂停悬挂状态
words.example_en: The suspension of the project was due to a lack of funds.
words.example_zh: 该项目因资金短缺而暂停。
words.en_def: The act of suspending, or the state of being suspended.

sentences.en: suspension from a hook
sentences.zh: 吊钩悬挂

sentences.en: suspension from school as a disciplinary measure
sentences.zh: 作为纪律措施停学

words.mnemonic_zh: sus（下）面被 pic（刺），心里有怀疑
words.example_en: There is a suspicion that he may be involved in the crime.
words.example_zh: 有人怀疑他可能参与了这起犯罪。
words.en_def: The act of suspecting something or someone, especially of something wrong.

sentences.en: a suspicion of a smile
sentences.zh: 微笑的怀疑

words.mnemonic_zh: 有 sus（下）面被 pic（刺）的感觉，是怀疑的
words.example_en: The police became suspicious of his behavior at the party.
words.example_zh: 警方对他在聚会上的行为产生了怀疑。
words.en_def: Arousing suspicion.

sentences.en: His suspicious behaviour brought him to the attention of the police.
sentences.zh: 他的可疑行为引起了警方的注意。

sentences.en: I have a suspicious attitude to get-rich-quick schemes.
sentences.zh: 我对快速致富的计划持怀疑态度。

sentences.en: She gave me a suspicious look.
sentences.zh: 她疑惑地看了我一眼。

words.mnemonic_zh: sus（下）面 tain（拿）住，即支撑维持
words.example_en: The strong column can sustain the weight of the whole building.
words.example_zh: 坚固的柱子可以支撑整座建筑的重量。
words.en_def: A mechanism which can be used to hold a note, as the right pedal on a piano.

sentences.en: The city came under sustained attack by enemy forces.
sentences.zh: 该城市遭到敌军的持续攻击。

sentences.en: provisions to sustain an army
sentences.zh: 维持军队的供给

sentences.en: The building sustained major damage in the earthquake.
sentences.zh: 该建筑在地震中遭受严重损坏。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似物体摆动的声音
words.example_en: The children like to swing on the playground after school.
words.example_zh: 孩子们放学后喜欢在操场上荡秋千。
words.en_def: The manner in which something is swung.

sentences.en: Door swing indicates direction the door opens.
sentences.zh: 门摆动指示门打开的方向。

sentences.en: The plant swung in the breeze.
sentences.zh: 植物在微风中摇曳。

sentences.en: The children laughed as they swung.
sentences.zh: 孩子们一边荡一边笑。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似挥剑的风声
words.example_en: The knight drew his sword and prepared for battle.
words.example_zh: 骑士拔出剑，准备战斗。
words.en_def: A long-bladed weapon with a hilt, and usually a pommel and cross-guard, which is designed to stab, slash, and/or hack.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: symbol（象征）加上 ic 变成象征的
words.example_en: The white dove is symbolic of peace in many cultures.
words.example_zh: 在许多文化中，白鸽是和平的象征。
words.en_def: Pertaining to a symbol.

sentences.en: a symbolic gesture
sentences.zh: 象征性的姿态

words.mnemonic_zh: 症状一起跑来，就是综合征
words.example_en: The doctor diagnosed him with a rare syndrome.
words.example_zh: 医生诊断他患有一种罕见的综合征。
words.en_def: A recognizable pattern of signs, symptoms and/or behaviours, especially of a disease or medical or psychological condition.

sentences.en: Down syndrome; acquired immune deficiency syndrome; restless-leg syndrome; battered-wife syndrome
sentences.zh: 唐氏综合症； 获得性免疫缺陷综合症； 不宁腿综合症； 受虐妻子综合症

sentences.en: not-in-my-backyard syndrome; tip-of-the-tongue syndrome
sentences.zh: “不在我家后院综合症”； 舌尖综合症

words.mnemonic_zh: 把东西放在一起就是合成
words.example_en: This theory is a synthesis of different ideas.
words.example_zh: 这个理论是不同观点的综合。
words.en_def: The formation of something complex or coherent by combining simpler things.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有…特征的
words.mnemonic_zh: system（系统）加上 atic 变成系统的
words.example_en: He made a systematic study of the problem.
words.example_zh: 他对这个问题进行了系统的研究。
words.en_def: Carried out using a planned, ordered procedure.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“太抠”，处理问题别太抠细节
words.example_en: We need to tackle this difficult task as soon as possible.
words.example_zh: 我们需要尽快处理这项艰巨的任务。
words.en_def: A device for grasping an object and an attached means of moving it, as a rope and hook.

sentences.en: The government's measures to tackle crime were insufficient.
sentences.zh: 政府打击犯罪的措施还不够。

words.mnemonic_zh: tact（策略）加上 ic 变成策略相关的词
words.example_en: They adopted a new tactic to win the game.
words.example_zh: 他们采用了一种新战术来赢得比赛。
words.en_def: A maneuver, or action calculated to achieve some end.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有…性质
words.mnemonic_zh: tact（策略）加上 ical 变成策略性的
words.example_en: The general made a tactical decision.
words.example_zh: 将军做出了一个战术性的决定。
words.en_def: A combinator of proof tactics.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表做某事的人
words.mnemonic_zh: tax（税）加上 payer（付款人）就是纳税人
words.example_en: The government should protect the rights of taxpayers.
words.example_zh: 政府应该保护纳税人的权利。
words.en_def: A person who is subject to, liable for, or pays tax as opposed to a nontaxpayer who is neither the subject nor the object of revenue laws.

sentences.en: 1945: I got into the bus full of taxpayers who were giving some money to a taxpayer who had on his taxpayer's stomach a little box which allowed the other taxpayers to continue their taxpayers' journeys. I noticed in this bus a taxpayer with a long taxpayer's neck and whose taxpayer's head bore a taxpayer's felt hat encircled by a plait the like of which no taxpayer ever wore before. Suddenly the said taxpayer peremptorily addressed a nearby taxpayer, complaining bitterly that he was purposely treading on his taxpayer's toes every time other taxpayers got on or off the taxpayers' bus. Then the angry taxpayer went and sat down in a seat for taxpayers which another taxpayer had just vacated. — Raymond Queneau, 'from Polyptotes' in Exercises in Style, 1945 (Eng. 1958)
sentences.zh: 1945年：我上了一辆满是纳税人的公共汽车，他们正在给一个纳税人一些钱，而这个纳税人的肚子里有一个小盒子，可以让其他纳税人继续他们的纳税人旅程。 我在这辆公共汽车上注意到一个纳税人，他的脖子很长，头上戴着纳税人的毡帽，帽子上缠着一条以前没有纳税人穿过的辫子。 突然，这名纳税人霸道地对附近的一名纳税人大喊大叫，抱怨每次其他纳税人上下车时，他都故意踩踏纳税人的脚趾。 然后愤怒的纳税人走到另一个纳税人刚刚腾出的纳税人座位上。 — Raymond Queneau，《风格练习》中的“来自 Polyptotes”，1945 年（英语，1958 年）

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“探扑”，想扑过去，被诱惑了
words.example_en: The delicious food tempted the children.
words.example_zh: 美味的食物诱惑着孩子们。
words.en_def: To provoke someone to do wrong, especially by promising a reward; to entice.

sentences.en: She tempted me to eat the apple.
sentences.zh: 她引诱我吃苹果。

sentences.en: Its glossy skin tempted me.
sentences.zh: 它光滑的皮肤吸引了我。

sentences.en: It would be tempting fate.
sentences.zh: 这将是命运的诱惑。

words.mnemonic_zh: ten（持有）房子的人是租户
words.example_en: The landlord is looking for a new tenant.
words.example_zh: 房东正在寻找新的租户。
words.en_def: One who pays a fee (rent) in return for the use of land, buildings, or other property owned by others.

words.mnemonic_zh: 可想象某人 tender(发音似“疼的”)关怀很温柔。
words.example_en: She gave him a tender look and then walked away.
words.example_zh: 她温柔地看了他一眼，然后走开了。
words.en_def: Care, kind concern, regard.

sentences.en: tender plants; tender flesh; tender fruit
sentences.zh: 嫩植物； 肉质细嫩； 嫩果

sentences.en: Suzanne was such a tender mother to her children.
sentences.zh: 苏珊娜对她的孩子们来说是一位温柔的母亲。

sentences.en: tender expressions; tender expostulations; a tender strain
sentences.zh: 温柔的表情； 温和的劝告； 温柔的应变

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: ten(持有) + ure，持有职位的时间即任期。
words.example_en: His tenure as the company's CEO lasted for five years.
words.example_zh: 他担任该公司首席执行官的任期长达五年。
words.en_def: A status of possessing a thing or an office; an incumbency.

words.mnemonic_zh: termin(终点) + al，到终点的即末端、晚期的。
words.example_en: The patient is in the terminal stage of the disease.
words.example_zh: 这位患者处于疾病的晚期。
words.en_def: A building in an airport where passengers transfer from ground transportation to the facilities that allow them to board airplanes.

sentences.en: terminal cancer
sentences.zh: 晚期癌症

sentences.en: a student's terminal fees
sentences.zh: 学生终端费

words.mnemonic_zh: termin(终点) + ate，使到终点，就是终止。
words.example_en: They decided to terminate the contract due to some issues.
words.example_zh: 由于一些问题，他们决定终止合同。
words.en_def: To end, especially in an incomplete state.

sentences.en: to terminate a surface by a line
sentences.zh: 用线终止曲面

sentences.en: Mountains on the Moon cast shadows that are very dark, terminate and more distinct than those cast by mountains on the Earth.
sentences.zh: 月球上的山脉投下的阴影非常暗、终止且比地球上的山脉投下的阴影更加清晰。

sentences.en: One third is a recurring decimal, but one half is a terminate decimal.
sentences.zh: 三分之一是循环小数，但二分之一是终止小数。

words.mnemonic_zh: terr(土地) + ain，和土地相关的，即地形。
words.example_en: The soldiers had to cross the difficult terrain to reach the base.
words.example_zh: 士兵们必须穿越艰难的地形才能到达基地。
words.en_def: A single, distinctive rock formation; an area having a preponderance of a particular rock or group of rocks.

sentences.en: The race will be run over a variety of terrain, including grass and sand.
sentences.zh: 比赛将在各种地形上进行，包括草地和沙地。

words.mnemonic_zh: 原义可怕的，现引申为好到惊人程度。
words.example_en: They had a terrific time at the party last night.
words.example_zh: 他们昨晚在聚会上玩得非常开心。
words.morph_note: 词义从恐惧相关引申为极好，注意理解
words.en_def: Terrifying, causing terror; terrible; sublime, awe-inspiring.

sentences.en: I've got a terrific hangover this morning.
sentences.zh: 今天早上我宿醉得很厉害。

sentences.en: I say! She's a terrific tennis player.
sentences.zh: 我说！ 她是一位出色的网球运动员。

words.mnemonic_zh: test(证明) + ify，使能证明，就是作证。
words.example_en: The witness will testify in court tomorrow.
words.example_zh: 证人明天将在法庭上作证。
words.en_def: To make a declaration, or give evidence, under oath.

words.mnemonic_zh: test(证明) + imony，证明的内容即证词。
words.example_en: The jury considered his testimony carefully.
words.example_zh: 陪审团认真考虑了他的证词。
words.en_def: Statements made by a witness in court.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: text(编织) + ure，编织的样子就是质地、纹理。
words.example_en: This kind of cloth has a soft texture.
words.example_zh: 这种布质地柔软。
words.en_def: The feel or shape of a surface or substance; the smoothness, roughness, softness, etc. of something.

sentences.en: The beans had a grainy, gritty texture in her mouth.
sentences.zh: 豆子在她嘴里有颗粒状、坚韧的质感。

sentences.en: The piece of music had a mainly homophonic texture.
sentences.zh: 这首音乐主要具有谐音结构。

sentences.en: Drag the trowel through the plaster to texture the wall.
sentences.zh: 将抹子拖过灰泥以对墙壁进行纹理处理。

words.mnemonic_zh: thank(感谢) + fully，充分感谢，即幸好、感激地。
words.example_en: Thankfully, the rain stopped before we left home.
words.example_zh: 幸好，在我们离开家之前雨停了。
words.en_def: In a thankful manner; giving thanks.

sentences.en: I was almost late for work, but thankfully there wasn't much traffic on the roads.
sentences.zh: 我上班差点迟到，幸好路上交通不多。

words.mnemonic_zh: 剧场（theatr）相关的，就是戏剧的（ical）
words.example_en: The actress gave a very theatrical performance last night.
words.example_zh: 这位女演员昨晚进行了一场非常戏剧性的表演。
words.en_def: A stage performance, especially one by amateurs.

words.mnemonic_zh: 关于神（theo）的学科（logy）是神学
words.example_en: He is studying theology at the university.
words.example_zh: 他正在大学学习神学。
words.en_def: The study of God, a god, or gods; and of the truthfulness of religion in general.

words.mnemonic_zh: 理论（theor）方面的（etical），即理论上的
words.example_en: This is just a theoretical possibility for now.
words.example_zh: 目前这只是一种理论上的可能性。
words.en_def: Of or relating to theory; abstract; not empirical.

words.mnemonic_zh: 在那（there）之后（after）就是此后
words.example_en: He graduated from college and thereafter found a good job.
words.example_zh: 他大学毕业后，此后找到了一份好工作。
words.en_def: After that, from then on; thenceforth.

sentences.en: He left; thereafter we never met again.
sentences.zh: 他离开了； 此后我们再也没有见过面。

words.mnemonic_zh: 通过在那（there）的方式（by），即借此、从而
words.example_en: He sold his old car and thereby got some extra money.
words.example_zh: 他卖掉了旧车，从而得到了一些额外的钱。
words.en_def: By it; by that; by that means, or as a consequence of that.

words.mnemonic_zh: 充满想法（thought）的，就是体贴、深思熟虑的（ful）
words.example_en: He is a thoughtful person who always cares about others.
words.example_zh: 他是一个体贴的人，总是关心他人。
words.en_def: Demonstrating thought or careful consideration.

sentences.en: Most thoughtful people eventually solve the puzzle.
sentences.zh: 最有思想的人最终会解决这个难题。

sentences.en: Preparing dinner is a thoughtful gesture for a new mother.
sentences.zh: 对于新妈妈来说，准备晚餐是一个体贴的举动。

words.mnemonic_zh: 联想缝衣服的线就是 thread
words.example_en: She used a red thread to sew the button on.
words.example_zh: 她用一根红线把扣子缝上了。
words.en_def: A long, thin and flexible form of material, generally with a round cross-section, used in sewing, weaving or in the construction of string.

sentences.en: All of these essays have a common thread.
sentences.zh: 所有这些文章都有一个共同的主线。

sentences.en: thread a needle
sentences.zh: 穿针线

sentences.en: I think I can thread my way through here, but it’s going to be tight.
sentences.zh: 我想我可以穿过这里，但会很紧。

words.root_cn: thresh 原指踩踏谷物，old 表意；整体与门槛的作用有关
words.mnemonic_zh: 想象踩踏（thresh）在老旧（old）木板上，像跨门槛
words.example_en: He stood on the threshold, hesitating to enter.
words.example_zh: 他站在门槛上，犹豫着是否要进去。
words.morph_note: 该词词源古老复杂，这里简化拆解助记
words.en_def: The bottom-most part of a doorway that one crosses to enter; a sill.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表被动或完成
words.mnemonic_zh: 激动（thrill）的状态（ed），即非常激动的
words.example_en: The children were thrilled to see the fireworks.
words.example_zh: 孩子们看到烟花非常激动。
words.en_def: To suddenly excite someone, or to give someone great pleasure; to (figuratively) electrify; to experience such a sensation.

sentences.en: Ben was thrilled to lead the game.
sentences.zh: 本很高兴能够领导比赛。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“思来屋”，思考未来，在屋里成长繁荣
words.example_en: Plants thrive in this warm and humid environment.
words.example_zh: 植物在这种温暖潮湿的环境中茁壮成长。
words.en_def: To grow or increase stature; to grow vigorously or luxuriantly, to flourish.

sentences.en: Not all animals thrive well in captivity.
sentences.zh: 并非所有动物在圈养条件下都能茁壮成长。

sentences.en: Since expanding in June, the business has really thrived.
sentences.zh: 自6月份开业以来，生意确实蒸蒸日上。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“太的”，大海的潮很“太的”，即很厉害。
words.example_en: The fishermen set sail according to the tide schedule.
words.example_zh: 渔民们根据潮汐时刻表出海航行。
words.en_def: The periodic change of the sea level, particularly when caused by the gravitational influence of the sun and the moon.

sentences.en: The doctor's no good this tide.
sentences.zh: 医生这阵势不行了。

sentences.en: Eventide, noontide, morrowtide, nighttide, moon-tide, harvest-tide, wintertide, summertide, springtide, autumn-tide etc.,.
sentences.zh: 黄昏、中午、次日、夜间、月潮、丰收潮、冬潮、夏潮、春潮、秋潮等。

sentences.en: The ocean tided most impressively.
sentences.zh: 海洋的潮汐最令人印象深刻。

words.mnemonic_zh: tight（紧的）加 en 变成使变紧。
words.example_en: You need to tighten the screws to fix the shelf.
words.example_zh: 你需要拧紧螺丝来固定架子。
words.en_def: To make tighter.

sentences.en: Please tighten that screw a quarter-turn.
sentences.zh: 请将螺钉拧紧四分之一圈。

sentences.en: That joint is tightening as the wood dries.
sentences.zh: 随着木材干燥，该接头会收紧。

sentences.en: If the government doesn't tighten the money supply, inflation is certain to be harsh.
sentences.zh: 如果政府不收紧货币供应，通货膨胀肯定会很严重。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“挺薄”，有的木材挺薄的。
words.example_en: They used timber to build a small cabin in the forest.
words.example_zh: 他们用木材在森林里建了一座小木屋。
words.en_def: Trees in a forest regarded as a source of wood.

sentences.en: the timbers of a ship
sentences.zh: 船的木材

sentences.en: timbering a roof
sentences.zh: 搭建屋顶

words.mnemonic_zh: time（时间）加 ly 表示与时间有关，即及时的。
words.example_en: The timely warning helped them avoid the danger.
words.example_zh: 及时的警告帮助他们避免了危险。
words.en_def: Done at the proper time or within the proper time limits; prompt.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“偷八角”，想象偷八角时顺便偷了烟草。
words.example_en: The government has imposed high taxes on tobacco products.
words.example_zh: 政府对烟草制品征收了高额税款。
words.en_def: Any plant of the genus Nicotiana.

sentences.en: Tobaccos from the Connecticut Valley were used for wrapping cigars.
sentences.zh: 来自康涅狄格山谷的烟草被用来包装雪茄。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态或行为
words.mnemonic_zh: toler（忍受）加 ance 变成名词容忍。
words.example_en: We should show tolerance towards different opinions.
words.example_zh: 我们应该对不同意见表示宽容。
words.en_def: The ability to endure pain or hardship; endurance.

sentences.en: Our customers can generally accept ten times the tolerance which we can achieve in our machining operations.
sentences.zh: 我们的客户通常可以接受我们在加工操作中所能达到的公差的十倍。

words.mnemonic_zh: 可以记成“toler（忍受）加 ate 使能忍受”。
words.example_en: She can't tolerate people who are always late.
words.example_zh: 她无法容忍总是迟到的人。
words.en_def: To accept hardship without objection.

sentences.en: I can tolerate working on Saturdays, but not on Sundays.
sentences.zh: 我可以忍受周六工作，但不能忍受周日工作。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“偷了”，交通行费像被“偷了”钱。
words.example_en: The toll for crossing the bridge is quite high.
words.example_zh: 过桥的通行费相当高。
words.en_def: Loss or damage incurred through a disaster.

sentences.en: The war has taken its toll on the people.
sentences.zh: 战争给人民带来了损失。

sentences.en: We can handle on a toll basis your needs for spray drying, repackaging, crushing and grinding, and dry blending.
sentences.zh: 我们可以收费满足您对喷雾干燥、重新包装、破碎和研磨以及干混合的需求。

sentences.en: We will be replacing some manned tolls with high-speed device readers.
sentences.zh: 我们将用高速设备阅读器取代一些人工收费站。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“托普”，把东西托到顶部。
words.example_en: There is a flag on the top of the mountain.
words.example_zh: 山顶上有一面旗帜。
words.en_def: The highest or uppermost part of something.

sentences.en: His kite got caught at the top of the tree.
sentences.zh: 他的风筝被挂在树顶了。

sentences.en: The boy was amazed at how long the top would spin.
sentences.zh: 男孩对陀螺能旋转多久感到惊讶。

sentences.en: I prefer being a top, and my boyfriend prefers being a bottom.
sentences.zh: 我更喜欢当上层，我男朋友更喜欢当下层。

words.mnemonic_zh: tort（扭曲）加 ure 表示身体或精神被扭曲的折磨。
words.example_en: The prisoner suffered a lot of torture in the past.
words.example_zh: 这名囚犯过去遭受了很多折磨。
words.en_def: Intentional causing of somebody's experiencing agony

sentences.en: In every war there are acts of torture that cause the world to shudder.
sentences.zh: 每场战争中都会有令世界颤抖的酷刑行为。

sentences.en: Coventry City midfielder Josh Ruffels described his 11 months out injured as 'absolute torture' after the goalless draw with Derby County Under-21s. (http//www.ccfc.co.uk/news/article/eleven-months-of-absolute-torture-760652.aspx)
sentences.zh: 考文垂城中场球员乔什·拉菲尔斯 (Josh Ruffels) 称，在与德比郡 21 岁以下青年队互交白卷后，他因伤缺席 11 个月的时间是“绝对的折磨”。 (http://www.ccfc.co.uk/news/article/eleven-months-of-absolute-torture-760652.aspx)

sentences.en: In the aftermath of 9/11, we did some things that were wrong. We did a whole lot of things that were right, but, we tortured some folks. We did some things that were contrary to our values.
sentences.zh: 9/11 事件发生后，我们做了一些错误的事情。 我们做了很多正确的事情，但是，我们折磨了一些人。 我们做了一些与我们的价值观相悖的事情。

words.mnemonic_zh: 读音似“投死”，可联想用力扔东西。
words.example_en: He likes to toss a ball in the yard after dinner.
words.example_zh: 他喜欢晚饭后在院子里扔球。
words.en_def: A throw, a lob, of a ball etc., with an initial upward direction, particularly with a lack of care.

sentences.en: I couldn't give a toss about her.
sentences.zh: 我对她无能为力。

sentences.en: Toss it over here!
sentences.zh: 把它扔到这儿来！

sentences.en: to toss the head
sentences.zh: 抛头颅

words.mnemonic_zh: 和“整体”发音相近，是整体的意思。
words.example_en: The total cost of the project is quite high.
words.example_zh: 这个项目的总成本相当高。
words.en_def: An amount obtained by the addition of smaller amounts.

sentences.en: A total of £145 was raised by the bring-and-buy stall.
sentences.zh: 自带购买摊位总共筹集了 145 英镑。

sentences.en: The total of 4, 5 and 6 is 15.
When we totalled the takings, we always got a different figure.
sentences.zh: 当我们合计收入时，我们总是得到不同的数字。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示“具有…性质的”
words.mnemonic_zh: 词根“tox”代表毒，加上后缀表“有毒的”。
words.example_en: These toxic chemicals should be handled with care.
words.example_zh: 这些有毒化学品应该小心处理。
words.en_def: Having a chemical nature that is harmful to health or lethal if consumed or otherwise entering into the body in sufficient quantities.

sentences.en: Tobacco smoke contains many toxic substances.
sentences.zh: 烟草烟雾中含有多种有毒物质。

sentences.en: The child appeared toxic on arrival at the hospital.
sentences.zh: 孩子到达医院后出现中毒症状。

sentences.en: a toxic environment that promoted bullying
sentences.zh: 助长欺凌行为的有毒环境

words.mnemonic_zh: 读音似“追思”，联想追踪查找的动作。
words.example_en: The police are trying to trace the suspect's whereabouts.
words.example_zh: 警方正在试图追踪嫌疑人的下落。
words.en_def: An act of tracing.

sentences.en: Your cell phone company can put a trace on your line.
sentences.zh: 您的手机公司可以在您的线路上留下痕迹。

sentences.en: There are traces of chocolate around your lips.
sentences.zh: 你的嘴唇周围有巧克力的痕迹。

sentences.en: All of our chocolates may contain traces of nuts.
sentences.zh: 我们所有的巧克力都可能含有微量坚果。

words.mnemonic_zh: 贸易中用于区分的标记就是商标。
words.example_en: This company's trademark is very well - known.
words.example_zh: 这家公司的商标非常有名。
words.en_def: A word, symbol, or phrase used to identify a particular company's product and differentiate it from other companies' products.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“吹哦”，联想风吹过留下的踪迹。
words.example_en: They followed the trail deep into the forest.
words.example_zh: 他们沿着小径深入森林。
words.en_def: The track or indication marking the route followed by something that has passed, such as the footprints of animal on land or the contrail of an airplane in the sky.

sentences.en: The hunters trailed their prey deep into the woods.
sentences.zh: 猎人将猎物拖入树林深处。

sentences.en: You'll get your coat all muddy if you trail it around like that.
sentences.zh: 如果你这样拖着你的外套，你会把它弄脏的。

sentences.en: He walked into the house, soaking wet, and trailed water all over the place.
sentences.zh: 他走进屋子，浑身湿透，到处都是水迹。

words.mnemonic_zh: trail有拖的意思，-er表示物，即拖车。
words.example_en: The movie trailer attracted a lot of audience.
words.example_zh: 这部电影的预告片吸引了很多观众。
words.en_def: Someone who or something that trails.

sentences.en: the trailer of a plant
sentences.zh: 工厂的拖车

sentences.en: At the end of the day, we put the snowmobiles back on the trailer.
sentences.zh: 一天结束时，我们将雪地摩托放回拖车上。

sentences.en: We drove our trailer to Yellowstone Park.
sentences.zh: 我们开着拖车前往黄石公园。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或行为的结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 转移物品的行动就是交易。
words.example_en: The bank recorded every transaction accurately.
words.example_zh: 银行准确记录了每一笔交易。
words.en_def: The act of conducting or carrying out (business, negotiations, plans).

sentences.en: The transaction was made on Friday with the supplier.
sentences.zh: 该交易于周五与供应商完成。

sentences.en: I made the transaction with the vendor as soon as she showed me the pearls.
sentences.zh: 当供应商向我展示珍珠后，我立即与她进行了交易。

words.mnemonic_zh: 把内容转移书写下来就是抄本。
words.example_en: The student asked for a copy of his transcript.
words.example_zh: 这名学生要了一份自己的成绩单。
words.en_def: Something which has been transcribed; a writing or composition consisting of the same words as the original; a written copy.

sentences.en: the transcript of a trial
sentences.zh: 审判笔录

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 转变形状的过程就是转化。
words.example_en: The city has undergone a great transformation in recent years.
words.example_zh: 这座城市近年来经历了巨大的转变。
words.en_def: The act of transforming or the state of being transformed.

words.mnemonic_zh: trans（穿过）+ it（走），走过就是运输通行
words.example_en: The city needs to improve its public transit system.
words.example_zh: 这座城市需要改善其公共交通系统。
words.en_def: The act of passing over, across, or through something.

sentences.en: the transit of goods through a country
sentences.zh: 货物经过一个国家过境

sentences.en: Beufort road, Birkenhead, about 17.15 June 19 2013, white transit overtakes and swerves left into junction almost taking my front wheel.
sentences.zh: 伯肯黑德 Beufort 路，2013 年 6 月 19 日 17 时 15 分左右，白色交通超车并向左转向进入路口，几乎夺走了我的前轮。

sentences.en: I always take the transit to work.
sentences.zh: 我总是乘坐公共交通去上班。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: trans（穿过）+ mit（送）+ sion，送过去就是传播传送
words.example_en: The transmission of diseases can be prevented by good hygiene.
words.example_zh: 通过良好的卫生习惯可以预防疾病传播。
words.en_def: The act of transmitting, e.g. data or electric power.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: trans（穿过）+ par（看见）+ ency，能看穿就是有透明度
words.example_en: The company should increase its financial transparency.
words.example_zh: 公司应该提高其财务透明度。
words.en_def: The quality of being transparent; transparence.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: trans（穿过）+ par（看见）+ ent，能看穿的就是透明的
words.example_en: The transparent glass allows plenty of sunlight in.
words.example_zh: 透明玻璃让大量阳光照进来。
words.en_def: (of a material or object) See-through, clear; having the property that light passes through it almost undisturbed, such that one can see through it clearly.

sentences.en: The waters of the lake were transparent until the factory dumped waste there.
sentences.zh: 在工厂向那里倾倒废物之前，湖水是透明的。

sentences.en: His reasons for the decision were transparent.
sentences.zh: 他做出这一决定的理由是透明的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“抓妈”，想象抓妈妈引发痛苦经历
words.example_en: He still suffers from the trauma of the accident.
words.example_zh: 他仍受那次事故创伤的折磨。
words.en_def: Any serious injury to the body, often resulting from violence or an accident.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“吹替”，吹吹打打替人谈成条约
words.example_en: The two countries signed a peace treaty last year.
words.example_zh: 两国去年签署了和平条约。
words.en_def: A binding agreement concluded by subjects of international law, namely states and international organizations.

words.mnemonic_zh: trem（颤抖）+ endous，大到让人颤抖
words.example_en: The concert had a tremendous impact on the audience.
words.example_zh: 这场音乐会对观众产生了巨大影响。
words.en_def: Awe-inspiring; terrific.

sentences.en: Van Beethoven's ninth symphony is a tremendous piece of music.
sentences.zh: 范·贝多芬的第九交响曲是一部伟大的音乐作品。

sentences.en: There was a tremendous outpouring of support.
sentences.zh: 得到了大量的支持。

words.mnemonic_zh: trib（部落）+ al，和部落有关的
words.example_en: The tribal culture has unique traditions.
words.example_zh: 部落文化有独特的传统。
words.en_def: A design or image that has been influenced by indigenous peoples; especially such a tattoo.

sentences.en: social order through tribal law
sentences.zh: 通过部落法维持社会秩序

sentences.en: a tribal society
sentences.zh: 部落社会

words.mnemonic_zh: trib（审判）+ unal，审判的地方是法庭
words.example_en: The tribunal will hear the case next month.
words.example_zh: 法庭下个月将审理此案。
words.en_def: An assembly including one or more judges to conduct judicial business; a court of law.

words.mnemonic_zh: trib（给予）+ ute，给予的东西是贡品
words.example_en: They paid tribute to the great leader.
words.example_zh: 他们向这位伟大领袖致敬。
words.en_def: An acknowledgment of gratitude, respect or admiration; an accompanying gift.

sentences.en: Please accept this as a tribute of our thanks.
sentences.zh: 请接受此作为我们的谢意。

sentences.en: The Ancient Romans made their conquered countries pay tribute.
sentences.zh: 古罗马人向被征服的国家纳贡。

words.mnemonic_zh: 按扳机触发事情，trigger 声音像扳机声
words.example_en: The sudden noise was the trigger for the alarm system.
words.example_zh: 突然的噪音是触发警报系统的诱因。
words.en_def: A finger-operated lever used to fire a gun.

sentences.en: Just pull the trigger.
sentences.zh: 只需扣动扳机即可。

sentences.en: Sleeping in an unfamiliar room can be a trigger for sleepwalking.
sentences.zh: 在陌生的房间里睡觉可能会引发梦游。

sentences.en: I can't watch that violent film. Blood is one of my triggers.
sentences.zh: 我不能看那种暴力电影。 血液是我的触发因素之一。

words.mnemonic_zh: tri 表三，o 结尾，就是三人组合
words.example_en: A talented trio performed at the music festival last night.
words.example_zh: 一个有才华的三人组昨晚在音乐节上表演。
words.en_def: A group of three people or things.

words.mnemonic_zh: tri 表彻底，umph 联想猛扑，彻底猛扑就是胜利
words.example_en: His scientific discovery was a great triumph for the whole team.
words.example_zh: 他的科学发现是整个团队的巨大胜利。
words.morph_note: tri- 的含义在本词中是教学简化理解，与古词源有差异
words.en_def: A conclusive success following an effort, conflict, or confrontation of obstacles; victory; conquest.

sentences.en: the triumph of knowledge
sentences.zh: 知识的胜利

sentences.en: Scorsese's latest film is a triumph.
sentences.zh: 斯科塞斯的最新电影取得了胜利。

words.mnemonic_zh: troph 有胜利之意，y 结尾就是胜利的奖杯
words.example_en: The athlete proudly displayed his trophy in the living room.
words.example_zh: 运动员自豪地在客厅展示他的奖杯。
words.en_def: Tropæum.

sentences.en: He won the trophy in a running competition.
sentences.zh: 他在一次跑步比赛中赢得了奖杯。

sentences.en: The set of antlers which hung on the wall was his prized trophy.
sentences.zh: 挂在墙上的那套鹿角是他最珍贵的战利品。

sentences.en: His trophies included his second wife, his successful children, the third and fourth homes in Palm Beach and Malibu, his three yachts (for the Pacific, the Atlantic, and the Mediterranean), his jet, and his mistresses.
sentences.zh: 他的战利品包括他的第二任妻子、他成功的孩子、在棕榈滩和马里布的第三和第四套房、他的三艘游艇（太平洋、大西洋和地中海）、他的喷气式飞机和他的情妇。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示被动或完成
words.mnemonic_zh: trouble 加 ed，表被麻烦困扰的
words.example_en: The troubled student needed extra help with his studies.
words.example_zh: 这位有困扰的学生在学习上需要额外的帮助。
words.en_def: To disturb, stir up, agitate (a medium, especially water).

sentences.en: What she said about narcissism is troubling me.
sentences.zh: 她所说的关于自恋的言论让我感到困扰。

sentences.en: I will not trouble you to deliver the letter.
sentences.zh: 我不会麻烦你送信的。

sentences.en: I won't trouble to post the letter today; I can do it tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 今天我不会麻烦地寄出这封信； 我明天就可以做。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作承受者
words.mnemonic_zh: trust 是信任，ee 表人，就是被信任的受托人
words.example_en: The trustee is responsible for managing the estate.
words.example_zh: 受托人负责管理这笔财产。
words.en_def: A person to whom property is legally committed in trust, to be applied either for the benefit of specified individuals, or for public uses; one who is intrusted with property for the benefit of another.

sentences.en: to trustee an estate
sentences.zh: 受托遗产

words.mnemonic_zh: tuition 音似“退学神”，没钱交学费想退学
words.example_en: Many students struggle to afford the high tuition fees.
words.example_zh: 许多学生难以负担高昂的学费。
words.en_def: A sum of money paid for instruction (such as in a high school, boarding school, university, or college).

sentences.en: These rosemaling workshops are no place for anyone who wants to pester me or the students with the "white privilege" card, inter alia. Therefore, I reserve the right to refund the tuition of such men and women, kick them out the door, and bar them from at least two of my future events.
sentences.zh: 这些迷迭香工作坊不适合任何想用“白人特权”卡纠缠我或学生的人。 因此，我保留退还这些人的学费、将他们赶出家门、并禁止他们参加我未来至少两次活动的权利。

words.cn_def: 出席人数； turnout  turnout 产量
words.mnemonic_zh: turn 转，out 出来，转出来的人数
words.example_en: The turnout for the concert was surprisingly large.
words.example_zh: 这场音乐会的出席人数多得惊人。
words.en_def: The act of coming forth.

sentences.en: When towing a trailer, use the turnouts to let faster traffic pass.
sentences.zh: 牵引拖车时，请使用道岔让更快的交通通过。

sentences.en: A man with a showy carriage and horses is said to have a fine turnout.
sentences.zh: 据说，拥有华丽车马的人，投票率很高。

words.mnemonic_zh: turn 转，over 翻转，营业额不断流转
words.example_en: The company's annual turnover has increased steadily.
words.example_zh: 该公司的年营业额稳步增长。
words.en_def: The amount of money taken as sales transacted in a given period.

sentences.en: The company had an annual turnover of $500,000.
sentences.zh: 该公司的年营业额为 500,000 美元。

sentences.en: High staff-turnover can lead to low morale amongst employees
sentences.zh: 员工流动率高会导致员工士气低落

sentences.en: They only served me one apple turnover for breakfast.
sentences.zh: 他们只给我提供了一份苹果早餐。

words.cn_def: 扭曲；转动； twist 转弯
words.mnemonic_zh: twist 音似“推死他”，用力推会扭曲
words.example_en: He can easily twist a metal rod with his strong hands.
words.example_zh: 他能用强壮的双手轻易地扭曲一根金属棒。
words.en_def: A twisting force.

sentences.en: Damascus twist
sentences.zh: 大马士革麻花

sentences.en: a twist toward fanaticism
sentences.zh: 转向狂热

sentences.en: Avarice twists itself into all human concerns.
sentences.zh: 贪婪扭曲了人类所有的担忧。

words.mnemonic_zh: 在毕业水平之下的学生，就是本科生
words.example_en: Many undergraduates choose to participate in internships during holidays.
words.example_zh: 许多本科生选择在假期参加实习。
words.en_def: A student at a university who has not yet received a degree.

sentences.en: After completing my undergraduate studies, I embarked on a career in publishing.
sentences.zh: 完成本科学业后，我开始了出版生涯。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表正在进行或主动
words.mnemonic_zh: 在下面存在着的，就是潜在的
words.example_en: The underlying cause of the problem needs to be found out.
words.example_zh: 需要找出问题的根本原因。
words.en_def: To lie in a position directly beneath.

sentences.en: A stratum of clay underlies the surface gravel.
sentences.zh: 表面砾石下面有一层粘土。

sentences.en: a doctrine underlying a theory
sentences.zh: 理论背后的学说

sentences.en: We dug down to the underlying rock.
sentences.zh: 我们挖到了下面的岩石。

words.mnemonic_zh: 在下面挖掘，会逐渐削弱事物
words.example_en: Lack of sleep can undermine one's health over time.
words.example_zh: 长期睡眠不足会损害人的健康。
words.en_def: To dig underneath (something), to make a passage for destructive or military purposes; to sap.

sentences.en: The war efforts were undermined by the constant bickering between the allies.
sentences.zh: 战争努力因盟友之间不断的争吵而受到破坏。

words.mnemonic_zh: 没有怀疑地，就是肯定地
words.example_en: He will undoubtedly succeed in his new project.
words.example_zh: 他的新项目无疑会成功。
words.en_def: Without doubt; definitely.

words.mnemonic_zh: 使事物变成单一状态，就是统一
words.example_en: The leader aims to unify the country after the civil war.
words.example_zh: 领导人的目标是在内战后使国家统一。
words.en_def: Cause to become one; make into a unit; consolidate; merge; combine.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表被动或完成
words.mnemonic_zh: 以前没走过的，即前所未有的
words.example_en: The pandemic has brought unprecedented challenges to the world.
words.example_zh: 这场疫情给世界带来了前所未有的挑战。
words.morph_note: 拆解取常见理解，cedent单独不是常见独立词根，但源自ced（走）
words.en_def: Never before seen, done, or experienced; without precedent.

words.mnemonic_zh: 去掉面纱，就是揭开、公布
words.example_en: The company will unveil its new product next month.
words.example_zh: 该公司下个月将公布其新产品。
words.en_def: To remove a veil from; to uncover; to reveal something hidden.

words.mnemonic_zh: 朝着前方来的，就是即将到来的
words.example_en: We are preparing for the upcoming exam.
words.example_zh: 我们正在为即将到来的考试做准备。
words.en_def: The act of coming up.

sentences.en: The Federal budget lays out government spending for the upcoming budget year.
sentences.zh: 联邦预算列出了即将到来的预算年度的政府支出。

words.mnemonic_zh: 使等级向上提升，就是升级
words.example_en: You should upgrade your software regularly.
words.example_zh: 你应该定期升级你的软件。
words.en_def: An upward grade or slope.

sentences.en: With my phone company, I get a free upgrade every twelve months if I keep topping up 10 pounds a month.
sentences.zh: 在我的电话公司，如果我每月继续充值 10 英镑，那么我每十二个月就可以获得一次免费升级。

sentences.en: The remarried couples among my friends often joked that their divorce and remarriage amounted to an upgrade.
sentences.zh: 朋友里的再婚夫妇经常开玩笑说，离婚再婚就是升级。

sentences.en: When you upgrade your standard of living, you become addicted to that standard of living.
sentences.zh: 当你提高生活水平时，你就会沉迷于这种生活水平。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向上拿着，有支持、维护的意思
words.example_en: We must uphold the principles of justice and equality.
words.example_zh: 我们必须维护正义和平等的原则。
words.en_def: To hold up; to lift on high; to elevate.

words.mnemonic_zh: ut（用）+ility，使用的性质即效用
words.example_en: The utility of this new software is quite remarkable.
words.example_zh: 这款新软件的功用十分显著。
words.en_def: The state or condition of being useful; usefulness.

sentences.en: I've bought a new disk utility that can recover deleted files.
sentences.zh: 我购买了一个新的磁盘实用程序，可以恢复已删除的文件。

sentences.en: utility line; utility bill
sentences.zh: 公用事业线； 水电费账单

sentences.en: utility room
sentences.zh: 杂物间

words.mnemonic_zh: ut（用）+ize，使能被使用即利用
words.example_en: We should utilize every opportunity to learn.
words.example_zh: 我们应该利用每一个学习的机会。
words.en_def: To make use of; to use.

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，表程度或方式
words.mnemonic_zh: utter可记发音似“彻底”，ly表副词，即完全地
words.example_en: He was utterly exhausted after a long - day work.
words.example_zh: 一整天的工作后，他彻底筋疲力尽了。
words.en_def: Completely, entirely, to the fullest extent

sentences.en: I have failed you utterly.
sentences.zh: 我彻底让你失望了。

words.mnemonic_zh: vac（空），再加部分像身处真空的虚幻感
words.example_en: A vacuum tube can be used to amplify electrical signals.
words.example_zh: 真空管可用于放大电信号。
words.en_def: A region of space that contains no matter.

sentences.en: a vacuum of 26 inches of mercury, or 13 pounds per square inch
sentences.zh: 26 英寸汞柱或每平方英寸 13 磅的真空

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“外哥”，远方的哥哥形象模糊
words.example_en: He gave a vague answer to the question.
words.example_zh: 他对这个问题给出了一个模糊的答案。
words.en_def: A wandering; a vagary.

sentences.en: a vague term of abuse
sentences.zh: 模糊的滥用术语

sentences.en: I haven’t the vaguest idea.
sentences.zh: 我没有最模糊的想法。

sentences.en: a vague longing
sentences.zh: 模糊的渴望

words.mnemonic_zh: val（有价值）+idity，有价值的性质即有效性
words.example_en: They questioned the validity of his argument.
words.example_zh: 他们质疑他论点的有效性。
words.en_def: The state of being valid, authentic or genuine.

words.mnemonic_zh: van（空）+ish，使成空即消失
words.example_en: All my worries vanished when I saw her smile.
words.example_zh: 当我看到她的笑容时，所有的担忧都消失了。
words.en_def: The brief terminal part of a vowel or vocal element, differing more or less in quality from the main part.

sentences.en: a as in ale ordinarily ends with a vanish of i as in ill.
sentences.zh: ale 中的 a 通常以 ill 中的 i 消失而结束。

sentences.en: The French drop is a well-known vanish involving sleight of hand.
sentences.zh: 法式滴法是一种众所周知的需要技巧的消失方法。

sentences.en: The function f(x)=x^2 vanishes at x=0.
sentences.zh: 函数 f(x)=x^2 在 x=0 处消失。

words.mnemonic_zh: vari（变）+able，可变化的即易变的
words.example_en: The weather here is very variable in spring.
words.example_zh: 这里的春天天气变化无常。
words.en_def: Something that is variable.

sentences.en: There are several variables to consider here.
sentences.zh: 这里有几个变量需要考虑。

sentences.en: variable winds or seasons; a variable quantity; a variable resistor
sentences.zh: 多变的风或季节； 可变数量； 可变电阻器

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表已完成的状态
words.mnemonic_zh: vari（变）+ed，有变化结果的就是多样的
words.example_en: He has had a varied career in different fields.
words.example_zh: 他在不同领域有过丰富多彩的职业生涯。
words.en_def: Diverse or miscellaneous

sentences.en: He varies his magic tricks so as to minimize the possibility that any given audience member will see the same trick twice.
sentences.zh: 他会改变他的魔术，以尽量减少任何特定观众看到同一魔术两次的可能性。

sentences.en: You should vary your diet. Eating just bread will do you harm in the end.
sentences.zh: 你应该改变你的饮食。 只吃面包最终会对你造成伤害。

sentences.en: His mood varies by the hour.
sentences.zh: 他的心情随时间而变化。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“文”，血管纹路像“文身”线条
words.example_en: The doctor inserted a needle into the vein in his arm.
words.example_zh: 医生将针插入他手臂的静脉。
words.en_def: A blood vessel that transports blood from the capillaries back to the heart.

sentences.en: in the same vein
sentences.zh: 同样地

sentences.en: The play is in a satirical vein.
sentences.zh: 该剧带有讽刺意味。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: vent（走）+ ure，走着去冒险
words.example_en: They launched a new business venture in the technology sector.
words.example_zh: 他们在科技领域开展了一个新的商业项目。
words.en_def: A risky or daring undertaking or journey.

sentences.en: Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
sentences.zh: 没有冒险，就没有收获。

sentences.en: to venture a horse to the West Indies
sentences.zh: 冒险一匹马去西印度群岛

words.mnemonic_zh: verb（词）+ al，和词有关就是口头的
words.example_en: The boss gave a verbal warning to the lazy employee.
words.example_zh: 老板给了那个懒惰的员工一个口头警告。
words.en_def: (grammar) A verb form which does not function as a predicate, or a word derived from a verb. In English, infinitives, participles and gerunds are verbals.

sentences.en: a verbal contract
sentences.zh: 口头合同

sentences.en: a verbal translation
sentences.zh: 口头翻译

words.mnemonic_zh: ver（真实）+ dict（说），说出真实的判断
words.example_en: The jury reached a unanimous verdict of guilty.
words.example_zh: 陪审团一致作出了有罪的裁决。
words.en_def: A decision on an issue of fact in a civil or criminal case or an inquest.

sentences.en: The jury returned a “not guilty” verdict.
sentences.zh: 陪审团做出“无罪”判决。

sentences.en: a “not out” verdict from the umpire
sentences.zh: 裁判员的“未出局”判决

words.mnemonic_zh: ver（真实）+ ify（使），使变真实就是核实
words.example_en: You need to verify the information before using it.
words.example_zh: 你在使用这些信息之前需要核实一下。
words.en_def: To substantiate or prove the truth of something

words.mnemonic_zh: vers（转），诗韵流转成诗句
words.example_en: He recited a beautiful verse from the poem.
words.example_zh: 他背诵了这首诗里的一个优美诗节。
words.en_def: A poetic form with regular meter and a fixed rhyme scheme.

sentences.en: Restoration literature is well known for its carefully constructed verse.
sentences.zh: 复辟文学以其精心构造的诗句而闻名。

sentences.en: The restrictions of verse have been steadily relaxed over time.
sentences.zh: 随着时间的推移，诗歌的限制逐渐放松。

sentences.en: Note the shift in tone between the first verse and the second.
sentences.zh: 注意第一节和第二节之间的语气转变。

words.mnemonic_zh: vers（转），转向对方就是对抗
words.example_en: The match is Team A versus Team B this weekend.
words.example_zh: 本周末的比赛是 A 队对阵 B 队。
words.en_def: Against; in opposition to.

sentences.en: It is the Packers versus the Steelers in the Super Bowl.
sentences.zh: 这是超级碗比赛中包装工队对阵钢人队的比赛。

sentences.en: Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka, Kans.
sentences.zh: 布朗诉堪萨斯州托皮卡教育委员会案。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“喂嗖”，喂东西的嗖的容器
words.example_en: The oil was stored in a large metal vessel.
words.example_zh: 油被储存在一个大金属容器里。
words.en_def: Any craft designed for transportation on water, such as a ship or boat.

sentences.en: Blood and lymph vessels are found in humans; xylem and phloem vessels are found in plants.
sentences.zh: 人体中存在血管和淋巴管； 木质部和韧皮部导管存在于植物中。

words.mnemonic_zh: veter（老）+ an（人），老人就是老手、老兵
words.example_en: The veteran shared his war experiences with the students.
words.example_zh: 那位老兵和学生们分享了他的战争经历。
words.en_def: A person with long experience of a particular activity.

words.mnemonic_zh: vi（生命）+ able（可……的），有生命迹象就是可行的
words.example_en: This new plan seems to be a viable solution.
words.example_zh: 这个新计划似乎是一个可行的解决方案。
words.en_def: An organism that is able to live and develop.

words.mnemonic_zh: vibr（振动）+ ant（……的），振动的就是有活力的
words.example_en: The city has a vibrant nightlife with many bars and clubs.
words.example_zh: 这座城市有充满活力的夜生活，有很多酒吧和俱乐部。
words.en_def: Pulsing with energy or activity.

sentences.en: He has a vibrant personality.
sentences.zh: 他个性充满活力。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“歪丝”，歪的习惯就是恶习
words.example_en: Smoking is a common vice that harms health.
words.example_zh: 吸烟是一种常见的危害健康的恶习。
words.en_def: A bad habit.

sentences.en: Gluttony is a vice, not a virtue.
sentences.zh: 暴食是一种恶习，而不是一种美德。

sentences.en: A. B. was appointed postmaster vice C. D. resigned.
sentences.zh: A. B. 被任命为邮政副局长，C. D. 辞职。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表“具有…性质的”
words.mnemonic_zh: 有恶习的人往往很恶毒
words.example_en: The vicious dog attacked the passer - by.
words.example_zh: 那只恶狗袭击了路人。
words.en_def: Violent, destructive and cruel.

words.mnemonic_zh: 住在村庄里的人就是村民
words.example_en: The villagers are very friendly to the tourists.
words.example_zh: 村民们对游客非常友好。
words.en_def: A person who lives in, or comes from, a village.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“围殴累他”，违法的事会让人受累
words.example_en: You shouldn't violate the traffic rules.
words.example_zh: 你不应该违反交通规则。
words.en_def: To break or disregard (a rule or convention).

sentences.en: Accessing unauthorized files violates security protocol.
sentences.zh: 访问未经授权的文件违反了安全协议。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: violate 的名词形式，表违反的行为
words.example_en: His violation of the contract led to a lawsuit.
words.example_zh: 他违反合同引发了一场诉讼。
words.en_def: The act or an instance of violating or the condition of being violated.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“我特优”，有很多优点和美德
words.example_en: Honesty is an important virtue in society.
words.example_zh: 诚实是社会中一项重要的美德。
words.en_def: Accordance with moral principles; conformity of behaviour or thought with the strictures of morality; good moral conduct.

sentences.en: Without virtue, there is no freedom.
sentences.zh: 没有美德，就没有自由。

words.mnemonic_zh: 和声音有关的，就是有声的
words.example_en: He is a vocal critic of the new policy.
words.example_zh: 他是新政策直言不讳的批评者。
words.en_def: A vocal sound; specifically, a purely vocal element of speech, unmodified except by resonance; a vowel or a diphthong; a tonic element; a tonic; distinguished from a subvocal, and a nonvocal

sentences.en: vocal problems
sentences.zh: 声音问题

sentences.en: vocal melody
sentences.zh: 声乐旋律

sentences.en: a vocal sound
sentences.zh: 声音

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“我”，我许下的承诺就是誓言
words.example_en: They made a vow to love each other forever.
words.example_zh: 他们发誓永远相爱。
words.en_def: A solemn promise to perform some act, or behave in a specified manner, especially a promise to live and act in accordance with the rules of a religious order.

sentences.en: The old hermit, up in the mountains, took a vow of silence.
sentences.zh: 老隐士在山上发誓保持沉默。

sentences.en: The wronged woman vowed revenge.
sentences.zh: 受委屈的女人发誓要报仇。

sentences.en: The rebels vowed to continue their fight.
sentences.zh: 叛军发誓要继续战斗。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: vulner 易受伤，加上后缀表其性质
words.example_en: The system's vulnerability needs to be fixed.
words.example_zh: 系统的脆弱性需要修复。
words.en_def: Susceptibility to attack or injury; the state or condition of being weak or poorly defended.

sentences.en: The country recognized their defence vulnerability after an airplane landed in front of the central square without any consequences.
sentences.zh: 一架飞机降落在中心广场前但没有造成任何后果后，该国认识到了自己的防御脆弱性。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示“可…的；易…的”
words.mnemonic_zh: vulner 易受伤，加上后缀表易受伤害的
words.example_en: Children are more vulnerable to diseases.
words.example_zh: 儿童更容易患病。
words.en_def: More or most likely to be exposed to the chance of being attacked or harmed, either physically or emotionally.

sentences.en: It's okay to get vulnerable every now and again.
sentences.zh: 时不时地变得脆弱是没关系的。

sentences.en: a vulnerable PC with no antivirus software
sentences.zh: 没有防病毒软件的易受攻击的电脑

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“我得”，生病我得去病房
words.example_en: The nurse checked on the patients in the ward regularly.
words.example_zh: 护士定期查看病房里的病人。
words.en_def: A warden; a guard; a guardian or watchman.

words.mnemonic_zh: 存放东西的房子就是仓库
words.example_en: They stored a lot of goods in the warehouse.
words.example_zh: 他们把很多货物存放在仓库里。
words.en_def: A place for storing large amounts of products. In logistics, a place where products go to from the manufacturer before going to the retailer.

sentences.en: the warehousing of syndicated TV shows
sentences.zh: 联合电视节目的仓储

words.mnemonic_zh: 战争的进展就是战争状态
words.example_en: Modern warfare has changed a lot compared to the past.
words.example_zh: 与过去相比，现代战争有了很大变化。
words.en_def: The waging of war or armed conflict against an enemy.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“我认他”，有授权令才认他
words.example_en: The police need a warrant to search the house.
words.example_zh: 警察搜查这所房子需要授权令。
words.en_def: Authorization or certification; a sanction, as given by a superior.

sentences.en: a warrant of authenticity; a warrant for success
sentences.zh: 真实性保证； 成功的保证

sentences.en: an arrest warrant issued by the court
sentences.zh: 法院发出的逮捕令

sentences.en: That tree is going to fall, I’ll warrant.
sentences.zh: 我保证那棵树会倒下。

words.mnemonic_zh: 参与战争的人就是战士
words.example_en: The warrior showed great courage in the battle.
words.example_zh: 这位战士在战斗中表现出极大的勇气。
words.en_def: A person who is actively engaged in battle, conflict or warfare; a soldier or combatant.

words.mnemonic_zh: 使变得弱
words.example_en: Lack of sleep can weaken your immune system.
words.example_zh: 睡眠不足会削弱你的免疫系统。
words.en_def: To make weaker or less strong.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“围屋”，围屋里编织
words.example_en: She can weave beautiful baskets with bamboo strips.
words.example_zh: 她能用竹条编织出漂亮的篮子。
words.en_def: A type or way of weaving.

sentences.en: That rug has a very tight weave.
sentences.zh: 那块地毯的编织非常紧密。

sentences.en: This loom weaves yarn into sweaters.
sentences.zh: 这台织机将纱线织成毛衣。

sentences.en: Spiders weave beautiful but deadly webs.
sentences.zh: 蜘蛛编织着美丽但致命的网。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“喂的”，喂的草里可能有杂草
words.example_en: The garden was full of weeds.
words.example_zh: 花园里长满了杂草。
words.en_def: Any plant regarded as unwanted at the place where, and at the time when it is growing.

sentences.en: If it isn't in a straight line or marked with a label, it's a weed.
sentences.zh: 如果它不是在一条直线上或没有标记，那就是杂草。

sentences.en: I weeded my flower bed.
sentences.zh: 我给花坛除草。

sentences.en: He wore a weed on his hat.
sentences.zh: 他的帽子上戴着一根杂草。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“喂哦”，喂哦，做得很好
words.example_en: He plays the piano very well.
words.example_zh: 他钢琴弹得非常好。
words.en_def: In good health.

sentences.en: I had been sick, but now I'm well.
sentences.zh: 我本来病过，但现在好了。

sentences.en: “How are you?” — “I'm well, thank you!”
sentences.zh: “你好吗？” ——“我很好，谢谢你！”

sentences.en: He does his job well.
sentences.zh: 他的工作做得很好。

words.mnemonic_zh: 不管是什么
words.example_en: Whatever happens, we should stay calm.
words.example_zh: 无论发生什么，我们都应该保持冷静。
words.en_def: Unexceptional or unimportant; blah.

sentences.en: There is no point whatever in going on with this discussion.
sentences.zh: 继续这个讨论没有任何意义。

sentences.en: Whatever he does, he will still lose the game.
sentences.zh: 无论他做什么，他仍然会输掉比赛。

sentences.en: I’ll do whatever I can.
sentences.zh: 我会尽我所能。

words.mnemonic_zh: what（什么）加上soever加强语气，表无论什么
words.example_en: There is no doubt whatsoever that he will succeed.
words.example_zh: 毫无疑问，他会成功的。
words.en_def: Whatever.

sentences.en: He gave me no answer whatsoever.
sentences.zh: 他没有给我任何答复。

words.mnemonic_zh: where（哪里）加by（通过），表凭借的方式
words.example_en: They devised a plan whereby they could solve the problem.
words.example_zh: 他们想出了一个能解决问题的办法。
words.en_def: (interrogative) By what, in which direction; how.

sentences.en: Whereby goest thou?
sentences.zh: 你要去哪里？

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“外思特”，联想外面思考时，即当……时候
words.example_en: Whilst he was reading, the phone rang.
words.example_zh: 他正在看书时，电话响了。
words.en_def: (rare or literary in North America) While, at the same time.

sentences.en: Drivers must switch off engines whilst on stand.
sentences.zh: 驾驶员必须在停车时关闭发动机。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像鞭子抽打声“ whip ”
words.example_en: The rider began to whip the horse to make it run faster.
words.example_zh: 骑手开始鞭打马，让它跑得更快。
words.en_def: A lash; a pliant, flexible instrument, such as a rod (commonly of cane or rattan) or a plaited or braided rope or thong (commonly of leather) used to create a sharp "crack" sound for directing or herding animals.

sentences.en: I had to use the whip to get the sheep's attention.
sentences.zh: 我不得不用鞭子来引起羊的注意。

sentences.en: I was going to vote against the bill, but the party whip came to see me and made it clear I needed to vote for it.
sentences.zh: 我本来打算投票反对该法案，但党鞭来见我并明确表示我需要投票支持该法案。

sentences.en: Did you want to add some whip to your coffee, ma'am?
sentences.zh: 女士，您想在咖啡中加点鞭子吗？

words.mnemonic_zh: whole（全部）加ly变副词，表全部地
words.example_en: He is wholly dedicated to his scientific research.
words.example_zh: 他全身心地投入到科学研究中。
words.en_def: Completely and entirely; to the fullest extent.

sentences.en: A creature wholly given to brawls and wine.
sentences.zh: 一种完全沉迷于争吵和酗酒的生物。

words.mnemonic_zh: wide（宽）加en，使变宽
words.example_en: They plan to widen the road next year.
words.example_zh: 他们计划明年拓宽这条路。
words.en_def: To become wide or wider.

sentences.en: His eyes widened as her negligee fell to the floor.
sentences.zh: 当她的睡衣掉到地板上时，他睁大了眼睛。

sentences.en: She widened his trousers for him.
sentences.zh: 她为他拉宽了裤子。

sentences.en: The police widened their enquiries.
sentences.zh: 警方扩大了调查范围。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“未到”，联想丈夫未到身边，即寡妇
words.example_en: The kind - hearted widow often helps the poor.
words.example_zh: 这位善良的寡妇经常帮助穷人。
words.en_def: A woman whose spouse has died (and who has not remarried); feminine of widower.

words.mnemonic_zh: wide（宽）加th变名词，表宽度
words.example_en: The width of the river is about 200 meters.
words.example_zh: 这条河的宽度大约是200米。
words.en_def: The state of being wide.

sentences.en: Manchester United like to play with width.
sentences.zh: 曼联喜欢打宽度。

words.mnemonic_zh: willing（愿意的）加ness变名词，表意愿
words.example_en: His willingness to help others is really admirable.
words.example_zh: 他乐于助人的意愿真的很令人钦佩。
words.en_def: The state of being willing

sentences.en: All it takes is a willingness to learn.
sentences.zh: 所需要的只是学习的意愿。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像擦东西时的“ whi ”声
words.example_en: Please wipe the table after dinner.
words.example_zh: 晚饭后请擦一下桌子。
words.en_def: The act of wiping something.

sentences.en: multiple wipes of a computer's hard disk
sentences.zh: 多次擦除计算机硬盘

sentences.en: I wiped the sweat from my brow with the back of my hand.
sentences.zh: 我用手背擦了擦额头上的汗。

sentences.en: I accidentally wiped my hard drive.
sentences.zh: 我不小心擦掉了我的硬盘。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“慧特”，特别有智慧
words.example_en: His quick wit helped him solve the difficult problem.
words.example_zh: 他的急智帮助他解决了那个难题。
words.en_def: (now usually in the plural) Sanity.

sentences.en: He's gone completely out of his wits.
sentences.zh: 他完全失去了理智。

sentences.en: Where she has gone to is beyond the wit of man to say.
sentences.zh: 她去了哪里，是人类无法说清的。

sentences.en: My father had a quick wit and a steady hand.
sentences.zh: 我的父亲头脑敏捷，手脚沉稳。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或行为的结果
words.mnemonic_zh: with（向后）+ draw（拉）+ al，向后拉即撤回
words.example_en: The company's withdrawal from the project surprised everyone.
words.example_zh: 公司从该项目中撤资让所有人都很惊讶。
words.en_def: Receiving from someone's care what one has earlier entrusted to them. Usually refers to money.

sentences.en: caffeine withdrawal
sentences.zh: 咖啡因戒断

words.root_cn: work（工作、锻炼）+ out（出去），引申为锻炼到外面去，即高强度锻炼
words.mnemonic_zh: work（工作）+ out（出去），出去工作引申为出去锻炼
words.example_en: He does a strenuous workout at the gym every morning.
words.example_zh: 他每天早上都在健身房进行高强度锻炼。
words.en_def: An exercise session; a period of physical exercise.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“我是陪”，我是陪偶像的人，即崇拜
words.example_en: Many people worship famous athletes for their achievements.
words.example_zh: 很多人因著名运动员的成就而崇拜他们。
words.en_def: The condition of being worthy; honour, distinction.

sentences.en: We worship at the church down the road.
sentences.zh: 我们在路边的教堂做礼拜。

words.root_cn: worth（值得）+ while（一段时间），值得花一段时间去做
words.mnemonic_zh: worth（值得）+ while（时间），值得花时间的
words.example_zh: 阅读一本好书是值得做的事。
words.example_en: Reading a good book is a worthwhile thing to do.
words.en_def: Good and important enough to spend time, effort, or money on.

sentences.en: Doing volunteer work to help others is truly worthwhile.
sentences.zh: 做志愿者工作来帮助别人确实是值得的。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有某种性质
words.mnemonic_zh: worth（价值）+ y，有价值的就是值得的
words.example_en: This charity is worthy of our support.
words.example_zh: 这个慈善机构值得我们支持。
words.en_def: A distinguished or eminent person

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“耶哦”，激动时大喊的声音
words.example_en: He began to yell when he saw the snake.
words.example_zh: 他看到蛇时开始大喊起来。
words.en_def: A shout.

sentences.en: He yelled directions to the party from the car.
sentences.zh: 他在车里大声喊着去聚会的方向。

sentences.en: If I come home late again, my dad is gonna yell at me.
sentences.zh: 如果我再晚回家，我爸爸就会对我大喊大叫。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“一丢”，放弃一点即屈服让步
words.example_en: The tree yields a lot of fruit every year.
words.example_zh: 这棵树每年产出很多果实。
words.en_def: To pay, give in payment; repay, recompense; reward; requite.

sentences.en: Yield the right of way to pedestrians.
sentences.zh: 给行人让路。

sentences.en: They refuse to yield to the enemy.
sentences.zh: 他们拒绝向敌人屈服。

sentences.en: Historically, that security yields a high return.
sentences.zh: 从历史上看，这种证券会产生高回报。

words.mnemonic_zh: young（年轻）+ ster（人），年轻人
words.example_en: The youngsters in the community often play basketball together.
words.example_zh: 社区里的年轻人经常一起打篮球。
words.en_def: A young person.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词或名词后缀，表相关的人或物
words.mnemonic_zh: ad（去）+ olesc（成长）+ ent，去成长的人就是青少年
words.example_en: Adolescents often face various challenges during their growth.
words.example_zh: 青少年在成长过程中常常会面临各种挑战。
words.en_def: A person who is in adolescence; someone who has reached puberty but is not yet an adult.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: ad（去）+ opt（选择）+ ion，去选择（孩子等）就是收养，选择方法等就是采用
words.example_en: The adoption of new technology has improved the efficiency.
words.example_zh: 新技术的采用提高了效率。
words.en_def: The act of adopting.

sentences.en: A Chinese baby girl was given away for adoption.
sentences.zh: 一名中国女婴被送人收养。

sentences.en: the adoption of people into hospitals or monasteries
sentences.zh: 将人们收养到医院或修道院

sentences.en: the adoption of opinions
sentences.zh: 意见的通过

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“爱倒特”，成年人爱倒腾特别的事
words.example_en: Adults should take more responsibilities in society.
words.example_zh: 成年人在社会中应该承担更多责任。
words.en_def: A fully grown human or animal.

sentences.en: an adult human, animal, or plant
sentences.zh: 成年人、动物或植物

sentences.en: adult clothes
sentences.zh: 成人衣服

sentences.en: This program contains adult content. Parental discretion is advised.
sentences.zh: 该节目包含成人内容。 建议家长酌情决定。

words.mnemonic_zh: ad（去）+ vers（转）+ e，转向不好的方向就是不利的
words.example_en: Adverse weather conditions affected the harvest this year.
words.example_zh: 不利的天气条件影响了今年的收成。
words.en_def: Unfavorable; antagonistic in purpose or effect; hostile; actively opposing one's interests or wishes; contrary to one's welfare; acting against; working in an opposing direction.

sentences.en: adverse criticism
sentences.zh: 不利的批评

sentences.en: adverse circumstances
sentences.zh: 不利的情况

sentences.en: the adverse page
sentences.zh: 不利页面

words.mnemonic_zh: ad（向）+ vis（见解）+ er（人），给出见解的人就是顾问
words.example_en: The financial adviser provided useful suggestions.
words.example_zh: 财务顾问提供了有用的建议。
words.en_def: One who advises

words.suffix_cn: 动词或名词后缀，表动作或人
words.mnemonic_zh: ad（向）+ voc（呼喊）+ ate，向着大众呼喊就是提倡
words.example_en: She advocates for environmental protection actively.
words.example_zh: 她积极倡导环境保护。
words.en_def: Someone whose job is to speak for someone's case in a court of law; a counsel.

sentences.en: Since she started working with her advocate, she has become much more confident.
sentences.zh: 自从她开始与她的倡导者一起工作以来，她变得更加自信。

sentences.en: I like trees, but I do not advocate living in them.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢树，但我不提倡住在树里。

sentences.en: We have been advocating for changes in immigration law.
sentences.zh: 我们一直主张修改移民法。

words.mnemonic_zh: aesth（感觉）+ ic，对美有感觉的就是审美的
words.example_en: This building has unique aesthetic features.
words.example_zh: 这座建筑有独特的美学特征。
words.en_def: The study of art or beauty.

sentences.en: Her most recent works have this quirky, half-serious 90's teen culture-inspired aesthetic.
sentences.zh: 她最近的作品具有这种古怪、半严肃的 90 年代青少年文化风格的审美观。

sentences.en: It works well enough, but the shabby exterior offends his aesthetic sensibilities.
sentences.zh: 它运作良好，但破旧的外观冒犯了他的审美情感。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: af（加强）+ fect（影响）+ ion，被对方深深影响就产生喜爱之情
words.example_en: She showed deep affection for her pet dog.
words.example_zh: 她对她的宠物狗表现出深深的喜爱。
words.en_def: The act of affecting or acting upon.

sentences.en: I have a lot of affection for my little sister.
sentences.zh: 我对我的小妹妹很有感情。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表相关特征
words.mnemonic_zh: af（加强）+ flu（流动）+ ent，钱不断流动就是富裕的
words.example_en: The affluent area has many high - end shops.
words.example_zh: 这个富裕的地区有很多高档商店。
words.en_def: Somebody who is wealthy.

sentences.en: They were affluent, but aspired to true wealth.
sentences.zh: 他们很富裕，但渴望真正的财富。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示能够...的
words.mnemonic_zh: af（加强）+ ford（承受）+ able，能够承受花费的就是负担得起的
words.example_en: They found an affordable apartment near the school.
words.example_zh: 他们在学校附近找到了一套负担得起的公寓。
words.en_def: Able to be afforded; inexpensive or reasonably priced.

sentences.en: an affordable vacation in the local area
sentences.zh: 在当地度过一个经济实惠的假期

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“绑的”，就是捆绑的意思
words.example_en: Please bind these books together with a rope.
words.example_zh: 请用绳子把这些书捆在一起。
words.en_def: That which binds or ties.

sentences.en: the Maróczy Bind
sentences.zh: 马罗奇绑定

sentences.en: Just to make the cheese more binding
sentences.zh: 只是为了让奶酪更有粘合力

sentences.en: I wish I knew why the sewing machine binds up after I use it for a while.
sentences.zh: 我希望我知道为什么缝纫机在使用一段时间后会粘住。

words.mnemonic_zh: 关于生命的书写就是传记
words.example_en: He wrote a biography of his favorite author.
words.example_zh: 他写了一本他最喜欢的作家的传记。
words.en_def: A person's life story, especially one published.

sentences.en: There are many biographies of Benjamin Franklin.
sentences.zh: 本杰明·富兰克林的传记有很多。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“逼生”，逼出来就是出生
words.example_en: The birth of the baby brought joy to the family.
words.example_zh: 婴儿的出生给这个家庭带来了欢乐。
words.en_def: The process of childbearing; the beginning of life.

sentences.en: Intersex babies account for roughly one per cent of all births.
sentences.zh: 双性婴儿大约占所有出生婴儿的百分之一。

sentences.en: the birth of an empire
sentences.zh: 一个帝国的诞生

sentences.en: He was of noble birth, but fortune had not favored him.
sentences.zh: 他出身高贵，但命运并没有眷顾他。

words.mnemonic_zh: 想象主教站在高处，“逼首”众人
words.example_en: The bishop delivered a sermon in the cathedral.
words.example_zh: 主教在大教堂里布道。
words.en_def: An overseer of congregations: either any such overseer, generally speaking, or (in Eastern Orthodoxy, Catholicism, Anglicanism, etc.) an official in the church hierarchy (actively or nominally) governing a diocese, supervising the church's priests, deacons, and property in its territory.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“必砸”，奇异的东西可能会被砸
words.example_en: He had a bizarre dream last night.
words.example_zh: 他昨晚做了个怪诞的梦。
words.en_def: Strangely unconventional in style or appearance.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“不累的”，好刀片用着不累
words.example_en: Be careful with the sharp blade of the knife.
words.example_zh: 小心这把刀锋利的刀刃。
words.en_def: The sharp cutting edge of a knife, chisel, or other tool, a razor blade/sword.

sentences.en: Want to go blading with me later in the park?
sentences.zh: 稍后想和我一起去公园玩滑冰吗？

sentences.en: The gang member got bladed in a fight.
sentences.zh: 该帮派成员在打斗中被砍伤。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“爆炸它”，就是爆炸的意思
words.example_en: The blast destroyed several buildings in the area.
words.example_zh: 爆炸摧毁了该地区的几座建筑物。
words.en_def: A violent gust of wind.

sentences.en: many tons of iron were melted at a blast
sentences.zh: 许多吨铁一下子就被熔化了

sentences.en: We had a blast at the party last night.
sentences.zh: 昨晚我们在聚会上玩得很开心。

sentences.en: an e-mail blast; a fax blast
sentences.zh: 电子邮件群发； 传真爆炸

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“不流的”，反着理解就是流血
words.example_en: His wound began to bleed after he moved.
words.example_zh: 他一动，伤口就开始流血了。
words.en_def: An incident of bleeding, as in haemophilia.

sentences.en: If her nose bleeds, try to use ice.
sentences.zh: 如果她的鼻子流血，请尝试使用冰块。

sentences.en: The company was bleeding talent.
sentences.zh: 公司正在流失人才。

sentences.en: Ink traps counteract bleeding.
sentences.zh: 墨水陷阱可以抵消出血。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“不蓝的”，混合后颜色就变了
words.example_en: Blend these two colors to create a new one.
words.example_zh: 把这两种颜色混合，调出一种新颜色。
words.en_def: A mixture of two or more things.

sentences.en: Our department has a good blend of experienced workers and young promise.
sentences.zh: 我们部门拥有经验丰富的员工和年轻有为的员工。

sentences.en: To make hummus you need to blend chickpeas, olive oil, lemon juice and garlic.
sentences.zh: 要制作鹰嘴豆泥，您需要混合鹰嘴豆、橄榄油、柠檬汁和大蒜。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“不累死”，被祝福就不会太累
words.example_en: May God bless you with good health.
words.example_zh: 愿上帝保佑你身体健康。
words.en_def: To make something holy by religious rite, sanctify.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，常表示行为、状态或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: bless（祝福）加上 ing 变成祝福之事
words.example_en: Her support was a real blessing during that difficult time.
words.example_zh: 在那段艰难时期，她的支持真是一种恩赐。
words.en_def: To make something holy by religious rite, sanctify.

sentences.en: We will not proceed without the executive director's blessing.
sentences.zh: 没有执行董事的批准我们不会继续进行。

sentences.en: After two weeks of sun, last night's rainfall was a blessing.
sentences.zh: 经过两周的阳光照射，昨晚的降雨是一件幸事。

words.mnemonic_zh: blind（瞎的）加 ness 表瞎的状态
words.example_en: His blindness to the problem led to many mistakes.
words.example_zh: 他对问题的盲目导致了许多错误。
words.en_def: The condition of being blind; unable to see.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“不乐可”，被阻挡当然不乐意
words.example_en: The fallen tree blocked the entire road.
words.example_zh: 倒下的树挡住了整条路。
words.en_def: A substantial, often approximately cuboid, piece of any substance.

sentences.en: a block of ice
sentences.zh: 一块冰

sentences.en: Anne Boleyn placed her head on the block and awaited her execution.
sentences.zh: 安妮·博林将头放在刑台上等待处决。

sentences.en: I'm going for a walk around the block.
sentences.zh: 我要去街区散步。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表“有……的；如……的”
words.mnemonic_zh: blood（血）加 y 变成有血的
words.example_en: The scene after the accident was a bloody mess.
words.example_zh: 事故后的场景一片血腥狼藉。
words.en_def: To draw blood from one's opponent in a fight.

sentences.en: All that remained of his right hand after the accident was a bloody stump.
sentences.zh: 事故发生后，他的右手只剩下血淋淋的残肢。

sentences.en: There have been bloody battles between the two tribes.
sentences.zh: 两个部落之间曾发生过血腥的战斗。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“抱的”，可以抱着的板子
words.example_en: They wrote the notice on a small wooden board.
words.example_zh: 他们把通知写在一块小木板上。
words.en_def: A relatively long, wide and thin piece of any material, usually wood or similar, often for use in construction or furniture-making.

sentences.en: Each player starts the game with four counters on the board.
sentences.zh: 每个玩家开始游戏时棋盘上有四个计数器。

sentences.en: We have to wait to hear back from the board.
sentences.zh: 我们必须等待董事会的回复。

sentences.en: Room and board
sentences.zh: 食宿

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“波斯的”，像波斯人爱自夸
words.example_en: He always boasts about his achievements at work.
words.example_zh: 他总是吹嘘自己在工作中的成就。
words.en_def: A brag; ostentatious positive appraisal of oneself.

sentences.en: It was his regular boast that he could eat two full English breakfasts in one sitting.
sentences.zh: 他经常吹嘘自己可以一口气吃两顿全套英式早餐。

sentences.en: His family boasted a famous name.
sentences.zh: 他的家族享有盛名。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“薄拿死”，薄薄的奖金也得拿下
words.example_en: The employees received a generous bonus this year.
words.example_zh: 员工们今年获得了丰厚的奖金。
words.en_def: Something extra that is good; an added benefit.

sentences.en: The employee of the week receives a bonus for his excellent work.
sentences.zh: 本周的最佳员工因其出色的工作而获得奖金。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似爆炸声，繁荣发展如爆炸般迅猛
words.example_en: The city experienced an economic boom last year.
words.example_zh: 这座城市去年经历了经济繁荣。
words.en_def: A low-pitched, resonant sound, such as of an explosion.

sentences.en: The boom of the surf.
sentences.zh: 海浪的轰鸣。

sentences.en: You should prepare for the coming boom in the tech industry.
sentences.zh: 您应该为科技行业即将到来的繁荣做好准备。

sentences.en: I can hear the organ slowly booming from the chapel.
sentences.zh: 我能听到教堂里缓缓响起的管风琴声。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“剥肉”，借书如剥人肉（难还）
words.example_zh: 他经常从图书馆借书。
words.example_en: He often borrows books from the library.
words.en_def: Deviation of the path of a rolling ball from a straight line; slope; slant.

sentences.en: This putt has a big left-to right borrow on it.
sentences.zh: 这个推杆有一个很大的从左到右的借位。

sentences.en: to borrow the style, manner, or opinions of another
sentences.zh: 借用他人的风格、方式或观点

sentences.en: Can I borrow a sheet of paper?
sentences.zh: 我可以借一张纸吗？

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“棒死”，球反弹起来很带劲
words.example_en: The ball can easily bounce off the wall.
words.example_zh: 球很容易从墙上反弹回来。
words.en_def: A change of direction of motion after hitting the ground or an obstacle.

sentences.en: Them pro-ballers got bounce!
sentences.zh: 他们的职业球员得到了反弹！

sentences.en: The tennis ball bounced off the wall before coming to rest in the ditch.
sentences.zh: 网球从墙上弹起，然后停在沟里。

sentences.en: He bounces nervously on his chair.
sentences.zh: 他紧张地在椅子上弹跳。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“巴迪”，像喊好友名字
words.example_en: He always hangs out with his buddy after work.
words.example_zh: 他下班后总是和他的伙伴一起出去玩。
words.en_def: A friend or casual acquaintance.

sentences.en: They have been buddies since they were in school.
sentences.zh: 他们从上学时起就是好朋友。

sentences.en: drinking buddies
sentences.zh: 酒友

sentences.en: Hey, buddy, I think you dropped this.
sentences.zh: 嘿，伙计，我想你把这个丢了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“巴弗”，能把冲击“弗”掉
words.example_en: The buffer between the two countries helps maintain peace.
words.example_zh: 两国之间的缓冲区有助于维护和平。
words.en_def: Of the color of buff leather, a brownish yellow.

sentences.en: The bouncer was a big, buff dude with tattoos, a shaved head, and a serious scowl.
sentences.zh: 保镖是个身材高大、皮肤黝黑的家伙，身上有纹身，剃着光头，一脸严肃的表情。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“伯克”，能吃下大量食物
words.example_en: The bulk of the work was done last week.
words.example_zh: 大部分工作上周就完成了。
words.en_def: Size, specifically, volume.

sentences.en: I understood the bulk of what you were saying, just one of two points I need to hear again.
sentences.zh: 我明白你所说的大部分内容，只是我需要再次听到的两点之一。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质
words.mnemonic_zh: bulk（大量）加 y，东西多就庞大
words.example_en: The bulky furniture takes up too much space.
words.example_zh: 那些笨重的家具占了太多空间。
words.en_def: Being large in size, mass, or volume.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“不利”，恶霸带来不利
words.example_en: The school is taking measures to deal with bullies.
words.example_zh: 学校正在采取措施对付恶霸。
words.en_def: A person who is intentionally, physically, or emotionally cruel to others; especially to those who are weaker or have less power or privilege.

sentences.en: A playground bully pushed a girl off the swing.
sentences.zh: 一名操场恶霸将一名女孩从秋千上推下。

sentences.en: You shouldn't bully people for being gay.
sentences.zh: 你不应该因为别人是同性恋而欺负他们。

sentences.en: a bully horse
sentences.zh: 一匹恶霸马

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“蹦扑”，碰撞时动作像蹦着扑过去
words.example_en: The car bumped along the rough road.
words.example_zh: 汽车在崎岖的道路上颠簸行驶。
words.en_def: A light blow or jolting collision.

sentences.en: the bump of veneration; the bump of acquisitiveness
sentences.zh: 崇敬的碰撞； 占有欲的冲击

sentences.en: US presidential nominees get a post-convention bump in survey ratings.
sentences.zh: 美国总统候选人在大会结束后的调查支持率有所上升。

sentences.en: I bumped the font size up to make my document easier to read.
sentences.zh: 我增大了字体大小，使文档更易于阅读。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“钵凳”，背着钵凳是负担
words.example_en: Taking care of the elderly can be a heavy burden.
words.example_zh: 照顾老人可能是一个沉重的负担。
words.en_def: A heavy load.

sentences.en: a ship of a hundred tons burden
sentences.zh: 一百吨载重的船

sentences.en: A burden of gad steel is 120 pounds.
sentences.zh: 一担 Gad 钢重 120 磅。

sentences.en: to burden a nation with taxes
sentences.zh: 给国家带来税收负担

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示统治、政体
words.mnemonic_zh: bureau（办公室）加 cracy，办公室统治就是官僚主义
words.example_en: The bureaucracy often slows down the decision - making process.
words.example_zh: 官僚机构常常会减慢决策过程。
words.en_def: Government by bureaus or their administrators or officers.

sentences.en: At that time the administration replaced the system of patronage in the civil service with a bureaucracy.
sentences.zh: 当时，政府以官僚机构取代了公务员制度中的恩赐制度。

sentences.en: The bureaucracy is expanding to meet the needs of the expanding bureaucracy. (apocryphal quip)
sentences.zh: 官僚机构不断扩大是为了满足不断扩大的官僚机构的需要。 （杜撰的俏皮话）

sentences.en: The head of the civil service promised to clamp down on bureaucracy.
sentences.zh: 公务员系统负责人承诺打击官僚主义。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: bury（埋葬）加 al，变成埋葬的行为
words.example_en: The burial ceremony was held in a quiet cemetery.
words.example_zh: 葬礼在一个安静的墓地举行。
words.en_def: The act of burying; interment

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“爆死特”，很容易爆炸
words.example_en: The balloon will burst if you blow it too hard.
words.example_zh: 如果你用力吹气球，它会爆的。
words.en_def: An act or instance of bursting.

sentences.en: The bursts of the bombs could be heard miles away.
sentences.zh: 炸弹爆炸的声音几英里外都能听到。

sentences.en: I blew the balloon up too much, and it burst.
sentences.zh: 我把气球吹得太大了，结果它爆炸了。

sentences.en: I burst the balloon when I blew it up too much.
sentences.zh: 当我把气球吹得太大时，我把气球炸破了。

words.cn_def: 与电有关的；电气科学的
words.mnemonic_zh: electr（电）加 ical 后缀，和电相关
words.example_en: The electrical system in this building needs an upgrade.
words.example_zh: 这栋楼的电气系统需要升级。
words.en_def: An electrical engineer.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: eleg（高雅）加 ance 成名词表高雅状态
words.example_en: Her elegance at the party impressed everyone.
words.example_zh: 她在聚会上的优雅举止给每个人都留下了深刻印象。
words.en_def: Grace, refinement, and beauty in movement, appearance, or manners.

sentences.en: The bride was elegance personified.
sentences.zh: 新娘是优雅的化身。

sentences.en: The simple dress had a quiet elegance.
sentences.zh: 简单的连衣裙有一种安静的优雅。

sentences.en: The proof of the theorem had a pleasing elegance.
sentences.zh: 该定理的证明非常优雅。

words.mnemonic_zh: e（向上）+ lev（上升）+ ate，使向上提升
words.example_en: The new policy aims to elevate the living standards.
words.example_zh: 新政策旨在提高生活水平。
words.en_def: To raise (something) to a higher position.

sentences.en: The doctor told me elevating my legs would help reduce the swelling.
sentences.zh: 医生告诉我抬高双腿可以帮助减轻肿胀。

sentences.en: The traditional worldview elevates man as the pinnacle of creation.
sentences.zh: 传统的世界观将人提升为创造的顶峰。

sentences.en: A talented chef can elevate everyday ingredients into gourmet delights.
sentences.zh: 才华横溢的厨师可以将日常食材提升为美食。

words.mnemonic_zh: e（出来）+ lig（选）+ ible（可……的），可选出来的
words.example_en: Only those over 18 are eligible for this job.
words.example_zh: 只有 18 岁以上的人有资格申请这份工作。
words.en_def: One who is eligible.

words.mnemonic_zh: e（出）+ limin（界限）+ ate，使出界限即消除
words.example_en: We should eliminate all the potential risks.
words.example_zh: 我们应该消除所有潜在风险。
words.en_def: To completely remove, get rid of, put an end to.

sentences.en: a ruthless mobster who eliminated his enemies
sentences.zh: 消灭了敌人的残酷暴徒

sentences.en: Bill was eliminated as a suspect when the police interviewed witnesses.
sentences.zh: 当警方采访目击者时，比尔被排除为嫌疑人。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“一立特”，特别突出的一群人即精英
words.example_en: The country's economic elite gathered for a summit.
words.example_zh: 该国的经济精英们齐聚一堂参加峰会。
words.en_def: A special group or social class of people which have a superior intellectual, social or economic status as, the elite of society.

words.mnemonic_zh: em（使进入）+ bark（船），使进入船即上船
words.example_zh: 他们下个月将开始一项新的商业项目。
words.example_en: They will embark on a new business project next month.
words.en_def: To get on a boat or ship or (outside the USA) an aeroplane.

sentences.en: All passengers please embark now.
sentences.zh: 请所有旅客立即登机。

sentences.en: Phil embarked on his journey yesterday.
sentences.zh: 菲尔昨天开始了他的旅程。

sentences.en: He embarked his fortune in trade.
sentences.zh: 他通过贸易发家致富。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: em（使）+ barrass（阻碍）+ ment，使人受阻的状态
words.example_en: His mistake caused a lot of embarrassment at the meeting.
words.example_zh: 他的错误在会议上造成了很大的尴尬。
words.en_def: A state of discomfort arising from bashfulness or consciousness of having violated a social rule; humiliation.

sentences.en: Kevin, you are an embarrassment to this family.
sentences.zh: 凯文，你让这个家庭感到尴尬。

words.cn_def: 大使馆；大使馆全体人员
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“俺办事”，大使馆就是办事的地方
words.example_en: The embassy provides various services for its citizens.
words.example_zh: 大使馆为其公民提供各种服务。
words.en_def: The function or duty of an ambassador.

sentences.en: The American embassy to France is located in Paris.
sentences.zh: 美国驻法国大使馆位于巴黎。

words.mnemonic_zh: em（使进入）+ bed（底座），使进入底座即嵌入
words.example_en: They embedded the jewels in the crown.
words.example_zh: 他们把珠宝嵌入了皇冠。
words.en_def: An embedded reporter or journalist, such as a war reporter assigned to and travelling with a military unit, or a political reporter assigned to follow and report on the campaign of a candidate.

sentences.en: to embed something in clay, mortar, or sand
sentences.zh: 将某物嵌入粘土、砂浆或沙子中

sentences.en: We wanted to embed our reporter with the Fifth Infantry Division, but the Army would have none of it.
sentences.zh: 我们想让我们的记者加入第五步兵师，但陆军不同意。

sentences.en: The instructions showed how to embed a chart from the spreadsheet within the wordprocessor document.
sentences.zh: 这些说明展示了如何将电子表格中的图表嵌入到字处理器文档中。

words.mnemonic_zh: 使思想进入身体，即体现
words.example_en: The statue embodies the spirit of the nation.
words.example_zh: 这座雕像体现了这个国家的精神。
words.en_def: To represent in a physical or concrete form; to incarnate or personify.

sentences.en: As the car salesman approached, wearing a plaid suit and slicked-back hair, he seemed to embody sleaze.
sentences.zh: 当汽车推销员走近时，他穿着格子西装，头发向后梳，看起来很肮脏。
