sentences.en: The US Constitution aimed to embody the ideals of diverse groups of people, from Puritans to Deists.
sentences.zh: 美国宪法旨在体现从清教徒到自然神论等不同群体的理想。

words.mnemonic_zh: 使进入怀抱，即拥抱、接受
words.example_en: She decided to embrace the new challenge bravely.
words.example_zh: 她决定勇敢地接受新挑战。
words.en_def: An act of putting arms around someone and bringing the person close to the chest; a hug.

sentences.en: I wholeheartedly embrace the new legislation.
sentences.zh: 我全心全意地接受新立法。

sentences.en: Natural philosophy embraces many sciences.
sentences.zh: 自然哲学涵盖许多科学。

words.mnemonic_zh: 从浸没状态出来，即出现
words.example_en: The sun emerged from behind the clouds.
words.example_zh: 太阳从云层后面露了出来。
words.en_def: To come into view.

sentences.en: He emerged unscathed from the accident.
sentences.zh: 他在事故中毫发无伤。

sentences.en: Gradually the truth emerged.
sentences.zh: 真相渐渐浮出​​水面。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: emerge的名词形式，表出现的状态
words.example_en: The emergence of new technologies has changed our lives.
words.example_zh: 新技术的出现改变了我们的生活。
words.en_def: The act of rising out of a fluid, or coming forth from envelopment or concealment, or of rising into view; sudden uprising or appearance.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 向外送出，即排放，加-ion成名词
words.example_en: The emission of greenhouse gases must be reduced.
words.example_zh: 必须减少温室气体的排放。
words.en_def: Something which is emitted or sent out; issue.

sentences.en: the emission was mostly blood
sentences.zh: 排出物主要是血液

sentences.en: the emission of heat from a fire
sentences.zh: 火灾散发的热量

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“俺怕惹”，皇帝谁不怕惹
words.example_en: The emperor ruled the country with absolute power.
words.example_zh: 皇帝以绝对权力统治着这个国家。
words.morph_note: 该词历史词源复杂，不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: The male monarch or ruler of an empire.

sentences.en: The Investiture Controversy was a conflict between the Emperor and the Pope.
sentences.zh: 册封之争是皇帝与教皇之间的冲突。

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想皇帝（emperor）统治的范围即帝国
words.example_en: The Roman Empire was once very powerful.
words.example_zh: 罗马帝国曾经非常强大。
words.morph_note: 该词历史词源复杂，不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: (furniture) Following or imitating a style popular during the First French Empire (1804–1814).

sentences.en: the Russian empire
sentences.zh: 俄罗斯帝国

sentences.en: The Empire of Vietnam was a short-lived client state of Japan governing Vietnam between March 11 and August 23, 1945.
sentences.zh: 越南帝国是日本的一个短暂附庸国，在 1945 年 3 月 11 日至 8 月 23 日期间统治越南。

sentences.en: the McDonald's fast food empire
sentences.zh: 麦当劳快餐帝国

words.cn_def: 经验主义的；基于经验的
words.mnemonic_zh: 使进入尝试，靠经验尝试得出的
words.example_en: Empirical evidence supports this theory.
words.example_zh: 经验证据支持这一理论。
words.en_def: Pertaining to or based on experience.

words.mnemonic_zh: 使进入工作，即雇用、使用
words.example_en: The company employs a lot of young people.
words.example_zh: 这家公司雇用了很多年轻人。
words.en_def: The state of being an employee; employment.

sentences.en: The school district has six thousand teachers in its employ.
sentences.zh: 该学区有六千名教师。

sentences.en: Yesterday our local garage employed a new mechanic.
sentences.zh: 昨天我们当地的车库雇用了一位新机械师。

sentences.en: The burglar employed a jemmy to get in.
sentences.zh: 窃贼雇了一个混蛋闯了进来。

words.mnemonic_zh: 使进入权力范围，即授权、赋能
words.example_en: The new law empowers the police to search houses.
words.example_zh: 新法律授权警察搜查房屋。
words.en_def: To give permission, power, or the legal right to do something.

sentences.en: John found that starting up his own business empowered him greatly in social situations.
sentences.zh: 约翰发现自己创业可以让他在社交场合中获得很大的能力。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: etern似“一疼”，一直疼，可联想为永恒
words.example_en: The stars in the sky seem to have an eternal existence.
words.example_zh: 天空中的星星似乎有着永恒的存在。
words.en_def: One who lives forever; an immortal.

sentences.en: some eternal villain
sentences.zh: 某个永恒的恶棍

words.root_cn: 来自希腊语，意为民族、种族
words.mnemonic_zh: ethn发音似“爱神”，不同民族有不同爱神
words.example_en: This region is famous for its rich ethnic cultures.
words.example_zh: 这个地区以其丰富的民族文化而闻名。
words.en_def: An ethnic person, especially a foreigner or member of an immigrant community.

sentences.en: There are many ethnic Indonesians in the Netherlands
sentences.zh: 荷兰有很多印尼裔

sentences.en: I like to eat ethnic food
sentences.zh: 我喜欢吃民族食物

words.mnemonic_zh: e-出，vacu空，使地方空出来即疏散
words.example_en: People were ordered to evacuate the building immediately.
words.example_zh: 人们被命令立即撤离这栋大楼。
words.en_def: To leave or withdraw from; to quit; to retire from

sentences.en: The firefighters told us to evacuate the area as the flames approached.
sentences.zh: 当火势逼近时，消防队员告诉我们撤离该地区。

sentences.en: The firefighters decided to evacuate all the inhabitants from the street.
sentences.zh: 消防队员决定疏散街上的所有居民。

sentences.en: The scientist evacuated the chamber before filling it with nitrogen.
sentences.zh: 科学家在充入氮气之前先抽空了腔室。

words.mnemonic_zh: e-出，valu价值，得出价值即评估
words.example_en: They need to evaluate the performance of the new system.
words.example_zh: 他们需要评估新系统的性能。
words.en_def: To draw conclusions from examining; to assess.

sentences.en: It will take several years to evaluate the material gathered in the survey.
sentences.zh: 评估调查中收集的材料需要几年时间。

sentences.en: Evaluate this integral.
sentences.zh: 评估这个积分。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 由evaluate变来，ate变ation成名词
words.example_en: The teacher's evaluation of the students' work is fair.
words.example_zh: 老师对学生作业的评价是公平的。
words.en_def: An assessment, such as an annual personnel performance review used as the basis for a salary increase or bonus, or a summary of a particular situation.

words.mnemonic_zh: e-出，voke召唤，召唤出情感等即唤起
words.example_en: The old photo can evoke many memories of the past.
words.example_zh: 这张旧照片能唤起许多过去的回忆。
words.en_def: To call out; to draw out or bring forth.

sentences.en: Being here evokes long forgotten memories.
sentences.zh: 来到这里唤起了人们早已遗忘的记忆。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与…有关的
words.mnemonic_zh: 由evolve演变而来，加ionary变形容词
words.example_en: The evolutionary process of species is very complex.
words.example_zh: 物种的进化过程非常复杂。
words.en_def: Of or relating to the biological theory of evolution.

sentences.en: The evolutionary history of marine mammals includes land-dwelling ancestors.
sentences.zh: 海洋哺乳动物的进化史包括陆地祖先。

words.mnemonic_zh: e-出，volv滚动，不断滚动发展即进化
words.example_en: Life on Earth has evolved over billions of years.
words.example_zh: 地球上的生命已经进化了数十亿年。
words.en_def: To move in regular procession through a system.

sentences.en: to evolve odours
sentences.zh: 进化出气味

words.mnemonic_zh: ex-过度，agger堆积，过度堆积就是夸大
words.example_en: He always tends to exaggerate his achievements.
words.example_zh: 他总是倾向于夸大自己的成就。
words.en_def: To overstate, to describe more than is fact.

sentences.en: He said he'd slept with hundreds of girls, but I know he's exaggerating. The real number is about ten.
sentences.zh: 他说他睡过数百个女孩，但我知道他有些夸张。 真实数量大约是十个。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 由exaggerate变来，ate变ation成名词
words.example_en: His story is full of exaggeration and fiction.
words.example_zh: 他的故事充满了夸张和虚构。
words.en_def: The act of heaping or piling up.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有…性质
words.mnemonic_zh: femin（女性）加上 ine，就是有女性特质的
words.example_en: She has a very feminine way of speaking.
words.example_zh: 她说话方式很有女性特质。
words.en_def: That which is feminine.

sentences.en: Mary, Elizabeth, and Edith are feminine names.
sentences.zh: 玛丽、伊丽莎白和伊迪丝都是女性名字。

words.mnemonic_zh: femin（女性）加 ist（人），就是为女性权益奋斗的人
words.example_en: The feminist advocates for gender equality.
words.example_zh: 这位女权主义者倡导性别平等。
words.en_def: An advocate of feminism; a person who believes in bringing about the equality of the sexes (of women and men) in all aspects of public and private life

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“费布尔”，可联想费很大劲扯的布尔（东西）是纤维
words.example_en: Eating foods rich in fibre is good for health.
words.example_zh: 吃富含纤维的食物有益健康。
words.en_def: A single piece of a given material, elongated and roughly round in cross-section, often twisted with other fibres to form thread.

sentences.en: The microscope showed several different fibres stuck to the sole of the shoe.
sentences.zh: 显微镜显示有几种不同的纤维粘在鞋底上。

sentences.en: The cloth was made from strange, somewhat rough fibre.
sentences.zh: 这块布是用奇怪的、有些粗糙的纤维制成的。

sentences.en: Fresh vegetables are a good source of fibre.
sentences.zh: 新鲜蔬菜是纤维的良好来源。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: fict（虚构）加 ion（结果），就是虚构出来的小说
words.example_en: Most of his stories are pure fiction.
words.example_zh: 他的大多数故事纯属虚构。
words.en_def: Literary type using invented or imaginative writing, instead of real facts, usually written as prose.

sentences.en: I am a great reader of fiction.
sentences.zh: 我非常喜欢小说。

sentences.en: The butler’s account of the crime was pure fiction.
sentences.zh: 管家对犯罪的描述纯属虚构。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“飞蛾死”，可联想飞蛾遇到凶猛情况会死
words.example_en: The fierce dog barked at strangers.
words.example_zh: 那只凶猛的狗对着陌生人狂吠。
words.en_def: Exceedingly violent, severe, ferocious, cruel or savage.

sentences.en: A fierce storm battered the coast.
sentences.zh: 一场猛烈的风暴袭击了海岸。

sentences.en: We made a fierce attempt to escape.
sentences.zh: 我们猛烈地试图逃跑。

sentences.en: The lion gave a fierce roar.
sentences.zh: 狮子发出剧烈的吼叫声。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: fig（塑造）加 ure（结果），塑造出来的就是人物、图形等
words.example_en: The famous historical figure is well - known.
words.example_zh: 这位著名的历史人物广为人知。
words.en_def: A drawing or diagram conveying information.

sentences.en: a figure in bronze; a figure cut in marble
sentences.zh: 青铜雕像； 大理石雕刻的人物

sentences.en: He cut a sorry figure standing there in the rain.
sentences.zh: 他站在雨中，样子很可怜。

sentences.en: The muslin was of a pretty figure.
sentences.zh: 平纹细布的身材很漂亮。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“费力”，装满东西有时挺费力
words.example_en: Please fill the glass with water.
words.example_zh: 请把杯子装满水。
words.en_def: To occupy fully, to take up all of.

sentences.en: the bucket filled with rain;  the sails fill with wind
sentences.zh: 桶里装满了雨水； 风帆充满风

sentences.en: My heart filled with joy.
sentences.zh: 我的心里充满了喜悦。

sentences.en: The pharmacist filled my prescription for penicillin.
sentences.zh: 药剂师给我配了青霉素处方。

words.mnemonic_zh: filtr（过滤）加 er（物），就是用来过滤的东西
words.example_en: The water filter can remove impurities.
words.example_zh: 这个水过滤器能去除杂质。
words.en_def: A device which separates a suspended, dissolved, or particulate matter from a fluid, solution, or other substance; any device that separates one substance from another.

sentences.en: He runs an email filter to catch the junk mail.
sentences.zh: 他运行一个电子邮件过滤器来捕获垃圾邮件。

sentences.en: He's got no filter, and he's always offending people as a result.
sentences.zh: 他没有过滤器，因此总是得罪人。

sentences.en: If (1) the universal set (here, the set of natural numbers) were called a "large" set, (2) the superset of any "large" set were also a "large" set, and (3) the intersection of a pair of "large" sets were also a "large" set, then the set of all "large" sets would form a filter.
sentences.zh: 如果（1）通用集合（这里是自然数的集合）被称为“大”集合，（2）任何“大”集合的超集也是“大”集合，并且（3）一对“大”集合的交集也是“大”集合，那么所有“大”集合的集合将形成一个过滤器。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有…性质
words.mnemonic_zh: filth（肮脏）加 y，就是肮脏的
words.example_en: He lives in a filthy apartment.
words.example_zh: 他住在一个肮脏的公寓里。
words.en_def: To make very dirty; to cover in filth.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“范”，可以联想模范是美好的
words.example_en: It's a fine day for a picnic.
words.example_zh: 这是个适合野餐的好天气。
words.en_def: Fine champagne; French brandy.

sentences.en: They filtered silt and fines out of the soil.
sentences.zh: 他们从土壤中过滤掉淤泥和细粉。

sentences.en: to fine gold
sentences.zh: 精金

sentences.en: to fine the soil
sentences.zh: 细化土壤

words.mnemonic_zh: 能喷火的武器，就是火器
words.example_en: The police confiscated several illegal firearms during the raid.
words.example_zh: 警方在突袭行动中没收了多支非法枪支。
words.en_def: A personal weapon that uses explosive powder to propel a projectile often made of lead.

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想东西刚好放入合适位置
words.example_en: This dress doesn't fit her well, so she needs a bigger size.
words.example_zh: 这条连衣裙她穿着不合身，所以她需要大一号的。
words.en_def: The degree to which something fits.

sentences.en: Since he put on weight, his jeans have been a tight fit.
sentences.zh: 自从他体重增加以来，他的牛仔裤就变得紧身了。

sentences.en: It's hard to get a good fit using second-hand parts.
sentences.zh: 使用二手零件很难获得良好的配合。

sentences.en: The Wonder Bread advertising research results showed the “White Picket Fence” commercial had strong fit ratings.
sentences.zh: Wonder Bread 广告研究结果显示，“白色栅栏”广告具有很强的契合度。

words.mnemonic_zh: 固定好的东西就是固定装置
words.example_en: The bathroom fixtures in this hotel are of high quality.
words.example_zh: 这家酒店的浴室设备质量很好。
words.en_def: Something that is fixed in place, especially a permanent appliance or other item of personal property that is considered part of a house and is sold with it; compare fitting, furnishing.

sentences.en: The device is available in both handheld and fixtured models.
sentences.zh: 该设备有手持式和固定式两种型号。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“弗莱尔”，联想天才人物名字
words.example_en: She has a real flair for painting and may become a great artist.
words.example_zh: 她在绘画方面很有天赋，可能会成为一名伟大的艺术家。
words.en_def: A natural or innate talent or aptitude.

sentences.en: to have a flair for art
sentences.zh: 有艺术天赋

sentences.en: to dress with flair
sentences.zh: 穿得有品味

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“服了”，有缺点让人服了
words.example_en: This beautiful vase has a small flaw at the bottom.
words.example_zh: 这个漂亮的花瓶底部有一个小瑕疵。
words.en_def: A flake, fragment, or shiver.

sentences.en: That vase has a flaw.
sentences.zh: 那个花瓶有一个缺陷。

words.mnemonic_zh: 有缺点的就是有缺陷的
words.example_en: His plan was flawed and couldn't be carried out.
words.example_zh: 他的计划有缺陷，无法实施。
words.en_def: Having a flaw or imperfection.

sentences.en: Flawed diamonds are generally not used in jewellery.
sentences.zh: 有缺陷的钻石一般不用于珠宝。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“飞离”，像飞一样离开，即逃走
words.example_en: The criminals fled from the scene as soon as they saw the police.
words.example_zh: 罪犯们一看到警察就逃离了现场。
words.en_def: To run away; to escape.

sentences.en: The prisoner tried to flee, but was caught by the guards.
sentences.zh: 囚犯试图逃跑，但被看守抓住。

sentences.en: Many people fled the country as war loomed.
sentences.zh: 随着战争的临近，许多人逃离该国。

sentences.en: Ethereal products flee once freely exposed to air.
sentences.zh: 一旦自由暴露在空气中，飘逸的产品就会消失。

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想一群船快速行驶像快速移动的团体
words.example_en: A fleet of ships is sailing towards the distant island.
words.example_zh: 一支船队正驶向遥远的岛屿。
words.en_def: A group of vessels or vehicles.

sentences.en: a ship that fleets the gulf
sentences.zh: 一艘航行于海湾的船

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“福来是”，肉多是福气
words.example_en: The tiger ate the flesh of the deer quickly.
words.example_zh: 老虎迅速地吃掉了鹿的肉。
words.en_def: The soft tissue of the body, especially muscle and fat.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 有弯曲的特性就是有灵活性
words.example_en: Yoga can improve your flexibility and balance.
words.example_zh: 瑜伽可以提高你的柔韧性和平衡能力。
words.en_def: The quality of being flexible; suppleness; pliability.

sentences.en: I had some flexibility in terms of whether to stay in a hotel or in a bed-and-breakfast.
sentences.zh: 我可以灵活选择入住酒店还是住宿加早餐旅馆。

words.mnemonic_zh: 花(flour)开意味着繁荣兴旺，加后缀ish成动词
words.example_en: The business will flourish if it is well - managed.
words.example_zh: 如果经营得当，这家企业将会繁荣兴旺。
words.en_def: A dramatic gesture such as the waving of a flag.

sentences.en: With many flourishes of the captured banner, they marched down the avenue.
sentences.zh: 他们高举夺取的旗帜，沿着大道行进。

sentences.en: His signature ended with a flourish.
sentences.zh: 他的签名以华丽的结束。

sentences.en: The trumpets blew a flourish as they entered the church.
sentences.zh: 当他们进入教堂时，号角吹响了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想水流动的声音，发音似“flow”
words.example_en: Rivers flow into the sea all the time.
words.example_zh: 河流一直在流入大海。
words.en_def: A movement in people or things with a particular way in large numbers or amounts

sentences.en: The notion of flow is basic to the study of ordinary differential equations.
sentences.zh: 流动的概念是常微分方程研究的基础。

sentences.en: The room was small, but it had good symmetry and flow.
sentences.zh: 房间虽小，但对称性和流动性很好。

sentences.en: Other devices measure water flow in streams fed by melted ice.
sentences.zh: 其他设备测量由融化的冰供给的溪流中的水流量。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质
words.mnemonic_zh: flu(流动)加id，像水一样能流动的
words.example_en: Water is a common fluid substance.
words.example_zh: 水是一种常见的流体物质。
words.en_def: Any substance which can flow with relative ease, tends to assume the shape of its container, and obeys Bernoulli's principle; a liquid, gas or plasma.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“佛喽”，联想跟着佛走
words.example_en: You should follow the rules at school.
words.example_zh: 你应该在学校遵守规则。
words.en_def: (sometimes attributive) In billiards and similar games, a stroke causing a ball to follow another ball after hitting it.

sentences.en: a follow shot
sentences.zh: 跟拍

sentences.en: Follow that car!
sentences.zh: 跟着那辆车！

sentences.en: B follows A in the alphabet.
sentences.zh: B 在字母表中位于 A 之后。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示集合、总量等
words.mnemonic_zh: foot(可联想拍摄用的脚步移动范围)加age，代表拍摄的片段
words.example_en: The news showed some footage of the accident.
words.example_zh: 新闻展示了一些事故的片段。
words.en_def: An amount of film or tape that has been used to record something.

sentences.en: The footage we shot at the riot yesterday got ruined.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天在骚乱中拍摄的镜头被毁了。

words.mnemonic_zh: foot(脚)和step(步伐)组合，就是脚步
words.example_en: She heard his footsteps approaching.
words.example_zh: 她听到他的脚步声正在靠近。
words.en_def: The mark or impression left by a foot; a track.

sentences.en: The child watched as his footsteps in the sand were washed away by the waves.
sentences.zh: 孩子看着自己在沙滩上的足迹被海浪冲走。

sentences.en: To walk the footsteps of greatness requires that you start at the bottom of a long stair.
sentences.zh: 要踏上伟大的脚步，就需要从长楼梯的底部开始。

sentences.en: The footsteps of the students echoed in the empty hall.
sentences.zh: 空荡荡的大厅里，回荡着学生们的脚步声。

words.mnemonic_zh: 可结合常用短语记忆，如“for you”
words.example_en: He bought a gift for his mother.
words.example_zh: 他为他的母亲买了一份礼物。

words.mnemonic_zh: fore(外)加ign(土地)再加er(人)，就是外面土地来的人
words.example_en: Many foreigners come to visit this city every year.
words.example_zh: 每年有许多外国人来参观这座城市。
words.en_def: A person from a foreign country.

words.mnemonic_zh: fore(预先)加see(看)，提前看到就是预见
words.example_en: Few people could foresee the consequences of the decision.
words.example_zh: 很少有人能预见这个决定的后果。
words.en_def: To be able to see beforehand: to anticipate; predict.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“佛之”，联想佛像锻造过程
words.example_en: He tried to forge the signature on the document.
words.example_zh: 他试图伪造文件上的签名。
words.en_def: Furnace or hearth where metals are heated prior to hammering them into shape.

sentences.en: The politician's recent actions are an effort to forge a relationship with undecided voters.
sentences.zh: 这位政治家最近的行动是为了与尚未做出决定的选民建立关系。

sentences.en: He had to forge his ex-wife's signature.  The jury learned the documents had been forged.
sentences.zh: 他不得不伪造前妻的签名。 陪审团得知这些文件是伪造的。

sentences.en: The party of explorers forged through the thick underbrush.
sentences.zh: 探险队在茂密的灌木丛中前进。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“挤呀”，挤动齿轮运转。
words.example_en: The mechanic checked the gears in the car engine carefully.
words.example_zh: 机械师仔细检查了汽车发动机里的齿轮。
words.en_def: Equipment or paraphernalia, especially that used for an athletic endeavor.

sentences.en: They have geared the hotel mainly at tourists.
sentences.zh: 他们的酒店主要面向游客。

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想“记忆因子”，基因携带记忆遗传信息。
words.example_en: Scientists are researching how genes affect human traits.
words.example_zh: 科学家们正在研究基因如何影响人类特征。
words.en_def: A theoretical unit of heredity of living organisms; a gene may take several values and in principle predetermines a precise trait of an organism's form (phenotype), such as hair color.

sentences.en: A change in a gene is reflected in the protein or RNA molecule that it codes for.
sentences.zh: 基因的变化反映在其编码的蛋白质或 RNA 分子中。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为、过程或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 由“general”（一般的）延伸，归纳出一般性结论。
words.example_en: Making hasty generalizations can lead to inaccurate judgments.
words.example_zh: 仓促进行概括可能会导致不准确的判断。
words.en_def: The formulation of general concepts from specific instances by abstracting common properties.

sentences.en: A hypersphere is a generalization of a sphere across more than three dimensions.
sentences.zh: 超球面是跨越三个以上维度的球体的概括。

words.mnemonic_zh: 让事物变得具有一般性，就是概括推广。
words.example_en: We should not generalize individual cases to the whole group.
words.example_zh: 我们不应将个别情况推广到整个群体。
words.en_def: To speak in generalities, or in vague terms.

words.cn_def: 一般的；通用的；无商标的
words.mnemonic_zh: 与“种类”相关，具有普遍种类的特征。
words.example_en: Generic products are usually cheaper than brand - name ones.
words.example_zh: 通用产品通常比名牌产品便宜。
words.en_def: A product sold under a generic name.

sentences.en: "Shrimp" is the generic name for a number of species of sea creature.
sentences.zh: “虾”是多种海洋生物的总称。

words.mnemonic_zh: 能大量产生给予的，就是慷慨的。
words.example_en: The generous man donated a lot of money to the charity.
words.example_zh: 这位慷慨的男士向慈善机构捐了很多钱。
words.en_def: Noble in behaviour or actions; principled, not petty; kind, magnanimous.

sentences.en: Thank you for your generous words.
sentences.zh: 谢谢你的慷慨之言。

sentences.en: She's been extremely generous with her winnings.
sentences.zh: 她对自己的奖金非常慷慨。

sentences.en: Add a generous helping of mayonnaise.
sentences.zh: 添加大量的蛋黄酱。

words.mnemonic_zh: 和“基因”紧密关联的。
words.example_en: Genetic research has made great progress in recent years.
words.example_zh: 基因研究近年来取得了重大进展。
words.en_def: Relating to genetics or genes.

sentences.en: Chinese has borrowed several words from English, but it does not have a genetic relationship to English.
sentences.zh: 汉语从英语中借用了几个单词，但与英语没有血缘关系。

words.mnemonic_zh: “gen”似“genius”自己创造，天才有创造力。
words.example_en: Einstein is widely recognized as a brilliant genius.
words.example_zh: 爱因斯坦被广泛认为是一位卓越的天才。
words.en_def: Someone possessing extraordinary intelligence or skill; especially somebody who has demonstrated this by a creative or original work in science, music, art etc.

sentences.en: I think that would qualify as not smart, but genius... and a very stable genius at that!
sentences.zh: 我认为这不是聪明，而是天才……而且是一个非常稳定的天才！

sentences.en: a work of genius.
sentences.zh: 天才的作品。

sentences.en: What a genius idea!
sentences.zh: 多么天才的想法啊！

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示杀戮、毁灭
words.mnemonic_zh: 对某个种族的杀戮行为。
words.example_en: The world should never forget the horror of genocide.
words.example_zh: 世界永远不应忘记种族灭绝的恐怖。
words.en_def: The systematic killing of substantial numbers of people on the basis of their ethnicity, religion, political beliefs, social status, or other particularities.

sentences.en: A genocide will always be followed by the denial that it ever happened.
sentences.zh: 种族灭绝之后总会有人否认它曾经发生过。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“枕头”，给人温柔的感觉。
words.example_en: The gentle breeze made the leaves rustle softly.
words.example_zh: 轻柔的微风使树叶沙沙作响。
words.en_def: A person of high birth.

sentences.en: Stuart is a gentle man; he would never hurt you.
sentences.zh: 斯图尔特是一个温柔的人； 他永远不会伤害你。

sentences.en: I felt something touch my shoulder; it was gentle and a little slimy.
sentences.zh: 我感觉有什么东西碰了碰我的肩膀； 它很温和，有点粘糊糊的。

sentences.en: We had a gentle swim in the lake.
sentences.zh: 我们在湖里轻轻地游泳。

words.mnemonic_zh: 出身(genu)纯正的就是真的
words.example_en: This antique vase is a genuine work of art from the Ming Dynasty.
words.example_zh: 这个古董花瓶是明代真正的艺术品。
words.en_def: Belonging to, or proceeding from the original stock; native

sentences.en: a genuine text;  a genuine production;  genuine materials; genuine friendship
sentences.zh: 真实的文本； 正品制作； 真材实料； 真诚的友谊

words.mnemonic_zh: 研究地球(geo)的学科(logy)
words.example_en: He is an expert in geology and has explored many mountains.
words.example_zh: 他是地质学专家，勘探过许多山脉。
words.en_def: The science that studies the structure of the earth (or other planets), together with its origin and development, especially by examination of its rocks.

sentences.en: The geology of the Alps.
sentences.zh: 阿尔卑斯山的地质。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“折磨”，细菌会折磨人
words.example_en: Washing hands often can prevent germs from spreading.
words.example_zh: 经常洗手可以防止细菌传播。
words.en_def: The small mass of cells from which a new organism develops; a seed, bud or spore.

sentences.en: the germ of civil liberty
sentences.zh: 公民自由的萌芽

words.mnemonic_zh: 动名词有动作产生(ger)的意味
words.example_en: In English, a gerund often functions as a noun.
words.example_zh: 在英语中，动名词常作名词用。
words.en_def: (grammar) A verbal form that functions as a verbal noun. (In English, a gerund has the same spelling as a present participle, but functions differently; however, this distinction may be ambiguous or unclear and so is no longer made in some modern texts such as A Comprehensive Grammar of the English Language and The Cambridge Grammar of the English Language)

words.mnemonic_zh: 身体移动(gest)形成的动作(ure)就是手势
words.example_en: He made a friendly gesture to welcome the guests.
words.example_zh: 他做了个友好的手势来欢迎客人。
words.en_def: A motion of the limbs or body, especially one made to emphasize speech.

sentences.en: The middle-finger gesture is really a nonverbal swear.
sentences.zh: 中指手势实际上是一种非语言的咒骂。

sentences.en: We took flowers as a gesture of sympathy.
sentences.zh: 我们接受鲜花以表示同情。

sentences.en: My dad said to never gesture with my hands when I talk.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸告诉我说话时不要用手做手势。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“尖头”，巨人在人群中似出头鸟
words.example_en: The story tells about a brave boy who defeated a giant.
words.example_zh: 这个故事讲的是一个勇敢的男孩打败了巨人。
words.en_def: A mythical human of very great size.

sentences.en: The retail giant is set to acquire two more struggling high-street chains.
sentences.zh: 这家零售巨头将收购另外两家陷入困境的商业连锁店。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“给福特”，像给福特送的东西就是礼物
words.example_en: She received a beautiful gift on her birthday.
words.example_zh: 她生日时收到了一份漂亮的礼物。
words.en_def: Something given to another voluntarily, without charge.

sentences.en: She had a gift for playing the flute.
sentences.zh: 她有吹长笛的天赋。

sentences.en: The office is in the gift of the President.
sentences.zh: 该办公室是总统赠予的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 有礼物(gift)般天赋的(ed)
words.example_en: The gifted child showed great talent in painting.
words.example_zh: 这个有天赋的孩子在绘画方面展现出了非凡的才能。
words.en_def: To give as a gift or donation.

sentences.en: a gifted artist
sentences.zh: 一位有天赋的艺术家

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“各拉莫”，大家都被拉动，有魅力
words.example_en: The old town has a special glamour that attracts many tourists.
words.example_zh: 这座古镇有独特的魅力，吸引了很多游客。
words.en_def: Originally, enchantment; magic charm; especially, the effect of a spell that causes one to see objects in a form that differs from reality, typically to make filthy, ugly, or repulsive things seems beauteous.

sentences.en: glamour magazines; a glamour model
sentences.zh: 魅力杂志； 魅力模特

sentences.en: The idea or being a movie star has lost its glamour for me.
sentences.zh: 成为电影明星的想法对我来说已经失去了魅力。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“格兰斯”，快速看一眼像格兰斯的动作
words.example_en: She glanced at her watch and realized she was late.
words.example_zh: 她瞥了一眼手表，意识到自己迟到了。
words.en_def: A brief or cursory look.

sentences.en: copper glance
sentences.zh: 铜色一瞥

sentences.en: She glanced at her reflection as she passed the mirror.
sentences.zh: 经过镜子时，她看了一眼自己的倒影。

sentences.en: The spring sunlight was glancing on the water of the pond.
sentences.zh: 春天的阳光洒在池塘的水面上。

words.mnemonic_zh: 和glance发音像，都和看有关
words.example_en: He caught a glimpse of her as she crossed the road.
words.example_zh: 她过马路时，他瞥见了她。
words.en_def: A brief look, glance, or peek.

sentences.en: I only got a glimpse of the car, so I can tell you the colour but not the registration number.
sentences.zh: 我只瞥见了这辆车，所以我可以告诉你颜色，但不能告诉你车牌号。

sentences.en: I have only begun to glimpse the magnitude of the problem.
sentences.zh: 我才刚刚开始意识到问题的严重性。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: global（全球的）加上表示行为的后缀成全球化
words.example_en: Globalization has greatly influenced the world economy.
words.example_zh: 全球化极大地影响了世界经济。
words.en_def: The process of becoming a more interconnected world.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示‘充满……的’
words.mnemonic_zh: glory（荣耀）加 -ous 变成充满荣耀的
words.example_en: They achieved a glorious victory in the final game.
words.example_zh: 他们在决赛中取得了辉煌的胜利。
words.en_def: Exhibiting attributes, qualities, or acts that are worthy of or receive glory.

sentences.en: glorious deeds
sentences.zh: 光荣事迹

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想为‘哥老有荣耀’
words.example_en: He dedicated his life to the glory of his country.
words.example_zh: 他一生都献给了国家的荣耀。
words.en_def: Great or overwhelming beauty or splendour.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音类似‘古德’，可联想古人品德好
words.example_en: This is a good opportunity to learn new skills.
words.example_zh: 这是学习新技能的好机会。
words.en_def: (of people)

sentences.en: The soup is good and hot.
sentences.zh: 汤又好又热。

sentences.en: Good Friday
sentences.zh: 耶稣受难日

sentences.en: Good! I can leave now.
sentences.zh: 好的！ 我现在可以离开了。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: govern（管理）加 -ance 表管理这件事
words.example_en: Effective governance is crucial for a country's development.
words.example_zh: 有效的治理对一个国家的发展至关重要。
words.en_def: The process, or the power, of governing; government or administration.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像‘格蕾丝’，优雅的女子名
words.example_en: She moved with grace across the dance floor.
words.example_zh: 她在舞池中优雅地移动着。
words.en_def: Charming, pleasing qualities.

sentences.en: The Princess brought grace to an otherwise dull and boring party.
sentences.zh: 公主给原本沉闷乏味的聚会带来了优雅。

sentences.en: It has become less common to say grace before having dinner.
sentences.zh: 吃晚饭前做祷告已经变得不那么常见了。

sentences.en: The dancer moved with grace and strength.
sentences.zh: 舞者的动作优雅而有力。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示‘充满……的’
words.mnemonic_zh: grace（优雅）加 -ful 成充满优雅的
words.example_en: The ballerina gave a graceful performance.
words.example_zh: 那位芭蕾舞女演员的表演很优雅。
words.en_def: Having or showing grace in movement, shape, or proportion.

sentences.en: She is a graceful dancer.
sentences.zh: 她是一位优雅的舞者。

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想学生去登‘grade’（年级）台阶
words.example_en: He is in the ninth grade this year.
words.example_zh: 他今年上九年级。
words.en_def: A rating.

sentences.en: I gave him a good grade for effort.
sentences.zh: 我给了他努力的好成绩。

sentences.en: He got a good grade on the test.
sentences.zh: 他考试取得了好成绩。

sentences.en: The grade of this hill is more than 5 percent.
sentences.zh: 这座山的坡度超过百分之五。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像‘壮观的’
words.example_en: They visited a grand palace during the trip.
words.example_zh: 他们在旅行中参观了一座宏伟的宫殿。
words.en_def: (plural "grand") A thousand of some unit of currency, such as dollars or pounds. (Compare G.)

sentences.en: a grand army
sentences.zh: 一支伟大的军队

sentences.en: His simple vision has transformed into something far more grand.
sentences.zh: 他简单的愿景已经转变为更加宏伟的目标。

sentences.en: The Grand Viziers of the Ottoman Empire.
sentences.zh: 奥斯曼帝国的大维齐尔。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“格力扑”，像用力扑上去紧紧抓住
words.example_en: He gripped the railing tightly to keep his balance.
words.example_zh: 他紧紧抓住栏杆以保持平衡。
words.en_def: To take hold of, particularly with the hand.

sentences.en: After a few slips, the tires gripped the pavement.
sentences.zh: 经过几次打滑后，轮胎紧紧抓住了路面。

sentences.en: He grips me.
sentences.zh: 他抓住我。

sentences.en: Let’s grip (get a coffee, hang, take a break, see a movie, etc.)
sentences.zh: 让我们抓紧时间（喝杯咖啡、闲逛、休息一下、看电影等）

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有…性质
words.cn_def: 扣人心弦的；引人入胜的
words.mnemonic_zh: grip（抓）+ ing，像被紧紧抓住注意力
words.example_en: The detective story is a gripping one that I can't put it down.
words.example_zh: 这个侦探故事扣人心弦，我简直爱不释手。
words.en_def: To take hold of, particularly with the hand.

sentences.en: After a few slips, the tires gripped the pavement.
sentences.zh: 经过几次打滑后，轮胎紧紧抓住了路面。

sentences.en: He grips me.
sentences.zh: 他抓住我。

sentences.en: Let’s grip (get a coffee, hang, take a break, see a movie, etc.)
sentences.zh: 让我们抓紧时间（喝杯咖啡、闲逛、休息一下、看电影等）

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“果罗斯”，像把所有果子加起来的总数
words.example_en: The gross income of the company this year is quite high.
words.example_zh: 该公司今年的总收入相当高。
words.en_def: Twelve dozen = 144.

sentences.en: The movie grossed three million on the first weekend.
sentences.zh: 该片首周末票房收入三百万美元。

sentences.en: a gross mistake;  gross injustice;  gross negligence; a gross insult
sentences.zh: 严重错误； 严重不公正； 重大过失； 严重侮辱

sentences.en: gross domestic product; gross income; gross weight
sentences.zh: 国内生产总值; 总收入； 毛重

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“格鲁普”，想象一群人围在一起喊口号
words.example_en: A group of students are discussing the project actively.
words.example_zh: 一群学生正在积极讨论这个项目。
words.en_def: A number of things or persons being in some relation to one another.

sentences.en: A group of people gathered in front of the Parliament to demonstrate against the Prime Minister's proposals.
sentences.zh: 一群人聚集在议会前示威，反对总理的提议。

sentences.en: Did you see the new jazz group?
sentences.zh: 你看到新的爵士乐队了吗？

sentences.en: Nitro is an electron-withdrawing group.
sentences.zh: 硝基是吸电子基团。

words.cn_def: 脾气暴躁的；性情乖戾的
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“咕噜脾气”，像肚子咕噜咕噜有坏脾气
words.example_zh: He becomes grumpy when he doesn't get enough sleep.
words.example_en: 他睡眠不足时就会脾气暴躁。
words.en_def: Dissatisfied and irritable.

sentences.en: The old man was grumpy because he couldn’t find his glasses.
sentences.zh: 老人因为找不到眼镜而脾气暴躁。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“ guerrilla 哥瑞啦”，游击队员很英勇
words.example_en: The guerrilla launched a surprise attack on the enemy camp.
words.example_zh: 游击队员对敌军营地发动了突然袭击。
words.en_def: A soldier in a small independent group, fighting against the government or regular forces by surprise raids.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态或行为
words.mnemonic_zh: guid（引导）+ ance，引导的行为
words.example_en: Under the guidance of the teacher, they made great progress.
words.example_zh: 在老师的指导下，他们取得了很大进步。
words.en_def: The act or process of guiding.

sentences.en: divine guidance
sentences.zh: 神圣的指导

words.mnemonic_zh: guide（引导）+ line（线），像引导的线条
words.example_en: We should follow the guidelines to complete the task.
words.example_zh: 我们应该遵循指导方针来完成任务。
words.en_def: A non-specific rule or principle that provides direction to action or behaviour.

sentences.en: He considered the Ten Commandments more a guideline than a requirement.
sentences.zh: 他认为十诫更多的是一个指导方针，而不是一个要求。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“鬼哦特”，像心里有鬼很愧疚
words.example_en: He felt a deep sense of guilt after lying to his friend.
words.example_zh: 他向朋友撒谎后深感内疚。
words.en_def: Responsibility for wrongdoing.

sentences.en: He didn't want to do it, but his wife guilted him into it.
sentences.zh: 他本来不想这么做，但他的妻子却让他感到内疚。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“割它”，想象割开身体看到内脏
words.example_en: The doctor examined his gut to find the cause of pain.
words.example_zh: 医生检查了他的内脏以找出疼痛的原因。
words.en_def: The alimentary canal, especially the intestine.

sentences.en: beer gut
sentences.zh: 啤酒好

sentences.en: I have a funny feeling in my gut.
sentences.zh: 我心里有一种奇怪的感觉。

sentences.en: You should take Intro Astronomy: it's a gut.
sentences.zh: 你应该学习天文学入门：它是一个直觉。

words.mnemonic_zh: habit（居住）的地方就是栖息地
words.example_en: The panda's habitat is mainly in the bamboo forests of China.
words.example_zh: 熊猫的栖息地主要在中国的竹林里。
words.en_def: Conditions suitable for an organism or population of organisms to live.

sentences.en: This park offers important amphibian habitat and breeding area.
sentences.zh: 该公园提供重要的两栖动物栖息地和繁殖区。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“海尔”，想象海尔冰箱里有冰雹
words.example_en: A sudden hail damaged many crops in the field.
words.example_zh: 一场突如其来的冰雹毁坏了田里的许多庄稼。
words.en_def: Balls or pieces of ice falling as precipitation, often in connection with a thunderstorm.

sentences.en: They say it's going to hail tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 他们说明天会下冰雹。

sentences.en: The cloud would hail down furiously within a few minutes.
sentences.zh: 几分钟之内，云就会猛烈地降下来。

sentences.en: He was hailed as a hero.
sentences.zh: 他被誉为英雄。

words.mnemonic_zh: half（一半）+ way（路），走到一半的路
words.example_en: They stopped halfway to rest during the long - distance journey.
words.example_zh: 在长途旅行中，他们中途停下来休息。
words.en_def: Half of the way between two points; midway.

sentences.en: a halfway decent place to sleep
sentences.zh: 一个还算不错的睡觉的地方

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“嚎停”，大声喊停
words.example_en: The police ordered the vehicle to halt immediately.
words.example_zh: 警察命令车辆立即停下。
words.en_def: To limp; move with a limping gait.

sentences.en: The contract negotiations put a halt to operations.
sentences.zh: 合同谈判导致运营停止。

sentences.en: The halt itself never achieved much importance, even with workers coming to and from the adjacent works.
sentences.zh: 即使工人们往返于邻近的工厂，停工本身也从未产生过太大的影响。

sentences.en: The contract negotiations halted operations for at least a week.
sentences.zh: 合同谈判导致运营暂停至少一周。

words.mnemonic_zh: hand（手）+ ful（满），满手的量
words.example_zh: 他只给了孩子们一把糖果。
words.example_en: He gave the children a handful of candies.
words.en_def: The amount that a hand will grasp or contain.

sentences.en: Those twins are a real handful to look after.
sentences.zh: 那些双胞胎确实很难照顾。

words.suffix_cn: 动词的现在分词形式，也可作名词后缀
words.mnemonic_zh: handle（处理）的进行状态就是正在处理
words.example_en: The handling of this complex problem requires patience.
words.example_zh: 处理这个复杂的问题需要耐心。
words.en_def: A touching, controlling, managing, using, take care of, etc., with the hand or hands, or as with the hands.

sentences.en: she handled the news with grace, the Persians handled the French ambassador shamefully
sentences.zh: 她优雅地处理这个消息，而波斯人则可耻地对待法国大使

sentences.en: a merchant handles a variety of goods, or a large stock
sentences.zh: 商人经营多种商品或大量库存

sentences.en: I can't handle this hot weather.
sentences.zh: 我受不了这炎热的天气。

words.mnemonic_zh: hand（手）边的东西，用起来很便利
words.example_en: A smartphone is a very handy device for modern people.
words.example_zh: 智能手机对现代人来说是非常便利的设备。
words.en_def: Easy to use, useful.

sentences.en: Some people regard duct tape as a handy fix-all.
sentences.zh: 有些人认为管道胶带是一种方便的解决方案。

sentences.en: I keep a first-aid kit handy in case of emergency.
sentences.zh: 我手边备有急救箱，以备紧急情况之需。

sentences.en: She's very handy: she made all her own kitchen cupboards.
sentences.zh: 她非常方便：所有的厨房橱柜都是她自己做的。

words.mnemonic_zh: happy（快乐）加上 ly 变成快乐地
words.example_en: The children played happily in the park all afternoon.
words.example_zh: 孩子们整个下午都在公园里快乐地玩耍。
words.en_def: By chance; perhaps.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: harass（骚扰）加上 ment 变成名词骚扰
words.example_en: She reported the harassment to the police immediately.
words.example_zh: 她立即向警方报告了这起骚扰事件。
words.en_def: Persistent attacks and criticism causing worry and distress.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“哈的”，想象哈口气都觉得东西硬
words.example_en: The hard rock is difficult to break.
words.example_zh: 这块坚硬的岩石很难打碎。
words.en_def: A firm or paved beach or slope convenient for hauling vessels out of the water.

sentences.en: The prisoners were sentenced to three years' hard.
sentences.zh: 囚犯被判处三年徒刑。

sentences.en: hard evidence;  a hard requirement
sentences.zh: 确凿的证据； 硬性要求

sentences.en: At the intersection, there are two roads going to the left. Take the hard left.
sentences.zh: 在十字路口，有两条路向左走。 走左边的硬路。

words.mnemonic_zh: 没了家(home)，就变得无家可归(homeless)。
words.example_en: Many homeless people sleep on the streets in winter.
words.example_zh: 许多无家可归的人冬天睡在大街上。
words.en_def: Lacking a permanent place of residence.

sentences.en: Whenever I pass the park, I see the homeless people sleeping on the benches.
sentences.zh: 每当我经过公园时，我都会看到无家可归的人睡在长凳上。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词或动词过去式后缀
words.mnemonic_zh: 获得荣誉(honour)就会受人尊敬(honoured)。
words.example_en: He felt honoured to be invited to the party.
words.example_zh: 他因受邀参加派对而感到荣幸。
words.en_def: To think of highly, to respect highly; to show respect for; to recognise the importance or spiritual value of

sentences.en: The freedom fighters will be forever remembered and honored by the people.
sentences.zh: 自由战士将永远被人民铭记和尊敬。

sentences.en: I trusted you, but you have not honored your promise.
sentences.zh: 我信任你，但你却没有兑现你的承诺。

sentences.en: Ten members of the profession were honored at the ceremony.
sentences.zh: 十名专业人士在颁奖典礼上获得表彰。

words.mnemonic_zh: 钩子形状像倒扣的h，可联想成hook。
words.example_en: Hang your coat on the hook behind the door.
words.example_zh: 把你的外套挂在门后的钩子上。
words.en_def: A rod bent into a curved shape, typically with one end free and the other end secured to a rope or other attachment.

sentences.en: He is not handling this job, so we're giving him the hook.
sentences.zh: 他不负责这项工作，所以我们给他一个机会。

sentences.en: The song's hook snared me.
sentences.zh: 这首歌的魅力吸引了我。

sentences.en: We've added hooks to allow undefined message types to be handled with custom code.
sentences.zh: 我们添加了挂钩以允许使用自定义代码处理未定义的消息类型。

words.mnemonic_zh: 读‘hop’音似蹦跳声，就像在单足跳。
words.example_en: The rabbit can hop very fast in the field.
words.example_zh: 兔子在田野里能蹦跳得很快。
words.en_def: A short jump.

sentences.en: The frog crossed the brook in three or four hops.
sentences.zh: 青蛙三四跳就过了小溪。

sentences.en: Sorry, can't chat. Got to hop.
sentences.zh: 抱歉，无法聊天。 得跳了

sentences.en: He hopped a train to California.
sentences.zh: 他跳上火车前往加利福尼亚州。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示充满…的
words.mnemonic_zh: 内心有希望(hope)，便会充满希望(hopeful)。
words.example_en: The students are hopeful about their future studies.
words.example_zh: 学生们对他们未来的学习充满希望。
words.en_def: Someone who is hoping for success or victory, especially as a candidate in a political election.

sentences.en: Several presidential hopefuls are campaigning in New Hampshire this week.
sentences.zh: 本周，几位总统候选人正在新罕布什尔州竞选。

sentences.en: I am hopeful that I will recover from the disease.
sentences.zh: 我希望我能从病中康复。

words.mnemonic_zh: horizon音似‘好瑞怎’，想象站在好地方看地平线，很祥瑞。
words.example_en: The sun slowly sank below the horizon.
words.example_zh: 太阳慢慢沉入了地平线以下。
words.en_def: The visible horizontal line or point (in all directions) that appears to connect the Earth to the sky.

sentences.en: A tall building was visible on the horizon.
sentences.zh: 地平线上可见一座高楼。

sentences.en: Some students take a gap year after finishing high school to broaden their horizons.
sentences.zh: 有些学生在高中毕业后会休学一年以拓宽视野。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与…有关的
words.mnemonic_zh: 地平线(horizon)的方向就是水平的(horizontal)。
words.example_en: Draw a horizontal line across the paper.
words.example_zh: 在纸上画一条水平线。
words.en_def: A horizontal component of a structure

sentences.en: 1667: As when the Sun new ris'n / Looks through the Horizontal misty Air — John Milton, Paradise Lost, Book 1, ll. 594-5
sentences.zh: 1667 年：当太阳新升起/透过水平薄雾的空气时 — 约翰·弥尔顿，《失乐园》，第 1 册，ll。 594-5

words.mnemonic_zh: horn音似‘哄’，吹喇叭哄人，也是牛角形状。
words.example_en: The bull lowered its horns and charged.
words.example_zh: 公牛低下头，亮出牛角冲了过来。
words.en_def: A hard growth of keratin that protrudes from the top of the head of certain animals, usually paired.

sentences.en: an umbrella with a handle made of horn
sentences.zh: 一把有牛角柄的雨伞

sentences.en: hunting horn
sentences.zh: 狩猎号角

sentences.en: The shot was after the horn and therefore did not count.
sentences.zh: 射击是在号角之后进行的，因此不算在内。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示能够…的，有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 对待客人(hospit)能够友善亲切，就是好客的(hospitable)。
words.example_en: The local people are very hospitable to tourists.
words.example_zh: 当地人对游客非常好客。
words.en_def: Cordial and generous towards guests

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 对客人(hospit)的友好态度和行为，就是好客(hospitality)。
words.example_en: We received great hospitality during our stay there.
words.example_zh: 我们在那里逗留期间受到了盛情款待。
words.en_def: The act or service of welcoming, receiving, hosting, or entertaining guests.

sentences.en: Please thank our hosts for their hospitality during the week that we stayed.
sentences.zh: 请感谢我们的主人在我们入住的一周内的热情款待。

sentences.en: After graduating from college, she found a job in hospitality.
sentences.zh: 大学毕业后，她找到了一份酒店业的工作。

words.mnemonic_zh: 主人热情招呼，发音似‘好客的’
words.example_en: The host welcomed all the guests at the door.
words.example_zh: 主人在门口迎接了所有客人。
words.en_def: One which receives or entertains a guest, socially, commercially, or officially.

sentences.en: A good host is always considerate of the guest’s needs.
sentences.zh: 一个好的主人总是会考虑客人的需求。

sentences.en: Our company is host of the annual conference this year.
sentences.zh: 我公司是今年年会的主办单位。

sentences.en: The host was terrible, but the acts themselves were good.
sentences.zh: 主持人很糟糕，但表演本身很好。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态或事物
words.mnemonic_zh: 主人（host）被控制成了人质（-age）
words.example_en: The police negotiated with the kidnapper to release the hostage.
words.example_zh: 警方与绑匪谈判以释放人质。
words.en_def: A person given as a pledge or security for the performance of the conditions of a treaty or similar agreement, such as to ensure the status of a vassal.

words.root_cn: 主人；原指客人，后引申为敌人
words.mnemonic_zh: 主人（host）态度不友好，变得敌对（-ile）
words.example_en: The hostile crowd shouted at the protesters.
words.example_zh: 怀有敌意的人群对着抗议者大喊大叫。
words.en_def: (chiefly in the plural) An enemy.

sentences.en: a hostile country
sentences.zh: 敌对国家

sentences.en: Microsoft may go hostile in its bid for Yahoo as soon as Friday, according to a published report.
sentences.zh: 据一份已发表的报告称，微软最早可能在周五对雅虎提出敌意收购。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 敌对的（hostile）状态（-ity）就是敌意
words.example_en: The hostility between the two countries led to a war.
words.example_zh: 两国之间的敌对状态导致了一场战争。
words.en_def: The state of being hostile.

sentences.en: My resentment and anger towards you caused hostility and a division between us.
sentences.zh: 我对你的怨恨和愤怒导致了我们之间的敌意和分裂。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘好烫’，就是热
words.example_en: It's too hot to go for a walk outside.
words.example_zh: 天气太热了，不适合出去散步。
words.en_def: (with up) To heat; to make or become hot.

sentences.en: He forgot that the frying pan was hot and burned his hand.
sentences.zh: 他忘记了煎锅是热的，烫伤了他的手。

sentences.en: It is hotter in summer than in winter.
sentences.zh: 夏天比冬天热。

sentences.en: Aren't you hot with that thick coat on?
sentences.zh: 穿这么厚的外套不热吗？

words.suffix_cn: 形容词或副词后缀，每……的/地
words.mnemonic_zh: 每小时（hour）都有规律（-ly）
words.example_en: The hourly wage in this job is quite high.
words.example_zh: 这份工作的时薪相当高。
words.en_def: Something produced each hour.

sentences.en: She never reads her hourly report, but let her hourlies be fifteen minutes late and she raises a ruckus.
sentences.zh: 她从来不看每小时的报告，但如果每小时报告迟到十五分钟，她就会大吵大闹。

sentences.en: There are hourly express buses.
sentences.zh: 有每小时一班的特快巴士。

sentences.en: Express buses depart hourly.
sentences.zh: 特快巴士每小时一班。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果或事物
words.mnemonic_zh: 房子（house）相关的统称（-ing）
words.example_zh: 政府正在努力解决住房问题。
words.example_en: The government is trying to solve the housing problem.
words.en_def: To keep within a structure or container.

sentences.en: The car is housed in the garage.
sentences.zh: 这辆车停在车库里。

sentences.en: to house the upper spars
sentences.zh: 容纳上翼梁

sentences.en: She lives in low-income housing.
sentences.zh: 她住在低收入住房中。

words.suffix_cn: 名词或形容词后缀，表示提倡……的人/主义的
words.cn_def: 人道主义者；人道主义的
words.mnemonic_zh: 以人为本（human）的主义者（-itarian）
words.example_en: The humanitarian organization provided aid to the refugees.
words.example_zh: 人道主义组织为难民提供了援助。
words.en_def: A scholar of one of the subjects in the humanities.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 人类（human）的特性（-ity）
words.example_en: We should show more humanity in dealing with others.
words.example_zh: 我们在与他人交往时应展现更多的人性关怀。
words.en_def: Mankind; human beings as a group.

sentences.en: Philosophy is a humanity while psychology is a science.
sentences.zh: 哲学是一门人文学科，而心理学是一门科学。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似‘喊啵’，像卑微地呼喊
words.example_en: A humble person is always willing to learn from others.
words.example_zh: 一个谦逊的人总是愿意向他人学习。
words.en_def: (Baltimore) An arrest based on weak evidence intended to demean or punish the subject.

sentences.en: He lives in a humble one-bedroom cottage.
sentences.zh: 他住在一间简陋的一居室小屋里。

words.mnemonic_zh: 思想（ideo）相关的就是意识形态的
words.example_en: The ideological differences between the two parties are profound.
words.example_zh: 两党之间的意识形态差异很大。
words.en_def: Of or pertaining to an ideology.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示学科、体系
words.mnemonic_zh: 思想（ideo）的体系即是意识形态
words.example_en: Different countries may have different ideologies.
words.example_zh: 不同国家可能有不同的意识形态。
words.en_def: Doctrine, philosophy, body of beliefs or principles belonging to an individual or group.

sentences.en: A dictatorship, in order to secure its reign, bans things that do not conform to its ideology.
sentences.zh: 独裁政权为了巩固自己的统治，会禁止一切不符合其意识形态的事物。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“一低头”，像笨蛋犯错低头的样子
words.example_en: He made such a stupid mistake; he's an idiot.
words.example_zh: 他犯了这么愚蠢的错误，真是个笨蛋。
words.en_def: A person of low general intelligence.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“爱豆”，就是偶像的意思
words.example_en: Many young people have their own idols.
words.example_zh: 很多年轻人都有自己的偶像。
words.en_def: A graven image or representation of anything that is revered, or believed to convey spiritual power.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 不（ig）知道（nor）就是无知
words.example_en: His ignorance of the law led to this accident.
words.example_zh: 他对法律的无知导致了这场事故。
words.en_def: The condition of being uninformed or uneducated. Lack of knowledge or information.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“咦哦”，像生病难受发出的声音
words.example_en: She was ill and had to stay at home.
words.example_zh: 她生病了，不得不待在家里。
words.en_def: (often pluralized) Trouble; distress; misfortune; adversity.

sentences.en: Music won't solve all the world's ills, but it can make them easier to bear.
sentences.zh: 音乐并不能解决世界上所有的弊病，但它可以让它们更容易忍受。

sentences.en: I wouldn't want you to do me ill.
sentences.zh: 我不想让你对我不好。

sentences.en: I am incapacitated by rheumatism and other ills.
sentences.zh: 我因风湿病和其他疾病而丧失行为能力。

words.mnemonic_zh: 加强（il）照亮（lustr）的效果来阐明
words.example_en: The professor used charts to illustrate the theory.
words.example_zh: 教授用图表来说明这个理论。
words.en_def: To shed light upon.

sentences.en: We illustrate our definitions by including quotations or simple examples.
sentences.zh: 我们通过引用或简单的例子来说明我们的定义。

sentences.en: The economics textbook was illustrated with many graphs.
sentences.zh: 经济学教科书上有很多图表。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 加强（il）照亮（lustr）的行为结果是说明例证
words.example_en: The book is full of colorful illustrations.
words.example_zh: 这本书里有很多彩色插图。
words.en_def: The act of illustrating; the act of making clear and distinct; education; also, the state of being illustrated, or of being made clear and distinct.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示集合、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 形象（image）的集合就是意象
words.example_en: The poet used rich imagery in his works.
words.example_zh: 这位诗人在他的作品中运用了丰富的意象。
words.en_def: The work of one who makes images or visible representation of objects.

words.mnemonic_zh: 和形象（image）有关的想象出来的就是虚构的
words.example_en: The story is set in an imaginary world.
words.example_zh: 这个故事设定在一个虚构的世界里。
words.en_def: Imagination; fancy.

sentences.en: Santa Claus is imaginary.
sentences.zh: 圣诞老人是想象出来的。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 能进行想象的，就是有想象力的
words.example_en: The imaginative artist created a unique sculpture.
words.example_zh: 这位富有想象力的艺术家创作了一件独特的雕塑品。
words.en_def: Having a lively or creative imagination.

words.mnemonic_zh: 模仿行为的体现
words.example_en: Children often imitate the behavior of their parents.
words.example_zh: 孩子们常常模仿他们父母的行为。
words.en_def: To follow as a model or a pattern; to make a copy, counterpart or semblance of.

words.mnemonic_zh: 没有中间间隔的，就是立刻的、直接的
words.example_en: We need immediate solutions to these problems.
words.example_zh: 我们需要立即解决这些问题。
words.en_def: Happening right away, instantly, with no delay.

sentences.en: Computer users these days expect immediate results when they click on a link.
sentences.zh: 如今，计算机用户希望在单击链接时立即得到结果。

sentences.en: immediate family;  immediate vicinity
sentences.zh: 直系亲属； 紧邻

sentences.en: Bravo Three, this Bravo Six. Immediate! We are coming under fire from the north from an unknown enemy, over!
sentences.zh: 布拉沃三号，这布拉沃六号。 即时！ 我们正遭受来自北方未知敌人的炮火，结束！

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词后缀转变而来
words.mnemonic_zh: 由“immediate”加副词后缀，表示立刻的状态
words.example_en: He left the room immediately after the meeting.
words.example_zh: 会议一结束他就立刻离开了房间。
words.en_def: In an immediate manner; instantly or without delay.

sentences.en: I hope we can begin immediately.
sentences.zh: 我希望我们能立即开始。

words.mnemonic_zh: 无法测量的，说明极其巨大
words.example_en: The project requires an immense amount of resources.
words.example_zh: 这个项目需要大量的资源。
words.en_def: Immense extent or expanse; immensity

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词后缀转变而来
words.mnemonic_zh: 由“immense”加副词后缀，表示程度极深
words.example_en: She was immensely proud of her son's achievements.
words.example_zh: 她为儿子的成就感到无比骄傲。
words.en_def: Greatly; hugely; extremely; vastly; to a great extent.

sentences.en: I enjoyed the party immensely.
sentences.zh: 我非常喜欢这个聚会。

words.mnemonic_zh: 像突出物即将掉落，有临近之感
words.example_en: There is an imminent danger of flood in this area.
words.example_zh: 这个地区有即将发生洪水的危险。
words.en_def: About to happen, occur, or take place very soon, especially of something which won't last long.

words.mnemonic_zh: 朝着目标挤压，会产生冲击力和影响
words.example_en: The new policy will have a great impact on the economy.
words.example_zh: 新政策将对经济产生重大影响。
words.en_def: The striking of one body against another; collision.

sentences.en: The hatchet cut the wood on impact.
sentences.zh: 斧头在撞击时砍断了木头。

sentences.en: His spine had an impingement; L4 and L5 made impact, which caused numbness in his leg.
sentences.zh: 他的脊椎受到撞击； L4和L5产生撞击，导致他的腿发麻。

sentences.en: His friend's opinion had an impact on his decision.
sentences.zh: 他朋友的意见影响了他的决定。

words.mnemonic_zh: 与“完美（perfect）”相反，就是不完美的
words.example_en: All things in the world are imperfect to some extent.
words.example_zh: 世界上的一切事物在某种程度上都是不完美的。
words.en_def: Something having a minor flaw

words.mnemonic_zh: 不是个人的，就是客观、非个人的
words.example_en: The report presented an impersonal analysis of the situation.
words.example_zh: 报告对形势进行了客观的分析。
words.en_def: (grammar) An impersonal word or construct.

sentences.en: She sounded impersonal as she gave her report of the Nazi death camps.
sentences.zh: 当她讲述纳粹死亡集中营的情况时，她的语气听起来毫无人情味。

sentences.en: The verb “rain” is impersonal in sentences like “It’s raining.”
sentences.zh: 在“正在下雨”这样的句子中，动词“雨”是非人称的。

words.mnemonic_zh: 往里面扔东西，就像打针注射
words.example_en: The doctor will inject the vaccine into your arm.
words.example_zh: 医生会把疫苗注射到你的手臂里。
words.en_def: To push or pump (something, especially fluids) into a cavity or passage.

sentences.en: The nurse injected a painkilling drug into the veins of my forearm.
sentences.zh: 护士在我前臂的静脉里注射了止痛药。

sentences.en: Punk injected a much-needed sense of urgency into the British music scene.
sentences.zh: 朋克为英国音乐界注入了急需的紧迫感。

sentences.en: Now lie back while we inject you with the anesthetic.
sentences.zh: 现在躺下来，我们给您注射麻醉剂。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: inject 的名词形式，注射的行为或结果
words.example_en: She was nervous about the injection.
words.example_zh: 她对打针感到紧张。
words.en_def: The act of injecting, or something that is injected.

sentences.en: The troubled business received a much-needed cash injection.
sentences.zh: 这家陷入困境的企业获得了急需的现金注入。

sentences.en: a SQL injection exploit allowing a malicious user to modify a database query
sentences.zh: SQL 注入漏洞允许恶意用户修改数据库查询

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 不公正，就是偏离了正义
words.example_en: The people protested against the social injustice.
words.example_zh: 人们抗议社会的不公平现象。
words.en_def: Absence of justice; unjustice.

sentences.en: Silence in the face of gross injustice, or support for it, or even active involvement therein, comes at a price.
sentences.zh: 面对严重的不公正现象，保持沉默，或者支持它，甚至积极参与其中，都是要付出代价的。

words.cn_def: （监狱、医院等的）同住者；同狱犯人
words.mnemonic_zh: 在一个地方里的伙伴，如狱友
words.example_en: The inmate was released after serving his sentence.
words.example_zh: 这名囚犯服刑期满后被释放了。
words.en_def: A person confined to an institution such as a prison (as a convict) or hospital (as a patient).

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质或状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 没有伤害他人的能力或意图，所以无辜
words.example_en: The lawyer proved his client's innocence in court.
words.example_zh: 律师在法庭上证明了他当事人的清白。
words.en_def: Absence of responsibility for a crime, tort, etc.

sentences.en: Her attorney managed to convince the jury of her innocence.
sentences.zh: 她的律师设法让陪审团相信她是无辜的。

sentences.en: In his innocence, he offered the stranger to bring the package to Paris, never suspecting it contained drugs.
sentences.zh: 他天真无邪，提议陌生人将包裹带到巴黎，但他从未怀疑其中含有毒品。

sentences.en: Tests have demonstrated the innocence of this substance.
sentences.zh: 测试证明该物质是无害的。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、过程或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 让新事物产生，就是创新
words.example_en: Technological innovation has changed our lives greatly.
words.example_zh: 技术创新极大地改变了我们的生活。
words.en_def: The act of innovating; the introduction of something new, in customs, rites, etc.

sentences.en: The others, whose time had been more actively employed, began to shew symptoms of innovation,—"the good wine did its good office." The frost of etiquette, and pride of birth, began to give way before the genial blessings of this benign constellation, and the formal appellatives with which the three dignitaries had hitherto addressed each other, were now familiarly abbreviated into Tully, Bally, and Killie.
sentences.zh: 其他人的时间得到了更积极的利用，开始表现出创新的迹象——“好酒发挥了它的作用。” 在这个仁慈的星座的亲切祝福面前，礼仪的严酷和出身的骄傲开始消失，三位贵宾迄今为止互相称呼的正式称呼现在被人们熟悉地缩写为塔利、巴利和基利。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 具有创新特质的
words.example_en: The company encourages innovative thinking among employees.
words.example_zh: 公司鼓励员工进行创新思考。
words.en_def: Characterized by the creation of new ideas or inventions.

words.mnemonic_zh: 不健康的精神状态，就是疯狂的
words.example_en: It's insane to drive so fast on this road.
words.example_zh: 在这条路上开这么快简直是疯了。
words.en_def: Exhibiting unsoundness or disorder of mind; not sane; mad

sentences.en: an insane asylum
sentences.zh: 疯人院

sentences.en: an insane amount of money
sentences.zh: 一大笔钱

words.mnemonic_zh: 不处于安全状态，缺乏安全感
words.example_en: She feels insecure about her future career.
words.example_zh: 她对自己未来的职业感到没有把握。
words.en_def: Not secure.

sentences.en: He's a nice guy and all, but seems to be rather insecure around other people.
sentences.zh: 他是一个好人，但在其他人面前似乎相当缺乏安全感。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 缺乏感知能力，所以不敏感
words.example_en: He was insensitive to her feelings.
words.example_zh: 他对她的感受毫无察觉。
words.en_def: Not expressing normal physical feeling

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: mar（海）+ ine，和海有关的就是海洋的
words.example_en: Marine life in the coral reef is incredibly diverse.
words.example_zh: 珊瑚礁里的海洋生物种类极其多样。
words.en_def: A soldier, normally a member of a marine corps, trained to serve on board or from a ship

sentences.en: He was a marine in World War II.
sentences.zh: 他是第二次世界大战中的一名海军陆战队员。

sentences.en: He fought with the Marines in World War II.
sentences.zh: 他在第二次世界大战中与海军陆战队并肩作战。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“马克”，可想象用马克笔做标记
words.example_en: There is a small mark on the corner of the page.
words.example_zh: 书页的一角有个小标记。
words.en_def: (heading) Boundary, land within a boundary.

sentences.en: to mark a box or bale of merchandise
sentences.zh: 标记一盒或一捆商品

sentences.en: See where this pencil has marked the paper.
sentences.zh: 看看这支铅笔在纸上标记的位置。

sentences.en: She folded over the corner of the page to mark where she left off reading.
sentences.zh: 她把书页的一角折起来，以标记她停止阅读的地方。

words.mnemonic_zh: 可联想集市上叫卖声“卖咯（mark）它（et）”
words.example_en: The local market is full of fresh produce.
words.example_zh: 当地市场摆满了新鲜农产品。
words.en_def: A gathering of people for the purchase and sale of merchandise at a set time, often periodic.

sentences.en: The privilege to hold a weekly market was invaluable for any feudal era burgh.
sentences.zh: 对于任何封建时代的城镇来说，每周举办一次集市的特权都是无价的。

sentences.en: Stop by the market on your way home and pick up some milk
sentences.zh: 回家路上顺便去市场买点牛奶

sentences.en: We believe that the market for the new widget is the older homeowner.
sentences.zh: 我们相信新部件的市场是年长的房主。

words.mnemonic_zh: market（市场）和place（地方）组合，就是市场的地方
words.example_en: People gather at the marketplace to trade goods.
words.example_zh: 人们聚集在集市上交易商品。
words.en_def: An open area in a town housing a public market.

sentences.en: Some high-street retailers were slow to enter the new digital marketplace of the Internet.
sentences.zh: 一些商业街零售商在进入新的互联网数字市场方面进展缓慢。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: mascul（男性）+ ine，有男性特质的
words.example_en: He has a very masculine appearance and demeanor.
words.example_zh: 他有着非常阳刚的外表和举止。
words.en_def: (grammar) The masculine gender.

sentences.en: “John”, “Paul” and “Jake” are masculine names.
sentences.zh: “约翰”、“保罗”和“杰克”是男性名字。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“马斯克”，可联想马斯克戴面具
words.example_en: Wearing a mask can protect you from dust.
words.example_zh: 戴面罩能保护你免受灰尘侵害。
words.en_def: A cover, or partial cover, for the face, used for disguise or protection.

sentences.en: a dancer's mask; a fencer's mask; a ball player's mask
sentences.zh: 舞者面具； 击剑运动员的面具； 球员的面具

sentences.en: to mask a body of troops or a fortess by a superior force, while some hostile evolution is being carried out
sentences.zh: 在敌对行动正在进行时，以优势力量掩盖部队或堡垒

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“妈死”，可想象妈死了很多人来，即大量
words.example_en: A mass of people gathered in the square.
words.example_zh: 一大群人聚集在广场上。
words.en_def: (physical) Matter, material.

sentences.en: I mass 70 kilograms.
sentences.zh: 我体重70公斤。

sentences.en: There is evidence of mass extinctions in the distant past.
sentences.zh: 有证据表明在遥远的过去曾发生过大规模灭绝。

sentences.en: Mass unemployment resulted from the financial collapse.
sentences.zh: 金融崩溃导致大规模失业。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: mass（大量）+ acre（英亩），大量人倒在英亩土地上，即屠杀
words.example_en: The massacre in that village was a great tragedy.
words.example_zh: 那个村庄的大屠杀是一场巨大的悲剧。
words.en_def: The killing of a considerable number (usually limited to people) where little or no resistance can be made, with indiscriminate violence, without necessity, and contrary to civilized norms.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“妈特”，可想象妈妈特别需要垫子
words.example_en: Put the mat in front of the door.
words.example_zh: 把垫子放在门前。
words.en_def: A flat piece of coarse material used for wiping one’s feet, or as a decorative or protective floor covering.

sentences.en: Wipe your feet on the mat before coming in.
sentences.zh: 进来之前先在垫子上擦脚。

sentences.en: They put mats on the table during mealtimes.
sentences.zh: 吃饭的时候他们会在桌子上放垫子。

sentences.en: The high jumper cleared the bar and landed safely on the mat.
sentences.zh: 跳高运动员越过横杆并安全落在垫子上。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“麦吃”，可想象边吃麦边看比赛
words.example_en: They are looking forward to the football match.
words.example_zh: 他们期待着这场足球比赛。
words.en_def: A competitive sporting event such as a boxing meet, a baseball game, or a cricket match.

sentences.en: My local team are playing in a match against their arch-rivals today.
sentences.zh: 我当地的球队今天正在与他们的主要竞争对手进行一场比赛。

sentences.en: He knew he had met his match.
sentences.zh: 他知道他遇到了对手。

sentences.en: The carpet and curtains are a match.
sentences.zh: 地毯和窗帘很相配。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一再保持关注，即观察
words.example_en: Scientists often observe animals in their natural habitat.
words.example_zh: 科学家经常在动物的自然栖息地观察它们。
words.en_def: To notice or view, especially carefully or with attention to detail.

sentences.en: From this vantage point we can observe the behavior of the animals in their natural habitat.
sentences.zh: 从这个有利位置我们可以观察动物在自然栖息地的行为。

sentences.en: Please observe all posted speed limits.
sentences.zh: 请遵守所有张贴的速度限制。

sentences.en: The senator observed that the bill would be detrimental to his constituents.
sentences.zh: 这位参议员指出，该法案将对其选民不利。

words.mnemonic_zh: 一直坐着想，就会痴迷
words.example_en: The idea of success began to obsess him day and night.
words.example_zh: 成功的念头开始日夜折磨他。
words.en_def: (passive, constructed with "with") To be preoccupied with a single topic or emotion.

sentences.en: Some people are obsessed with sports.
sentences.zh: 有些人痴迷于运动。

sentences.en: Thoughts of her obsess my every waking moment.
sentences.zh: 对她的思念萦绕在我醒着的每一个时刻。

sentences.en: Stop obsessing over it, will you!
sentences.zh: 别再沉迷于它了好吗！

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 痴迷状态就是一种困扰
words.example_en: His obsession with fitness led him to the gym every day.
words.example_zh: 他对健身的痴迷使他每天都去健身房。
words.en_def: A compulsive or irrational preoccupation.

words.mnemonic_zh: 不再被习惯使用，就是过时的
words.example_en: Many old - fashioned tools have become obsolete today.
words.example_zh: 如今许多老式工具已经过时了。
words.en_def: (of words, equipment, etc.) No longer in use; gone into disuse; disused or neglected (often by preference for something newer, which replaces the subject).

sentences.en: It is speculated that, within a few years, the Internet's speedy delivery of news worldwide will make newspapers obsolete.
sentences.zh: 据推测，几年之内，互联网在全球范围内快速传播新闻将使报纸变得过时。

sentences.en: This software component has been obsoleted.
sentences.zh: 该软件组件已被废弃。

words.mnemonic_zh: 站在面前阻挡的东西，就是障碍
words.example_zh: 缺乏资金是他们项目的主要障碍。
words.example_en: Lack of funds is the main obstacle to their project.
words.en_def: Something that impedes, stands in the way of, or holds up progress

sentences.en: A big obstacle to understanding the manual was that it had been poorly translated from the Japanese.
sentences.zh: 理解该手册的一个很大障碍是它的日文翻译很差。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 偶然降临的，就是偶尔的
words.example_en: They have occasional meetings to discuss new ideas.
words.example_zh: 他们偶尔开会讨论新想法。
words.en_def: A person who does something only occasionally.

sentences.en: He took an occasional glass of wine.
sentences.zh: 他偶尔喝一杯酒。

sentences.en: Elgar's music was not created to be occasional music for high-school graduations.
sentences.zh: 埃尔加的音乐并不是为高中毕业典礼而创作的。

sentences.en: What your living room needs are some occasional chairs.
sentences.zh: 您的客厅需要一些临时椅子。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 拿到手的事，就是职业或占用的事
words.example_en: Teaching is a rewarding occupation for many people.
words.example_zh: 对很多人来说，教书是一份有意义的职业。
words.en_def: An activity or task with which one occupies oneself; usually specifically the productive activity, service, trade, or craft for which one is regularly paid; a job.

words.mnemonic_zh: 用力拿过来，就是占用或占领
words.example_en: The new building will occupy a large area of land.
words.example_zh: 这座新建筑将占用一大片土地。
words.en_def: (of time) To take or use.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 跑出来的事，就是发生的事
words.example_en: The occurrence of natural disasters has increased in recent years.
words.example_zh: 近年来自然灾害的发生频率有所增加。
words.en_def: An actual instance when a situation occurs; an event or happening.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“偶得”，偶然得到有概率
words.example_en: The odds of winning the lottery are extremely low.
words.example_zh: 中彩票的概率极低。
words.en_def: (diminutive) An odd number.

sentences.en: So let's see. There are two evens here and three odds.
sentences.zh: 那么让我们看看。 这里有两个偶数和三个奇数。

sentences.en: I'd say the odds are strongly in favor of the sun rising tomorrow morning.
sentences.zh: 我想说明天早上太阳升起的可能性很大。

words.mnemonic_zh: 完全拿到信息，就是感知到
words.example_en: Animals can often perceive danger before humans do.
words.example_zh: 动物常常能比人类先察觉到危险。
words.en_def: To become aware of, through the physical senses or by thinking; to see; to understand.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 完全做好就是完美
words.example_en: He always strives for perfection in his work.
words.example_zh: 他在工作中总是追求完美。
words.en_def: The quality or state of being perfect or complete, so that nothing substandard remains; the highest attainable state or degree of excellence

sentences.en: The system runs to perfection.
sentences.zh: 系统运行至完美。

words.cn_def: 额外福利； perk 也可作动词表示振作
words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“派客”，派给客人福利
words.example_en: One of the perks of this job is free lunch.
words.example_zh: 这份工作的一项福利是提供免费午餐。
words.en_def: Perquisite.

sentences.en: Free coffee is one of the perks of the job.
sentences.zh: 免费咖啡是这份工作的福利之一。

sentences.en: I’ll perk some coffee.
sentences.zh: 我要喝点咖啡。

sentences.en: The coffee is perking.
sentences.zh: 咖啡很提神。

words.mnemonic_zh: 完全放行就是允许
words.example_en: The school doesn't permit students to use mobile phones in class.
words.example_zh: 学校不允许学生在课堂上使用手机。
words.en_def: An artifact or document rendering something allowed or legal.

sentences.en: A construction permit can be obtained from the town offices.
sentences.zh: 施工许可证可以从镇办公室获得。

sentences.en: The Building Department permitted that project last week.
sentences.zh: 建筑部上周批准了该项目。

sentences.en: We've been busy permitting the State Street development.
sentences.zh: 我们一直忙于批准道富街的开发。

words.mnemonic_zh: 始终站立就是坚持
words.example_en: He persists in running every morning despite the cold weather.
words.example_zh: 尽管天气寒冷，他仍坚持每天早上跑步。
words.en_def: To go on stubbornly or resolutely.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 始终站立的，就是坚持不懈的
words.example_en: The persistent rain made the roads very slippery.
words.example_zh: 持续的降雨使道路非常湿滑。
words.en_def: Obstinately refusing to give up or let go.

sentences.en: She has had a persistent cough for weeks.
sentences.zh: 她已经持续咳嗽数周了。

sentences.en: There was a persistent knocking on the door.
sentences.zh: 门外传来持续不断的敲门声。

sentences.en: There have been persistent rumours for years.
sentences.zh: 多年来，谣言一直不断。

words.mnemonic_zh: person 加上后缀表示一群人
words.example_en: The company needs to recruit more technical personnel.
words.example_zh: 公司需要招聘更多的技术人员。
words.en_def: Employees; office staff.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示相关事物
words.mnemonic_zh: 完全看到事物的角度就是视角
words.example_en: We should consider the problem from different perspectives.
words.example_zh: 我们应该从不同的视角考虑这个问题。
words.en_def: A view, vista or outlook.

sentences.en: a perspective drawing
sentences.zh: 透视图

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 完全能说服人的，就是有说服力的
words.example_en: His persuasive speech convinced many people to support the project.
words.example_zh: 他有说服力的演讲让很多人支持这个项目。
words.en_def: That which persuades; incitement.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 寻求的行为形成请愿书
words.example_en: A large number of people signed the petition against the new policy.
words.example_zh: 很多人签署了反对新政策的请愿书。
words.en_def: A formal, written request made to an official person or organized body, often containing many signatures.

sentences.en: The villagers petitioned the council to demolish the dangerous building.
sentences.zh: 村民向议会请愿拆除危房。

words.mnemonic_zh: phenom像phenomenon出现，enon加尾成现象
words.example_en: The social phenomenon of aging population is getting more prominent.
words.example_zh: 人口老龄化这一社会现象正变得越来越突出。
words.en_def: A thing or being, event or process, perceptible through senses; or a fact or occurrence thereof.

sentences.en: An electromagnetic phenomenon.
sentences.zh: 一种电磁现象。

sentences.en: A volcanic eruption is an impressive phenomenon.
sentences.zh: 火山喷发是一种令人印象深刻的现象。

words.mnemonic_zh: 爱（philo）智慧（soph）的人就是哲学家
words.example_en: A great philosopher once said that knowledge is power.
words.example_zh: 一位伟大的哲学家曾说过，知识就是力量。
words.en_def: A lover of wisdom.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 爱智慧的性质就是哲学的
words.example_en: He has a philosophical attitude towards difficulties in life.
words.example_zh: 他对生活中的困难持达观的态度。
words.en_def: Of, or pertaining to, philosophy.

words.mnemonic_zh: 爱智慧形成哲学
words.example_en: Different people have different philosophies of life.
words.example_zh: 不同的人有不同的人生哲学。
words.en_def: The love of wisdom.

sentences.en: Philosophy is often divided into five major branches: logic, metaphysics, epistemology, ethics and aesthetics.
sentences.zh: 哲学通常分为五个主要分支：逻辑学、形而上学、认识论、伦理学和美学。

sentences.en: a philosophy of government;   a philosophy of education
sentences.zh: 政府哲学； 一种教育哲学

words.mnemonic_zh: 研究身体自然状况的人是内科医生
words.example_en: The physician examined the patient carefully.
words.example_zh: 内科医生仔细地检查了病人。
words.en_def: A practitioner of physic, i.e. a specialist in internal medicine, especially as opposed to a surgeon; a practitioner who treats with medication rather than with surgery.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 描绘（pict）出来的结果就是图画（picture）
words.example_en: There is a beautiful picture on the wall.
words.example_zh: 墙上有一幅漂亮的画。
words.en_def: A representation of anything (as a person, a landscape, a building) upon canvas, paper, or other surface, by drawing, painting, printing, photography, etc.

sentences.en: There was a picture hanging above the fireplace.
sentences.zh: 壁炉上方挂着一幅画。

sentences.en: I took a picture of the church.
sentences.zh: 我拍了一张教堂的照片。

sentences.en: Casablanca is my all-time favorite picture.
sentences.zh: 卡萨布兰卡是我一直以来最喜欢的照片。

words.mnemonic_zh: pioneer音似“派你啊”，派你去开拓
words.example_en: The pioneers made great contributions to the development of the city.
words.example_zh: 先驱者们为这座城市的发展做出了巨大贡献。
words.morph_note: 该词不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: One who goes before, as into the wilderness, preparing the way for others to follow.

sentences.en: Certain politicians can be considered as pioneers of reform.
sentences.zh: 某些政治家可以被视为改革的先驱。

sentences.en: The young doctor pioneered a new life-saving surgical technique.
sentences.zh: 这位年轻的医生开创了一种新的救生手术技术。

words.mnemonic_zh: 管子（pipe）连成线（line）就是管道
words.example_en: The oil pipeline transports oil to the refinery.
words.example_zh: 输油管道将石油输送到炼油厂。
words.en_def: A conduit made of pipes used to convey water, gas or petroleum etc.

sentences.en: An oil pipeline has been opened from the Caspian Sea.
sentences.zh: 里海的石油管道已经开通。

sentences.en: 3D images are rendered using the graphics pipeline.
sentences.zh: 3D 图像是使用图形管道渲染的。

sentences.en: A new version of the software is in the pipeline, but has not been rolled out.
sentences.zh: 该软件的新版本正在酝酿中，但尚未推出。

words.mnemonic_zh: pirate音似“拍热特”，疯狂拍东西的盗版者
words.example_en: The pirate ship attacked the merchant vessel.
words.example_zh: 海盗船袭击了商船。
words.morph_note: 该词不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: A criminal who plunders at sea; commonly attacking merchant vessels, though often pillaging port towns.

sentences.en: You should be cautious due to the Somali pirates.
sentences.zh: 由于索马里海盗，您应该小心谨慎。

sentences.en: They pirated the tanker and sailed to a port where they could sell the ship and cargo.
sentences.zh: 他们盗取了这艘油轮，并航行到一个港口，在那里他们可以出售船只和货物。

sentences.en: Not willing to pay full price for the computer game, Heidi pirated a copy.
sentences.zh: 海蒂不愿意支付全价购买电脑游戏，于是盗版了。

words.mnemonic_zh: pit音似“劈它”，劈出个坑
words.example_en: The car fell into a pit on the road.
words.example_zh: 汽车掉进了路上的一个坑里。
words.morph_note: 该词不宜强行拆分
words.en_def: A hole in the ground.

sentences.en: The meadow around the town is full of old pits.
sentences.zh: 小镇周围的草地上布满了古老的坑。

sentences.en: Two drivers have already gone into the pit this early in the race.
sentences.zh: 比赛一开始就有两名车手进站。

sentences.en: I felt pain in the pit of my stomach.
sentences.zh: 我感到胃部疼痛。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前行进处理的东西，就是处理器
words.example_en: The computer's processor determines its overall performance.
words.example_zh: 计算机的处理器决定了它的整体性能。
words.en_def: A person or institution who processes things (foods, photos, applications, etc.).

sentences.en: He is a loan processor with a bank.
sentences.zh: 他是一家银行的贷款处理员。

sentences.en: The food processor shredded the vegetables.
sentences.zh: 食品加工机将蔬菜切碎。

sentences.en: This computer has two processors, but only one keyboard.
sentences.zh: 这台计算机有两个处理器，但只有一个键盘。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前大声呼喊来宣布事情
words.example_en: The king proclaimed a new law to his people.
words.example_zh: 国王向他的臣民宣布了一项新法律。
words.en_def: To announce or declare.

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前引导创造出产品
words.example_en: This factory can produce thousands of cars each year.
words.example_zh: 这家工厂每年能生产数千辆汽车。
words.en_def: To yield, make or manufacture; to generate.

sentences.en: to produce a side of a triangle
sentences.zh: 生成三角形的一条边

sentences.en: to produce a man's life to threescore
sentences.zh: 使一个人的生命达到三十岁

sentences.en: highly produced sound
sentences.zh: 高音质

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前引导生产的人
words.example_en: The producer is responsible for the whole project.
words.example_zh: 制片人负责整个项目。
words.en_def: An individual or organization that creates goods and services.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前引导产出，富有成效的
words.example_en: They had a productive meeting and reached many agreements.
words.example_zh: 他们开了一次富有成效的会议，达成了许多协议。
words.en_def: Capable of producing something, especially in abundance; fertile.

sentences.en: a productive set
sentences.zh: 一个富有成效的集合

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 向前引导产出的能力，即生产率
words.example_en: The new technology has greatly improved productivity.
words.example_zh: 新技术极大地提高了生产力。
words.en_def: The state of being productive, fertile or efficient

sentences.en: You can see the computer age everywhere but in the productivity statistics.
sentences.zh: 除了生产力统计数据之外，你随处都可以看到计算机时代。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示属于…的
words.mnemonic_zh: 公开宣称自己专业的
words.example_en: A professional athlete needs to train hard every day.
words.example_zh: 一名职业运动员需要每天刻苦训练。
words.en_def: A person who belongs to a profession

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前画出的线条，形成轮廓或简介
words.example_en: The profile of the mountain against the sunset is beautiful.
words.example_zh: 夕阳下山脉的轮廓很美。
words.en_def: The outermost shape, view, or edge of an object.

sentences.en: His fingers traced the profile of the handle.
sentences.zh: 他的手指描绘着手柄的轮廓。

sentences.en: The brooch showed the profile of a Victorian woman.
sentences.zh: 胸针展现了维多利亚时代女性的轮廓。

sentences.en: Law enforcement assembled a profile of the suspect.
sentences.zh: 执法部门收集了嫌疑人的个人资料。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前做能获利的
words.example_en: Investing in this company seems to be a profitable choice.
words.example_zh: 投资这家公司似乎是个有利可图的选择。
words.en_def: Producing a profit.

words.mnemonic_zh: 向前到达底部，有深刻之意
words.example_en: His speech had a profound impact on the audience.
words.example_zh: 他的演讲对听众产生了深远的影响。
words.en_def: The deep; the sea; the ocean.

sentences.en: a profound investigation
sentences.zh: 深刻的调查

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词后缀 -al 加 -ly 构成
words.mnemonic_zh: radic 像树根，从根上改变就是彻底改变
words.example_en: The new policy will change the situation radically.
words.example_zh: 新政策将彻底改变这种状况。
words.en_def: In a radical manner; fundamentally; very.

sentences.en: two radically different political groups
sentences.zh: 两个截然不同的政治团体

sentences.en: "Clot" and "clod" are radically the same word.
sentences.zh: “Clot”和“clod”根本上是同一个词。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“锐急”，人急了容易发怒
words.example_en: His rage was obvious when he heard the bad news.
words.example_zh: 他听到这个坏消息时，愤怒显而易见。
words.en_def: Violent uncontrolled anger.

sentences.en: Miniskirts were all the rage back then.
sentences.zh: 那时迷你裙风靡一时。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“锐的”，突袭行动很锐利
words.example_en: The police carried out a raid on the criminal's hideout.
words.example_zh: 警方对罪犯的藏身之处进行了突袭。
words.en_def: A quick hostile or predatory incursion or invasion in a battle.

sentences.en: a police raid of a narcotics factory
sentences.zh: 警方突袭一家毒品工厂

sentences.en: The police raided the gambling den.
sentences.zh: 警察突袭了赌博窝点。

sentences.en: I raided the fridge for snacks.
sentences.zh: 我翻遍冰箱寻找零食。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“来哩”，喊大家来集合
words.example_en: They managed to rally the supporters quickly.
words.example_zh: 他们设法迅速召集了支持者。
words.en_def: A public gathering or mass meeting that is not mainly a protest and is organized to inspire enthusiasm for a cause.

sentences.en: a campaign rally
sentences.zh: 竞选集会

sentences.en: a political rally
sentences.zh: 政治集会

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“软等”，软等着，没有规律就是随机
words.example_en: He made a random choice among the books.
words.example_zh: 他在那些书中随意选了一本。
words.en_def: A roving motion; course without definite direction; lack of rule or method; chance.

sentences.en: The party was boring. It was full of randoms.
sentences.zh: 聚会很无聊。 它充满了随机性。

sentences.en: The flip of a fair coin is purely random.
sentences.zh: 一枚公平硬币的翻转完全是随机的。

sentences.en: A toss of loaded dice is still random, though biased.
sentences.zh: 抛掷已加载的骰子仍然是随机的，尽管有偏差。

words.mnemonic_zh: random 加 -ly 变成副词，随机地做某事
words.example_en: The names were chosen randomly from the list.
words.example_zh: 名字是从名单中随机选取的。
words.en_def: In a random manner.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“认可”，达到一定等级才会被认可
words.example_en: He has a high rank in the company.
words.example_zh: 他在公司里级别很高。
words.en_def: Strong of its kind or in character; unmitigated; virulent; thorough; utter (used of negative things).

sentences.en: rank nonsense
sentences.zh: 胡说八道

sentences.en: rank grass
sentences.zh: 莽

sentences.en: rank land
sentences.zh: 兰克土地

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: rank 加 -ing 表示排名这个行为或结果
