words.example_en: The school's ranking has improved this year.
words.example_zh: 这所学校今年的排名有所提升。
words.en_def: To place abreast, or in a line.

sentences.en: Their defense ranked third in the league.
sentences.zh: 他们的防守排名联盟第三。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“锐迫”，强迫他人就是强奸等恶行
words.example_en: The police are investigating a rape case.
words.example_zh: 警方正在调查一起强奸案。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“锐儿”，稀少的东西才显得锐利特别
words.example_en: This is a rare species of bird.
words.example_zh: 这是一种稀有的鸟类。
words.en_def: A scarce or uncommon item.

sentences.en: Black pearls are very rare and therefore very valuable.
sentences.zh: 黑珍珠非常稀有，因此非常有价值。

words.mnemonic_zh: re（再）+ adjust（调整），再次调整
words.example_en: You need to readjust your plan according to the new situation.
words.example_zh: 你需要根据新情况重新调整你的计划。
words.en_def: To adjust again

words.mnemonic_zh: realist（现实主义者）加后缀变副词，按现实方式
words.example_en: He assessed the situation realistically and made a wise decision.
words.example_zh: 他现实地评估了形势并做出了明智的决定。
words.en_def: In a realistic manner.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: realize（实现）加后缀变名词，实现的结果
words.example_en: The realization of his dream made him extremely happy.
words.example_zh: 他梦想的实现让他极其开心。
words.en_def: The act of realizing.

sentences.en: The painter's realization of her concept was breathtaking.
sentences.zh: 画家对她的概念的实现令人惊叹。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“瑞姆”，可联想神秘领域
words.example_en: This scientist has made great contributions in the realm of physics.
words.example_zh: 这位科学家在物理学领域做出了巨大贡献。
words.en_def: An abstract sphere of influence, real or imagined.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“锐儿”，尖锐的尾部
words.example_en: The car was hit at the rear in the traffic accident.
words.example_zh: 这辆车在交通事故中后部被撞了。
words.en_def: To bring up to maturity, as offspring; to educate; to instruct; to foster.

sentences.en: The family has been rearing cattle for 200 years.
sentences.zh: 该家族饲养牛已有 200 年历史。

sentences.en: The horse was shocked, and thus reared.
sentences.zh: 马受惊，立起身来。

sentences.en: The monster slowly reared its head.
sentences.zh: 怪物缓缓抬起头。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: reason（推理）加后缀变名词，推理的过程
words.example_en: His reasoning was so logical that everyone was convinced.
words.example_zh: 他的推理很有逻辑性，每个人都信服了。
words.en_def: To deduce or come to a conclusion by being rational

sentences.en: I reasoned the matter with my friend.
sentences.zh: 我和朋友就这件事进行了推理。

sentences.en: to reason one into a belief; to reason one out of his plan
sentences.zh: 推理一个人的信念； 推理出他的计划

sentences.en: to reason down a passion
sentences.zh: 理性地降低激情

words.mnemonic_zh: re（再）+ assure（保证），再次保证让人安心
words.example_en: The doctor reassured the patient about his recovery.
words.example_zh: 医生向病人保证他会康复。
words.en_def: To assure anew; to restore confidence to; to free from fear or self-doubt.

sentences.en: The boy's mother reassured him that there was no monster hiding under the bed.
sentences.zh: 男孩的母亲向他保证床底下没有藏着怪物。

words.mnemonic_zh: reassure（使安心）加后缀变形容词，有让人安心特征
words.example_en: The reassuring news made the family feel relieved.
words.example_zh: 这个令人安心的消息让家人松了口气。
words.en_def: To assure anew; to restore confidence to; to free from fear or self-doubt.

sentences.en: The boy's mother reassured him that there was no monster hiding under the bed.
sentences.zh: 男孩的母亲向他保证床底下没有藏着怪物。

words.mnemonic_zh: re（反）+ bel（战斗），反向战斗的人
words.example_en: The rebels tried to overthrow the government.
words.example_zh: 反叛者试图推翻政府。
words.en_def: A person who resists an established authority, often violently

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: re（反）+ bell（战斗）+ ion（名词后缀），反向战斗的行为
words.example_en: The rebellion was quickly suppressed by the army.
words.example_zh: 叛乱很快被军队镇压了。
words.en_def: Armed resistance to an established government or ruler.

sentences.en: The government is doing its best to stop rebellion in the country.
sentences.zh: 政府正在尽最大努力制止该国的叛乱。

sentences.en: Having a tattoo was Mathilda's personal rebellion against her parents.
sentences.zh: 纹身是玛蒂尔达个人对父母的反抗。

sentences.en: The army general led a successful rebellion and became president of the country.
sentences.zh: 这位陆军将军领导了一次成功的叛乱并成为了国家总统。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: re反 + bell打斗 + ious的 → 爱反抗打斗的
words.example_en: The rebellious teenager often goes against his parents' wishes.
words.example_zh: 那个叛逆的青少年经常违背他父母的意愿。
words.en_def: Showing rebellion.

words.mnemonic_zh: re回 + ceive拿 → 拿回来，即收到
words.example_en: She will receive a package from her friend tomorrow.
words.example_zh: 她明天会收到朋友寄来的包裹。
words.en_def: An operation in which data is received.

sentences.en: She received many presents for her birthday.
sentences.zh: 她生日时收到了很多礼物。

sentences.en: to receive a lodger, visitor, ambassador, messenger, etc.
sentences.zh: 接待房客、访客、大使、使者等

sentences.en: I received a bloody nose from the collision.
sentences.zh: 我因碰撞而流鼻血。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: re回 + cept拿 + ion表行为 → 把客人迎回来的行为，即接待
words.example_en: The hotel provides excellent reception for guests.
words.example_zh: 这家酒店为客人提供优质的接待服务。
words.en_def: The act of receiving.

sentences.en: The new system provides exceptional quality of the reception signal.
sentences.zh: 新系统提供卓越的接收信号质量。

sentences.en: After the wedding we proceeded to the reception.
sentences.zh: 婚礼结束后，我们前往接待处。

sentences.en: The ambassador's jokes met a cold reception.
sentences.zh: 大使的笑话遭到冷遇。

words.mnemonic_zh: re再 + charge充电 → 再次充电
words.example_en: You need to recharge your phone before going out.
words.example_zh: 你出门前需要给手机充电。
words.en_def: Water that has percolated from the ground surface to an aquifer.

sentences.en: My phone has needed five recharges in the last month.
sentences.zh: 我的手机上个月需要充电五次。

words.mnemonic_zh: re回 + cip拿 + ient人 → 拿回东西的人，即接受者
words.example_en: The recipient of the award was very excited.
words.example_zh: 获奖者非常激动。
words.en_def: One who receives.

sentences.en: My e-mail never reached the intended recipient.
sentences.zh: 我的电子邮件从未到达预定收件人。

words.mnemonic_zh: re再 + cogn认识 + ize使 → 再次认识，即认出
words.example_en: He can recognize his old friend in the crowd easily.
words.example_zh: 他能在人群中轻易认出他的老朋友。
words.en_def: To match (something or someone which one currently perceives) to a memory of some previous encounter with the same person or thing.

sentences.en: I recognised his face immediately.
sentences.zh: 我立刻认出了他的脸。

sentences.en: The US and a number of EU countries are expected to recognize Kosovo on Monday.
sentences.zh: 预计美国和一些欧盟国家将于周一承认科索沃。

sentences.en: I recognize that my behaviour has been unacceptable.
sentences.zh: 我认识到我的行为是不可接受的。

words.mnemonic_zh: re再 + consider考虑 → 再次考虑
words.example_en: The board decided to reconsider the proposal.
words.example_zh: 董事会决定重新考虑这个提案。
words.en_def: To consider a matter again

sentences.en: Is there any way I can get you to reconsider selling your car?
sentences.zh: 有什么办法可以让您重新考虑出售您的汽车吗？

words.mnemonic_zh: re再 + construct建造 → 再次建造，即重建
words.example_en: They plan to reconstruct the old building next year.
words.example_zh: 他们计划明年重建那座旧建筑。
words.en_def: To construct again; to restore.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: re再 + construct建造 + ion表行为 → 再次建造的行为，即重建
words.example_en: The reconstruction of the city took several years.
words.example_zh: 这座城市的重建花了好几年时间。
words.en_def: A thing that has been reconstructed or restored to an earlier state.

sentences.en: The reconstruction of the medieval bridge began last year.
sentences.zh: 这座中世纪桥梁的重建工作于去年开始。

sentences.en: The detective's reconstruction of what happened that night is dubious.
sentences.zh: 侦探对当晚发生的事情的重建是值得怀疑的。

words.mnemonic_zh: re回 + cord心 → 把想法放回心里记下，即记录
words.example_en: The scientist recorded the data carefully in his notebook.
words.example_zh: 科学家在笔记本里仔细记录了数据。
words.morph_note: record 作“记录”讲时，re- 理解为“回”，cord 理解为“心”，但词源复杂，这里是简化拆解
words.en_def: A disk, usually made of a polymer, used to record sound for playback on a phonograph.

sentences.en: The person had a record of the interview so she could review her notes.
sentences.zh: 该人有采访记录，以便她可以查看她的笔记。

sentences.en: We have no record of you making this payment to us.
sentences.zh: 我们没有您向我们付款的记录。

sentences.en: The heat and humidity were both new records.
sentences.zh: 高温和湿度均创下新纪录。

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新（re-）计数（count）就是再讲一遍或重算
words.example_en: The witness will recount the events of that night in court.
words.example_zh: 证人将在法庭上详细叙述那晚发生的事情。
words.en_def: Narration, account, description, rendering

sentences.en: The old man recounted the tale of how he caught the big fish.
sentences.zh: 老人讲述了他如何捕到大鱼的故事。

sentences.en: to recount one's blessings
sentences.zh: 重述某人的祝福

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新（re-）覆盖（cover）健康，即恢复健康
words.example_en: She managed to recover her lost wallet at the police station.
words.example_zh: 她在警察局找回了丢失的钱包。
words.en_def: Recovery.

sentences.en: After days of inquiries, he finally recovered his lost wallet.
sentences.zh: 经过几天的询问，他终于找回了丢失的钱包。

sentences.en: They recovered three of the explorers very much alive, then another, wracked with severe hypothermia, who was taken to hospital.
sentences.zh: 他们救出了三名还活着的探险家，然后另一名因严重低温而被送往医院。

sentences.en: At the top of the hill I asked to stop for a few minutes to recover my strength.
sentences.zh: 到了山顶，我要求停下来几分钟恢复体力。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 恢复（recover）的状态（-y）就是痊愈
words.example_en: His quick recovery from the illness surprised everyone.
words.example_zh: 他从疾病中快速康复让每个人都很惊讶。
words.en_def: The act or process of regaining or repossession of something lost.

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新（re-）创造（create）就是再现
words.example_en: The artist tried to recreate the beauty of the ancient city in his painting.
words.example_zh: 这位艺术家试图在他的画中再现这座古城的美丽。
words.en_def: To give new life, energy or encouragement (to); to refresh, enliven.

words.mnemonic_zh: 再次（re-）让人员成长（cruit），即招募
words.example_en: The company plans to recruit new employees next month.
words.example_zh: 公司计划下个月招聘新员工。
words.en_def: A supply of anything wasted or exhausted; a reinforcement.

sentences.en: These new recruits were hired after passing the interviews
sentences.zh: 这些新员工通过面试后被录用

sentences.en: We need to recruit more admin staff to deal with the massive surge in popularity of our products
sentences.zh: 我们需要招聘更多的管理人员来应对我们产品受欢迎程度的大幅上升

sentences.en: the army was recruited for a campaign
sentences.zh: 军队被征召参加一场战役

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 招募（recruit）的行为（-ment）就是招聘活动
words.example_en: The recruitment process in this firm is quite strict.
words.example_zh: 这家公司的招聘流程相当严格。
words.en_def: The process or art of finding candidates for a post in an organization, or recruits for the armed forces.

words.mnemonic_zh: 直角（rect- 直 + angle 角）组成的图形就是矩形
words.example_en: The room is in the shape of a rectangle.
words.example_zh: 这个房间是长方形的。
words.en_def: A quadrilateral having opposing sides parallel and four right angles.

words.mnemonic_zh: 使（-ify）变直（rect-）就是纠正错误
words.example_en: You should rectify your bad habits as soon as possible.
words.example_zh: 你应该尽快纠正你的坏习惯。
words.en_def: To heal (an organ or part of the body).

sentences.en: to rectify the crisis
sentences.zh: 纠正危机

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新（re-）进行发展（develop）就是再开发
words.example_en: The government plans to redevelop this old area.
words.example_zh: 政府计划重新开发这个老城区。
words.en_def: To develop again or differently.

sentences.en: to redevelop an unsuccessful product for relaunch
sentences.zh: 重新开发不成功的产品以重新推出

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 重新开发（redevelop）的行为（-ment）就是再发展项目
words.example_en: The redevelopment of the city center has changed its appearance.
words.example_zh: 市中心的重新开发改变了它的面貌。
words.en_def: The process of developing something anew.

sentences.en: the redevelopment of the hero's character in a comic book
sentences.zh: 漫画中英雄人物的重新塑造

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: re再+und波浪+ancy → 再次像波浪一样，显得多余
words.example_en: The report contains a lot of redundancy that can be removed.
words.example_zh: 报告中有很多冗余内容可以删除。
words.en_def: The state of being redundant

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: re回+fer带+ence → 带回来作为参考
words.example_en: You can make a reference to the dictionary when reading.
words.example_zh: 阅读时你可以参考字典。
words.en_def: A relationship or relation (to something).

sentences.en: You must thoroughly reference your paper before submitting it.
sentences.zh: 在提交之前，您必须彻底参考您的论文。

sentences.en: Reference the dictionary for word meanings.
sentences.zh: 参考字典了解单词含义。

sentences.en: In his speech, the candidate obliquely referenced the past failures of his opponent.
sentences.zh: 这位候选人在演讲中间接提到了对手过去的失败。

words.mnemonic_zh: re回+fer带+endum → 带回民众的意见，即全民公决
words.example_en: The government held a referendum on the new policy.
words.example_zh: 政府就新政策举行了全民公决。
words.en_def: A direct popular vote on a proposed law or constitutional amendment. The adposition on is usually used before the related subject of the vote.

sentences.en: My father is taking my decision on whether to go to university as a referendum on his performance as a parent, and it's very stressful.
sentences.zh: 我父亲正在把我是否上大学的决定作为对他作为家长表现的公投，压力很大。

words.mnemonic_zh: re回+flect弯曲 → 弯曲回来，如光线反射
words.example_en: The mirror can reflect light and form an image.
words.example_zh: 镜子能反射光线并成像。
words.en_def: To bend back (light, etc.) from a surface.

sentences.en: A mirror reflects the light that shines on it.
sentences.zh: 镜子反射照在其上的光。

sentences.en: The moonlight reflected from the surface of water.
sentences.zh: 月光从水面反射出来。

sentences.en: The shop window reflected his image as he walked past.
sentences.zh: 当他走过时，商店的橱窗映出了他的身影。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: reflect的名词形式，反射等行为的结果
words.example_en: His speech is a reflection of his deep thoughts.
words.example_zh: 他的演讲反映了他深刻的思考。
words.en_def: The act of reflecting or the state of being reflected.

sentences.en: The dog barked at his own reflection in the mirror.
sentences.zh: 狗对着镜子里自己的倒影狂吠。

sentences.en: After careful reflection, I have decided not to vote for that proposition.
sentences.zh: 经过深思熟虑，我决定不投赞成票。

sentences.en: It is a reflection on his character that he never came back to see them.
sentences.zh: 他再也没有回来看他们，这反映了他的性格。

words.mnemonic_zh: re重新+form形式 → 重新塑造形式，即改革
words.example_en: The country needs to reform its economic system.
words.example_zh: 这个国家需要改革其经济体制。
words.en_def: The change of something that is defective, broken, inefficient or otherwise negative, in order to correct or improve it

sentences.en: A major reform is needed to improve the efficiency in the factory.
sentences.zh: 需要进行重大改革来提高工厂的效率。

sentences.en: 1909, H. G. Wells, The History of Mr. Polly Chapter 9
sentences.zh: 1909 年，H. G. Wells，《波利先生的历史》第 9 章

sentences.en: It is hoped that many criminals, upon being freed, will eventually reform.
sentences.zh: 希望许多罪犯在获释后最终能够改过自新。

words.cn_def: 使恢复精力；使焕然一新
words.mnemonic_zh: re重新+fresh新鲜 → 重新变得新鲜，恢复精力
words.example_en: A cup of coffee can refresh you in the morning.
words.example_zh: 早上一杯咖啡能让你恢复精力。
words.en_def: The periodic energizing required to maintain the contents of computer memory, the display luminance of a computer screen, etc.

sentences.en: Sleep refreshes the body and the mind.
sentences.zh: 睡眠可以使身体和精神焕发活力。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表性质、特征
words.cn_def: 使人精神焕发的；令人耳目一新的
words.mnemonic_zh: refresh的形容词形式，有让人恢复精力的特性
words.example_zh: The refreshing breeze makes people feel comfortable.
words.example_en: 清新的微风让人感觉舒适。
words.en_def: To renew or revitalize.

sentences.en: Sleep refreshes the body and the mind.
sentences.zh: 睡眠可以使身体和精神焕发活力。

words.mnemonic_zh: re回+fug逃 → 逃回去的地方，即避难所
words.example_en: The refugees found a refuge in the old building.
words.example_zh: 难民们在那座旧建筑里找到了避难所。
words.en_def: A state of safety, protection or shelter.

words.mnemonic_zh: re回+fund资金 → 把资金返回，即退款
words.example_en: The store will refund your money if the product is defective.
words.example_zh: 如果产品有缺陷，商店会给你退款。
words.en_def: An amount of money returned.

sentences.en: If the camera is faulty, you can return it to the store where you bought it for a full refund.
sentences.zh: 如果相机出现故障，您可以将其退回购买相机的商店以获得全额退款。

sentences.en: If you find this computer for sale anywhere at a lower price, we'll refund you the difference.
sentences.zh: 如果您发现这台计算机在任何地方以更低的价格出售，我们将退还差价。

sentences.en: to refund a railroad loan
sentences.zh: 退还铁路贷款

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 往回流，即拒绝
words.example_en: His refusal to cooperate made the project more difficult.
words.example_zh: 他拒绝合作使项目变得更难了。
words.en_def: The act of refusing.

words.mnemonic_zh: 再次获得即重新获得
words.example_en: She managed to regain her confidence after the failure.
words.example_zh: 失败后她设法重新找回了信心。
words.en_def: To get back; to recover possession of.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“热嘎的”，热情关注即看待
words.example_en: People often regard him as a genius in this field.
words.example_zh: 人们常把他视为这个领域的天才。
words.en_def: A steady look, a gaze.

sentences.en: He is held in great regard in Whitehall.
sentences.zh: 他在白厅受到高度尊重。

sentences.en: She regarded us warily.
sentences.zh: 她警惕地看着我们。

sentences.en: He regards honesty as a duty.
sentences.zh: 他把诚实视为一种义务。

words.mnemonic_zh: 不看待，即不顾
words.example_en: He continued working regardless of the difficulties.
words.example_zh: 他不顾困难继续工作。
words.en_def: Having no regard; heedless; careless.

sentences.en: Tatiana knew the meat had passed its expiry date, but she ate it regardless.
sentences.zh: 塔蒂亚娜知道肉已经过了保质期，但她还是吃了。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“瑞吉姆”，可联想一个统治的地方政权
words.example_en: The old regime was overthrown by the revolution.
words.example_zh: 旧政权被革命推翻了。
words.en_def: Mode of rule or management.

sentences.en: a prison regime
sentences.zh: 监狱制度

sentences.en: a capitalist regime
sentences.zh: 资本主义政权

sentences.en: Heaven will eliminate the tyrannical regimes.
sentences.zh: 天必消灭暴政。

words.mnemonic_zh: 再次记录，即登记注册
words.example_en: You need to register your new address at the post office.
words.example_zh: 你需要在邮局登记你的新地址。
words.en_def: A machine that tabulates the amount of sales transactions, makes a permanent and cumulative record of them, and has a drawer in which cash can be kept.

sentences.en: The teacher took the register by calling out each child's name.
sentences.zh: 老师喊出了每个孩子的名字，进行了登记。

sentences.en: a register of deeds
sentences.zh: 行为登记册

sentences.en: My ex-boss used "let go", in the euphemistic register, when he sacked me.
sentences.zh: 我的前老板在解雇我时委婉地说了“放手”。

words.mnemonic_zh: 再次引导，即管理调控
words.example_en: The government should regulate the market to avoid chaos.
words.example_zh: 政府应调控市场以避免混乱。
words.en_def: To dictate policy.

sentences.en: to regulate a watch, i.e. adjust its rate of running so that it will keep approximately standard time
sentences.zh: 调节手表，即调整其运行速度，使其保持大约标准时间

sentences.en: to regulate one's eating habits
sentences.zh: 调节饮食习惯

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 管理的结果，形成规则
words.example_en: You must follow the school regulations.
words.example_zh: 你必须遵守学校的规章制度。
words.en_def: The act of regulating or the condition of being regulated.

words.mnemonic_zh: 进行管理的人或物
words.example_en: The financial regulator plays an important role in the market.
words.example_zh: 金融监管者在市场中起着重要作用。
words.en_def: A device that controls or limits something.

sentences.en: The voltage regulator stopped working and the resulting overload destroyed the device.
sentences.zh: 电压调节器停止工作，由此产生的过载损坏了设备。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示与…有关
words.mnemonic_zh: 与管理有关的
words.example_en: The regulatory measures aim to protect consumers.
words.example_zh: 监管措施旨在保护消费者。
words.en_def: Of or pertaining to regulation.

words.mnemonic_zh: re（再）+ new（新），再次变新
words.example_en: They decided to renew their contract for another year.
words.example_zh: 他们决定将合同再续签一年。
words.en_def: To make (something) new again; to restore to freshness or original condition.

sentences.en: I'd like to renew these three books.  Did you know that you can renew online?
sentences.zh: 我想续订这三本书。 您知道可以在线续订吗？

words.mnemonic_zh: renew（更新）+ able（可……的），可更新的
words.example_en: Solar energy is a renewable source of power.
words.example_zh: 太阳能是一种可再生能源。
words.en_def: A thing that is renewable; especially, a renewable source of energy.

sentences.en: Solar and wind power are renewable, but coal is not.
sentences.zh: 太阳能和风能是可再生的，但煤炭不是。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: renew（更新）+ al（名词后缀），更新的行为
words.example_en: The renewal of the old building took several months.
words.example_zh: 那座旧建筑的翻新花了几个月时间。
words.en_def: The act of renewing.

words.mnemonic_zh: re（再）+ nov（新）+ ate（使），使再次变新
words.example_en: They plan to renovate the old house next year.
words.example_zh: 他们计划明年翻新那座老房子。
words.en_def: To renew; to revamp something to make it look new again.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: renovate（翻新）+ ation（名词后缀），翻新的行为或结果
words.example_en: The renovation of the museum cost a large amount of money.
words.example_zh: 博物馆的翻新花费了一大笔钱。
words.en_def: An act, or the process, of renovating.

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示被动或完成
words.mnemonic_zh: re（强调）+ nown（知道）+ ed，被众人知道的
words.example_en: The renowned writer gave a speech at the university.
words.example_zh: 那位著名作家在大学发表了演讲。
words.morph_note: 词根与know同源，历史音变导致拼写差异
words.en_def: Famous, celebrated, or well-known.

sentences.en: The movie “Three Stars” is about world-renowned chefs.
sentences.zh: 电影《三颗星》讲述的是世界知名厨师的故事。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示相关事物
words.mnemonic_zh: rent（租）+ al（名词后缀），与租赁相关的事物
words.example_en: The rental of this apartment is quite high.
words.example_zh: 这套公寓的租金相当高。
words.en_def: Something that is rented.

sentences.en: It's just a rental, so I don't need to take very good care of it.
sentences.zh: 这只是租来的，所以我不需要很好地照顾它。

words.mnemonic_zh: re（再）+ organize（组织），再次组织
words.example_en: The company decided to reorganize its management structure.
words.example_zh: 公司决定重组其管理结构。
words.en_def: To organize something again, or in a different manner

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，由形容词后缀 -ed 加 -ly 构成
words.mnemonic_zh: repeat（重复）+ edly（副词后缀），重复地
words.example_en: He failed repeatedly but never gave up.
words.example_zh: 他屡次失败，但从未放弃。
words.morph_note: peat 词根源于拉丁 petere（追求、寻找），现代较少用此义
words.en_def: Done several times or in repetition.

sentences.en: He repeatedly violated the court order, and shall now be punished.
sentences.zh: 他多次违反法院命令，现应受到处罚。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有……性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: re（重复）+ peat（有反复之意）+ itive（形容词后缀），反复的
words.example_zh: 工厂里的工作往往是重复且单调的。
words.example_en: The work in the factory is often repetitive and boring.
words.morph_note: peat 词根源于拉丁 petere（追求、寻找），现代较少用此义
words.en_def: Happening many times in a similar way; containing repetition; repeating.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态、性质
words.mnemonic_zh: 反复停留的地方就是住宅
words.example_en: The old man's residence is surrounded by beautiful gardens.
words.example_zh: 这位老人的住宅被美丽的花园环绕。
words.en_def: The place where one lives; one's home.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示人；形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 总停留在此的人就是居民
words.example_en: Many residents in this area enjoy outdoor activities.
words.example_zh: 这个地区的许多居民喜欢户外活动。
words.en_def: A person, animal or plant living at a certain location or in a certain area.

sentences.en: The tiger lily is a resident of Asia.
sentences.zh: 虎百合是亚洲的居民。

sentences.en: She's a resident in neurosurgery at Mass General.
sentences.zh: 她是麻省总医院神经外科的住院医师。

sentences.en: resident in the city or in the country
sentences.zh: 居住在城市或乡村

words.mnemonic_zh: 和居民停留相关的，即住宅的
words.example_en: This is a quiet residential neighborhood.
words.example_zh: 这是一个安静的住宅区。
words.en_def: A trip during which people temporarily live together.

sentences.en: The youth group organises annual residentials.
sentences.zh: 青年小组每年组织一次住宿活动。

sentences.en: They live in a residential neighborhood.
sentences.zh: 他们住在一个住宅区。

sentences.en: There is a residential requirement for obtaining a marriage license here.
sentences.zh: 在这里获得结婚证有居住要求。

words.mnemonic_zh: 留下的东西就是剩余物
words.example_en: The residue at the bottom of the bottle needs to be cleaned.
words.example_zh: 瓶子底部的残渣需要清理。
words.en_def: Whatever remains after something else has been removed.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 再次签字放弃工作，即辞职
words.example_en: His resignation surprised everyone in the company.
words.example_zh: 他的辞职让公司里的每个人都很惊讶。
words.en_def: The act of resigning.

words.mnemonic_zh: 站回来对抗，就是抵抗
words.example_en: They tried to resist the new policy.
words.example_zh: 他们试图抵制这项新政策。
words.en_def: A protective coating or covering.

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: 抵抗的行为或状态就是阻力
words.example_en: The resistance against the invaders was fierce.
words.example_zh: 对入侵者的抵抗很激烈。
words.en_def: The act of resisting, or the capacity to resist.

sentences.en: the resistance of bacteria to certain antibiotics
sentences.zh: 细菌对某些抗生素的耐药性

words.mnemonic_zh: 再次解开问题，即解决
words.example_en: We must resolve these issues as soon as possible.
words.example_zh: 我们必须尽快解决这些问题。
words.en_def: Determination; will power.

sentences.en: It took all my resolve to go through with the surgery.
sentences.zh: 我用尽了全部的决心才完成了手术。

sentences.en: to resolve a riddle
sentences.zh: 解开谜语

sentences.en: I resolve to finish this work before I go home.
sentences.zh: 我决定在回家之前完成这项工作。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示充满…的
words.mnemonic_zh: 反复地用尊敬的目光看，即恭敬的
words.example_en: The students are always respectful to their teachers.
words.example_zh: 学生们总是对他们的老师很恭敬。
words.en_def: Marked or characterized by respect

sentences.en: It is of great importance that you act in a respectful manner towards the duke and duchess.
sentences.zh: 对公爵和公爵夫人表现出尊重是非常重要的。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表示具有…性质的
words.mnemonic_zh: 各自回头看自己的，即各自的
words.example_en: They went to their respective homes after the party.
words.example_zh: 聚会结束后，他们各自回了家。
words.en_def: Relating to particular persons or things, each to each; particular; own.

sentences.en: They returned to their respective places of abode.
sentences.zh: 他们回到了各自的住处。

sentences.en: the respective connections of society
sentences.zh: 社会的各自联系

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，用于修饰动词、形容词等
words.mnemonic_zh: 由'respect'变形而来，可记成‘各自带着尊重地对应’
words.example_en: Tom and Jerry got 90 and 80 points respectively in the exam.
words.example_zh: 汤姆和杰瑞在考试中分别得了 90 分和 80 分。
words.en_def: In a relative manner; often used when comparing lists, where the term denotes that the items in the lists correspond to each other in the order they are given.

sentences.en: Serena Williams and Roger Federer won the women's and men's singles titles, respectively, at the 2010 Australian Open.
sentences.zh: 塞雷娜·威廉姆斯和罗杰·费德勒在 2010 年澳大利亚网球公开赛上分别赢得了女子和男子单打冠军。

words.mnemonic_zh: re 表示再，重新开始就是 restart
words.example_en: The computer needs to restart after installing the new software.
words.example_zh: 安装新软件后，电脑需要重启。
words.en_def: The act of starting something again.

sentences.en: After the restart of my browser, the problem went away.
sentences.zh: 重新启动浏览器后，问题就消失了。

sentences.en: All attempts to restart the engine failed.
sentences.zh: 所有重新启动发动机的尝试均失败。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表否定，意为‘无、不’
words.cn_def: 焦躁不安的；坐立不安的
words.mnemonic_zh: 不能休息，所以焦躁不安
words.example_en: The child was restless during the long - boring meeting.
words.example_zh: 在冗长乏味的会议期间，孩子坐立不安。
words.en_def: Not allowing or affording rest.

sentences.en: The night before his wedding was a restless one.
sentences.zh: 婚礼的前一天晚上是一个不安的夜晚。

sentences.en: He was a restless child.
sentences.zh: 他是一个不安分的孩子。

sentences.en: A restless ambition.
sentences.zh: 不安分的野心。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: re 再加上 store 储存，让事物再恢复原状
words.example_en: The restoration of the old building cost a large amount of money.
words.example_zh: 旧建筑的修复花费了大量资金。
words.en_def: The process of bringing an object back to its original state; the process of restoring something.

sentences.en: The restoration of this medieval church involved undoing all the Victorian modifications.
sentences.zh: 这座中世纪教堂的修复涉及撤销所有维多利亚时代的修改。

sentences.en: The restoration of the House of Stuart took place a few years after the death of Cromwell.
sentences.zh: 克伦威尔去世几年后，斯图亚特王朝得以复辟。

words.mnemonic_zh: re 再加上 store 储存，重新归位即恢复
words.example_en: They hope to restore the city to its former glory.
words.example_zh: 他们希望使这座城市恢复昔日的辉煌。
words.en_def: The act of recovering data or a system from a backup.

sentences.en: We backed up the data successfully, but the restore failed.
sentences.zh: 我们备份数据成功，但是恢复失败。

sentences.en: He restored my lost faith in him by doing a good deed.
sentences.zh: 他做了一件好事，恢复了我对他失去的信心。

sentences.en: There was a crash last night, and we're still restoring the file system.
sentences.zh: 昨晚发生了崩溃，我们仍在恢复文件系统。

words.mnemonic_zh: re 往回，strain 拉紧，往回拉就是约束
words.example_en: He tried to restrain his anger when hearing the bad news.
words.example_zh: 听到这个坏消息时，他尽力抑制自己的愤怒。
words.en_def: To control or keep in check.

sentences.en: He was restrained by the straight jacket.
sentences.zh: 他被直筒夹克束缚住了。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，使动词变为名词
words.mnemonic_zh: 由 restrain 变来，有约束就得克制
words.example_en: Showing restraint in public is a sign of good manners.
words.example_zh: 在公共场合表现出克制是有礼貌的表现。
words.en_def: Something that restrains, ties, fastens or secures

sentences.en: Make sure all the restraints are tight.
sentences.zh: 确保所有约束装置均紧固。

sentences.en: Try to exercise restraint when talking to your boss.
sentences.zh: 与老板交谈时尽量保持克制。

words.mnemonic_zh: re 往回，strict 严格，往回严格要求就是限制
words.example_en: The new policy restricts the use of plastic bags in supermarkets.
words.example_zh: 新政策限制了超市使用塑料袋。
words.en_def: To restrain within boundaries; to limit; to confine

sentences.en: After suffering diahrroea, the patient was restricted to a diet of rice, cold meat, and yoghurt.
sentences.zh: 患有腹泻后，患者的饮食仅限于米饭、冷肉和酸奶。

words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表被动、完成
words.mnemonic_zh: 由 restrict 变来，被限制了就是受限制的
words.example_en: This area is restricted to authorized personnel only.
words.example_zh: 此区域仅限授权人员进入。
words.en_def: To restrain within boundaries; to limit; to confine

sentences.en: After suffering diahrroea, the patient was restricted to a diet of rice, cold meat, and yoghurt.
sentences.zh: 患有腹泻后，患者的饮食仅限于米饭、冷肉和酸奶。

sentences.en: a restricted military document
sentences.zh: 受限制的军事文件

sentences.en: This hotel is restricted: no Blacks.
sentences.zh: 这家酒店有限制：禁止黑人入住。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示动作或结果
words.mnemonic_zh: restrict 加 ion 变成名词，限制的相关表述
words.example_en: There are some restrictions on smoking in public places.
words.example_zh: 公共场所对吸烟有一些限制。
words.en_def: The act of restricting, or the state of being restricted.

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新拿起来做，即继续
words.example_en: After a short break, they resumed their discussion.
words.example_zh: 短暂休息后，他们继续了讨论。
words.en_def: To take back possession of (something).

sentences.en: We will resume this discussion tomorrow at nine.
sentences.zh: 我们将于明天九点继续讨论。

words.mnemonic_zh: 反复切分货物卖，就是零售
words.example_en: This store mainly focuses on retail business.
words.example_zh: 这家商店主要经营零售业务。
words.en_def: The sale of goods directly to the consumer, encompassing the storefronts, mail-order, websites, etc., and the corporate mechanisms, branding, advertising, etc. that support them.

sentences.en: She works in retail.
sentences.zh: 她从事零售业。

sentences.en: I never pay retail for clothes.
sentences.zh: 我从不支付服装零售费。

sentences.en: We've shut shown our reseller unit. We're only selling retail now.
sentences.zh: 我们已经关闭了我们的经销商单位。 我们现在只做零售。

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新去思考
words.example_en: He decided to rethink his career plan.
words.example_zh: 他决定重新思考他的职业规划。
words.en_def: The act of thinking again about something.

sentences.en: This business plan of yours looks risky. It needs a rethink.
sentences.zh: 你的这个商业计划看起来有风险。 它需要重新思考。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向后拉，就像撤退
words.example_en: The army had to retreat due to the strong enemy.
words.example_zh: 由于敌人强大，军队不得不撤退。
words.en_def: The act of pulling back or withdrawing, as from something dangerous, or unpleasant.

sentences.en: a retreating forehead
sentences.zh: 后退的额头

words.mnemonic_zh: 重新找到，即找回
words.example_en: She managed to retrieve her lost keys.
words.example_zh: 她设法找回了丢失的钥匙。
words.en_def: A retrieval

sentences.en: to retrieve one's character or independence; to retrieve a thrown ball
sentences.zh: 恢复一个人的性格或独立性； 捡回扔出的球

sentences.en: The cook doesn't care what's shot, only what's actually retrieved.
sentences.zh: 厨师并不关心拍摄的是什么，只关心实际取回的内容。

sentences.en: Dog breeds called 'retrievers' were selected for retrieving.
sentences.zh: 选择被称为“寻回犬”的犬种进行寻回。

words.mnemonic_zh: 向后转动，就返回了
words.example_en: He will return to his hometown next week.
words.example_zh: 他下周将返回他的家乡。
words.en_def: The act of returning.

sentences.en: I expect the house to be spotless upon my return.
sentences.zh: 我希望我回来时房子一尘不染。

sentences.en: Do you want a one-way or a return?
sentences.zh: 您想要单程还是往返？

sentences.en: Last year there were 250 returns of this product, an improvement on the 500 returns the year before.
sentences.zh: 去年该产品的退货量为 250 件，比前年的 500 件退货有所改善。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果
words.mnemonic_zh: 去掉遮盖，就是揭示
words.example_en: The revelation of the truth shocked everyone.
words.example_zh: 真相的揭露让每个人都震惊了。
words.en_def: The act of revealing or disclosing.

words.mnemonic_zh: 回去复仇
words.example_en: He took revenge on those who had wronged him.
words.example_zh: 他对那些冤枉他的人进行了报复。
words.en_def: Any form of personal retaliatory action against an individual, institution, or group for some alleged or perceived harm or injustice.

sentences.en: Indifference is the sweetest revenge.
sentences.zh: 冷漠是最甜蜜的报复。

sentences.en: Arsenal revenged its loss to Manchester United last time with a 5–0 drubbing this time.
sentences.zh: 阿森纳此次以5-0惨败曼联，报了上次输给曼联的一箭之仇。

words.mnemonic_zh: 回来的钱，就是收入
words.example_en: The company's revenue has increased this year.
words.example_zh: 这家公司今年的收入增加了。
words.en_def: The income returned by an investment.

words.mnemonic_zh: 反向转动，即反转
words.example_en: They decided to reverse their previous decision.
words.example_zh: 他们决定推翻之前的决定。
words.en_def: The opposite of something.

sentences.en: We believed the Chinese weren't ready for us. In fact, the reverse was true.
sentences.zh: 我们相信中国人还没有准备好迎接我们。 事实上，事实恰恰相反。

sentences.en: to reverse a portion of video footage
sentences.zh: 反转视频片段的一部分

sentences.en: to reverse a judgment, sentence, or decree
sentences.zh: 推翻判决、判决或法令

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“嗖啊”，像箭一样嗖地高飞
words.example_en: The prices of houses soar in this area recently.
words.example_zh: 最近这个地区的房价猛涨。
words.en_def: The act of soaring.

sentences.en: The pump prices soared into new heights as the strike continued.
sentences.zh: 随着罢工的继续，汽油价格飙升至新高。

words.suffix_cn: 动词的现在分词形式，可作形容词，表正在进行或具有某种特征
words.mnemonic_zh: soar（高飞）加 ing 表正在高飞、猛增的状态
words.example_en: The soaring eagle caught everyone's attention.
words.example_zh: 高飞的老鹰吸引了所有人的注意。
words.en_def: To fly high with little effort, like a bird.

sentences.en: The pump prices soared into new heights as the strike continued.
sentences.zh: 随着罢工的继续，汽油价格飙升至新高。

sentences.en: Soaring fuel prices make U.S. energy policy one of the hottest issues of the presidential campaign https//web.archive.org/web/20090207211354/http://www.pittsburghlive.com/x/pittsburghtrib/news/election/s_574218.html.
sentences.zh: 飙升的燃油价格使美国能源政策成为总统竞选中最热门的问题之一https//web.archive.org/web/20090207211354/http://www.pittsburghlive.com/x/pittsburghtrib/news/election/s_574218.html。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示人或主义
words.cn_def: 社会主义者；社会主义的
words.mnemonic_zh: social（社会的）加 ist 表示信奉社会主义的人
words.example_en: Many socialists advocate for equal rights and opportunities.
words.example_zh: 许多社会主义者倡导平等的权利和机会。
words.en_def: One who practices or advocates socialism.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“搜了”，搜了一遍就这一个，即唯一的
words.example_en: He is the sole heir to the large estate.
words.example_zh: 他是那笔巨额遗产的唯一继承人。
words.en_def: A wooden band or yoke put around the neck of an ox or cow in the stall.

words.suffix_cn: 副词后缀，表方式、程度等
words.mnemonic_zh: sole（唯一）加 ly 表示只、仅仅
words.example_en: He did it solely for his own benefit.
words.example_zh: 他这么做仅仅是为了自己的利益。
words.en_def: Alone; exclusively.

sentences.en: The new chef was solely responsible for attending the grill.
sentences.zh: 新厨师全权负责参加烧烤活动。

words.mnemonic_zh: solicit（请求、招揽）加 or 表示做这些事的人，如律师、推销员
words.example_zh: The solicitor provided professional legal advice.
words.example_en: 这位律师提供了专业的法律建议。
words.en_def: One who solicits.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“嗖立得”，能嗖地立住，说明很坚实
words.example_en: Ice is a solid form of water.
words.example_zh: 冰是水的固体形态。
words.en_def: A substance in the fundamental state of matter that retains its size and shape without need of a container (as opposed to a liquid or gas).

sentences.en: I owe him; he did me a solid last year.
sentences.zh: 我欠他的； 去年他给了我很大的帮助。

sentences.en: I prefer solids over paisleys.
sentences.zh: 与佩斯利图案相比，我更喜欢固体图案。

sentences.en: The doctor said I can't eat any solids four hours before the operation.
sentences.zh: 医生说手术前四个小时不能吃任何固体食物。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: solid（坚实）加 arity 表示像固体一样坚实的状态，即团结
words.example_en: The workers showed great solidarity during the strike.
words.example_zh: 工人们在罢工期间表现出了极大的团结。
words.en_def: A bond of unity or agreement between individuals, united around a common goal or against a common enemy, such as the unifying principle that defines the labor movement; mutual support within a group.

sentences.en: A long time union member himself, Phil showed solidarity with the picketing grocery store workers by shopping at a competing, unionized store.
sentences.zh: 菲尔本人是一名长期工会成员，他通过在一家竞争的工会商店购物来表达对纠察杂货店工人的声援。

sentences.en: Only the solidarity provided by her siblings allowed Margaret to cope with her mother's harrowing death.
sentences.zh: 只有兄弟姐妹的团结一致，玛格丽特才能应对母亲的悲惨死亡。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示状态、性质
words.mnemonic_zh: sol（单独）加 itude 表示单独的状态，即独处、孤独
words.example_en: She enjoys the solitude of the mountains.
words.example_zh: 她享受在山里独处的时光。
words.en_def: Aloneness; state of being alone or solitary, by oneself.

words.mnemonic_zh: sol（单独）本身就有独自之意，solo 即独自表演等
words.example_en: The pianist gave an excellent solo performance.
words.example_zh: 这位钢琴家进行了一场精彩的独奏表演。
words.en_def: A piece of music for one performer.

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，dur持久，使持久即忍受、持续。
words.example_en: She can endure the pain for the sake of her dream.
words.example_zh: 为了梦想，她能忍受痛苦。
words.en_def: To continue or carry on, despite obstacles or hardships; to persist.

sentences.en: The singer's popularity endured for decades.
sentences.zh: 这位歌手的受欢迎程度持续了数十年。

sentences.en: Our love will endure forever.
sentences.zh: 我们的爱将永远持续下去。

sentences.en: He endured years of pain.
sentences.zh: 他忍受了多年的痛苦。

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，force力量，使有力量即执行、强迫。
words.example_en: The police enforce the law to maintain social order.
words.example_zh: 警察执行法律以维护社会秩序。
words.en_def: To keep up, impose or bring into effect something, not necessarily by force.

sentences.en: The police are there to enforce the law.
sentences.zh: 警察在那里执行法律。

sentences.en: The victim was able to enforce his evidence against the alleged perpetrator.
sentences.zh: 受害人能够对被指控的肇事者提供证据。

sentences.en: to enforce a passage
sentences.zh: 强制通过

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果等
words.mnemonic_zh: 由enforce加名词后缀-ment，表执行的行为。
words.example_en: The strict enforcement of regulations is necessary.
words.example_zh: 严格执行规章制度是必要的。
words.en_def: The act of enforcing; compulsion.

words.root_cn: 抵押、担保（引申为参与等）
words.mnemonic_zh: en使，gage有参与之意，使参与进来。
words.example_en: The interesting game engaged the children easily.
words.example_zh: 有趣的游戏轻易地吸引了孩子们。
words.en_def: (heading) To interact socially.

words.root_cn: 抵押、担保（引申为参与等）
words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示行为、结果等
words.mnemonic_zh: 由engage加名词后缀-ment，表参与等行为或结果。
words.example_en: Their engagement was announced in the newspaper.
words.example_zh: 他们的订婚消息在报纸上公布了。
words.en_def: An appointment, especially to speak or perform.

sentences.en: The lecturer has three speaking engagements this week.
sentences.zh: 讲师本周有三场演讲。

sentences.en: Check the gears for full engagement before turning the handle.
sentences.zh: 转动手柄之前检查齿轮是否完全啮合。

sentences.en: We are enjoying a long engagement, but haven't yet set a date.
sentences.zh: 我们订婚时间很长，但尚未确定日期。

words.root_cn: 抵押、担保（引申为参与等）
words.suffix_cn: 形容词后缀，表具有……性质
words.mnemonic_zh: 由engage加-ing，能吸引人的就是迷人的。
words.example_en: He has an engaging personality that makes people like him.
words.example_zh: 他有迷人的个性，让人喜欢他。
words.en_def: (heading) To interact socially.

sentences.en: I found the first of the Harry Potter books a very engaging read.
sentences.zh: 我发现《哈利·波特》第一本书读起来非常引人入胜。

sentences.en: Beauty, of course, and a bright, engaging personality — or at least the ability to fake one — are prerequisites for entering the Miss World competition.
sentences.zh: 当然，美丽以及聪明、迷人的个性——或者至少是伪装的能力——是参加世界小姐比赛的先决条件。

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，hance有提升之意，使提升即增强。
words.example_en: Regular exercise can enhance your physical health.
words.example_zh: 定期锻炼能增强你的身体健康。
words.en_def: To lift, raise up.

sentences.en: A debt enhances rapidly by compound interest.
sentences.zh: 债务通过复利迅速增加。

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，quire询问，使去询问。
words.example_en: He went to the office to enquire about the job opening.
words.example_zh: 他去办公室询问那个职位空缺的情况。
words.en_def: To make an enquiry.

sentences.en: He enquired about the availability of rental bicycles in the town.
sentences.zh: 他询问了镇上是否有出租自行车的情况。

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，rich富有，使富有即丰富、充实。
words.example_en: Traveling can enrich your life experience.
words.example_zh: 旅行能丰富你的生活经验。
words.en_def: To enhance.

sentences.en: Hobbies enrich lives.
sentences.zh: 兴趣爱好丰富生活。

words.root_cn: 名单、名册（引申为登记、注册）
words.mnemonic_zh: en使，rol名册，使进入名册即登记、入学。
words.example_en: Many students enrol in this course every year.
words.example_zh: 每年有很多学生报名参加这门课程。
words.en_def: To enter (a name, etc.) in a register, roll or list

sentences.en: They were eager to enroll new recruits.
sentences.zh: 他们急于招收新兵。

sentences.en: Have you enrolled in classes yet for this term?
sentences.zh: 您已经报名本学期的课程了吗？

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，sue跟随，使跟随而来即接着发生
words.example_en: A heated argument ensued after they discussed the plan.
words.example_zh: 他们讨论完计划后，紧接着发生了一场激烈的争论。
words.en_def: To follow (a leader, inclination etc.).

sentences.en: Give three freshmen six bottles of wine, and hilarity will ensue.
sentences.zh: 给三个新生六瓶酒，欢闹就会随之而来。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“硬特”，硬闯进去就是进入
words.example_en: He can't enter the building without a pass.
words.example_zh: 没有通行证他不能进入那栋大楼。
words.en_def: The "Enter" key on a computer keyboard.

sentences.en: You should knock before you enter, unless you want to see me naked.
sentences.zh: 进去之前应该先敲门，除非你想看我裸体。

sentences.en: to enter a knife into a piece of wood;  to enter a boy at college, a horse for a race, etc.
sentences.zh: 将刀插入一块木头； 一个男孩进入大学，一匹马参加比赛，等等。

sentences.en: My twelve-year-old son will be entering his teens next year.  She had planned to enter the legal profession.
sentences.zh: 我十二岁的儿子明年将进入十几岁。 她原本计划进入法律行业。

words.mnemonic_zh: enter在中间，prise抓住，抓住中间机会的是企业
words.example_en: The small enterprise is facing financial difficulties.
words.example_zh: 这家小企业正面临财务困难。
words.en_def: A company, business, organization, or other purposeful endeavor.

sentences.en: A micro-enterprise is defined as a business having 5 or fewer employees and a low seed capital.
sentences.zh: 微型企业被定义为拥有 5 名或更少员工且原始资本较低的企业。

sentences.en: Biosphere 2 was a scientific enterprise aimed at the exploration of the complex web of interactions within life systems.
sentences.zh: Biosphere 2 是一项科学事业，旨在探索生命系统内复杂的相互作用网络。

sentences.en: He has shown great enterprise throughout his early career.
sentences.zh: 在他的早期职业生涯中，他表现出了伟大的进取心。

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，thusi神，使像有神附身一样的人是爱好者
words.example_en: The car enthusiast spends much money on his collection.
words.example_zh: 这位汽车爱好者在他的收藏上花了很多钱。
words.en_def: A person filled with or guided by enthusiasm.

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，title权利，使有权利
words.example_en: This ticket entitles you to free admission to the concert.
words.example_zh: 这张票使你有权免费进入音乐会现场。
words.en_def: To give a title to.

sentences.en: A passport entitles the bearer to travel to other countries.
sentences.zh: 护照使持有人有权前往其他国家旅行。

words.suffix_cn: 名词后缀，表示性质、状态
words.mnemonic_zh: en使，tit存在，使存在的就是实体
words.example_zh: 这家公司在商业界是一个合法实体。
words.en_def: That which has a distinct existence as an individual unit. Often used for organisations which have no physical form.

sentences.en: The group successfully maintains its tribal entity.
sentences.zh: 该团体成功地维持了其部落实体。

words.mnemonic_zh: environment环境，alist人，关注环境的人是环保主义者
words.example_en: The environmentalist advocates for sustainable development.
words.example_zh: 这位环保主义者倡导可持续发展。
words.en_def: One who holds the view that environment, rather than heredity or culture, is the primary factor in the development of an individual or group.

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，vis看，使看到即设想
words.example_en: He can't envisage a world without modern technology.
words.example_zh: 他无法设想一个没有现代科技的世界。
words.en_def: To conceive or see something within one's mind; to imagine or envision.

words.mnemonic_zh: en使，vision想象，使能想象即展望
words.example_en: She envisions a bright future for her children.
words.example_zh: 她为孩子们展望了一个光明的未来。
words.en_def: To conceive or see something within one's mind. To imagine.

words.mnemonic_zh: epi在……上，dem人民，在人民中流行的是流行病
words.example_en: The government took measures to control the epidemic.
words.example_zh: 政府采取措施控制疫情。
words.en_def: A widespread disease that affects many individuals in a population.

sentences.en: Epidemic hysteria occurred upon the incumbent’s reelection.
sentences.zh: 现任总统连任后出现了流行性歇斯底里症。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“哥rap”，哥哥说唱时要抓住节奏
words.example_en: He can quickly grasp the key points of the lecture.
words.example_zh: 他能迅速抓住讲座的要点。
words.en_def: (sometimes figurative) Grip.

sentences.en: The goal is within my grasp.
sentences.zh: 目标就在我的掌握之中。

sentences.en: I have never been able to grasp the concept of infinity.
sentences.zh: 我一直无法理解无穷大的概念。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“鬼屋”，坟墓常让人联想鬼屋
words.example_en: There are many old graves in the cemetery.
words.example_zh: 公墓里有许多古老的坟墓。
words.en_def: An excavation in the earth as a place of burial

sentences.en: to grave an image
sentences.zh: 雕刻图像

words.mnemonic_zh: grav重 + ity表状态 → 重力、严重性
words.example_en: The gravity of the situation requires immediate action.
words.example_zh: 形势的严重性需要立即采取行动。
words.en_def: The state or condition of having weight; weight; heaviness.

sentences.en: I hope you appreciate the gravity of the situation.
sentences.zh: 我希望你能意识到事态的严重性。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“格力的”，贪心的人啥都想要格力的
words.example_en: His greed led him to make foolish decisions.
words.example_zh: 他的贪婪使他做出了愚蠢的决定。
words.en_def: A selfish or excessive desire for more than is needed or deserved, especially of money, wealth, food, or other possessions.

sentences.en: His greed was his undoing.
sentences.zh: 他的贪婪导致了他的毁灭。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“格瑞”，可联想一个叫格瑞的人头发是灰色
words.example_en: The grey sky indicates that it may rain soon.
words.example_zh: 灰色的天空表明可能很快要下雨了。
words.en_def: Having a color.

sentences.en: Wash colored items separately from whites and darks to prevent the colors from bleeding.
sentences.zh: 将有色物品与白色和深色物品分开洗涤，以防止颜色渗色。

sentences.en: The room was red, with a dark-colored rug.
sentences.zh: 房间是红色的，铺着深色的地毯。

sentences.en: The singer wore a colored shirt.
sentences.zh: 这位歌手穿着一件彩色衬衫。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“格瑞德”，想象一个叫格瑞德的人画了网格
words.example_en: The city is laid out in a regular grid of streets.
words.example_zh: 这座城市的街道呈规则的网格状布局。
words.en_def: A rectangular array of squares or rectangles of equal size, such as in a crossword puzzle.

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“格瑞福”，联想一个叫格瑞福的人遭遇悲痛之事
words.example_en: She was overwhelmed with grief after her pet died.
words.example_zh: 她的宠物死后，她悲痛万分。
words.en_def: Suffering, hardship.

sentences.en: She was worn out from so much grief.
sentences.zh: 她因如此悲痛而疲惫不堪。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“格瑞”在“哦”，想象格瑞在烧烤时发出声音
words.example_en: They often grill steaks in the backyard on weekends.
words.example_zh: 他们经常在周末的后院烧烤牛排。
words.en_def: A grating; a grid of wire or a sheet of material with a pattern of holes or slots, usually used to protect something while allowing the passage of air and liquids. Typical uses: to allow air through a fan while preventing fingers or objects from passing; to allow people to talk to somebody, while preventing attack.

sentences.en: I put some peppers and mushrooms on the grill to go with dinner.
sentences.zh: 我在烤架上放了一些辣椒和蘑菇来搭配晚餐。

sentences.en: a packet of frozen cauliflower cheese grills
sentences.zh: 一包冷冻花椰菜奶酪烤架

sentences.en: These coupons will get you a discount at Johnny's Bar and Grill.
sentences.zh: 这些优惠券可以让您在 Johnny's Bar and Grill 享受折扣。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音似“格润”，想象一个叫格润的人咧嘴笑
words.example_en: The child grinned when he got a new toy.
words.example_zh: 孩子拿到新玩具时咧嘴笑了。
words.en_def: A smile in which the lips are parted to reveal the teeth.

sentences.en: Why do you grin?  Did I say something funny?
sentences.zh: 你为什么笑？ 我说了什么好笑的话吗？

sentences.en: She grinned pleasure at his embarrassment.
sentences.zh: 她因他的尴尬而高兴地笑了。

sentences.en: He grinned a broad smile when I told him the result.
sentences.zh: 当我告诉他结果时，他露出了灿烂的笑容。

words.mnemonic_zh: 发音像“格入引得”，想把东西格着往里引着磨碎
words.example_en: You need to grind the beans before making coffee.
words.example_zh: 你在煮咖啡前需要把咖啡豆磨碎。
words.en_def: The act of reducing to powder, or of sharpening, by friction.

sentences.en: This bag contains espresso grind.
sentences.zh: 这个袋子里装的是浓缩咖啡粉。

sentences.en: This homework is a grind.
sentences.zh: 这个作业很辛苦。

sentences.en: grind a lens; grind an axe
sentences.zh: 研磨镜片； 磨斧头

phrases.phrase: a bit of a change/fool/problem, etc.
phrases.norm_head: a bit of a change/fool/problem, etc
phrases.cn_def: 有点变化/有点傻/有点问题等
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 可以想象一个场景，事情出现了一点小状况，就是有点变化、问题等
phrases.example_en: The new policy is a bit of a change for the employees.
phrases.example_zh: 新政策对员工来说有点变化。
phrases.note: 较口语化，‘etc.’表示可替换为其他合适的名词

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象问题像燃烧的火一样急切，需要马上解决
phrases.example_en: Environmental protection is a burning issue nowadays.
phrases.example_zh: 如今环境保护是个紧迫的问题。
phrases.note: 常用于正式场合讨论重要问题

phrases.cn_def: 对某事的呼吁；要求某事
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 可以联想有人大声呼喊，表达对某事的需求
phrases.example_en: There is a call for more investment in education.
phrases.example_zh: 有人呼吁在教育方面进行更多投资。
phrases.note: 正式表达，常用于书面语和新闻报道

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一条很细的线，跨越它就会有不同，代表细微差别
phrases.example_en: There is a fine line between confidence and arrogance.
phrases.example_zh: 自信和傲慢之间只有一线之隔。
phrases.note: 较正式，用于描述两者界限不明显的情况

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 可以想象在原有的基础上，再添加一定的数量
phrases.example_en: They need a further 20 people to complete the project.
phrases.example_zh: 他们还需要20个人来完成这个项目。
phrases.note: 常用于描述数量的追加，‘etc.’表示可替换为其他数字

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象买到很实惠的东西，就是划算交易，也可联想数量很多
phrases.example_en: He has spent a good deal of money on books.
phrases.example_zh: 他在书上花了很多钱。
phrases.note: 可用于描述数量和交易情况，较口语化

phrases.cn_def: 有某事的历史；有某事的经历
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一个人或事物过去有过相关的事情，就是有其历史
phrases.example_en: The company has a history of innovation.
phrases.example_zh: 这家公司有创新的历史。
phrases.note: 正式或非正式场合均可使用

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一场盛大的活动，有很多客人，就是有大量的事物
phrases.example_en: A host of problems have arisen recently.
phrases.example_zh: 最近出现了许多问题。
phrases.note: 较正式，用于描述数量众多的情况

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象话题像热的东西一样吸引人关注
phrases.example_en: The election is a hot topic these days.
phrases.example_zh: 这些天选举是个热门话题。
phrases.note: 常用于日常交流和新闻报道

phrases.cn_def: 理所当然的事；自然的事
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一件事情按照常理就会发生，就是理所当然的
phrases.example_en: It is a matter of course to respect the elders.
phrases.example_zh: 尊敬长辈是理所当然的事。
phrases.note: 较正式，用于表达事情的必然性

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一个人对某事物狂热投入的样子
phrases.example_en: She has a passion for painting and spends hours in the studio.
phrases.example_zh: 她对绘画充满热情，会在工作室里花上好几个小时。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把镜子里的影像看作事物的反映
phrases.example_en: His grades are a reflection of his hard work this semester.
phrases.example_zh: 他的成绩是他这学期努力学习的体现。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 可以想象用拇指来大致测量，代表粗略准则
phrases.example_en: A rule of thumb is to drink eight glasses of water a day.
phrases.example_zh: 经验法则是每天喝八杯水。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一个让人安心、没有危险的场所
phrases.example_en: They found a safe place to hide during the storm.
phrases.example_zh: 他们在暴风雨期间找到了一个安全的地方藏身。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 可以联想阴影只是覆盖了一小部分，代表少量
phrases.example_en: This dress is a shade darker than the one I saw yesterday.
phrases.example_zh: 这条裙子比我昨天看到的那条颜色深一点。

phrases.cn_def: 基干人员；最低限度的服务
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把骨架看作最基本的部分，代表最少的人员或服务
phrases.example_en: During the holiday, there's only a skeleton crew at the office.
phrases.example_zh: 假期期间，办公室里只有基干人员值班。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一个人在床上翻来覆去睡不着的情景
phrases.example_en: He had a sleepless night worrying about his exam results.
phrases.example_zh: 他因为担心考试成绩而度过了一个不眠之夜。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一个人逐渐适应新环境或新行为的过程
phrases.example_en: He is accustomed to getting up early for work.
phrases.example_zh: 他习惯了早起去上班。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象事情最后回归本质的感觉
phrases.example_en: He decided not to go on the trip after all.
phrases.example_zh: 他终究还是决定不去旅行了。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一个人比约定时间更早到达的场景
phrases.example_en: The project was completed ahead of schedule.
phrases.example_zh: 项目提前完成了。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一群人突然同时出现
phrases.example_en: All at once, the lights went out and the room was in darkness.
phrases.example_zh: 突然，灯灭了，房间陷入了黑暗。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象有人任何时间都在工作
phrases.example_en: He works all hours to achieve his career goals.
phrases.example_zh: 他不分昼夜地工作以实现自己的职业目标。

phrases.cn_def: 考虑到所有情况；总体来说
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象权衡各种因素后得出结论
phrases.example_en: All things considered, the party was a great success.
phrases.example_zh: 总体来说，这次派对非常成功。

phrases.cn_def: 归自己一人使用；独自享用
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象自己独自拥有一个空间
phrases.example_en: I had the whole house to myself last weekend.
phrases.example_zh: 上周末整座房子归我一人使用。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 即便有不利情况，还是要做
phrases.example_zh: 雨下得很大，但他还是出门了。
phrases.example_en: It was raining heavily, but he went out all the same.

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象按间隔规律做事
phrases.example_en: She goes to the gym on alternate days.
phrases.example_zh: 她每隔一天去一次健身房。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象距离目标接近的状态
phrases.example_en: His performance wasn't anywhere near his usual standard.
phrases.example_zh: 他的表现远未达到他平时的水准。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一件事导致另一件事发生
phrases.example_en: He missed the train and, as a consequence, was late for work.
phrases.example_zh: 他没赶上火车，结果上班迟到了。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象意外发生的巧合场景
phrases.example_en: As it happens, I met my old friend in the supermarket.
phrases.example_zh: 碰巧，我在超市遇到了我的老朋友。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象东西数量很多，多得能和其他数量作等量比较
phrases.example_en: There are as many as fifty students in the classroom.
phrases.example_zh: 教室里多达五十名学生。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 联想时间线，截止到现在这个时间点
phrases.example_en: As yet, no decision has been made about the plan.
phrases.example_zh: 到目前为止，关于这个计划还没有做出任何决定。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象快速看一眼某事物就能知晓情况
phrases.example_en: He could tell the problem at a glance.
phrases.example_zh: 他一眼就能看出问题所在。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象物品摆放不是正的，有一定倾斜角度
phrases.example_en: The picture on the wall is hanging at an angle.
phrases.example_zh: 墙上的画挂得有点倾斜。

phrases.cn_def: 按照表面价值；不加怀疑地接受
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像看到商品价格标签，直接按表面数值理解
phrases.example_en: Don't accept his words at face value.
phrases.example_zh: 别轻易相信他的话。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 联想伸手就能拿到东西，或者事情很快就要来临
phrases.example_en: The final exam is at hand, so students are studying hard.
phrases.example_zh: 期末考试即将来临，所以学生们都在努力学习。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象情况紧急，需要马上行动起来
phrases.example_en: You should leave the room at once.
phrases.example_zh: 你应该立刻离开这个房间。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象从一堆东西里随意拿一个的情景
phrases.example_en: The teacher chose a student at random to answer the question.
phrases.example_zh: 老师随机选了一名学生回答问题。

phrases.cn_def: 提前很短时间通知；临时
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象突然接到通知要做某事的情景
phrases.example_en: He had to cancel his appointment at short notice.
phrases.example_zh: 他不得不临时取消预约。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象为了得到某样东西，失去了其他东西的场景
phrases.example_en: He achieved success at the expense of his health.
phrases.example_zh: 他以健康为代价获得了成功。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想到底线情况，就是至少的意思
phrases.example_en: You should sleep for six hours at the very least every day.
phrases.example_zh: 你每天至少应该睡六个小时。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象在某些时间点，就是偶尔的时候
phrases.example_en: He can be quite stubborn at times.
phrases.example_zh: 他有时会相当固执。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把情感或事物连接到某人/某物上，就是依恋或附属
phrases.example_en: She is very attached to her childhood toys.
phrases.example_zh: 她非常喜爱她童年的玩具。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想到不那么显眼、在后面的路，就是小路或后街
phrases.example_en: They took a back road to avoid the traffic.
phrases.example_zh: 他们走了一条小路以避开交通拥堵。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 不好的感觉，就是反感或敌意
phrases.example_en: There is still some bad feeling between them after the argument.
phrases.example_zh: 争吵过后，他们之间仍有一些敌意。

phrases.phrase: be a far cry from sth
phrases.norm_head: be a far cry from sth
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象距离很远，就是差别很大
phrases.example_en: His current life is a far cry from what he had expected.
phrases.example_zh: 他目前的生活与他的预期大相径庭。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 直接理解就是成为笑话，即荒谬
phrases.example_en: The way he handles this problem is really a joke.
phrases.example_zh: 他处理这个问题的方式真是荒谬可笑。

phrases.phrase: be a pain in the neck
phrases.norm_head: be a pain in the neck
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 脖子疼会让人难受，就像讨厌的人或事
phrases.example_en: That noisy neighbor is a real pain in the neck.
phrases.example_zh: 那个吵闹的邻居真是个令人讨厌的家伙。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想到事情的关键在于某个方面，就是……的问题
phrases.example_en: It's a question of whether we have enough time.
phrases.example_zh: 这是一个我们是否有足够时间的问题。

phrases.cn_def: 是稀罕事；是罕见的人（或物）
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想到稀少的情况，就是稀罕事或罕见之物
phrases.example_en: Snow in this area is a rarity.
phrases.example_zh: 这个地区下雪是件稀罕事。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一切都安排好，就可以说都搞定，准备好了
phrases.example_en: The party is all set and people are arriving soon.
phrases.example_zh: 派对一切准备就绪，人们很快就要来了。

phrases.cn_def: （用于指出某事虽好但有不足）当然好，没什么问题
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 事情表面看起来都不错，但可能有隐情
phrases.example_en: It's all very well to suggest a plan, but who will execute it?
phrases.example_zh: 提出一个计划当然好，但谁来执行呢？
phrases.note: 较正式，用于书面或口语中表达对观点的保留

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 得到许可、权力去做一件事
phrases.example_en: The manager is authorized to make important decisions.
phrases.example_zh: 经理被授权做出重要决定。
phrases.note: 正式用语，常用于商务、官方等场景

phrases.cn_def: 对某人来说是坏/好消息
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 事情的结果对某人有利或不利就是好坏消息
phrases.example_en: The new policy is good news for small businesses.
phrases.example_zh: 新政策对小企业来说是好消息。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 心里惦记着某件事，或者事情和某方面挂钩
phrases.example_en: This book is concerned with environmental protection.
phrases.example_zh: 这本书与环境保护有关。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 如同死心一样，坚决不同意某件事
phrases.example_en: He is dead set against changing the plan.
phrases.example_zh: 他坚决反对改变计划。

phrases.cn_def: 应该得到某物；该做某事了
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 按照情况，到时间该有或该做某事
phrases.example_en: The team is due for a victory after a long - losing streak.
phrases.example_zh: 经历了长时间的连败后，这个队该赢一场了。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 话里藏着某个意思，快要表达出来了
phrases.example_en: What are you getting at by saying that?
phrases.example_zh: 你那么说是什么意思？

phrases.cn_def: 对某事感到高兴；因某事而感激
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 因为某件事而心情愉悦
phrases.example_en: She is glad of the opportunity to study abroad.
phrases.example_zh: 她为有出国留学的机会而高兴。

phrases.cn_def: 是个好伴儿；相处起来很愉快
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 和某人在一起感觉开心，他就是好伴儿
phrases.example_en: My neighbor is good company and we often chat.
phrases.example_zh: 我的邻居是个好伴儿，我们经常聊天。

phrases.phrase: be in a position to do sth
phrases.norm_head: be in a position to do sth
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 处于能做某事的位置，自然就有机会和能力啦
phrases.example_en: He is in a position to solve the complex problem independently.
phrases.example_zh: 他有能力独立解决这个复杂的问题。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 处在运气的好状态里，就是运气好啦
phrases.example_en: They are in luck as the last tickets are still available.
phrases.example_zh: 他们运气好，最后几张票还有。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 在合适的位置上，就是就位啦
phrases.example_en: The soldiers are in position and ready for the battle.
phrases.example_zh: 士兵们已就位，准备战斗。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 事情在某人手上，就是由他负责啦
phrases.example_en: The project is in the manager's hands now.
phrases.example_zh: 这个项目现在由经理负责。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 处在某人利益的范围内，就是符合其利益
phrases.example_en: It is in the company's interests to invest in new technology.
phrases.example_zh: 投资新技术符合公司的利益。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 处在公众的视线范围内，自然受关注
phrases.example_en: Celebrities are often in the public eye all the time.
phrases.example_zh: 名人常常一直受到公众关注。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 脑子里有两种想法，自然就犹豫啦
phrases.example_en: She is in two minds about whether to accept the job offer.
phrases.example_zh: 她对是否接受这份工作邀请犹豫不决。

phrases.cn_def: 倾向于认为/相信/同意等
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 有某种倾斜的趋势，就是倾向于啦
phrases.example_en: Most people are inclined to believe the official report.
phrases.example_zh: 大多数人倾向于相信官方报告。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 有针对某人的意图，就是为其设计的
phrases.example_en: This book is intended for beginners in programming.
phrases.example_zh: 这本书是为编程初学者设计的。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像钥匙对锁很关键，它就是某事的关键
phrases.example_en: Good communication skills are key to a successful career.
phrases.example_zh: 良好的沟通技巧是事业成功的关键。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 某人因做某事被大家知道，就是以此闻名啦
phrases.example_en: He is known to solve complex math problems quickly.
phrases.example_zh: 他以能快速解决复杂数学问题而闻名。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 处于缺少某物的状态，就是缺乏啦
phrases.example_en: This plan is lacking in practical details.
phrases.example_zh: 这个计划缺乏实际细节。

phrases.cn_def: 没有某人/某物就不知所措
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 没了某人或某物就像迷失了方向，就是不知所措
phrases.example_en: She would be lost without her mobile phone.
phrases.example_zh: 没有手机她会不知所措。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 意味着是给某人或某物的，就是专为其设计
phrases.example_en: This book is meant for young readers.
phrases.example_zh: 这本书是专为年轻读者设计的。

phrases.cn_def: 担任委员会/小组等的成员
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 在委员会等里面，就是其成员啦
phrases.example_en: He is on a panel to review the proposals.
phrases.example_zh: 他是评审提案小组的成员。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 像打球时紧跟球一样，就是反应快
phrases.example_en: You need to be on the ball in this fast - paced job.
phrases.example_zh: 在这份快节奏的工作中你得反应快。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 处于和某事对立的状态，就是反对
phrases.example_en: Many people are opposed to the new policy.
phrases.example_zh: 很多人反对这项新政策。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 处于被人或生物占据的状态，就是有人居住或栖息
phrases.example_en: This island is sparsely populated.
phrases.example_zh: 这个岛屿人口稀少。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 处于对某情况满意的状态
phrases.example_en: The boss is satisfied that the project is going well.
phrases.example_zh: 老板对项目进展顺利感到满意。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 处于该被指责的境地，就是应受责备
phrases.example_en: The driver was to blame for the accident.
phrases.example_zh: 司机应对这起事故负责。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象很多东西集中在一个中心区域。
phrases.example_en: The population is concentrated in the urban areas.
phrases.example_zh: 人口集中在城市地区。

phrases.phrase: be/have som ething to do with sth/sb
phrases.norm_head: be/have som ething to do with sth/sb
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 和某件事或人有联系，就好像线连接着一样。
phrases.example_en: This event has something to do with the new policy.
phrases.example_zh: 这一事件与新政策有关。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一片曾经繁华的地方现在全是残垣断壁。
phrases.example_en: The ancient city lies in ruins after the war.
phrases.example_zh: 这座古城在战后成了一片废墟。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把路当成方向标，朝着左右拐。
phrases.example_en: Bear left at the next intersection.
phrases.example_zh: 在下一个十字路口向左转。

phrases.cn_def: 绕圈子，不直截了当地说
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 像在灌木丛周围打，就是不直接进去。
phrases.example_en: Stop beating around the bush and tell me the truth.
phrases.example_zh: 别绕圈子了，告诉我真相。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 事情在你没意识到的时候就发生或完成了。
phrases.example_en: Before you know it, the holiday will be over.
phrases.example_zh: 不知不觉，假期就会结束。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 好像落在时间的后面，跟不上步伐。
phrases.example_en: This kind of technology is behind the times.
phrases.example_zh: 这种技术已经过时了。

phrases.cn_def: 比以往任何时候都更好/更快/更快乐等
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 和过去比，现在各方面都达到新高度。
phrases.example_en: He is healthier than ever after regular exercise.
phrases.example_zh: 经常锻炼后，他比以往任何时候都健康。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 像蚂蚁搬东西，一次搬一点，慢慢积累。
phrases.example_en: Bit by bit, he improved his English skills.
phrases.example_zh: 他一点一点地提高了自己的英语技能。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 像皮球落地又弹起来，失败后再次成功。
phrases.example_en: After a business failure, he managed to bounce back.
phrases.example_zh: 生意失败后，他成功地东山再起。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 从所有人的说法来看，就是据说的意思。
phrases.example_en: By all accounts, he is an excellent teacher.
phrases.example_zh: 据大家所说，他是一位优秀的老师。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 从整体和大致情况来说，就是大体上。
phrases.example_en: By and large, the project was a success.
phrases.example_zh: 总的来说，这个项目很成功。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 按照法律规定的方式，就是合法地。
phrases.example_en: By law, everyone must pay taxes.
phrases.example_zh: 根据法律，每个人都必须纳税。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 通过某种方法、手段来做，就是借助于。
phrases.example_en: They solved the problem by means of hard work.
phrases.example_zh: 他们通过努力工作解决了问题。

phrases.phrase: by no means; not by any means
phrases.norm_head: by no means; not by any means
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 从任何方式都不，就是绝不的意思。
phrases.example_en: This task is by no means easy.
phrases.example_zh: 这项任务绝不容易。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 通过某种途径、方式，就是经由的意思。
phrases.example_en: He sent a message by way of a friend.
phrases.example_zh: 他通过一个朋友传递了消息。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 叫人来进行选举、会议等活动，就是宣布举行。
phrases.example_en: The government called an election last month.
phrases.example_zh: 政府上个月宣布举行选举。

phrases.phrase: call off sth or call sth off STOP
phrases.norm_head: call off sth or call sth off stop
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把要进行的事情叫停，就是取消的意思。
phrases.example_en: They called off the concert due to the bad weather.
phrases.example_zh: 由于天气不好，他们取消了音乐会。

phrases.phrase: call on sb to do sth
phrases.norm_head: call on sb to do sth
phrases.cn_def: 呼吁某人做某事；要求某人做某事
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 召唤某人去做某事，就是要求某人做。
phrases.example_en: The leader called on people to protect the environment.
phrases.example_zh: 领导呼吁人们保护环境。

phrases.cn_def: 吸引某人的注意力/想象力/兴趣
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 像抓住一样把某人的注意力等抓住，就是吸引。
phrases.example_en: The beautiful scenery captured the tourists' interest.
phrases.example_zh: 美丽的风景吸引了游客的兴趣。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象新事物像火一样，一‘抓住’人们注意力就流行了
phrases.example_en: This new dance style caught on quickly among the youth.
phrases.example_zh: 这种新舞蹈风格在年轻人中迅速流行起来。

phrases.phrase: catch up (sb) or catch (sb) up BE AS GOOD AS
phrases.norm_head: catch up (sb) or catch (sb) up be as good as
phrases.cn_def: 赶上，追上；达到与……相同的水平
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象跑步时努力‘抓住’前面人的脚步赶上他
phrases.example_en: He worked hard to catch up with his classmates in studies.
phrases.example_zh: 他努力学习以在学业上赶上他的同学。

phrases.phrase: catch your breath; get your breath back
phrases.norm_head: catch your breath; get your breath back
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象跑步后停下来‘抓住’呼吸，让呼吸恢复
phrases.example_en: After the sprint, he stopped to catch his breath.
phrases.example_zh: 短跑后，他停下来喘口气。

phrases.cn_def: 满足……的需要；为……提供服务
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象餐厅厨师‘迎合’顾客的口味需求
phrases.example_en: This hotel caters for business travelers very well.
phrases.example_zh: 这家酒店为商务旅行者提供了很好的服务。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象商家‘迎合’消费者的喜好来卖东西
phrases.example_en: Some TV programs cater to low - level tastes.
phrases.example_zh: 一些电视节目迎合低级趣味。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 当别人提不合理要求，直接坚决回应‘当然不’
phrases.example_en: A: Can you lend me all your money? B: Certainly not!
phrases.example_zh: 甲：你能把你所有的钱借给我吗？乙：当然不！

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 根据不同场景，以不同态度表达否定
phrases.example_en: Hopefully not, but the situation might get worse.
phrases.example_zh: 但愿不会，但情况可能会更糟。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象老师‘查看’学生作业完成情况
phrases.example_en: You should check up on the information before using it.
phrases.example_zh: 你在使用这些信息之前应该核实一下。

phrases.phrase: check sth out or check out sth GO TO SEE
phrases.norm_head: check sth out or check out sth go to see
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象听说有好玩的地方，‘去看看’究竟
phrases.example_en: Let's check out that new restaurant this weekend.
phrases.example_zh: 我们这个周末去看看那家新餐厅吧。

phrases.phrase: check sth out or check out sth INFORMATION
phrases.norm_head: check sth out or check out sth information
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象要做决定时‘查看’相关信息
phrases.example_en: You can check out the details on the official website.
phrases.example_zh: 你可以在官方网站上了解详细信息。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象两个人观点相反，一人说的和另一人相反
phrases.example_en: Contrary to popular belief, he is actually very hard - working.
phrases.example_zh: 与普遍看法相反，他实际上非常勤奋。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 联想大家都遵循的传统观念，约定俗成的看法
phrases.example_en: Conventional wisdom says that early rising is good for health.
phrases.example_zh: 传统观念认为早起有益健康。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象制定计划时，确定的行动方向和做法
phrases.example_en: We need to decide on a proper course of action soon.
phrases.example_zh: 我们需要尽快确定一个合适的行动方案。

phrases.phrase: cover sth up or cover up sth
phrases.norm_head: cover sth up or cover up sth
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象用布把不好的东西盖住不让人看见
phrases.example_en: They tried to cover up the mistake they had made.
phrases.example_zh: 他们试图掩盖自己所犯的错误。
phrases.note: 较常用，口语和书面语都适用

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 联想聚会时有人突然讲个笑话逗乐大家
phrases.example_en: He always cracks a joke to lighten the atmosphere.
phrases.example_zh: 他总是讲个笑话来活跃气氛。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一条路穿过不同的街区群体
phrases.example_en: This issue cuts across different social groups.
phrases.example_zh: 这个问题跨越了不同的社会群体。

phrases.phrase: cut out sth or cut sth out SHAPE
phrases.norm_head: cut out sth or cut sth out shape
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 联想用剪刀在纸上剪出星星形状
phrases.example_en: She cut out a heart shape from the red paper.
phrases.example_zh: 她从红纸上剪出了一个心形。

phrases.phrase: cut out sth or cut sth out STOP EATING
phrases.norm_head: cut out sth or cut sth out stop eating
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象为了健康不再吃垃圾食品
phrases.example_en: He decided to cut out junk food for his health.
phrases.example_zh: 为了健康，他决定戒掉垃圾食品。

phrases.cn_def: 激某人做某事；挑战某人做某事
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象朋友间互相较劲，一方激另一方做难事
phrases.example_en: His friends dared him to jump into the cold lake.
phrases.example_zh: 他的朋友们激他跳进冰冷的湖里。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 从一天到另一天，就是日常的状态
phrases.example_en: They handle the day-to-day problems in the company.
phrases.example_zh: 他们处理公司的日常问题。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: deadly有‘致命地’意思，形容程度极深，所以是极其怎样
phrases.example_en: The lecture was deadly dull and many people fell asleep.
phrases.example_zh: 讲座极其枯燥，很多人都睡着了。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: decision是决定，making是制作，合起来就是做决定即决策
phrases.example_en: Good decision-making is crucial for a manager.
phrases.example_zh: 良好的决策能力对管理者至关重要。

phrases.cn_def: 献身于某事；致力于某事
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把自己的生命都投入进去，就是献身、致力于
phrases.example_en: He dedicated his life to helping the poor.
phrases.example_zh: 他一生致力于帮助穷人。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: definitely表示确定地，加上not就是绝对否定
phrases.example_zh: 这种行为绝对不被允许。
phrases.example_en: This kind of behavior is definitely not allowed.

phrases.cn_def: 依赖于某物；取决于某物
phrases.mnemonic_zh: dependent有依赖的意思，后面接依赖的对象
phrases.example_en: The success of the project is dependent on our efforts.
phrases.example_zh: 项目的成功取决于我们的努力。

phrases.cn_def: 从某物中获得（某物）；源自某物
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把东西从另一个东西里提取出来，就是获得、源自
phrases.example_en: We can derive great pleasure from reading good books.
phrases.example_zh: 我们可以从读好书当中获得极大的乐趣。

phrases.cn_def: 致力于某事；全身心投入某事
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把自己奉献给某事，就是投入精力去做
phrases.example_en: She devotes herself to environmental protection.
phrases.example_zh: 她致力于环境保护事业。

phrases.cn_def: 把某物针对/指向某人/某物
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 将东西引导到某人或某物那，就是针对指向
phrases.example_en: He directed his anger at the wrong person.
phrases.example_zh: 他把怒气发泄到了错误的人身上。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把东西安排走，就是处理、丢弃
phrases.example_en: We should dispose of the waste properly.
phrases.example_zh: 我们应该妥善处理这些垃圾。

phrases.cn_def: 转移某人的注意力/思绪等
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像用新事物把人的注意力从一处引开
phrases.example_en: The magician tried to divert the audience's attention with a sudden movement.
phrases.example_zh: 魔术师试图用突然的动作转移观众的注意力。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象分蛋糕，在大家中间把蛋糕分开
phrases.example_en: They divided the profits up among the three partners.
phrases.example_zh: 他们把利润在三个合伙人之间进行了分配。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像把不好的东西赶走、去掉
phrases.example_en: The school decided to do away with the old teaching method.
phrases.example_zh: 学校决定废除旧的教学方法。

phrases.phrase: do everything in your power to do sth
phrases.norm_head: do everything in your power to do sth
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象用尽自己所有的能力去达成目标
phrases.example_en: The doctor did everything in his power to save the patient.
phrases.example_zh: 医生竭尽全力挽救病人的生命。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 可以想象自己拼尽全力的样子
phrases.example_en: She did her utmost to win the competition.
phrases.example_zh: 她尽最大努力赢得比赛。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象人站在地上，稳稳当当做事
phrases.example_en: He is a down - to - earth person who always focuses on practical matters.
phrases.example_zh: 他是个务实的人，总是关注实际问题。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象从一个资源库中取用东西
phrases.example_en: The writer drew on his own experiences to write the novel.
phrases.example_zh: 这位作家凭借自己的经历写了这部小说。

phrases.phrase: draw sth up or draw up sth
phrases.norm_head: draw sth up or draw up sth
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象用笔把计划、文件等写出来
phrases.example_en: The lawyer drew up a contract for the business deal.
phrases.example_zh: 律师为这笔生意起草了一份合同。

phrases.phrase: drive sb to sth; drive sb to do sth
phrases.norm_head: drive sb to sth; drive sb to do sth
phrases.cn_def: 驱使某人做某事；迫使某人处于某种状态
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一股力量推着人去做某事
phrases.example_en: His anger drove him to make a hasty decision.
phrases.example_zh: 他的愤怒驱使他做出了一个仓促的决定。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象在一件事情的整个进程里
phrases.example_en: During the course of the project, many difficulties were overcome.
phrases.example_zh: 在项目进行过程中，许多困难都被克服了。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像停留在某件事上反复琢磨
phrases.example_en: Don't dwell upon your past mistakes too much.
phrases.example_zh: 不要过度纠结于你过去的错误。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象劝人做事，对方抱怨时说的话
phrases.example_en: Losing weight is easier said than done for many people.
phrases.example_zh: 对很多人来说，减肥说起来容易做起来难。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把努力尝试做事情当成一次“奋进之旅”
phrases.example_en: He always endeavours to achieve his goals.
phrases.example_zh: 他总是努力实现自己的目标。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象认识新朋友开始交流建立联系的场景
phrases.example_en: They managed to establish communication with the remote village.
phrases.example_zh: 他们设法与那个偏远村庄建立了联系。

phrases.cn_def: 使某人/某物成为；确立……的地位
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象把一个人或物放到某个位置上
phrases.example_en: His achievements established him as a leading scientist.
phrases.example_zh: 他的成就使他成为了一位顶尖科学家。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象情况不利，但仍要继续
phrases.example_en: The weather was bad. Even so, they went on a picnic.
phrases.example_zh: 天气很糟糕。即便如此，他们还是去野餐了。
phrases.note: 较正式，常用于书面语和口语表达中衔接观点

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像时不时冒出来的小惊喜
phrases.example_en: She visits her grandparents every now and then.
phrases.example_zh: 她偶尔会去看望她的祖父母。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象结果比预想的还要好
phrases.example_en: The performance exceeded the audience's expectations.
phrases.example_zh: 这场演出超出了观众的预期。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象开车时速度指针越过规定速度
phrases.example_en: Drivers should not exceed the speed limit on the highway.
phrases.example_zh: 司机在高速公路上不应超过限速。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一个人在舞台上直面观众评判，即要承担后果。
phrases.example_en: You made the mistake, so you have to face the music now.
phrases.example_zh: 你犯了错，现在就得承担后果。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象表演摔倒在地，肯定失败没效果。
phrases.example_en: His joke fell flat and nobody laughed.
phrases.example_zh: 他的笑话没达到效果，没人笑。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 强调与所说情况差距大，根本不是。
phrases.example_zh: 他说工作轻松，可远非如此。
phrases.example_en: He said the work was easy, but far from it.
phrases.note: 用于口语和书面语，反驳观点

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 距离某状态很远，就是完全不是。
phrases.example_en: The result is far from our expectation.
phrases.example_zh: 结果远非我们所期望的。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 内心有股力量驱使自己去做。
phrases.example_en: She felt compelled to help the old man.
phrases.example_zh: 她觉得不得不帮助那位老人。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 制作电影的人。
phrases.example_en: The famous film-maker made another great movie.
phrases.example_zh: 那位著名的电影制作人又拍出了一部佳作。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把剩余部分全部搞定。
phrases.example_en: He finished off all the food on the plate.
phrases.example_zh: 他把盘子里的食物都吃光了。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 强调最先和最重要的事。
phrases.example_en: First and foremost, we need to solve the problem.
phrases.example_zh: 首先，我们需要解决这个问题。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 数字代表不同等级。
phrases.example_en: This hotel is a first-rate one with good service.
phrases.example_zh: 这家酒店是一流酒店，服务很好。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 像拼图一样合适地进入群体。
phrases.example_en: She quickly fitted in with her new classmates.
phrases.example_zh: 她很快就和新同学融入到一起了。

phrases.phrase: fit in with sth SUCCESSFUL PART
phrases.norm_head: fit in with sth successful part
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象拼图，一块成功嵌入整体，就是契合
phrases.example_en: His ideas fit in with the project's successful part well.
phrases.example_zh: 他的想法与项目的成功部分很契合。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把东西弄好就是修理，把事情弄好就是安排
phrases.example_en: They need to fix up the old house before selling it.
phrases.example_zh: 他们在出售那所老房子之前需要修理一下。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 开始做事情时先提一点，就是首先
phrases.example_en: For a start, we need to gather more information.
phrases.example_zh: 首先，我们需要收集更多信息。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想到一件事永远结束了，就是永久地
phrases.example_en: He left the city for good last year.
phrases.example_zh: 他去年永久地离开了这座城市。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 一辈子的时间，就是终身
phrases.example_en: The award will bring him honor for life.
phrases.example_zh: 这个奖项将给他带来终身的荣誉。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 持续较长时间，就是长久地
phrases.example_en: He won't stay here for long.
phrases.example_zh: 他不会在这里待很久。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 大部分情况如此，就是在很大程度上
phrases.example_en: For the most part, the project was a success.
phrases.example_zh: 在很大程度上，这个项目是成功的。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就现在这段时间而言，就是暂时
phrases.example_en: For the time being, we have to wait for the result.
phrases.example_zh: 暂时，我们得等待结果。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 不好听、不文明的话，就是脏话
phrases.example_en: Using foul language in public is impolite.
phrases.example_zh: 在公共场合说脏话是不礼貌的。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象摆脱束缚，就是没有了某事物
phrases.example_en: The area is free from pollution.
phrases.example_zh: 这个地区没有污染。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象一无所有，重新开始，就像在空白纸上作画。
phrases.example_en: He built his business from scratch in just a few years.
phrases.example_zh: 他仅用了几年时间就白手起家创办了自己的企业。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像看一场电影，从开始到结束都全神贯注。
phrases.example_en: The project was well - managed from start to finish.
phrases.example_zh: 这个项目从头到尾都管理得很好。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象从某一个特定时刻起，生活开始有了新变化。
phrases.example_en: From that day on, he decided to change his lifestyle.
phrases.example_zh: 从那天起，他决定改变自己的生活方式。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把承诺当作必须完成的任务，努力去做到。
phrases.example_en: He always fulfils his promises to his friends.
phrases.example_zh: 他总是履行对朋友的承诺。

phrases.cn_def: 发挥作用/满足需求/扮演角色等
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像螺丝钉在机器里，要发挥自己的作用。
phrases.example_en: This software can fulfil various functions for users.
phrases.example_zh: 这款软件能为用户发挥多种作用。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象自己朝着目标努力，最终达成梦想。
phrases.example_en: She fulfilled her dream of becoming a doctor.
phrases.example_zh: 她实现了成为一名医生的梦想。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像参加比赛，要达到规定条件才能参赛。
phrases.example_en: The applicant must fulfil the requirements for the job.
phrases.example_zh: 申请人必须符合这份工作的要求。

phrases.cn_def: 取得/失去进展；占/失优势
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象在赛跑中，领先就是取得进展，落后就是失去优势。
phrases.example_en: The new technology is gaining ground in the market.
phrases.example_zh: 这项新技术正在市场上取得进展。

phrases.cn_def: 加快速度/增强力量/获得支持等
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象汽车启动后速度越来越快，力量逐渐增强。
phrases.example_en: The campaign is gathering support from more people.
phrases.example_zh: 这场运动正获得更多人的支持。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 联想基因被人为改变，产生新的特征。
phrases.example_en: Genetically modified crops are a controversial topic.
phrases.example_zh: 转基因作物是一个有争议的话题。

phrases.cn_def: 帮助（某人）度过难关；使通过
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像护送某人穿过艰难隧道，帮其度过难关
phrases.example_en: His support got her through the difficult period.
phrases.example_zh: 他的支持帮助她度过了艰难时期。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把人或物从里面弄出来
phrases.example_en: They managed to get the cat out of the tree.
phrases.example_zh: 他们设法把猫从树上弄了下来。

phrases.cn_def: 控制自己的情绪；保持镇定
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象紧紧抓住自己情绪，让它稳定
phrases.example_en: You need to get a grip on yourself in this situation.
phrases.example_zh: 在这种情况下你需要控制好自己的情绪。

phrases.cn_def: 给某人回复；再与某人联系
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像出去后再回到某人身边，即回复联系
phrases.example_en: He promised to get back to me after the meeting.
phrases.example_zh: 他答应会后再和我联系。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 走进某件事里，意味着产生兴趣
phrases.example_en: She got into painting recently.
phrases.example_zh: 她最近对绘画产生了兴趣。

phrases.cn_def: 惹某人生气；使某人烦躁
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 就像在某人神经上走动，让人烦躁
phrases.example_en: His constant whistling gets on my nerves.
phrases.example_zh: 他不停地吹口哨让我心烦。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 想象从各个不同地方走出来的情景
phrases.example_en: People get out different places to attend the concert.
phrases.example_zh: 人们从不同的地方出来参加音乐会。

phrases.mnemonic_zh: 把某人从身边赶走，就是摆脱
phrases.example_en: He tried to get rid of the annoying salesman.
phrases.example_zh: 他试图摆脱那个烦人的推销员。

phrases.cn_def: 把某事弄清楚；搞明白某事
phrases.mnemonic_zh: 让事情变得笔直清晰，即弄清楚
phrases.example_en: You should get the facts straight before making a decision.
phrases.example_zh: 你应该在做决定前把事实弄清楚。

phrases.cn_def: 让某人理解；与某人沟通成功
